Pero an Pedro a'tam nawpalay ma ntu sawalh. Pants'ik'ischa walh, an yu ancha ixtat'ajun a'tamcha tajumpalayi an Pedro: —Chun sawalh, uxint'i de yu'uncha ; mu uxint'i jamacha'a Galilea, ch'i wach'u ch'uni ch'iwini.
Pus akxni tsukulhcha wa aya najun, chi ixnajuncha li ma sawalh: —Tukmispayi an lapanak yu lhich'iwinat'it.

Walh t'asalhcha an pullux ixli'a't'uycha, wachuncha pastaklhicha an Pedro tacha an ixjunita an Jesús: —Jantuka' a't'uyi katit'asalh an pullux, a't'utucha k'anawna'a li nt'u k'imisp'ay. —Pus sa'cha lhatapastaknani an Pedro, tsukulhcha alhun.

Sawalhka wats'isin, tata'ayxto'opalhcha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin, chi an laktatanincha, chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin, chi ixchuxk'an an israelitajnin yu ixtach'alhkatnan laxla'acha'ank'an. Tach'ilhi'anilhcha an Jesús an Pilato.
An Pilato lhisakmi, juniy: —¿Uxint'i ixrejk'an judiojnin? —Yucha alhtaylh juniy: —Uxint'ich'a nawt'a'un.
Pus an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin ixta'alhtasuycha, pero an Jesús tu tu'u ja'alhtaylh.
A'tam lhisakmipalhi an Pilato juniy: —Tacha an stak talhimuk'ayan ¿jant'u tu'u k'at'ija'alht'ayan?
An Jesús masi chuncha ntu k'is ja'alhtayanalh; pus an Pilato ixli'a'nicha.
An Pilato akxni k'atan ixjun ixmakajuni watichicha tach'in yu ixtask'iniy an lapanakni.
An lakapulach'in ixtanun pumatam tach'in ixjunkan Barrabás, ixjat'atanun ixkompañerojnin yu ixtat'ajama'nininta akxni tat'alasalh jamach'alhkatni.
Ts'anan tala'cha'alhi an Pilato, tajuniy li ma tacha a'tajcha ilhtuyi ka'ilhtulh.
Pus an Pilato jajuniy: —¿Lak'ask'inat'iti li akmakawlh an ixrejk'an judiojnin?
Chuncha jajunilh an Pilato mu yucha ixjak'atsaniya li an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin xliyu ixtalhima'axtani an Jesús li wa ixtaxkaji.
Wachuncha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin tachiwiwalhi an lapanakni para li katajunilhi an Pilato li yucha an Barrabasi kamakawlh.
Pus akxni jaxa'alapalh an Pilato, jajumpalay: —¿Pus t'asuch'a nawnat ak'ilhtulh an yu unat li ixrejk'an judiojnini?
Yu'uncha ixchuxk'ani talakt'asa'opalh tanajun: —¡K'amakxt'ukmuk'acha laka cruz!
An Pilato jajuniy: —¿Tisuncha tala'alhini ilhtuta? —Pero yu'uncha wa palay p'as ixtalakt'asapalay ixtanajun: —¡K'amakxt'ukmuk'acha laka cruz!

Pus an Pilato mu sa'cha ixja'ulaputuni an lapanakni tacha an ixtala'talh'amanta, jamakawnilhcha an Barrabás. Chi an Pilato lhinawlhcha an Jesús li kastakcha ta'ayna'lhi, xli'astan ma'axta'lhicha para li kamakxtukmuk'akalhcha.
Wachuncha an soldadojnin talhi'alhcha tan jalhi'ay junita an laka palacio tan tawlay jamach'alhkat, chi tat'alat'asanilhcha an ali'in ixt'asoldadojnink'an.
Tamala'ch'inilhcha xmumu la'ch'it, chi tama'tanulhcha corona de jalhtukun.
Tsukulhcha tamat'asay ixtajuniy: —¡K'ajama'alht'axt'uncha ixrejk'an judiojnin!
Chi ixtala'pana'acha laka aktiyak chi ixtala'achuj'waycha chi ixtatatso'ottanicha, chi ixtatapayninicha.
Akxni stakcha tamamaxani'olh, tamaxtunicho'olhcha an xmumu la'ch'it chi tamala'ch'inicho'olhcha an yu ixla'ch'it tukan. Xli'astan talhi'alhcha tan tamakxtukmuk'alhcha laka kruz.
Pumatam lapanak yu ancha ixla'pust'ajun, wa tanuchilhka an la'acha'an, junkan Simón, jamacha'a Cirene, ixpayk'an Alejandro chi Rufo, ta'asi t'amalhi'anilhi an ixkruz an Jesús,
tanchun junkan Gólgota, nawputun la'ixla'pa'axi sue'elukut.
Chi ixtama'ot'oputuncha jamaskajanti xaxkan uvaj yu ixtalhiyawnita lhaklhi perjume junkan mirraj, pero ntu otlhi.
Akxni tamakxtukmuk'alhcha an Jesús, an soldadojnin talamala'pitsilhcha an ixla'ch'it, wa ta'amanalh suerte, para li tuchini katalhi'alhcha atamj atamj.
Wats'isini tamakxtukmuk'alh, katacha las nueve.
An la x'akpuxni ixtats'o'nitacha tuchini talhima'nilhcha, ixtats'o'nita: Ixrejk'an judiojnin.
Wachu jat'amakxtukmuk'akalh ixt'uyunk'an ja'alhawnan, ixtapiktutamincha ixjat'ayawkanta tan laxcruschak'an, lhilaxjama'xi chi tan oxi ixmaka'.
Ts'awjcha tapasalh tacha an najunta laxchiwinti Dios, tan najunta: —Wa tachanu wa aycha ma'lhta'alhini wachu talhimalakxtulh.
Yu ancha ixtala'pusa xkayajcha ixtajuni chi wili, wilicha ixtatalakpayajuy. Xtajuniy: —¡ Li k'axlakt'ilhi tajtan, chi li wa la'at'utu wilhchan k'axla'oxich'o'ocha,
¡Chaway k'ama'alht'axt'uk'acha mi'akstu, chi k'at'a'alht'a'ut'icha an laka kruz!
An xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an fariseojnin, wanajcha chuni ixtamamaxani, ixtajuniy: Ali'in jama'alhtaxtulh chi yucha ntucha layi ma'alhtaxtunikan ix'akstu
¡Kata'alhtajulhcha an laka kruz an Cristo, xarey Israel, kala'ts'inawcha, chuncha kakiklaka'iyawcha! Chi masi an yu anchacha ixjat'amakxtukmuk'akanta, wachu ixtamamaxaniya an Jesús.
Atunkulhcha, taputs'isi'olhi chux an lakaat'un, sta las tres akxni ta'oxaycha.
Pus las trescha an Jesús, p'asi chiwinilh, najun: —Eloí, Eloí, ¿lama sabactani? nawputun: KiDios, kiDios ¿tasu li k'imak'a'unt'acha?
Akxni ta'alha'asmatlhi an yu ancha ixtayanalh, talajuniy: —¡Jo'! t'asani an Elías.

Pumatam jats'alaj'alh, mala'ch'uch'uwalh la'atam wa tacha panimak laka vinagre, chi kinkach'imuk'alhcha laka ma'atam k'iw, para li kapuma'ot'ulhcha, chi jajuniy an ali'in: —K'amak'a'untcha, kala'ts'inawcha li kamina ma'alhtajunu an Elías.
Walh an Jesús p'asi chiwimpalh, nilhcha.
Wa akxni an la'ch'it yu ix'uk'alh an laka tajtan lht'it'in tapu'exli, aklht'uyi walh, an talhmani pu'a'taynichalh sta talaktsin.
An ixkapitank'an an soldadojnin oxi la'ts'ilh an Jesús akxni t'asalh chi nilh, pus najun: —"Chun sawalh, ani lapanak Ists'alhi an Dios".

Ali'in t'akunin wachu ani ixtayanalh wa ma'atcha ixtalaka'an. Ancha ixma'yalh an María Magdalena, chi an María ixnatik'an Jacobo xalakat'ikt'i chi José, chi pumatam t'aku yu ancha ixjat'ayapalh yucha an Salomé.
Ani t'akunin ixtach'a'o'ayi an Jesús chi ixta'a'tayjuy akxni ixt'awnachalh Galilea; chi ali'incha t'akunin yu wachu ixtat'a'anta Jerusalén ancha wachu ixtayanalh.
Tats'isilhcha, chi mu akxniy ixmala'asijnikan para li kajastaknankana katunkunanta,

an José, jamacha'a Arimatea jantu talhanan, la'alhi an Pilato, kisk'inilhi an ixlakatunaj an Jesús. Mu yucha wachu ixpakxan'iya an ixlich'alhkat an Dios, chi yucha wachu ay lapanaki ixjunita an tan ix'alin lakchiwinti laka ay juntaj.
Jantu ixliwilayi an pilato li ixnitacha an Jesús, pus t'asanilhi an ixcapitank'an an soldadojnin chi lhisakmilhcha.
An capitán juniya li chun sawalh, pus an José makawnikalhcha an ixlakatunaj an Jesús.
Ixtamajutacha alhtam sábana, yuchacha pula'apamililh akxni ma'alhtajulhcha, chi maknulhcha tanchun ixtantilhpatakanta laktalhpa, an tan ixputanukan yawnilhcha aya chiwx.
An María Magdalena chi an María ixnati José tala'ts'ini tan maknukalh.
La'puslicha an wilhchan akxni jastaknankan, an María Magdalena chi an María ixnati Jacobo, chi an Salomé, takilaktamawlhcha laklhaklhi perjume yu kata'ana lakamuk'anin an ixlakatunaj an Jesús.
Pus xlila'atamcha wilhchan a'taynicho'olh samana, sawalhka wats'isin, ta'alhcha an tan aknuy Jesús, chi jask'unulhcha.
Talajuniy: —¿Tisiyuchacha akintama'osuniyan an chiwx an tan putanukani?
Walh akxni tacha'alh, tala'ts'in mala'xtinukanta an aya chiwx.
Chi tatanuchalh tala'ts'in ch'up'e' wilh pumatam ts'alh, lhilaka oxi ixpa'xti an puta'aknun, wanaj lhmani an sut'ut'u ixla'ch'it, pus ixtalaktalhanancha.

Yucha jajuniy: —Jant'u k'alakt'alhanant'it; ¿yucha an ka tamakxtukmuk'alh Jesús jamacha'a Nazareti p'uxk'awyat'it? yucha la'awcho'olhcha, tucha tu'u tanun; jo' k'ala'ts'int'it, tucha tu'u malh an tan ixtamamata.
K'ajak'i'unit'iti an ixt'alhtanan chi an Pedro, Yucha katatap'ulhniyan ka'ana xalakaat'un Galileaja, ancha k'ala'ts'int'achi'it tacha tajunin.
An t'akunin so'ojo tataxtulh an tan ix'aknuy mu ixtalaktalhanancha, wa xk'ip'ip'icha ixtalay; tu k'is xamati tu'u ixtajuni mu ixtalaktalhanancha.

Mu ixla'awcho'otacha wats'isin an Jesús, yu xlila'atamcha wilhchan a'taynicho'olh samana, yucha an María Magdalenajcha p'ulhnaj talakasunilh, yu ixk'uch'uta akxni ixtala'apaxto'ta la'atujun makxkay'un.
Pus yucha alh jamak'atsanini an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, tan ixtalhita'oxila'alhi chi ixtalhi'alhun.
Akxni ta'alha'asmatlhi an María Magdalena, li t'ajuni an Jesús chi li la'ts'ilh, jantu takiklaka'ilh.
La'puslicha panch'e'ex, an Jesús tamcha jalhitalakasunipalh ixt'uyunk'an ixt'alhtanan, akxni ixtat'ajun tanchun laka tij, ma'spa an la'acha'an.
Chi yu'uncha wachucha tat'alajunilhi an ali'in ixt'alhtanank'an; walh wachu ntu jakiklaka'ikalh.

Xli'astan jatalakasunilhcha an Jesús an ixpumakawtamk'an ixt'alhtanan akxni ixtalakwilanan'olh laka mesaj, chi jalaj'aymalhi mu ntu ixtat'alakiklaka'iya an ali'in li ixtala'ts'intacha li ixla'awcho'otacha, mu sawalhcha lakt'ak'alha ixtajuninita an ixjalhunutk'an.
Chi jajuniy: —K'ap'inchi'it'iti ta ixlijalhi'ay an lakamunulhpa chi ixchuxk'ani k'ajalak'unit'it an lapanakni an laj'oxi chiwinti.
Yu kakiklaka'iya chi ka'a'paxa, kata'alhtaxtuya'; pero yu ntu katikiklaka'ilh, kala'a'iya lhima'alh'ajna.
Chunchuniya katamasuya an yu tajakiklaka'inin: layi katak'uch'uya lakintalakask'i an yu wa tala'apaxt'o'a maxkay'un, chi layi katachiwinina tipalhuw tumpaj chiwinti.
Layi katach'apayanta tsapulin, chi masi kata'otlhi veneno, tu katitalhinilh; katalakpach'apaya an ta'an'anin, chi katatak'uch'uya'.
Xli'astan jaxa'ala'olh an jamach'alhkat Jesús, lhi'ankalhcha an lakt'iyan, piktutawlhchalhcha tan oxi ixpa'xti an Dios.

Chi yu'uncha an ixt'alhtanan tataxtunilhcha talhichiwiniy an ixchiwinti Dios, ta ixlijalhi'ay, chi an jamach'alhkat Jesús ixja'a'tayjuycha, ixjamasunicha an lapanakni li an ixchiwinti Dios sawalh, tacha an ixtala'ts'incha yu la'lhi'a'nin tanlhun ixlaktapasay. Chunchacha kawalh.
Ixluwk'ancha yu ta'a'taynita tats'o'a tani laktapasalhcha an tanlhun yu k'atsayaw kitnan li sawalh,
tacha an kintalakmasunin yu la ixla'chulhk'an tala'ts'ilh akxni a'taynichalh, chi mu yu'uncha jalhimap'a'sikalh li katalaknawlh an chiwinti,

kit'in wachu oxi iklhiwilay, mu oxicha xlak'anti iklhakapu'alh chux an tanlhun, tanchunchaa pu'a'taynichalh. Pus chawayi Teófilo uxint'i mu ayk'at'i lapanak akts'o'niyani ixlakata aniy tanlhun tanischa yu pu'aklaminchalh,
para li oxi k'ak'ats'at'i an yu sawalh t'ach'a an masunik'ant'acha.
Akxni ixjunita rey an Herodes, xalakat'un Judea, ixt'ajun pumatam sacerdote ixjunkan Zacarías ixjat'atala'xt'o'a an Abías; chi yu ixt'iwi ixjunita Elisabet ixjunkan, ixt'alalhila'ts'i an Aarón.
An ixt'uyunk'an oxi ixtat'ajun la ix'ukxlakapu an Dios, chi ixta'ilhtuy sawalhi an ixlamap'a'sin an Dios chi yu ixjalhijuni kata'ilhtulh pus tu xamati lay tu'u ixjalhimuk'ay.
Pero ntu ixtalhit'ajuniy ixjas'at'ank'an, mu an Elisabet tu lay ixjamas'at'anan, chi an ixt'uyunk'an laj'ajincha ixtajunita.
Walh milh wilhchan akxni an Zacarías yucha ixtapatsat'ajun ixlisacerdote la ix'ukxlakapu an Dios, chux ali an yu ixjat'ata'ayxt'o'a.
Ta'amanalh suerte chi yucha la'cha'alh li kala'xawalh an cenciaj, tacha ixtalhilaniycha an sacerdotejnin, pus tanulhcha an Zacarías tan wa lhilakatijtam ma'axta'kan lha'ulan an Dios.
Chi chux an lapanakni ma'spacha ixtatapaynit'ajun akxni ixla'xawat'ajuncha an cenciaj.
Walh talakasunilh pumatam ix'angelh an Diosi an Zacarías, sa'cha ixyalh tan oxi ixpa'xti an tan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan tan ixla'xawat'ajun an cenciaj.
Pus an Zacarías akxni la'ts'ilh an angelh talhanalh.
Pero an angelh juniy an Zacarías: —Zacarías, jant'u k'at'alhan; mu amintapaynit asmatnik'acha, chi amint'iwi Elisabet kaxta'niyan pumatami mints'alh, Juan k'a'ulaniya'a ixta'a'ut.
Sawalhcha oxi k'alhiwilaya'a, k'a'ach'ana'a, chi ixluwk'ani yu sawalhcha katalaj'achana akxni katsukuyacha.
Mu ayi kajuna la ix'ukxlakapu Dios. Jantu kati'otlhi xaxkan uvaj chi k'uch'u, sawalhcha kalhitsukuya an ixTakuwin Dios, masi palaktajunka an ixnati.
Ka'ilhtuya li ixluwk'an an jamacha'an Israel katakiklaka'ilhi an Dios yu xJamach'alhkatk'an.

Chi an Juan katap'ulhniya an Cristo kalhichiwinina an ixchiwinti Dios la ixTakuwin an Dios, chi la ix'alhp'asninti an Elías, para li an xalakpaynin katat'ala'oximixnicho'olhcha an ixjas'at'ank'an, chi an yu ntu k'is taja'asmatnan kataja'asmatnalhcha tacha an yu taja'asmatnan, para li axkni kachina an Jamach'alhkat taja'asmatnancha kajala'china'.
An Zacarías juniy an angelh: —¿Tasucha aklhik'atsalh li sawalhi an yu k'i'uniya? Mu kit'in k'aycha chi an kint'iwi wachucha ay.
An angelh alhtaylh juniy: —Kit'in ijGabriel, la ix'ukxlakapu an Diosi ikt'ajun; yuchaa kimala'achatachalh para li akmin mak'atsaaninin ani laj'oxi chiwinti.
Chaway jant'u lay k'at'ich'iwin, sta akxni chunchacha katapasaya', mu nt'u k'ink'iklak'a'it'i tacha an ijkunan li katapasaya akxni kachinacha ixpanch'e'ex.
An lapanakni sa'cha ixtapakxanta an Zacarías, tucha ixtalhimacha'xayi tuchini ntucha so'oj ixlitaxtuy an laka tajtan.
Walh akxni taxtulhcha, jantucha lay ixjaxa'alay, pus talhimacha'xanilhcha li tu'u talakasunilh an laka tajtan. Wa ixjatamakyawniycha; chunchacha taylhi'alh tuchalay ixchiwiniy.
Akxni la'tsalhcha wilhchan yucha ixtapatsat'ajun ixlisacerdote, ancho'olhcha ixcha'a'.
Xli'astan an Elisabet an ixt'iwi an Zacarías, ja'aynalhcha, pus la'akisi malhkuyu jantucha ixtaxtuy la ixcha'a', ixnajun:
An Dios oxi lapanak, chaway kima'osunilhcha an maxanti xaklhit'ajun la ix'ukxlakapuk'an an ali'in.
Xlila'achaxancha malhkuyu, an Dios mala'achalh an ix'angelh junkan Gabriel tanchun xala'acha'an Galilea junkan Nazaret,
tan ixwilh pumatam jatsi ixjunkan María, tuka' ixt'atsukukan, pero isk'in'ulatacha pumatam ts'alh ixjunkan José, ixt'alalhila'ts'i an rey David.
Pus an angelh tanuchalhi tan ixwilh an María, juniy: —¡Sawalhch'a map'aynik'an! An Dios lhistaktan; chux tacha an tat'ajun an t'akunin, uxint'i sawalhch'a oxi la'ts'ink'an.
Akxni chunchacha alha'asmatlhi chi chunchacha la'ts'ilh an María an ángelh, tucha ixlimacha'xaniy tuchi jala'axa'alanticha tacha an junilh, ixtalhanancha.
Pus an angelh juniy a María: —Jant'u k'at'alhan, mu an Dios oxi lhiwilayan.
Chaway k'ap'akxana'a mijas'at'a, k'alhits'uk'uya'a pumatam mints'alh, chi k'a'ulaniya'a ixta'a'ut Jesús.
Yucha ay lapanaki kajuna', chi isTs'alh yu wilhchalh talhmani kajunkana'. An Jamach'alhkat Dios, reje ka'ilhtuya tacha an David yu ma'anchacha ta ixlila'ts'in.
Yucha ixpujun'alhincha kach'alhkatnaniya an ixla'acha'an Jacob, tu a'tam katimin'olhi an ixlich'alhkat.
Wa chuncha an María alhtaylh an angelh juniy: —¿Pero tasicha li ntuka' ikt'at'awkani?

An angelh alhtaylh juniy: —Yucha an Stalan'a Takuwini kala'chinan, chi an ix'alhp'asninti an yu wilhchalh talhman Dios kamatanchaniyan la ixma'stele', xliyu an stalan'a jas'at'a katsukuya, Ists'alh Diosi kajunkana'.
An mint'alalhila'ts'i Elisabet, an yu ixtajuniy li ntu lay jamas'at'anan wachu kalhitsukuya pumatam ists'alh masi yucha nanacha, la'achaxancha malhkuyu chaway yucha pakxanta.
Mu an Dios yucha jantu tu'u yu ntucha lay ka'ilhtulh.
Pus akxni an María najun: —Kit'in ixma'tsuku an Dios; kachajcha walhi la kijatsukunti t'ach'a an k'i'uniy. Pus an angelh akxni ancho'olhcha.
Alhcha lakats'uniya panch'e'ex, an María sawalhcha so'oyi alh tanchun a'stitawk'a la'acha'an, xalakat'un Judá,
walh tanuchalhcha la ixcha'a an Zacarías, pus la'axa'alaycha an Elisabet.
Walh akxni asmatlhicha an Elisabet li la'axa'alay an María, an ixpalaktajun ixjas'at'a an Elisabet jalht'ujnulh. Chi wanajcha la'tanu'olhi an Elisabet an Stalan'a ixTakuwin,
pus p'aschaa chiwiniy najun: —Chux an t'akunin, uxint'i sawalhch'a map'aynik'an chi an palaktajuman mijas'at'a.
¿Tasu li kit'inchaa kila'minta pixiyalhna an ixnati kiJamach'alhkati?
Mu watacha k'alha'asmatni k'ila'axa'alat'i, sawalhcha achaniy jalht'ujnulh la kimpalakni an jas'at'a.
Sawalhcha oxi para uxint'i li k'iklak'a'it'i yu junin an Dios, mu chunchaa katapasaya'.
Wachuncha an María najun: —La kintak'atsaan ijkuniya an Dios li yucha ay.
Chi an kiJama'alhtaxtunuj Dios ma'an'achayi an kintakuwin,
mu yucha lhakapu'alhi masi wa ixjakilhpatinij ma'tsukucha. Chaway, sta chaway chux tacha an kala'aw'ankana katanawna li sawalhcha oxi yu ikputapasalh.
Mu an yu lay ilhtu'ojoy wa tuchicha, laj'ay tanlhuni pu'ilhtut'ajun an kijatsukunti. Yucha Stalan'a junkan.
Chi tacha an la'aw'ankanta yucha si mapayniya yu kiklaka'iy.
Yucha laj'ay tanlhuni ilhtulh la xmaka'. Ilhtulhi li ntu kawalhi tacha an ixtapast'ak'a an yu wa talaj'ayajk'atsay.
Jamaxtunilhi an ixlich'alhkatk'an an laj'ajin jamach'alhkatni, yu'uncha an wa tajakilhpatinijk'atsayi xalaj'ajin ja'ilhtulh.
An yu ixtalakchawaniy jaxta'nilhi yu ixtama'lhtask'iniy. Chi an jamatuminin wanaj jamaxtuni'olhi ixtanlhunk'an, wachunchacha jamala'achacho'olh.
Ja'a'tayjulhi an jamacha'an Israel, yu'uncha tacha ixma'tsukunin, jantu kapmaj'alhi an ixjamapayninti
tacha ixjajunita an kilakpaynink'an. Masunikalhcha an jamapayninti an Abraham chi an yu katapu'a'p'un'ana, mu ixpujun'alhincha.
An María t'atamakawlhi an Elisabet la ixcha'a ka tacha la'at'utu malhkuyu'. Ixli'astan ancho'olhcha la ixcha'a.
Akxni cha'alhcha wilhchan lhitsukulh ixjas'at'a an Elisabet, ts'alhi lhitsukulh.
Chi an yu wani ixjat'awilh chi an taa ixjalhila'ts'in talakcha'alhcha akxni tak'atsaalh, sawalhcha tat'alaj'achan, mu an Dios masunilhi an Elisabet an ay ixjamapayninti.
La'atsajincha wilhchan cha'alh, talhi'alhcha an jas'at'a tan akach'uk'up'uxnikalh an ix'a'axt'a'a. Chi tacha an junkancha ixpayi ixtalhimapa'a'uputun, ma Zacarías.
Pero an ixnati jajuniy: —Jantu, jantu chuni junkan, kajunkana Juan.
Pus ta'alhtaylh tajuniy: —¿Tasu'u? Tu xamati t'aa lhila'ts'in yu chuncha junkan.
Pus wachuncha tatamakyawniycha an ixpay an jas'at'a tani jumputuncha yucha.
Yucha jask'inilh lakat'ikt'i lht'a'alak'iw chi anchacha ts'o'lhi, najun: —Juani junkan. Pus sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'ni.
Chi wanaj wa akxni an Zacarías laycha chiwincho'olh, tsukulhcha oxi lhipast'ak'a an Dios.
Ixchuxk'an an yu wani ixjat'awilh sawalhcha ixtalaktalhanan; chi taa ixlijalhi'ay an ixla'a'a'stitawk'an Judea ixlaknawkancha tacha an tapasalh.
Yu ixta'asmat'a ixtapast'ak'a: —¿Tisuncha ixlijunti kajuna ani jas'at'a? Mu an Dios ixlistakta an jas'at'a.
An Zacarías, an ixpay an jas'at'a, la'chilhi an Stalan'a ixTakuwin Dios chi manawnilhi yu katapasaya', najun:
Lhimala'puchajuncha an Dios ixJamach'alhkat Israel, mu jala'pixiyalhnalhcha an ixlapanakni, chaway jama'alhtaxtulhcha.
Kintamakminincha pumatami yu lay jama'alhtaxtunun, pumatam yu taa lhila'ts'in an David, an ixma'tsuku Dios.
Tacha an ixjamanawnita an la'stalan'an ixlapanakni yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti ma'anchacha,
li akintamala'xtinuniyani an yu sawalh kintaxkayan chi an yu ntu k'is kintala'ts'imputunan,
li kapast'ak'a tacha an ixjat'atamakajunta laka laj'oxi ixchiwinti an yu japu'a'p'unmincha'aw, li kajalhi'a'tayjuya'.
An kimpayk'an Abraham jurarlanikalh, tan junkan:
Li ka'ilhtuya an Dios katsukuyaw tucha xamati akintitaxkayajla'ts'in, li kinta'achaninchak'ani kat'atapatsayaw,
laka la'stalan'a jatsukunti chi laka laj'oxi lanti la ix'ukxlakapu', chux wilhchan la kijatsukuntik'an.
Chi uxint'i kints'alh, uxint'i kapuchiwininan an yu talhman wilhchalh, mu k'at'ap'ulhniya'a an Jamach'alhkat para li k'ala'oxinin an ixtij.
K'ajamak'ats'aaniya'a an ixlapanakni li yucha jamala'mixiniya ixtala'alhink'an para li katata'alhtaxtulh.
Mu an kiDiosk'an ay jamapayninti lhit'ajun, an lakt'iyan la'atam jatapulhkunu akintamapulhkuniyan.
Kajamapulhkuniya an yu lakaaputs'isni tat'ajun chi an yu la ixma'stele' lhinin tat'ajun. Akintapulhi'anani tan oxi tij.

An jas'at'a tacha ixta'ayay, wachu palay k'ut'ilhi ixjun la ixtakuwin. Chi tan jantu la'acha'ani ta'ayalh sta akxni tsukulhcha jalhixa'alay an ixchiwinti Dios an israelitajnini talakasulh tan lhilhuw.
Lanancha alhi panch'e'ex ixlila'ajunta an jama'paxanaj Juan, an ay xajamach'alhkat Roma ixjunkan Augusto César, lhinawlh li kasakkalh censo taa ixlijalhi'ay an Roma.
Aniy p'ulhnaj censo sakkalh, akxni gobernador ixjunita an Cirenio xalakaat'un Siria.
Atamj atamjcha ixta'an tats'o'nin tanchuncha la ixla'acha'ank'an.
Xliyu an José taxtulhi Nazaret, xalakaat'un Galilea, chi alhcha Belén, xalakaat'un Judea, la ixla'acha'an an rey David yu ma'anchacha taa ixlila'ats'in an José.
Anchacha ta'alh tats'o'nin an José ali an María tacha ixt'iwicha, pero ntuka' ixt'at'ajun. An María ixja'aynantacha.
An la'acha'anka Beleni ixtat'ajun, walh cha'alhcha wilhchan li an María kata'oxiyacha.
Pus anchacha lhitsukulh yu p'ulhnajcha ixjas'at'a, pasmililhcha la ixtipa'at chi p'ilikscha mamalh tan ixjamawakan jatapakxat, mu ntucha inta ixjunita yu para yu'uncha tan laka cha'a'.
Wanicha ancha lanan tan wa jalhi'ay, ixtat'ajun yu ixtalhist'ak'a ixborregojk'an puts'ista.
Walh jatalakasunilh an ix'angelh an Dios. Xlimjcha jamapulhkunilhi tuntala'acho'o an Dios; pus sawalhcha talaktalhanalh.
Pero an angelh jajuniy: —Jant'u k'alakt'alhanant'it, kit'in klalhiminitaw laj'oxi chiwinti, yu oxi k'alhiwilaya'it'it chi ixchuxk'an an ali'in.
Chaway tsukulhcha an la ixla'acha'an David yu katama'alhtaxtuniyan, yucha an Cristo, yucha Jamach'alhkat.
Chunchuniya k'ap'ula'ch'ip'ina'it'it an jas'at'a: K'ala'ch'ip'ina'it'it tan pasmilhmakanta la ixtipa'at tan jamawakan jatapakxat.
Wa akxni, lhuw angelhnin yu tat'ajun an lakt'iyani tat'atalakasulh an angelh, ixtalhilakmilhpaycha an Dios, ixtanajun:
¡An Dios ayi an talhman chi an lakaat'un oxi sa' ja'ulay an yu tala'a'iy an ixjamapayninti!
Akxni ta'ancho'olhcha an angelhnin lakt'iyan, an yu ixtalhist'ak'a ixborregojk'an talajuniy: —Ka'awi sta Belén, ka'aw la'ts'inini an yu kintamak'atsaanin an Dios li tapasalh".
Pus watukan ta'alh, p'asi ta'alh; walh tala'cha'alhcha an María chi an José, chi an jas'at'a sa'cha ixmalh an tan tawajin jatapakxat.
Akxni tala'ts'ilhcha an jas'at'a, tanajuncha tani ixjalhixa'alakantacha.
Pus ixchuxk'an an yu ta'asmatlhi, sawalhcha talhi'a'nilhi tacha an tanawlh an yu ixtalhist'ak'a ixborregojk'an.
Pero an María yucha wa la ixjalhunutcha sa' ixlhatapastaknan'ojoy chux tacha an ixlaktapasay.

An yu ixtalhist'ak'a ixborregojk'an ta'ancho'olhcha, oxicha talhilakchiwij'alh an Dios chi ixtaxta'niycha lhimala'puchajun, xliyu li tacha an tala'ts'ilhcha chi tacha an ta'asmatlhicha, mu chunchacha ixjajunkanta.
Akxni ilhtulhcha la'atsajin wilhchan an jas'at'a, akaxwililich'uk'up'uxnikalhcha an ix'a'axt'a'a, chi Jesuscha junikalh, tacha ixnajunta an angelh li kajunkana' akxni ntuka' istsukuy.

Chi akxni ta'a'tsalhcha wilhchan para li laycha kata'alh stalan'ancho'onin an ixpay chi an ixnati an Jesús, tacha najun an ixlamap'a'sin an Moisés, an José chi an María ta'alhcha Jerusalén malakasuninini an Dios an jas'at'a.
Chunchacha ta'ilhtulh mu an la ixlamap'a'sin an Dios chuncha ts'o'muk'akanta tan najunta: —Yu p'ulhnaj katsukuya jas'at'a li ts'alh, yucha an Diosi kama'axta'nikana'.
Chi para li katastalan'ancho'olhcha tacha an najunta la ixlamap'a'sin an Dios, kalhi'ankalh la'at'uy tuluway u la'at'uy paloma, yuchacha kajama'nikalh.

Akxni chuncha tapasalh, ixt'ajun pumatam lapanak an Jerusalén ixjunkan Simeón, sawalh ixjakiklaka'inin chi oxi lapanak, ixpakxan'iya li an la'acha'an Israel kata'alhtaxtulh. An Stalan'a Takuwin xt'a'aklat'ajuni an Simeón,
pus ixjunita li ntuka' katinilhi li ntuka' la'ts'ini an Cristo yu yucha Jamach'alhkat Dios kamala'achayanta.
An Stalan'a Takuwin ilhtulhi li an Simeón ka'alhi an laka tajtan. Walh akxni, an ixpaynin an Jesús talhicha'alhcha an laka tajtan, para li kata'ilhtuyacha tacha an najun laka lhamap'a'sin.
An Simeón jama'alhtaylhi an jas'at'a chi xta'nilhcha lhimala'puchajuni an Dios najun:
Chaway chuni, Jamach'alhkat, tapasalhcha t'ach'a an xak'i'unit'a, chaway lhi'achacha ak'imak'aw li ajkastaknalhcha, mu kit'in mima'tsuku'.
Chaway kla'ts'ilhcha an minpama'alhtaxtun,
takilhmakchux lapanakni tala'ts'incha li mala'asijnit'acha.
Yucha tacha jatapulhkunu', kajaxa'ala'oya an la'acha'anaxni, chi an xalapanakni Israel ayi katapujuna'.
Tacha an ixlichiwint'ajun an Simeón an Jesús, sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'niya an ixpay chi an ixnati.

Chi an Simeón tapayninilhcha an Dios para oxi katatsukulh. An Simeón juniy an María: —Ani jas'at'a lhimakminkanta para li xluwk'ani katata'a'talh u xluwk'ani kata'ostayalh an xalapanakni Israel. Chi xluwk'ani yu ntu k'is katitala'ts'imputulh.
Pus chunchacha kapuk'atsakana tanischa tajatapastaknan an lapanakni. (Uxint'i tachanu wanaj an la mintak'atsani kapala'pusa espada).

Wachu ani ixt'ajun pumatam t'aku junkan Ana, istsi Fanuel, ixt'alalhila'ts'i an Aser, ixlichiwiniy ixchiwinti an Dios. Nanacha ixjunita. Lakat'ikt'ika lanani t'atsukukalh, pero cha'alh la'atujun k'ata nimakawtijlakalh.
Pus t'at'ip'uxamt'at'i k'ata (84) wa ix'akstucha ixt'ajun. Jantucha ixtaxtuyi an laka tajtan, wa anchacha ixt'atapatsay an Dios, ixlitask'ajayi, akxni jantu ixwajin, chi tunku chi ts'isii xtapayniy.
An Ana jala'cha'alhi akxni ancha ixtayanalh, tsukulhcha xta'niya lhimala'puchajun an Dios, chi ixjalhixa'alaycha an jas'at'a ixchuxk'an an yu ixtapakxan'iy li an Jerusalén kata'alhtaxtulh.
Akxni taki'ilhtu'olhcha tacha an najunta la ixlamap'a'sin an Jamach'alhtkat, ixli'astan ta'ancho'olhcha ixla'acha'ank'an Nazaret, xalakaat'un Galilea.
An jas'at'a tachapuncha tsukulh ta'ayay, sawalhcha tsukulh jalakpastaknan chi an Dios ixmapayniy, ixlist'ak'a.
An ixpaynin an Jesús chux k'ata ixta'an Jerusalén la ixk'atan paxku.
Akxni la'tsalhcha la'akawt'uy k'ata an Jesús, ta'alhi k'atan Jerusalén tacha ixlismanikantacha, ixchuxk'ani ta'alh.
Akxni tamincho'ochalhcha, mu la'ochalhcha an k'atan, tamakawchalhi an Jesús Jerusalén, tu talhakapu'ani an ixpaynin.
Ixtanajun li sna inta ma'minta, tam wilhchancha tajalhtanalh. Walh akxni tapuxkajuycha tan ixtalakminta yu taa talhila'ts'in chi yu tat'alamispay,
jantu tala'cha'alh, pus ta'ampalhi Jerusalén puxkawnin.
La'at'utucha wilhchan walh, laka tajtani tala'cha'alh, sa'cha ixjapujawilh an yu ixtamasuy lhamap'a'sin, ixja'asmatniycha chi ixjalhisakmiycha.
Ixchuxk'an an yu ixta'alha'asmat'a an Jesús sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'niniya an ixjatapast'ak'at chi tacha an ixja'alhtajiy.
Akxni tala'ts'ilhcha an ixpaynin ixtalhi'a'nicha, an ixnati juniy: —Kints'alh ¿Tasu li chunchacha kila'ilhtuyawi? Aminpay chi kit'in tucha oxi ijk'atsanaw li ntucha lay xaklalhitajuyaw.
An Jesús jajuniyan ixpaynin: —¿Tasu li kilapuxkawyawcha, ch'unt'u k'ats'ayat'iti li an la ixcha'a kimPayi lhitask'ini aktawilh?
Pero yu'uncha ntu talhimacha'xanilhi tacha an jajunilh.
Wachuncha, jat'ataju'ancho'olhcha la'acha'an Nazaret an ixpaynin chi taylhi'alhi ixja'asmatni yu ixtajuniy. An ixnati an Jesús wa ixma'a'ojoycha la ixjalhunuti tacha an ixla'ts'in.
An Jesús tacha ixta'ayay wachu palay ixjalakpastaknan, chi an Dios ixmapayni chi an lapanakni wachu ixtamapayniy.

La'akawkisicha k'ata ixch'alhkatnant'ajun an ay jamalch'alhkat Tiberio, akxni gobernador ixjunita an Poncio Pilato, xalakaat'un Judea, chi an Herodes ixch'alhkatnan xalakaat'un Galilea, chi an ixt'aala'ajun junkan Felipe ixch'alhkatnant'ajun xalakaat'un Iturea chi Traconite, chi an Lisanias ixch'alhkatnan xalakaat'un Abilinia,
chi akxni tukancha xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin ixtajunita an Anás chi an Caifás, an Dios xa'alalhi an Juan, ists'alh Zacarías, tan wa la'asa'nik'a.

Pus yucha alhcha ta'a'cho'onu an la'acha'anaxni yu waniy an ayxkan Jordán ixlaklhitamakawni, ixjajuniy an lapanakni li katamapaxalhcha ixjatapast'ak'atk'an, chi li kata'a'paxlicha para li an Dios kajamala'mixinilhi ixtala'alhink'an.

Tapasalhcha tacha an ts'o'muk'akanta laka libro an ixchiwinti Isaias yu ixlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, tan najun: —Pasi chiwinkan an tan tu la'acha'an, nawkan: "K'amala'asijnit'itcha an ixtij an Jamach'alhkat; k'ala'ts'awalanitcha an tan kapumina'.
Tan wa japulh'ot'alh kajat'ap'ujununkana', chi tan lakaa'a'stitawk'an ja'o'spiti ka'ilhtukana'. An tij yu la'lh'awilh kalats'awalakana', chi tan wa la'jalh'ot'alh an laka tij kajat'ap'ujununkana'.
Chux lapanak kala'ts'ina an ixjama'alhtaxtunti an Dios.
Akxni ixtala'cha'ancha an lapanakni an Juan para li kajama'paxalh ixjajuniy: —¡Xjas'at'ank'an tsapulin! ¿Tisiyuchacha tajunan li k'at'a'alht'axt'uya'it'iti an laka lhima'alh'ajna yu minta?

Pus k'a'ilht'utcha yu oxicha tanlhun para li katasulhcha li mak'a'unt'itcha mintala'alhink'an, ch'int'u k'ap'ast'akt'iti li mimpayk'an sna an Abraham, mu an Dios yucha layi kaja'ilhtulh ixjas'at'an an Abraham ani lakwilh chiwx.
An achaj chaway wachucha mala'asijnikanta para li chux an k'iw yu ntu oxi xt'a'a xajatawk'at katicha'xkana', chux ixjataxiyak chi kala'xawakana'.
Pus an lapanakni ixtajuniy: —Pus ¿Tasucha yu aklawi?
An Juan ixjajuniy: —K'axt'a'nit'iti yu ntu tu'u lhit'ajun ixla'ch'it li uxitnan alht'uyi lhit'awnat'it, chi li alini yu uyat'it, k'at'a'ut'iti yu ntu tu'u uy.
Wachu tala'cha'alh ali'in an yu ixtalhach'inin tanlhun para li kajama'paxalh, tajuniy: —Maestro, kitnan ¿tisuncha lay ak'ilhtuwi?
An Juan ja'alhtaylh: —Jant'u k'alhimo'slat'iti k'ajach'inint'it, wa t'ach'a lhi'unk'anat'itch'a k'a'ilht'ut.

Chi ali'in soldadojnin wachu talhisakmilh tajuniy: —Chi kitnan ¿tisuncha ak'ilhtuwi? Yucha jajuniy: —T'u xamat'i k'a'asi maxt'unit tu'u', k'alhimamatcha yu lhajayat'it, chi nt'u k'a'alht'asut'iti xamati yu ntu tu'u ilhtuta.
An lapanakni sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'ni, ixtanajun li sna an Juan yuchacha Cristo.

Pero an Juan jajuniy: —Kit'in wa laka xkani klama'paxayaw, pero kamina pumatam yu palay ay, kit'in jantu, yucha katama'paxayan la ixTakuwin an Dios chi laka jikmi, yucha ntu ikt'acha'ani masi wa ak'o'x'otnilhcha ixwarachi.
Yucha ch'apatacha an xpala, kamaxtuniyacha an xajamakxtalh an ixtrigo, chi kama'ayacha an ixtrigo laka cha'a tan la'oxinita chi an xajamakxtalh kala'xawayacha laka jikmi tan tu a'tam mixa.
Chunchacha ixjajuniy an Juan chi tamj tamjcha ixjapumak'atsaani an laj'oxi chiwinti an lapanakni.

Atumpaj an Herodes yu gobernador ixjunita, an Juan ixjuniya li ntu oxi tacha an ixlay, mu an Herodes ixt'at'awniya ixt'iwi wa ixt'ala'ajuncha yu ixjunkan Felipe chi an ixt'iwi ixjunkan Herodias, chi tanlhuncha ali ixlakata yu ntu oxi tacha ixlay an Herodes,
walh a'tam ilhtupalhi yu ntu oxi an Herodes, palay lhimo'slapalh, malaklhchawlhi an Juan laka pulach'in.
Akxni ixchuxk'an an lapanakni ixjama'paxat'ajun an Juan, an Jesús wachu a'paxli, walh akxni ixtapaynit'ajunka an Jesús, an lakt'iyan tati'achalh.
Chi ta'alhtajulhi an ixTakuwin an Dios, tan ixyalh an Jesús, wa tacha paloma, chi chiwinkanchalhi an lakt'iyan nawkan: —Uxint'i kinTs'alhk'at'i ikmapayniyan, uxint'i k'ima'an'ach'ay.
Katacha la'ap'uxamkawcha k'ata ixpakxanta an Jesús akxni tsukulhcha lhichiwiniy an ixchiwinti Dios. Ixtalhi'ilhtuy li an Jesús ists'alh an José, an ists'alh Elí.
An Elí ists'alh Matat ixjunita; an Matat ists'alh Leví; an Leví ists'alh Melqui; an Melqui ists'alh Jana; an Jana ists'alh José;
an José ists'alh Matatías; an Matatías ists'alh Amós; an Amós ists'alh Nahum; an Nahum ists'alh Esli; an Esli ists'alh Nagai;
an Nagai ists'alh Maat; an Maat ists'alh Matatías; an Matatías ists'alh Semei; an Semei ists'alh José; an José ists'alh Judá;
an Judá ists'alh Joana; an Joana ists'alh Resa; an Resa ists'alh Zorobabel; an Zorobabel ists'alh Salatiel; an Salatiel ists'alh Neri;
an Neri ists'alh Melqui; an Melqui ists'alh Adi; an Adi ists'alh Cosam; an Cosam ists'alh Elmodam; an Elmodam ists'alh Er;
an Er ists'alh Josué; an Josué ists'alh Eliezer; an Eliezer ists'alh Jorim; an Jorim ists'alh Matat; an Matat ists'alh Leví;
an Leví ists'alh Simón; an Simón ists'alh Judá; an Judá ists'alh José; an José ists'alh Jonán; an Jonán ists'alh Eliaquim;
an Eliaquim ists'alh Melea; an Melea ists'alh Mainán; an Mainán ists'alh Matata; an Matata ists'alh Natán; an Natán ists'alh David;
an David ists'alh Isaí; an Isaí ists'alh Obed; an Obed ists'alh Booz; an Booz ists'alh Salmón; an Salmón ists'alh Naasón;
an Naasón ists'alh Aminadab; an Aminadab ists'alh Admín; an Admín ists'alh Aram; an Aram ists'alh Esrom; an Esrom ists'alh Fares; an Fares ists'alh Judá;
an Judá ists'alh Jacob; an Jacob ists'alh Isaac; an Isaac ists'alh Abraham; an Abraham ists'alh Taré; an Taré ists'alh Nacor;
an Nacor ists'alh Serug; an Serug ists'alh Ragau; an Ragau ists'alh Peleg; an Peleg ists'alh Heber; an Heber ists'alh Sala;
an Sala ists'alh Cainán; an Cainán ists'alh Arfaxad; an Arfaxad ists'alh Sem; an Sem ists'alh Noé; an Noé ists'alh Lamec;
an Lamec ists'alh Matusalén; an Matusalén ists'alh Enoc; an Enoc ists'alh Jared; an Jared ists'alh Mahalaleel; an Mahalaleel ists'alh Cainán;
an Cainán ists'alh Enós; an Enós ists'alh Set; an Set ists'alh Adán; chi an Adán ists'alh Dios.
An Jesús sawalhcha ixla'tanu'ojota an ixTakuwin Dios akxni tasp'itcho'ochalh an ayxkan tan junkan Jordán; chi an ixTakuwin Dios lhi'alhcha lakaak'iwin.
T'up'uxam wilhchani ancha ixt'awnachalh. Ancha an xapay makxkay'un ixlila'ts'intanuycha an Jesús. Jantu k'is tu'u ix'uy an Jesús an t'up'uxam wilhchan, xli'astan chawanalhcha.
Pus an xapay makxkay'un juniy: —Li isTs'alhk'at'i Dios, k'aja'un ani chiwx li katatapalalh pan.
An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Ts'o'kanta tan najun: —Jantu wa pancha katiputsukulh an lapanak, wachu kaputsukuya chux an ixchiwinti Dios.
Wachuncha an xaapay makxkay'un a'tam lhi'ampalh lakatam laka ay a'stitawk'a an Jesús, chi lakmasuni'olhcha an laj'ay lhich'alhkat alin lakaamunulhpa chi an ixk'usinti.
Juni: —Akxta'ni'oyancha chux ani lhich'alhkat chi an ixk'usinti, mu kit'ini kima'axta'nikanta, kit'in layi akma'axta'niya yu ikma'axta'niputun.
Li ak'int'ats'o'ott'aniya'a mi'anucha kajun'oya chux.
An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —¡K'ap'inchicha Satanás, mu ts'o'muk'akanta an la ixchiwinti Dios tan najun: "Wa yucha an miJamach'alhkat Diosi k'at'ats'o'ott'aniya'a chi wa yucha k'ak'iklak'a'iya'a."
Walh lhi'ampalh la'acha'an Jerusalén, muk'achalhcha la ix'ukxni an tajtan, chi juniy: —Li isTs'alhk'at'i Dios, k'awarj p'it'i an talaktsin;
mu ts'o'muk'akanta an la xchiwinit Dios: "An Dios kajamakminiyani ix'angelhnin para li katalhistakni,
katama'ch'apayani para li nt'u k'a'ayst'uk'uk'a laka chiwx."
An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Ts'o'muk'akanta tan najun: "Jant'u wa k'at'ilhila'ts'int'anut'i an miJamach'alhkat Dios."
Pus an xaapay makxkay'un akxni la'ts'ilhi li ntucha lay ali lhila'ts'intanuy, makawlhcha, sta apu'a'tamka'.
Ancho'olhcha xalakaat'un Galilea an Jesús, sawalhcha ixla'tanuni an ixTakuwin Dios, chi sawalhcha ixtamispayi taa ixlijalhi'ay an tan ixt'ajun.
Ixjamasunicha an laka lakcha'a tan ixtala'ta'ayxt'o'a an israelitajnin, chi oxicha ixtalhipast'ak'a ixchuxk'an.

Alhcha la'acha'an Nazaret, tan ta'ayachalh, chi akxni sábado tanuchalhcha an laka cha'a an tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an israelitajnin, mu chunchacha ixlismanita, chi sa'cha ixyalh tsukulhcha punajuni an ixchiwinti Dios.
Chi taxta'nilhcha an ixlibro Isaias, an yu ma'anchacha ixlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, pus pux'otlhicha, walh ancha la'cha'alh tan najunta:

"An ixTakuwin Dios la ki'ukxni t'ajun, mu yuchaa kilakpach'apalh la ixmaka para li ajkalhixa'alalh an laj'oxi chiwinti an jakilhpatinin. Chi kimakminta para li ajkak'uch'ulh an yu wa tala'ta'oxila'alhiy la ixjalhunutk'an. Chi para li p'asi aknawlh li an yu taalaklhchawnan kajamakawkalh, chi katajalakawanalhi an yu ntu tajalakawanan. Chi para li kajamakawkalhi an yu sawalhcha jamama'alh'ajnikan.
Chi para li aklhichiwinilhi yu chaway aniy oxi panch'e'ex yu ixnawin an Dios."
Mala'apuxto'cho'olhcha an libro an Jesús, xta'nicho'olhcha an yu ixja'a'tayjunun lapanak, chi tawilhcha. An yu ancha ixtat'aw'ojoy wa sa'cha ixtala'ts'ini an Jesús.
Yucha tsukulhcha jajuniy: —Chaway walhcha la mi'ukxlakapuk'an tacha an ts'o'kantalh.
Ixchuxk'an oxicha ixtalhichiwiniy an Jesús, chi sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'niya tacha an laj'oxi chiwinti ixchiwiniy, ixtalajuniy: —¿Aniy chu ntu yu an ists'alh José?
Yucha jajuniy: —Ijk'atsaycha li akilajunaw aniy chiwinti: —"Jak'uch'unu', k'ak'uch'uk'a mi'akstu! Wach'u k'a'ilht'u ani la mint'un yu t'ach'a lak'ilht'uchi la'acha'an Capernaúm."
Chi jajumpalay: —Ani sawalhi an yu klajunaw, jantu xamati la'a'ikan yu lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios tan la ixla'acha'an.
Chi xluwk'an t'akunini ixtat'ajun an la'acha'an Israel yu ntucha tu'u ixt'apapak'an akxni ixt'ajun an Elias, akxni la'at'utu k'ata apaytat tu ixmin xkan, ay lhichawani ix'alin aniy lakaat'un.

Walh an Elias jantu mala'achakalhi para li ka'alh jala'ts'ini an t'akunin yu jamacha'an Israel, apalij la'acha'an Sareptaja mala'achakalh wani la'acha'an Sidón, para li ka'alh la'ts'ini pumatam t'aku yu ntucha tu'u ixt'apapa'.

Chi xluwk'an yu ixtalaklakap'uch'i'ojotacha ixtat'ajun an la'acha'an Israel akxni ixt'ajun an Eliseo, yu ixlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, walh tu xamati k'uch'ukalh, apalij yucha an Naamán jamacha'a Siriaja k'uch'ukalh.
Akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi, ixchuxk'an an yu ixtatanumanalh an tan ixta'ayxt'o'nun sawalhcha tala'talh'amalh.
Pus tatamakxtulhcha an Jesús an la'acha'an, talhi'alhcha tanchun la ix'ukxni a'stitawk'a tan ixla'acha'ank'an ixjuntachalh yu'uncha, sta anchacha ixtama'aj'ajuputun.
Pero yucha japujataxtulh, alhcha.
An Jesús alh Capernaúm xalakaat'un Galilea, chi akxni ntu xtapatsakan wilhchan, ixjamasunicha.
Ixtalhi'a'nicha tacha an ixmasuy mu ixchiwiniy tacha yu lhit'ajun lhich'alhkat.
An tan ixta'ayxto'nun ixtanun pumatam lapanak yu ixlakpach'apata makxkay'un, pus p'ascha pukilht'asay
najun: —¡ Jijwa! Jesús de Nazaret ¿T'isunch'a la't'ant'a? ¿Wa kilamintawcha lalakt'ilhi'ulanin? Kit'in ikmispayan, uxint'i xnawin Dios.
Pus an Jesús la'a'aymalh juniy: —¡Wasa'cha k'ak'ilhu, chi k'amak'awcha ani lapanak! Wachuncha an makxkay'un, ma'talhi an lapanak tan an ixtayanalh ali'in, pero ntu tani ilhtulh.
Pus ixchuxk'an an yu tala'ts'ilh ixtalaktalhanancha, chi ixtalajumpaxay: —¿Tisu wa tichiwinticha aniy li layi ilhtuy li kata'osli an lakmakxkay'un chi ta'osa?
Taa ixlijalhi'ay an tan ixt'ajun an Jesús sawalhcha ixmispakan.

Akxni taxtulhcha an Jesús an tan ixta'ayxto'nun an lapanakni, la ixcha'acha an Simoni tanuchalh, walh an ixput'icha'o'olh an Simón sawalhcha ixch'apata alhp'as iskakat, pus tatapayninicha an Jesús li kak'uch'ulh.
Yucha tantawilhi an tan ixmalh, la'a'aymalhi an alhp'as jaskakana', pus makawlhcha an alhp'as iskakat, chi wa akxni tayalhcha an ixput'icha'o'olh an Simón tsukulhcha jamaway.

Akxni ta'aknuchalhcha an wilhchan, wa tuchicha ta'an'at ixtapakxanta yu ixtalaklhit'ajun ixta'an'ank'an, talhicha'anilhcha an Jesús, pus yucha ixjalaklakpach'apaycha pumatamjtamin chi ixjak'uch'uycha.

Wachu tamakawlhi tanlhun lakmakxkay'un ixluwk'an an ta'an'anin, akxni ixtat'asay an lakmakxkay'un ixtanajun: —Uxint'i isTs'alh Dios. Pero an Jesús tu ixjamakawniya katachiwinilh. Ixjalaj'aymay, mu yu'uncha ixtak'atsayi li yucha Cristo.
Akxni tunkulhcha an Jesús taxtulh, alhcha tan tu la'acha'an. Pero an lapanakni ixtapuxkajuy pus tala'cha'alhi tan ixt'awnachalh, tu ixtamakawniya li ka'alh, ixtach'apa'ulaputun,
pero an Jesús jajuniy: —Wachu lhitask'iniya li ak'alh nawna an ali la'acha'anaxni an laj'oxi chiwinti yu alin la ixlich'alhkat Dios, mu yuchaa kilhimakminkanta.
Pus an laka lakcha'a an yu ixpulakta'ayxt'okan an Galilea, an Jesús ixlichiwiniycha an ixchiwinti Dios.
A'tamchacha akxni an Jesús ixpiktu an ay xalakxkan Genesaret ixt'ajun, an lapanakni wa ixtapa'asicho'oycha li ixta'asmatputun an ixchiwinti Dios.
Walh an Jesús jala'ts'ilh la'at'uy barco yu wani ixpiktu an lakxkan ixtawilanalh, mu an yu ixtach'apayajuy jatanti ixtaputakutta, ixtala'ch'a'ay an ixpaxo'tank'an.

Pus putajulh la'atami an Jesús an barco, ma ix'anu Simón. Chi sk'inilhka lamapaynin li kastalhka mujulh palay an lakxkan; chi sa'cha tawlhchalh, sta anchacha ixjamasuniyachalh an laka barco tacha an ts'anan ixlakyakalh.
Akxni chiwin'olhcha, juniy an Simón: —Tan talhmancha k'alhip'inchi', chi k'amutcha an minpaxo'tank'an.
An Simón alhtaylh juniy: —Maestro, tuntats'isnicha iktapatsaw, pero ntu lay tu'u ikch'apayawyaw, pero li uxint'ich'a na'un, akmuyacha an paxo'tan.
Walh akxni tamujulhcha, lhuw jatanti tama'alhilalh, ixla'ta'exacha an ixpaxo'tank'an.
Pus tatamakyawlaka'anicha an yu lakatam laka barco ixtatajumananchalh, para li katamilhcha t'ala'a'tayjunin, pus tamilhcha. Tala'tsamalhi an la'at'uy barco, walaycha tatalak'aknulh.
Akxni chunchacha la'ts'in an Simón Pedro, tatso'ottanilhcha an Jesús, juniy: —Ak'ilaj'ost'i Jamach'alhkat Jesús, mu kit'in lhuwi kintala'alhin.
Wa xliyu an Simón chi an ali'in ixtalaktalhanancha li tacha an tach'apayawlhcha an jatanti.

An Jakobo chi an Juan, ists'alan Zebedeo yu ixjat'a'anta an Simón wachucha ixtalaktalhanan. Pero an Jesús juniy an Simón: —Jant'u k'at'alhan; chaway tukan lapanaknicha k'ajama'alhilaya'a tacha ixjama'alhilay jatantin.
Akxni talakmakutu'olhcha an ixbarcojk'an, chuxi talakmakaw'ula'olh, chi tat'a'alhcha an Jesús.

La'atam wilhchan akxni an Jesús ixt'ajun tanchun la'acha'an, la'cha'alh pumatam lapanak yu ixlakap'uch'i'ojota, an lapanak akxni la'ts'incha an Jesús tatso'ottanilhcha chi tamuntitachalhcha lakaat'un, tapayninicha juniy: —Jamach'alhkat, li sna ak'ink'uch'up'ut'u, ak'ink'uch'ut'ika'.
Pus lats'awalalhi ixmaka an Jesús, chi lakpach'apachalhcha, juniy: —Chun, k'at'ala'a'oxit'icha. Wa akxni watukan tala'a'oxilhi an lapanak.

Chi juniy li ntu xamati kajunilh, juniy: —Wa k'ap'inchicha talakasunini an sacerdote, chi k'ama'axt'a'a'acha milha'ulan ixlakata li t'ala'a'oxit'icha, tacha lhinawlh a Moisés, para li katak'atsaa'olhi an sacerdotejnin.
Pero ali ali ixmispakani an Jesús, chi lhilhuwi ixla'cha'ankan mu ixta'alha'asmatputun chi ixtalakask'in li kajalajk'uch'ulh.
Pero yucha ix'an tapaynini tan wa ix'akstu, tan tu la'acha'an.

Tapasalh la'atam wilhchan akxni ixmasut'ajun an Jesús, ali'in fariseojnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin ancha sa' ixtalakwilanalh, yu ixtalakmintachalh xala'acha'anaxni Galilea, chi Judea chi Jerusalén. Walh an ix'alhp'asninti an Dios ancha ixt'a'aklat'ajun an Jesús para li lay kak'uch'unulh.
Wachuncha tichi yu'uncha lapanakni talhicha'alh la ixputamat pumatam lapanak, yu wa ixlaklhtukulunta. Ixtama'anuputunachalhi an laka cha'a', la ix'ukxlakapu an Jesús,

pero ntu tala'cha'alhi tan kataputamaknulh, mu wanajcha lhilhuwi ixjunkanta, pus an ix'a'sti cha'a tatawk'alh, ta'a'stip'uxli lakats'uniya an ix'a'sti cha'a ancha taputamaknuchalh an ta'an'an la ixputamat, ixtan'ajnichak'an an lapanakni tamamalh, la ix'ukxlakapu an Jesús.
An Jesús mu jala'ts'incha li tajakiklaka'inin, pus juniy an yu ta'an'ay: —Amigo, ikmala'mixini'oyani mintala'alhin.
Pus an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an fariseojnin tsukulhcha tajatapastaknan, tanajun: —¿Tisiyuchacha ani li wa lhila'ts'incha Diosi? Wa Diosi yu lay mala'mixi tala'alhin.
Pero mu an Jesús ixjak'atsaniya tacha an ixtajatapastaknan, pus jajuniy: —¿Tasu li ch'unch'ach'a jat'ap'ast'aknanat'iti?
¿Tampiyu yu palaycha wa las, aknawlh: "Ikmala'mixini'ojoncha mintala'alhin", u aknawlh: "k'a'ost'aycha, k'ajalht'ancha"?

Pus para li k'ak'ats'at'iti li kit'in yu kwalh isTs'alh Lapanak layi kakmala'mixiya tala'alhin aniy lakaat'un, La'alhi an yu lakalhtukulunta lapanak, juniy: —Chaway uxint'i ijkunan, k'a'ost'aycha, k'asakt'icha amimputamat chi k'ap'inch'o'ochicha mincha'a'.
Wa akxniy ostayalh an yu ixlakalhtukulunta, sakcho'olhcha an ixputamat, chi ancho'olhcha la ixcha'a'. Xta'nilhi'alhcha lhimala'puchajun an Dios, chi ixchuxk'ani tala'ts'ilh.
Pus sawalhcha ixtalaktalhanan chi oxicha ixtalhipast'ak'a an Dios. Laka ay ixtalhantik'an ixtanajun: —Chaway la'ts'iw yu lhi'a'nin.

Xli'astan tacha an laktapasalh, an Jesús alhcha, walh la'ts'ilh pumatam lapanak yu ixlaklhach'inin tanlhun an laka banco, Leví ixjunkan, sa' ix'wilh tan an ixjach'inin, pus an Jesús juniy: —Ak'int'ap'it'icha.
Yucha makaw'olhi an yu ix'ilhtuy, tayalh chi ch'a'o'alhcha.
Xli'astan an Leví, an la ixcha'a ilhtunilh la'atam wayti an Jesús. Ixluwk'an an yu ixtalhach'inin tanlhun ancha ixtama'wilanalh chi ali'incha lapanakni wachu ancha ixtama'wilanalh laka mesaj.

An xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an fariseojnin kalaks kalakscha ixtaxa'alayi an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, ixjajunkan: —¿Tasu li jat'alakwaynatcha chi jat'alaj'ot'atcha an yu talaklhach'inin tanlhun chi an ma'lhta'alhinini?
An Jesús ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —Yu oxi tat'ajun tu tama'lhtask'iniya jak'uch'unu', an ta'an'anin chun.
Kit'in tu ikminta jat'asanini yu ntu tu'u ixtala'alhink'an, kit'in ikminta jat'asanini yu talhit'ajun ixtala'alhink'an para li katamakawlhcha.
Wachuncha yu'uncha tajuniy: —¿Tasu li an ixt'alhtanan Juan chi an ixt'alhtanank'an fariseojnin sawalh tatapayni chi a'lhuwi ntu tawajini? Amint'alhtanan talakwajin chi ta'ot'a li tu'u'.
An Jesús jajuniy: —¿Chu laycha k'a'ilht'uya'it'it li ntu katawaylhi yu jat'asanikanta tan tama'xto'kan, li ancha jat'a'aklat'ajun an ts'alh yu tama'xt'o'a?
Kachina wilhchani akxni an ts'alh an yu tama'xt'o'a kama'osukana' pus akxni an yu ixtalakwajin wachucha ntu katitawaylhi a'tamin.

Wachu jajumpalh la'atam pulhamacha'xan: —Jantu xamati sit'iy sast'i la'ch'it chi lhila'ts'ap'ancha yu at'ilhcha; li xamati chuncha ilhtuy, tu oxi t'atasuy an la'ch'it, chi an sast'i la'ch'it exa an yu at'ilhcha.
Chi ntu xamati pumujuy yu sast'ika xaxkan uvaj yu laj'at'ilhcha jaxt'a'an, mu an sast'i xaxkan uvaj tan'exa an jaxt'a'an, pus pu'an'ojoy, chi an jaxt'a'an ts'an'aycha.
Yu sast'ika xaxkan an uvaj, yu sast'ika wachu jaxt'a'ani pumujukan, chuncha an xaxkan uvaj chi an jaxt'a'an tu tani talay.
Chi ntu xamati yu ot'a an yu xama'ancha xaxkan uvaj watukan ka'otputumpalhi an yu wa sast'ika', mu najun: —Palay oxi an yu xama'ancha.
La'atam wilhchan akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchan, an Jesús ixla'pust'ajun tan ch'ankanta trigo. An ixt'alhtanan ixta'akatan'ex'iycha an trigo chi ixta'akatanswajp'uxacha, ixta'uycha.
Walh ali'in fariseojnin tat'alajuni an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús: —¿T'asu li ilht'uyatcha yu ntu ixpu'ilhtuka akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchani?
An Jesús ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —Jant'u p'unawt'at'iti tani lalhcha an David akxni chawanalh, chi an yu ixtat'a'anta?
Yucha tanulhi an la ixcha'a Dios chi xa'a'ilhi an pan yu jamatajtanilanti, chi ulh chi jaxta'nilhcha wachu an yu ixtat'a'anta; walh yucha wa yucha an sacerdotejnini lay ixta'uy.
Chi jajumpalay an Jesús: —Kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh Lapanak ikch'alhkatnani masi akxni jantu tapatsakan wilhchan.

Tapasapalh a'tam la'atam wilhchan akxni jantu tapatsakan wilhchan, an Jesús tanuchalhi an laka cha'a tan ixtata'ayxto'a an israelitajnin, chi ixmasuycha. Walh ancha ixtanun pumatam lapanak yu ntu lay xlak'anuy an yu oxi ixmaka'.
Pus an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an fariseojnin sawalhcha ixtalhakapu'ani an Jesús li sna kak'uch'uya an lapanak mu akxni jantu xtapatsakan wilhchan, para li ka'alilhi yu lay katapu'alhtasulh.
Pero mu yucha ixjak'atsaniya an ixjatapast'ak'atk'an; pus juniy an yu ixmaklhtukulunta lapanak: —K'at'aycha, an ixtan'ajnicha k'at'ay. Pus yucha tayalh, sa'cha tayalh.
Wachuncha an Jesús jajuniy: —Aklalhisakmiyaw la'atam jasakminti: —¿Oxi li ak'ilhtulh yu oxi u yu ntu oxi tu'u akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchan?, ¿u li akma'alhtaxtulh jatsukunti u akma'nilh?
Sa'cha jala'ts'ini tuntala'acho'o an Jesús, juniy an lapanak: —K'alats'awalat'icha amimaka'. Pus chunchacha ilhtulh, walh ta'oxinilhcha an ixmaka'.
Pus yu'uncha sawalhcha tala'talh'amalh, tsukulhcha talalhima'achiwiniya tani kata'ilhtulhcha an Jesús.
Anchunu panch'e'ex an Jesús alh tapaynini a'stitawk'a, tuntats'isni tapayninilh an Dios.
Akxni tunkuncho'olhcha, jat'asanilhcha an ixt'alhtanan, chi ixpumakawt'uychak'ani jasakxtulh yu katat'alhtananacha chi kajamala'achayacha kata'alh lhichiwinin an ixchiwinti Dios.
An ixpumakaut'uyk'an chunchuniya ixjajunkan: Simón, yu wachu ixjumpalhkan Pedro, chi Andrés ixt'ala'ajun an Pedro; chi Jacobo chi Juan chi Felipe chi Bartolomé
chi Mateo chi Tomás chi Jacobo ists'alh Alfeo chi Simón yu ixtajumpalay Zelote
chi Judas ixt'ala'ajun Jacobo chi Judas Iscariote an yu ma'axta'lhi an Jesús.

Xli'astan jat'ajatajununcho'ochalhcha an Jesús, chi tan jaswa'alhcha sa' jat'atayalh. Wanajcha ixluwk'an an yu ixtat'alhtanani ixtala'cha'anta. Chi lhuw lapanaki ixtala'cha'anta yu ixtamintachalh xalakaat'un Judea, chi la'acha'an Jerusalén, chi an la'acha'an Tiro chi Sidón yu ixpiktu lakxkan ixtalakwilanalh. Mu ixta'alha'asmatputun chi ixtalakask'in li kajalajk'uch'ulh.
An yu wa ixtala'apaxto'ta makxkay'un ixjalajk'uch'uycha,
pus ixchuxk'an an lapanakni wa laycha li kata'aych'apa'ochalhcha an Jesús, mu ixtala'ts'incha li layi ixjak'uch'u'ojoy.
Chi sa'cha jala'ts'ini an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, jajuniy: —Oxi para uxitnani jakilhpatinin mu uxitnan minawink'ani an ixlich'alhkat Dios.
Oxi para uxitnani yu ch'away lakch'awananat'it, mu oxi k'a'o'ats'aya'it'it akxni k'alakwayna'it'it. Oxi para uxitnani yu ch'away laj'alhunat'it, mu k'alakts'i'ina'it'it.

Oxi para uxitnani akxni xk'ayk'anat'it, ch'i akxni nt'uch'a la'ts'imp'ut'unk'anat'it, chi akxni wa t'ani k'alhich'iwink'ana'itcha, ch'i akxni nt'uch'a oxi lhip'ast'akk'anat'it li kilakiklaka'iyaw kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh Lapanak.

K'alaj'ach'ant'iti akxni ch'unch'a ilht'uk'anat'it st'a k'ala't'a'a'lht'ujt'it, mu an yu k'alhajaxt'uya'it an lakt'iyan yucha ay. An ixlakpaynink'an yu'uncha chuncha stak ta'ilhtulh an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
¡Payni'incha uxitnani jamatuminin k'ap'ulhik'ats'aya'it'it! mu jama'lht'ayanant'atcha mi'achatk'an.

¡Payni'incha uxitnani yu o'ats'at'atcha k'ap'ulhik'ats'aya'it'it! mu k'ast'ak lakch'awanana'it'it. ¡Payni'incha uxitnani yu lakts'i'inat'it, k'ap'ulhik'ats'aya'it'it! mu k'ala't'a'oxila'alhiya'it chi k'alaj'alhuna'it'it.
¡Payni'incha uxitnani yu sawalhch'a oxi lhip'ast'akk'anat'it k'ap'ulhik'ats'aya'it'it, mu aminlakpaynink'an chuncha oxi ixtalhipast'ak'a an yu ntu xasawalh ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
Pero uxitnan yu kila'alha'asmat'aw, klajunaw: —K'ajamap'aynit'iti masi yu ntu tala'ts'imputunan, oxi k'aja'ilht'ut masi yu wa taxkayan.
K'ask'init'iti an Dios li oxi katatawilh masi yu wa aya tajunan, chi k'alhit'ap'aynit'iti masi yu wa talhitama'chapuyan.
Li xamati la'xtisayan, k'alhip'inip'alhi amintala'xtitam; chi li xamati maxtuniyan mixkuju wach'u k'axt'a'nini aminkutun.
Watichicha tu'u sk'iniyan, k'axt'a'nin, chi li xamati xa'a'iniyan tu'u yu minawin, jant'ucha k'ask'inich'o'o.
T'ach'a lak'ask'inat'iti li k'a'ilht'uk'ant'it, wachu chuni k'aja'ilht'ut an ali'in.
Mu li wa yu tat'alamapayniyani jat'alamap'ayniyat'it, ¿T'anyuch'a yu p'alaych'a oxi ilht'uyat'iti? An ma'lhta'alhinin wachu chuni talay.
Ch'i li wa yu'unch'a oxi jala'ts'inat'it yu oxi tala'ts'inan, ¿T'anyuch'a yu p'alaych'a oxi ilht'uyat'iti? An ma'lhta'alhinin wachu chuni talay.
Chi li wa yu'unchaa jamach'ixt'a'niyat'it tu'u yu jalhiwilayat'it li tu'u kataxta'niyan, ¿Tanyu yu p'alaych'a t'am ilht'uyat'iti? An ma'lhta'alhinin wachu chuni talamach'ixta'ni.

Uxitnan k'ajamap'aynit'iti masi yu ntu tala'ts'imputunan, oxi k'aja'ilht'ut, chi k'ajamach'init'iti tu'u masi ntu tu'u kataxta'nin. Chuncha ayi yu k'ajama'lht'ayanana'it'it uxitnan, chi ixjas'at'an Dios an yu wilhchalh talhmani k'a'una'it'it, mu yucha oxi ja'ilhtuy masi an yu ntu taxta'niy lhimala'puchajun chi an yu wa ay tajunita.
Pus uxitnan k'ajamap'ayninint'it wachu tacha jamapayninin aminPayk'an

Jant'u k'ajalhimuk'at'iti li tuchini ta'ilhtutacha ali'in para li an Dios wachu ntu katalhimuk'ani t'uch'ini ilht'ut'atcha uxitnan. Jant'u k'ajamuk'anit'it'i lhima'alh'ajna an ali'in, walh an Dios wachu ntu chuni katita'ilhtun. K'ajamala'mixinit'iti ixtala'alhink'an an ali'in, walh wachu k'amala'mixinik'ana'it'it.

K'axt'a't'it, walh wach'u k'axt'a'nik'ana'it'it. Palay lhuwi k'axt'a'nik'ana'it'it yu wa t'ak'alhcha a'tsamanta, yu wa lhi'o'slaycha a'tsamanta. Tacha p'alhk'ananat'it wach'u ch'uni k'ap'ulhk'ak'ana'it.
Chi jajumpalh la'atam pulhamacha'xani an Jesús, jajuniy: —¿Chu layi xamati lapanak yu la'lhtulu kamalhtanalh yu ixt'ala'lhtulu?, ¿Jantu wa ayxtami kajuluklh ta'alh tan jalh'ot'alh?
An jatalanini jantu yu palay k'atsay, yucha an ixmaestro, pero li akxni jatalaninin'olhcha tacha an ixmaestrojcha kajuna'.
¿Ch'i t'asich'a li la'ts'inicha an k'is laktanun xatap'aksni ts'a'am amint'ala'ajuni, chi uxint'i nt'u la'ts'ini an p'amj laktanuman a'tolo'ontawlhna'a?

¿T'asu li unicha amint'ala'ajun: "Aklakpumaxtuyani an xatap'aksni ts'a'am"? ¿chi uxint'i nt'u la'ts'ini an p'amj laktanuman a'tolo'ontawlhna'a? ¡Uxint'i wa t'a'ukxp'ut'uyunun! P'ulhnajch'a k'alakp'umaxt'uk'a an p'amj laktanuman a'tolo'ontawlhana' walh chuncha laycha k'alakp'umaxt'uya'a an laktanun xatap'aksni ts'a'am amint'ala'ajun.
Jantu tu'u yu oxi k'iw yu ntu oxi kaxta'lhi xajatawk'at, chi ntu tu'u yu ntu oxi k'iw yu oxi kaxta'lhi xajatawk'at.
A'atamin k'iw xajatawk'ati pumispakan, mu ntu layi aktip'uxlicha higo lakaalhtukunan u akp'uxli uvaj lakaajawana'.
An yu oxi lapanak, yu laj'oxi jatapast'ak'ati makutuy la ixjalhunut; chi an yu ntu oxi lapanak, yu ntu oxi jatapast'ak'ati makutuy la ixjalhunut. Mu chux chiwinti laka jalhunuti minachalht.
¿Tasu li Jamach'alhkat, Jamach'alhkat kilajunawcha ch'i nt'u ilht'uyat'iti yu klajunawi?
Watichicha yu kila'min chi ilhtuyi an kinchiwinti yu ijkuni, aklajunawi tichini ixt'achunchacha.

Wanaj tacha an lapanak yu yawlh ixcha'a'. Yucha p'ulhnajcha ja'ajnalh talhman chi akxni la'cha'alhcha an chiwx anchacha mach'atalh. Pus akxni ja'a'muxtunulh tu tani ilhtunilh an xkan an ixcha'a masi p'as talakanuchalh, mu an xjach'aja de chiwx.

Pero yu ki'alha'asmat'a chi ntu ilhtuy, tachanu an lapanak yu mach'atalh ixcha'a wa la ix'ukxni an lakaat'un, jantu laka chiwxi mach'atalh. Pus akxni p'as talakanuchalh an xkan, wa lasi juluklh ta'a'talh wanaj talakt'ilhi'olh.
Akxni chunchacha jajun'olh an Jesús, alhcha la'acha'an Capernaum.
Walh ancha ixt'ajun pumatam xkapitank'an soldadojnin de Roma, ixlit'ajun pumatam ixma'tsuku yu sawalh ixmapayni, an ixma'tsuku p'asi ixta'an'ay, ixnit'ajuncha.
Pus akxni k'atsaalhi an kapitán li ancha t'ajun an Jesús, jamala'achalh ali'in an xalaj'ajin judiojnin, tapayninicha li ka'alh k'uch'unu an ixma'tsuku'.
Yu'uncha tala'cha'alhcha an Jesús, sawalhcha ixtatapaynini, ixtajuniy: —Ka t'acha'ani li k'a'a't'ay'ut'i;
mu yucha mapayniya an kila'acha'ank'an, yucha kintayawnin a'atam cha'a tan ikta'ayxt'o'aw.

Pus an Jesús jat'a'alh. Pero akxni ntucha tukan ma'at ixtacha'ant'ajun an laka cha'a, an capitán jamala'achanilh ali'in ix'amigojnini an Jesús, tan junkan: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, t'u k'alhak'ap'up'i, jantu k'is ikt'acha'ani li k'at'anuch'ita an la kincha'a',
xliyu wanaj tu iktapujulh ak'ancha'an t'asaninin kit'in. Wa k'anawcha li kata'oxilhcha an kima'tsuku kata'oxiyacha.

Mu masi kit'in wachu wa kintalhijuniya an yu palaycha xalaj'ajin, chi wachu ijkalhit'ajuni soldadojnin yu wachu ijkalhijuni. Akxni ijkuni xapumatam li inta ka'alh, an; chi akxni xapumatam ijkuni li kamilh, min; chi akxni iklhijuni tu'u ka'ilhtulh an kima'tsuku, ilhtuy.

An Jesús lhi'a'nilhcha akxni chunchacha alha'asmatlhi, pus sa'cha jala'ts'ini an lapanakni yu an ixtat'a'anta, jajuniy: —Klajunaw, masi an la'acha'an Israel tu tu'u kla'ts'in ay jakiklaka'inti ka'alilh tacha ani jakiklaka'inin ani lapanak.
Akxni tacha'ancho'olhcha laka cha'a an yu ixjamala'achata an capitán, tala'ts'ilhcha li ta'oxitacha an ixma'tsuku'.
Xli'astan tapasapalh akxni an Jesús ixti'an la'acha'an Naín, ixluwk'ani ixtat'a'anta an ixt'alhtanan chi wanaj lhilhuwi ixjat'a'ankanta.

Walh akxni ixcha'ant'ajuncha an tan putanukanachalh la'acha'an, la'ts'in li ixti'ankan maknuka janini', ists'alh tichiyucha t'aku yu ntucha tu'u ixt'apapa', wa pumatami ixlit'ajun ists'alh. Lhilhucha ixt'a'ankanta an t'aku'.
An Jesús la'ts'incha an t'aku pus mapaynicha, juniy: —T'uch'a k'a'alhu.
Stalh la'alhi an yu ixpulhi'ankanta, chi ch'apachalh, pus an yu ixtalhi'anta sa'cha tat'atayalh. Chi junicha an Jesús an yu ixli'ankanta: —Ts'alh, ijkunan, ¡K'a'ost'aycha!
Pus ostayalhcha an yu ixnitacha, sa'cha tawilh chi tsukulhcha chiwiniy. An Jesús ma'axtanilhcha an ixnati.

Ixchuxk'an an yu ixtama'anta talaktalhanalh, chi ixtaxta'nicha lhimala'puchajun an Dios, ixtalaknajun: —Ayi ani yu lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, yu makminkanta ani tan t'awnaw. An Dios minta ma'alhtaxtunu an ixla'acha'an.
Wanajcha ta'a'pitsi'olhi an chiwinti chux la'acha'an Judea, chi chux an la'acha'anaxni yu ixtala'acho'owilananilh.
An Juan k'atsalhi tacha an laktapasalh, mu an ixt'alhtanan tamak'atsaanilh. Pus jat'asanilh ixt'uyunk'an ixt'alhtanan
jamala'achanilhi an Jesús para li katalhisakmilhi li yucha yu kamina u katapakxan'ipala pumatam.

Akxni tala'cha'alhcha an Jesús an yu jamala'achalh an Juan, tajuniy: —Yucha an Jama'paxanaj Juani kintamala'achatacha'an para li ma aklalhisakmiw li sna uxint'icha yu k'at'ana'a u akpakxan'ipalaw pumatam.
Walh ixt'a'akxni tukan an Jesús, ixluwk'ani jak'uch'ulh yu wa ixtata'an'ay, chi yu wa ixtala'ma'alh'ajnan, chi yu wa ixtala'apaxto'ta makxkay'un, chi ixluwk'an yu wa la'la'lhtulu'un, jamalakawanilh.

Pus an Jesús ja'alhtaylh, jajuniy: —K'ap'inchi'itcha mak'atsaninini an Juan yu la'ts'int'it ch'i yu asmatt'it: an la'la'lhtulu'un tajalakawanancha, chi an lakch'anlht'ulukun, talakalhtanancha, an yu xtalaklakap'uch'ita tala'tala'a'oxilhcha, an laj'a'atapan taja'asmatnancha, an yu xtalaknitacha jala'mala'awnicho'okalh, chi an jakilhpatinin jamak'atsaanikancha an laj'oxi chiwinti.
¡Oxi para yucha yu ntu akintiputa'a'talh!

Akxni ta'ancho'olhcha an yu ixjamala'achata an Juan, an Jesús tsukulhcha jalhixa'alayi an Juan an lapanakni, jajuniy: —¿T'isunch'a k'ila'ts'int'it an tan wa jasa'nik'a? ¿Ma'atam ts'a'am yu xmalaklay un?

Li ntu yu, ¿T'isunch'a k'ila'ts'int'iti? ¿Pumatam lapanak yu sawalhcha k'usi ixmala'ch'ininta? Jantu, yu k'usi tala'mala'ch'inin chi yu sawalhcha tama'an'achaputun an la ixpalaciojk'an rejnini tawilanalh.
Pero uxitnan ¿t'isunch'a k'ila'ts'int'iti? ¿Pumatam yu lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios? Chun, yucha sawalh, walh tu wa yuchacha lhilakatijtami la'minta.
Aniy lapanak, yucha an lhits'o'muk'akanta tan najunta: —P'ulhnaj akmak'ana yu ka'ana lhichiwiniy an kinchiwinti para li kamala'asijnilhi min tij.
Klajunaw tu xamati apumatam lapanaki aniy yu chuncha ixli'ay tacha an Juan, walh masi chuncha, anu la ixlich'alhkat Dios masi yu palay wa xalakat'ikt'i, palay ay, an Juan jantu.
Pus chux an la'acha'an chi an yu ixtalhach'inin tanlhun akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi, tapastaklhicha li oxi an ixtij Dios, pus jama'paxalhcha an Juan.
Pero an fariseojnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin jantu tala'a'ilhi li kajama'paxalh an Juan, pus chunchacha tapula'amaj'alh yu oxi ixja'ilhtuniputun an Dios.
Chi an Jesús najun: —¿Tasucha ajkalhimalakxtulh an lapanakni yu chaway tat'ajuni? ¿Tisuncha ixt'atamk'ani?

Wanaj tacha an jas'at'an akxni an talaj'amanajtawlay xtan'ajni an la'acha'an chi talamat'asaycha talajuniy: Klala's'olhniwcha laka s'olh pero, nt'u lak'at'inint'it, chi klamilhpaniwcha yu wa lhita'oxila'alhikan pero, nt'u laj'alhunt'it.
Mu kilachilhcha an Jama'paxanaj Juan yu ntu wa sawalhcha ixwajin chi ntu ix'ot'a xaxk'an uva, ch'i unat'iti li makxkay'uni ixlakpach'apata.

Chi milhcha an isTs'alh Dios yu ixwajin chi ix'ot'a li tu'u, ch'i ch'unch'a ix'ump'alat li wa sawalhcha wajin chi li wa sawalhcha ot'a xaxkan uva, chi li x'amigojnini an talaklhach'inin tanlhun chi an la'ma'lhta'alhinin.
Pero tacha an laj'oxi xajachalh an tanlhun anchacha putasuy an ixjatapast'ak'at Dios.
Pumatam fariseo juniy an Jesús li ka'alh t'alakwayna la ixcha'a'. Pus an Jesús t'a'alhcha la ixcha'a an fariseo, tanuchalh tawilhcha laka mesaj an Jesús.
Walh pumatam t'aku yu ancha ixla'acha'an, yu wa sawalhcha ix'ilhtuy ixtala'alhin, akxni k'atsalhi li an Jesús alh t'alakwayna la ixcha'a an fariseo, lhicha'alh la'atam perjume la xafrasco.
An t'aku ix'alhuncha, chi tantawilhcha la ixjach'aja an Jesús, tsukulhcha lhich'ampaxayi an ix'alhut, xli'astan ch'anxakalhcha la ix'ay chi lakch'ankilhtastuklhicha chi lakch'anmuk'alhcha an perjume.

Akxni chunchacha la'ts'in an fariseo yu ixt'alakwajin an Jesús, ixpast'ak'a: —Aniy li ixchiwinti Dios sawalhi lhichiwiniy ka ixk'atsaalhi tani t'ajuncha ani t'aku an yu lakch'anch'apay, yucha wanaj tu oxi tacha t'ajun.
Wachuncha an Jesús juniy: —Simón, aklhisakmiyan tuchichun. Yucha alhtaylh: —Ak'i'uncha, maestro. An Jesús najun:
—Ixt'uyunk'an lapanakni ixtalhi'ani tichi lapanak yu ixjamach'inita ixtumin: pumatam quinientojo ixli'ani chi an pumatam cincuentaj,
chi mu ntucha lay tu'u ixtalhimapalhnicho'oy, yucha jamak'akxanilh. Chi ¿tisiyuchacha an yu palay kalhimapayniya lhiwilayi? Ak'i'un.
An Simón alhtaylh, juniy: —Kit'in ikpast'ak'a ka yucha an yu palay la'lhuw ixli'ani. An Jesús juniy: —Chun sawalh, chuncha t'ach'a an p'ast'ak'a.

Chi an Jesús la'ts'impalhi an t'aku, juniy an Simón: —¿La'ts'ini ani t'aku'? Iktanuchilhcha an la mincha'a chi nt'u k'ixt'anini xkan yu aklhich'anch'a'alh; pero ani t'aku kilhich'anch'a'alhi ix'alhut chi kilhich'anxakalhi an ix'ay.
Jant'u k'ila'xt'ik'ilht'ast'ukt'i; pero ani t'aku, wa iktichilh tuka' kilakch'ankilhtastuk'ojoy.
Jant'u k'i'ukmuk'a asaytej; pero ani t'aku kilakch'anmuk'alhi perjume.
Xluyu iklhijunan li masi lhuwi ixtala'alhin, mala'mixini'okalhcha, mu sawalhcha jamapayninilh; pero yu wa lakats'uniya mala'mixinikan, wa k'isi jamapayninin.
Pus an Jesús juniy an t'aku: —Amintala'alhin mala'mixini'ok'acha.
Wachuncha an yu ancha ixtat'awilanalh laka mesaj tsukulhcha tapast'ak'a: —¿Tisiyuchacha aniy li wachu mala'mixiya tala'alhini?
Pero an Jesús juniy an t'aku: —Amijakiklaka'inti ma'alhtaxtuncha, k'ap'inch'o'ochicha. Jant'uch'a t'u'u k'alhak'ap'up'i.

Xli'astan an Jesús alhcha lhichiwiniy an laj'oxi chiwinti yu mintachalh la ixlich'alhkat Dios, ta lakachux an laj'ay la'acha'anaxni chi tan wa lakt'ikt'i. Ixtat'a'anta an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan,
chi ali'incha t'akunin yu ixjak'uch'uta akxni wa ixtala'apaxto'ta makxkay'un chi yu akxni wa ixtala'ta'an'ay. Ancha ixma'anta an María yu ixtajuni ma Magdalena, yu la'atujun maxkay'un tamakawlh,
chi Juana, ixt'iwi Chuza, yu ixt'atapatsay an Herodes, chi Susana, chi ixlukancha ali'in t'akunin yu ixta'a'tayjuycha laka tu'u an Jesús chi an ixt'alhtanan.
Lhilhuwi lakminkanchalh lakatamincha la'acha'an, pus wanajcha lhilhuwi la'cha'ankalh an Jesús, chi yucha jajunilh la'atam pulhamacha'xan, jajuniy:
Pumatam lapanak alh maj'ana ixt'in, walh akxni ixmaj'ant'ajuncha, an ali xatalhts'i an yu ixmaj'an waniy laka tiji tamachalh, pus putayakalh chi ta'usaklhi an ts'o'on.
An ali an ixt'in an yu ixmaj'an laka chiwxini tamachalh; pus akxni la'awlhcha lakxixli, mu ntu tu'u xkan.
An ali laka jalhtukunani tamachalh, chi mu wa ayxtami t'ata'ayalh an jalhtukun, pus maxixilh.

Pero an ali tan oxi t'uni tamachalh, pus p'unlhicha, chi oxi alilh, la'atamin t'in tamciento xatalhts'i xta'cho'olh. Akxni chunchacha naw'olh an Jesús, p'ascha najun: —Yu lhit'ajuni ixpa'asmatna, ka'asmatlhi.
Pus an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús tajuniy: —¿Tisuncha nawputun t'ach'a an na'un?

Yucha jajuniy: —Uxitnan layi k'alhimach'a'xaya'it an ixlich'alhkat Dios masi ntu tasuy; pero an ali'in wanaj laka pulhamacha'xani ijkajuni, mu masi tajalakawanan tachanu ntu tajalakawanan, chi masi taja'asmatnan tachanu ntu katalhimacha'xalh.
Aniy pulhamacha'xan yucha aniya jumputun: An t'in yucha an ixchiwinti Dios.

Chi an t'in an yu tamachalh laka tij yu'uncha an yu ta'asmat'acha an ixchiwinti Dios, pero akxni jala'cha'an an xapay makxkay un jamaxtuni'ojoyi an la ixjalhunutk'an an ixchiwinti Dios, para li ntu katajakiklaka'inilh chi ntu katata'alhtaxtulh.

An t'in an yu laka chiwxnan tamachalh, yu'uncha an yu akxni ta'asmat'acha an ixchiwinti Dios, sawalhcha ta'achani ta'asmat'a; pero ntu tajataxiyaklay, jantu ma'ani tajakiklaka'inin, mu akxni jalhila'ts'intanukancha tamakawcho'oycha.

An yu laka jalhtukunan tamachalh t'in, yu'uncha an yu ta'asmat'acha an ixchiwinti Dios, pero ancha panch'e'ex, xli'astan talhimakawcho'oycha an ixlitsukuputunka laj'oxi tanlhun, lhuw tumin chi an ixma'an'achaka jatsukunti, pus tu tu'u taxt'a'a ixjatawk'atk'an.
Pero an yu tan oxi t'un tamachalh an t'in, yu'uncha an yu oxi tama'ay la ixjalhuntk'an an ixchiwinti Dios chi ta'ilhtuy sawalh, pus oxi taxt'a'a ixjatawk'atk'an mu ali tataylhi'an.
Tu xamati makilhnuy la'atam pumaklhku chi ka'a't'alhmuk'alhcha laka a'cho'o, u ixtan'apucha putamat katamaknulh, talhmancha muk'ay para li yu tanuyachalh oxicha kajalakawanalh.
Pus wanajcha chuni tapasay, tu'u yu ntu k'atsakan kak'atsakana', chi yu tats'e'ta kala'cha'ankana', pus kak'atsa'okana'.
Pus chunchacha, oxi k'a'asmatt'it. Yu lhit'ajun, palay kaxta'nikana'; pero yu ntu tu'u lhit'ajun, masi wa k'ischa kaxlitsukulh, kamaxtuni'okana'.
Wachuncha an ixnati chi an ixjat'ala'awnin an Jesús tala'cha'alh; pero ntu lay ixtala'cha'ani an tan ixyachalh mu wanajcha lhilhuw.
Pus xapumatam juniy an Jesús: —Aminati chi amijat'ala'awnin ma'spa tayananchalh, ma tat'achiwimputunan.
Pero yucha jajuniy: —Yu kinati chi kijat'ala'awnin yu'uncha an yu ta'asmat'a an ixchiwinti Dios, chi ta'ilhtuy.
La'atam wilhchan an Jesús jat'atajulh laka barco an ixt'alhtanan, chi jajuniy: —Ka'aw an ixtapiktutam lakxkan. Pus ta'alhcha.
Walh akxni ixtala'pust'ajuncha an lakxkan, yucha lhtatalh. Pus tsukulhcha lay p'as uni an lakxkan, an barco lhuwcha putajulh an xkan walaycha katatalak'aknulh.
Pus tala'alh tamakujulh, tajuniy: —¡Maestro, Maestro, ka kalakniyawcha! Yucha ostayalh, la'a'aymalhi an un chi tacha an milh milh ixlaklay an alamalh, pus wanaj sa' tawilh, sa'cha juncho'olh.
Chi jajuniy: —¿Tanischa t'ajun mijakiklaka'intik'ani? Pus ixtalaktalhanancha chi ixtalhi'a'nicha, ixtalajuniy: —¿Tisiyuchacha ani li masi an un chi an xkan ta'asmatniya li jalaj'aymayi?
Xli'astan tacha'alhcha tan talhiwilananchalh an jamacha'an Gadara, ixtapiktutamcha an lakxkan, yu t'alalakapu'anitacha an xalakaat'un Galilea.

Akxni takutlhicha an Jesús tayachalhcha lakaat'un, la'cha'alh pumatam lapanak yu ancha jamacha'a', ma'anchacha ixla'apaxto'ta makxkay'un, jantucha ixmala'ch'ininta chi ntucha ixcha'a ixwilh, wa laka lakpanteoncha ixtawlay.

Pus an lapanak akxni la'ts'ilhcha an Jesús, p'ascha t'asalh chi tatso'ottatawlhnilhcha la ixjach'aja an Jesús, najun: —¿Tasicha k'ilhtuyani Jesús, isTs'alh Dios yu wilhchalh talhman? ¡Lamapaynin jant'u ak'imama'alh'ajnit'i!

Chunchacha najun mu an Jesús la'a'aymalhcha an makxkay'un, juniy li kamakawlhcha an lapanak. Wanajcha a'lhuwi ixputawlachilh, masi ixch'i'ulakan laka cadena ixlaj'exa chi an makxkay'un ixli'ancha tan tu la'acha'an.
An Jesús lhisakmi juniy: —¿T'asich'a unk'an? Yucha najun: —Legión. Mu wanaj lhuw makxkay'uni ixtala'apaxto'ta.
An lakmakxkay'un sawalhcha ixtatapayniniya an Jesús li ntu kajamak'alhi tan tu inta kilhimaktay putalhman.
Ixtajuniy li kajamakawnilh li yu'uncha an p'axnincha katala'apaxt'o'a', mu wa ancha a'stitawk'a lhuw p'axnini ixta'ex'wayt'ajun, pus jamakawnilhcha.
Akxni tamakawlhcha an lapanak an lakmakxkay'un, yu'uncha an p'axnincha tala'apaxto'olh, pus wanaj t'o'o'o tata'aj'aju'olh an lakxkan, talak'aksk'anj'u'olh.
Pus an yu ixtalhist'ak'a an p'axnin akxni chunchacha tala'ts'ilh, talakats'alalhcha, ta'alhcha jamak'atsaaninini an la'acha'an chi masi tan wa jalhi'ay.

Pus an lapanakni ta'alhcha la'ts'inini tuchini tapasalhcha; tala'cha'alhcha an Jesús, chi an lapanak an yu tamakawlh lakmakxkay'un sa'cha ix'wilh la ixjach'aja an Jesús, ixmala'ch'inincho'otacha chi oxicha ixjalakpastaknancho'oy; pus ixtalaktalhanancha.
An yu tala'ts'ilh tanischa lhik'uch'uk'alh an yu ixtala'apaxto'ta makxkay'un ixtat'alajunicha an ali'in.

Wachuncha ixchuxk'an tacha an ts'anaks ixta'ayxto'nun an yu ancha ixtalhilakwilanalh xalakat'un Gadara, tatapayninilhcha an Jesús li ka'alhcha, mu sawalhcha ixtalaktalhanan, pus an Jesús tajucho'olhcha an laka barco, alhcha.
Pero an lapanak an yu tamakawlh lakmakxkay'un sawalhcha ixt'ak'uxa'ani an Jesús, pero an Jesús tu makawnilh, juniy:

K'ap'inch'o'ochicha mincha'a, k'alaknawna'acha tuchi laj'ay tanlhuncha lay ilhtuy an Dios, tani ilhtuncha. Pus yucha alhcha, ixlaknajuncha an la'acha'an tuchi laj'ay tanlhuncha lay ilhtuy an Jesús, tani ilhtulhcha yucha.
Akxni cha'ancho'olhcha an ixtapiktutam lakxkan an Jesús, sawalhcha talaj'achani talakatastuklhi an lapanakni, mu anchacha ts'anaks ixtapakxan'ita.
Wachuncha cha'alh pumatam lapanak junkan Jairo, xajefe an laka cha'a tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an israelitajnin, tatso'ottanilhcha la ixjach'aja an Jesús, chi tapaynisk'inilhcha li kat'a'alh la ixcha'a'.
Mu wa pumatam istsi ixlit'ajun katacha la'akawt'uycha k'ata ixpakxanta chi ixnit'ajuncha. Akxni ixtit'a'ancha an Jesús sawalhcha ixtapa'asi mu wanajcha lhilhuwi ixch'a'o'akanta.
Pus pumatam t'aku yu ancha ixma'anta, la'akawt'uycha k'ata ixta'an'ay, wa ixmaj'an ixjak'alhni, chi ixmakamin'ojotacha ixtumin laka lakjak'uch'unu pero ntu layi ixtak'uch'uy.
Pus ch'a'o'ayawlh, la x'a'lhch'a pupiktuch'apanichalh an ixla'ch'it, walh wa akxniy sa' tayanilh an ixjak'alhni.

Pus an Jesús jajuniy: —¿Tisiyuchacha ki'aych'apachalh? Pero ntu xamati tu'u alhtaylh. Pus an Pedro chi an yu ancha ixtat'ayanalh tajuniy: —Maestro, sawalhcha tapa'asiyan chi tatisamaj'anan, mu wanajcha lhilhuw, ch'i lhasakminini tichini aych'apacha'ancha.
Pero an Jesús wa jajumpalay: —Kaxamati ki'aych'apachalh, mu ijk'atsayi li tak'uch'ulhi akxni an ki'aych'apachalh.

Pus akxni an t'aku la'ts'ilhi li ntu lay kati'alhtats'e'lhi, talhanajla'alhi an Jesús chi tatso'ottanilhcha la ixjach'aja. Junilhcha an Jesús la ix'ukxlakapuk'an chux an yu ixta'ayxto'nun tuchini lhi'aych'apachalhcha chi li akxnicha ta'oxilh.
Pus an Jesús juniy: —Kintsi', amijakiklaka'inti p'ut'ak'uch'ut'icha. Lhi'achacha k'ap'inch'o'ochi.

Ixchiwint'ajunka an Jesús, cha'alhcha pumatami yu minchalh la ixcha'a an xla'ts'ilhi'an laka cha'a tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an israelitajnin, juniy: —Amintsi nilhcha, t'uch'a ali k'ama'ach'ap'u an Maestro.
Pero an Jesús asmatlhi pus juniy: —Jant'u k'at'alhan, wa k'ajak'iklak'a'incha, walh kata'alhtaxtuya'.
Akxni cha'alhcha an laka cha'a an Jesús, jantu wa tichicha makawnilhi kat'atanulh, wa yucha an Pedro chi Jacobo chi Juan chi an ixpay chi an ixnati an jatsi'.
Ixtalhita'oxila'alhicha chi ixtalhilaj'alhuncha an yu ancha ixtatanumanalh, pero an Jesús jajuniy: —Jant'u k'alaj'alhunt'it; mu ntu nita an jatsi', wa lhtatay.
Yu'uncha wa xtalhits'i'in, mu ixtala'ts'incha li ixnitacha.
Pero an Jesús ma'ch'apachalh, p'ascha juniy: —¡K'a'ost'aycha jatsi'!
Wachuncha la'awcho'olh watukan, chi ostayalhcha, chi an Jesús lhinawlhcha li kamawakalh.
Pus an ixpaynin an jatsi ixtalhi'a'nicha; pero an Jesús jajuniyli ntu xamati katajunilh tacha an tapasalh.
An Jesús jama'ayxto'olhi an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan chi ja'ilhtulhcha li lay katatamakxtuya tanlhun lakmakxkay'un chi li layi katak'uch'uya wa tuchicha ta'an'at.
Jamala'achalhcha li kata'alh lhichiwinin an ixlich'alhkat Dios chi li katak'uch'ulh an ta'an'anin.
Jajuniy: —T'u t'u'u k'alhip'it'it para laka tij, t'u k'alhip'it'iti minpalikk'an, chi mibolsajk'an, chi pan, chi tumin, chi alht'uy mila'ch'itk'an.
Wa t'anch'unch'a k'ach'ip'ina'it laka cha'a wa anch'ach'a k'at'awla'it, sta akxni k'ap'inch'o'oya'itcha.
Chi wa tanchuncha la'acha'an t'u la'a'ik'anat'it, k'at'axt'ut'it, chi k'alakch'ank'alhap'uxk'ant'iti an po'xmi para li katak'atsalhi li ntu oxi tacha an talay.
Pus yu'uncha tataxtunilhcha ta lakachux an la'acha'anaxni, ixtalhichiwiniycha an laj'oxi chiwinti chi ixtajak'uch'ununcha.
An rey Herodes k'atsalhi tacha an ixlaktapasay, pus tucha ixlimacha'xay mu ali'in ixtalaknajun li ma yucha an Juancha la'awcho'olh,
ali'in ixtalaknajun ma yucha an Eliascha talakasucho'olh, chi ali'in ixtalaknajun ma wa xatichicha an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Diosi la'awcho'olh.
Pero an Herodes najun: —An Juan kit'ini iklhinawlh li ka'a'cha'xkalh, ¿tisiyuchacha an yu lhichiwinkani? Pus ixmispaputuncha.
Akxni tala'cha'ancho'olhcha an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús tajunicha tuchini ta'ilhtulhcha. Yucha ja'aylhi'alhcha tan wa ix'akstuk'an an la'acha'an Betsaida tan tu la'acha'an.
Pero akxni an lapanakni tak'atsaalh, tach'a'o'alh, pus tala'cha'alhi an Jesús, yucha jala'a'ilh, tsukulhcha jalhixa'alayi an ixlich'alhkat Dios chi ixjak'uch'uycha an yu wa ixtata'an'ay.

Akxni ixta'oxat'ajuncha tala'cha'alhcha an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, tajuniy: —K'ajamala'ach'ach'o'ocha an lapanakni para li kata'alhcha puxkawnini tanchuncha katajastaknana chi para li kata'alhcha puxkawnini an la'acha'anaxni u masi tan wa lakalakrancho yu kata'uya', an tan wani laklhitamakajun, mu ani ntu tu'u alin.
An Jesús jajuniy: —K'ajaxt'a'nitcha uxitnani yu kata'uya'. Yu'uncha ta'alhtaylh: —Wa a'xkisi pan chi ma'at'uy jatanti iklhit'awnaw, ka wanaj ak'aw jatamawninini yu kata'ulh tacha an ta'ayxto'nun.
Tacha la'akisi milh lapanakni ixta'ayxto'nun. An Jesús jajuniyan ixt'alhtanan: —K'a'unitka li katalaktawilhka', t'up'uxamkawincha (50) katalaktawilh kilhmaktamin.
Pus chunchacha ta'ilhtulh.

Chi an Jesús xa'a'ilhcha an a'xkisi pan chi an ma'at'uy jatanti, tala'st'alhcha an lakt'iyan, li xta'lhicha lhimala'puchajun chi la'ch'e'elhcha, jala'xta'nilhcha an ixt'alhtanan para li katamala'pitsilhcha.
Pus ixchuxk'ancha talak'ulh, talhikiklalhcha. Chi an yu ntucha lay ta'o'olh xaxajni tamach'ixtamicho'olh la'akawt'uy canasta.
A'tamchacha akxni ixtapaynit'ajun wa ix'akstu an Jesús, jajuniyan ixt'alhtanan mu ancha ixtat'a'aklat'ajun: —¿Tisi kit'incha tanajun an lapanakni?
Yu'uncha tajuniy: —Ali'in tanajun ma Jama'paxanaj Juank'at'i, ali'in ma Eliask'at'i, chi ali'in tanajun ma xamati yu an ma'anchacha ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Diosi la'awcho'olh.
Pus yucha jajuniy: —¿Chi uxitnan tisi kit'inch'a nawnat'iti? An Pedro juniy: —Uxint'i ixCristo Dios.
An Jesús sawalhcha jajuniyli ntu k'is xamati katajunilh.

Chi jajuniy: —Kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh Lapanak akstakma'alh'ajnana', chi ntu akintitala'ts'imputulhi an laktatanincha chi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin. Akintama'niya pero ixlila'at'utu wilhchan akla'awcho'oya'.
Chi tan ixchuxchak'an jajuniy: —Li xamati kint'alhtana jumputun, kamakawlhcha yu wa xjatapast'ak'atcha, kaxa'a'ilhcha xcruz yu lay kapuma'nikalh chi akinch'a'o'alhcha.
Mu yu kama'alhtaxtuputuna ixjatsukunti, kama'ats'an'aya', pero yu kama'ats'an'aya ixjatsukunti kilakata, kama'alhtaxtuya'.
¿Tasipi lhila'ancha masi an lapanak wanajcha ix'anu kajun'olh an lakamunulhpa, li wa akstu lakt'ilhi'ulakancha chi wa akstu ma'ats'an'akancha?
Yu kint'amaxanan chi t'amaxanani an kinchiwinti wachu akt'amaxanana akxni akmina tacha Rey, la ixmakalip'at an kimPay chi la ixmakalip'atk'an an stalan'a ix'angelhnin.
Pero klajunaw an ali'in yu ani tat'ajun jantu katitanilhi li ntuka' tala'ts'ini an ixlich'alhkat Dios.
Xli'astan katacha la'atsajincha wilhchan la'pusli chuncha ixjalhixa'alata an Jesús, jat'a'alhcha an Pedro chi Juan chi an Jacobo tanchun a'stitawk'a, alhcha tapaynini'.
Akxni ixtapaynit'ajuncha, an ix'ukxpu tapaxalhcha, chi an ixla'ch'it wa sut'ut'ucha walh chi wa xlimjnik'acha.
Chi tatalakasulhcha ixt'uyunk'an lapanakni yu ixtat'achiwiniy. Yu'uncha an Moisés chi an Elías.
Wa xlimjcha ixjunita ixtuntala'acho'ok'an, ixtalhit'alakchiwiniycha an Jesús li ka'anacha, mu wa k'ischa ists'an'ani yu kamuktaxtuya an la'acha'an Jerusalén.
Pus an Pedro chi an yu ixtat'a'anta masi sawalhcha ixtalaklhtataputun talhitayanilh, tala'ts'ilhi li an Jesús ay, wa xlimnik'acha ixjunita chi an ixt'uyunk'an an yu ixjat'achiwiniy.

Akxni ixtita'ancho'oycha an yu ixjat'achiwiniy an Jesús, an Pedro juniy an Jesús: —Maestro, ¡Oxi li ani ikt'awnaw! akyawyaw a'at'utu mulht'a', a'atam mi'anucha, a'atam ix'anucha Moisés chi a'atam ix'anucha Elías. Tu ixk'atsay tani ixnawt'ajuncha an Pedro.
Chunchaka ixnawt'ajun, ta'alhtajulh la'atam jataputs'i, jala'atanchanulhcha, pus ixtalaktalhanancha akxni ixjala'atanchanutacha an jataputs'i.
Wachuncha an laka jataputs'i chiwinkalhcha, nawkan: —Yucha aniya yu iksakxtuta kinTs'alh, yuch'a k'a'asmatnit'it.
Akxni chunchacha naw'okalh, an Jesús wa ix'akstucha tala'ts'incho'olh. Chi yu'uncha ntu k'is talaknawlh, alhcha panch'e'ex akxni chuncha tapasachalh tu xamati ixtajuni tacha an tala'ts'ilh.
Tunkunchalh akxni tata'alhtajucho'olhcha an a'stitawk'a, lhuw lapanaki talakatastuklhi.
Ancha ixma'anta pumatam lapanak p'ascha xa'alay an Jesús, juniy: —Maestro, iktapaynisk'iniyan li k'ala'ts'ika an kints'alh, wa ix'akstu kints'alh;
walh chi wa la'apaxto'palay makxkay'un, wa la'a'ijcha tsukuy t'asay chi p'ascha lakchikixa, wa xut'ut'ucha a'pupuy stakcha lhitama'chapuy chi ntu makawputun.
Ijkatapaynisk'inilhcha amint'alhtanan li akintak'uch'unilhka', pero ntu lay tak'uch'uy.

An Jesús alhtaylh najun: —¡ Yu ch'away t'awnat jant'u jak'iklak'a'ininat'it, wa t'ani lap'ut'unatcha layat'itcha! ¿ Tasu wanancha wa aktilat'a'aklatsukuyawi? ¿ Tasu wanancha wa aktilalhilhitayaniyawi? K'alhit'a amints'alh.
Akxni stalhcha la'alhi an ts'alh an Jesús, an makxkay'un ma'talh, p'ascha lakchikixli; pero an Jesús la'a'aymalhi an makxkay'un pus ta'oxilhcha an ts'alh chi ma'axta'nicho'olhcha an ixpay.
Sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'niya ixchuxk'an li an Dios ay. Chunchaka ixtalhi'a'nit'ajun tacha an ixlak'ilhtuy an Jesús, yucha jajuniyan ixt'alhtanan:
Oxi kata'akatutanun aniy chiwinti yu aklajunaw: kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh Lapanak akima'axta'kana la ixmakak'an an lapanakni.
Pero yu'uncha ntu talhimacha'xanilhi tuchini ixjajunicha, mu lhima'anxkayi para yu'uncha kaxtalhimacha'xalh, chi ntucha talhisakmiputulh, mu ixtatalhanajlay.
Wachuncha tsukulhcha talalhisakmipaxay tichini palaycha xa'ayi kajuna de yu'uncha.
Chi mu an Jesús ixjak'atsaniya tani ixtajatapastaknancha la ixjalhunutk'an, xa'a'ilh pumatam jas'at'a la ixpa'xticha yawlh.

Chi jajuniy: —Watichicha yu la'a'iya ani jas'at'a la kintalakask'i, kit'ini kila'a'i, chi yu kila'a'i, yucha la'a'i an yu kimakmintalh; xliyu yu palay wa xalakat'ikt'i de chux uxitnan, yucha yu palay xa'ay.
Pus an Juan alhtaylh juniy: —Maestro, kla'ts'inaw pumatam lapanak yu ixjak'uch'uyi la mintalakask'i an yu wa tala'apaxt'o'a makxkay'un; pero ntucha ikmakawniw mu ntu kintach'a'o'ayan.
An Jesús juniy: —Jantu k'ala'aymat'it, mu yu ntu tani kinta'ilhtuyan, kintat'a'anan.
Akxni wanicha ixchint'ajun panch'e'ex para li an Jesús ka'anacha lakt'iyan, wachunchacha t'ak'alh lhi'ilhtulh ixtak'atsan li ka'anacha la'acha'an Jerusalén.
Jamala'achalhcha lapanakni p'ulhnaj yu ta'alh puxkawninin tan kacha'ana', lakatam xala'acha'an Samariajcha tacha'alh,
pero an yu ancha jamacha'an tu tala'a'ilh, mu ixtak'atsayi li Jerusaleni ka'ana an Jesús.
Pus akxni tak'atsaalhi an Jacobo chi an Juan yu ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, tajuniy: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, ¿Na'uni li akma'alhtajuwi jikmi an lakt'iyan para li katala'xaw'olh?
Pero an Jesús yucha jalaj'aymalh, jajuniy: —Uxitnan jantu k'ats'aaya tuchi takuwincha lhit'awnat.
Kit'in yu kwalh isTs'alh Lapanak ikminta jama'alhtaxtunu an ixjatsukuntik'an lapanakni, jantu ikminta jama'nini'. Chi ta'alhcha lakatam la'acha'an.
Akxni laka tijcha ixtat'ajun, pumatam juniy: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, wa t'anch'unch'a k'ap'ina'a akt'a'anan.
An Jesús alhtaylh: —An zorrajnin talhit'ajuni ixcha'ak'an, chi an ts'o'on talhit'ajuni ixpamaj'ank'an; pero kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh Lapanak jantu inta ikmast'ak'ay ki'a'tsulh.
Chi pumatam jumpalay: —Ak'inch'a'o'acha. Yucha juniy: —Jamach'alhkat, kachajcha p'ulhnaj ikti'an maknunu an kimpay.
An Jesús juniy: —K'amak'awcha, kachajcha tamaknulhi ixjaninink'an an janinin, uxint'i k'ap'inchicha lhichiwiniy an ixchiwinti Dios.
Chi pumatam wachu najun: —Akch'a'o'ayani, Jamach'alhkat, pero kachajcha p'ulh ikti'an jamak'atsanini an yu taa ijkalhila'ts'in an la kincha'a'.
An Jesús juniy: —Tu xamati li akxni ma'lhts'anch'apatacha ixtarpalaj la ix'a'lhch'acha kalaka'alh, yu chuncha lay, jantu lhitapalayi an la ixlich'alhkat Dios.
Xli'astan an Jesús pumat'utump'uxamkawt'uy (70) lapanakni jasakxtupalh, chi jala'mala'achalhcha ixlipumat'uyunk'an p'ulhnaj, ta lakachux an la'acha'anaxni chi tanlayjcha tan ixpast'ak'a li ka'ana'.
Ixjajuniy: —Lhuwi an tapatsat walh chi ntu ixluwk'ani an yu tatapatsay, xliyu k'at'ap'ayninit'iti an yu jamanawin an tapatsat li kajamakmilh aliy yu katatapatsalh.
Uxitnan k'ap'inchi'itcha, k'ats'ayatcha li kit'in klamak'anaw tacha borregojnin ixtan'ajni tan wanaj lhuw tat'ajun ma'tilin.
Jant'u k'alhip'it'iti mintumink'an chi mibolsajk'an chi miwarachijk'an, chi ntu xamati k'at'ilhima't'ijlat'it k'at'ila'axa'alat'it laka tij.
Wa tanchuncha k'ach'ip'ina'it laka cha'a p'ulhcha k'anawna'it: —Dioscha kajalhistaklhi yu ani tawilanalh laka cha'a'.
Chi li xamati ancha wilh yu ists'alhi an oxi jatawlhnat, an mi jama'oxintik'an la ixjatsukunticha katsukuya'; pero li jantu, tu tu'u kati'alilh yu oxi tu'u ancha.
Wa anchacha k'at'awla'it t'an ch'ip'inat laka cha'a', jant'u k'at'alak'ap'axats'uk'ut'iti laka cha'a', ancha k'awayna'it chi k'a'ot'a'it yu xt'a'nik'anat'it; mu yu tapatsay cha'ani li kamapalhnikalh.
Wa tanchuncha la'acha'an ch'ip'inat li la'a'ik'anat, k'a'u't'iti yu xt'a'nik'anat'it.
Chi k'ajak'uch'ut'iti yu ancha ta'alin ta'an'anin, k'aja'una'it: —Wa nicha tala'chint'awnan an ixlich'alhkat Dios.
