Chi an tan jalhi'ay jatalakxtut, ixtan'ajni, ta'ulalhcha jikmi chi tala'atanchanulhcha, an Pedro anchacha japujatawilh wachu'.
Pero pumatam t'aku, ma'tsuku, la'ts'ilhi li ancha ixma'wilh tan an ixla's'onkan, pus najun: —Aniy wachu ancha ixt'a'aklat'ajun an Jesús.
Pero an Pedro najun ma jantu, najun: —¡Jantu ikmispayi, t'aku'!
Panch'e'excha lakats'uniya jumpalh, pumatamcha la'ts'impalh, juniy: —Uxint'i wachu ixt'alhtanak'at'i an Jesús. An Pedro najun: —¡Jantu kit'ini, lapanak!
Katacha tamcha horaja jumpalh, pumatamcha nawpalay, najun: —Chun sawalh, aniy wachu ani ixt'a'aklat'ajun, chi wachu jamacha'a Galilea.
An Pedro najun: —Jantu ijk'atsay t'uch'ini unicha, lapanak. Walh wa akxni, chunchaka ixnawt'ajun, t'asalhcha an puyux.

Pus wachuncha an jamach'alhkat tala'aspitlaka'alhi tan ixyalh an Pedro. Pus pastaklhicha an Pedro li an Jamach'alhkat ixjunitalh: —Jantuka' katit'asalhi an puyux, a't'utucha k'anawna'a li nt'u k'imisp'ay.
Pus an Pedro taxtulh ma'spa, chi wa stakcha alhulh.
An lapanakni an yu ixtalhist'ak'a an Jesús, ixtamamaxanicha chi ixtamuk'anicha.
Tala'puch'ilhcha chi ixtalakpusaycha, ixtajuniy: —¿Tisiyuchacha muk'anini? k'anawcha.
Chi tachalayjcha aliy ixtalhimamaxani.
Akxni tunkulhcha, tata'ayxto'lhicha an xalaktatanin la'acha'an, chi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin. Talhi'alhcha an Jesús laka ay junta, tajuniy:
¿Uxint'i Cristo k'at'i? Akilajuniw. Yucha jajuniy: —Li aklajuniw jantu akintilakiklaka'iw,
chi li aklalhisakmiw tu'u, jantu akintilajuniw chi ntu akintilamakaju.
Pero chaway ati'anta kit'in yu ikwalh isTs'alh Lapanak kakpiktutawlantacha tan oxi ixpa'xti an Dios, yu lay ilhtu'ojoy watuchicha.
Pus wa ayxtami ixchuxk'an talhisakmilh, tajuniy: —¿Uxint'i Ists'alh Dios? Yucha jajuniy: —Uxitnanch'a nawnat li kit'in.
Wachuncha talajuniy: —¿Ali ma'lhtask'iniyawi yu akintajunin? Wanajcha kitnani alha'asmat'aw.
Pus ixchuxk'an an yu ancha ixta'ayxto'nun laka junta talaktaya'olh chi talhi'anilhcha an Jesús an Pilato.

Chi tsukulhcha talhimuk'ay, tajuniy: —Aniy lapanak ik'a'taymaw li wa jalaktilha an lapanakni yu aniy jamacha'an, chi najun li ntu kamapalhlhi'anikalhi an ay xajamach'alhkat Roma, najun li ma Cristojo yucha, ma rey.
Pus an Pilato lhisakmiy, juniy: —¿Uxint'i ixrejk'an judiojnin? Yucha ja'alhtayanalh, najun: —Uxint'ich'a na'un.
Wachuncha an Pilato, jajuniy an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an lapanakni: —Jantu tu'u tala'alhini ikla'cha'anini aniy lapanak.
Pero yu'uncha palay p'as ixtanajun: —Wa jalaktilhnini aniy la'acha'an tacha an masuy, an xalakaat'un Galileaja pu'a'taynichalh chi chaway aniycha xalakaat'un Judeaja taylhi'anta.
Pus an Pilato akxni asmatlhi nawkalh Galilea, lhasakminilhi li an Jesús sna jamacha'a Galilea.
Akxni k'ats'aalhi an Pilato li an Jesús jamacha'a tan ixch'alhkatnan an Herodes, ancha mala'achanilh, chi mu akxni an Herodes wachu Jerusaleni ixt'ajun.

An Herodes akxni la'ts'ilhcha an Jesús, sawalhcha achalh, mu ma'anchacha sawalhcha ixla'ts'imputun. Mu lhuwcha tanlhuni ixlaj'asmatta ixlichiwinkan yu ixlak'ilhtuy, chi ixla'ts'imputuncha li tu'ucha lhi'a'nini ka ix'ilhtulh.
Tipalhuwcha tu'u ixlisakmiy, pero yucha ntu tu'u alhtaylh.
An xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin wachu an ixtayanalh, p'ascha ixtalhimuk'ay tanlhun.
Pus wachuncha an Herodes ali an ixsoldadojnin tu tu'ucha ixtalhiwilay an Jesús, tamala'ch'inilhcha yu k'usi la'ch'it, wa ixtapumamaxaniycha chi an Herodes mala'achanipalhi an Pilato.
Pus akxni, oxicha talalhi'alh an Pilato ali an Herodes, mu ixlip'ulhnaj wa ixtalaxkajiy.
Wachuncha an Pilato, jama'ayxto'olhi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an jamach'alhkatni chi taa ixlijalhi'ay an la'acha'an,
jajuniy: —Aniy lapanak kilalhiminitaw kilajunaw li wa jalaktilhnini an la'acha'an; pero la mi'ukxlakapuchak'ani iklhisakmilh, chi ntu tu'u ikla'cha'aninilh tala'alhin t'ach'a an lhimuk'ayat'it.
Chi an Herodes, wanajcha chun kintamala'achanicho'ochin. La'ts'inat'itcha, jantu tu'u ilhtuta yu laycha kalhima'nikalh.
Akxta'niyacha la'atam lhima'alh'ajna chi akmakawcho'oyacha.
Chuncha jajunilh mu akxni k'atan ixjun an Pilato ixjamakawniy pumatam tach'ini an lapanakni.
Pero ixchuxk'an wa ayxtami talakt'asa'olh, tanajun: —¡Ani Jesús jantu! ¡Yu akilamakawniw yucha an Barrabás!
An Barrabás ixmalaklhchawkanta mu ixjama'nininta chi wa ixt'alaxtukuy an xajamach'alhkat an la'acha'an.
An Pilato a'tam jalhisakmipalhi mu ixmakawputuni an Jesús,
pero yu'uncha a'tam palay p'as talakt'asapalh, ixtalaknajun: —¡K'amakxt'ukmuk'acha, k'amakxt'ukmuk'acha!
Pero an Pilato, ixlipu'a't'utucha a'tam jajumpalh: —¿Tisuncha tala'alhini ilhtuta?, jantu tu'u tala'alhini ikla'cha'anini para li kama'nikalhcha; akmama'alh'ajniyacha pero akmakawcho'oya'.
Pero yu'uncha palay p'as ixtalakt'asay, ixtalhisk'in li ma kamakxtukmuk'akalhcha. Pus tacha an ixtalakt'asay an lapanakni chi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin, tamatapujunilhcha.
Pus an Pilato ilhtulhcha yu an ixtalakask'in yu'uncha.

Jama'axta'nilhcha an Jesús an lapanakni para li kata'ilhtulhcha wa tani ta'ilhtuputuncha chi an yu ixlimalaklhchawkanta ixjama'ninti chi ixlakata li wa ixt'ala'ajiy an xajamach'alhkat la'acha'an yucha makawlhcha, mu chunchacha ixtajuniy.
Akxni ixtitalhi'ancha an Jesús, tach'apayawlh pumatam lapanak ixjunkan Simón, jamacha'a Cirene, la ixlhima'spa la'acha'ani minchalh, tamak'uk'alhcha an cruz para li ma kach'a'o'alhi'alhcha an Jesús.
Wanajcha lhilhuwi ixch'a'o'akanta chi lhuw t'akunini ixtama'anta, sawalhcha ixtalhita'oxila'alhi chi ixtalhilaj'alhuncha.
Pero an Jesús tala'asp'itlhi chi sa'cha ixjala'ts'in, ixjajuniy: —Ixjatsi'in la'acha'an Jerusalén, jantu akilalhi'alhuw; mijas'at'ank'ani k'ajalhi'alhunt'it chi milakatak'an,
mu kamina wilhchani akxni kanawkana: —Oxi para yu'uncha an t'akunin an yu ntu lay tajamas'at'analh, chi an yu ntu a'tam tajamas'at'analh chi an yu ntu a'tam tajamats'ik'inilh.
Akxni katajuna an laj'a'stitawk'a: "Akila'a'lhtants'iwcha", Chi an tan laklakatitawk'a katajuna: "Akilamats'e'wi",
mu li kit'in tacha kinta'ilhtuy, walh chi tacha ikst'a'aw k'iw, pus uxitnan ¿tasu li ntucha chun k'at'i'ilht'uk'ant'it li tachanu xaxixni k'iwi unt'at'it'i?
Ixjat'alhi'ampalhkanta ixt'uyunk'an lapanakni an Jesús, para li kajat'ama'nikalhcha. Yu'uncha ixta'ilhtuta ixtala'alhink'an.

Akxni tacha'alhcha tan junkan la Ixla'pa'axi Swe'elukut, anchacha makxtukmuk'akalh an Jesús chi an ixt'uyunk'an lapanakni yu ixta'ilhtuta tala'alhin, ixtapiktutamincha, lhilaxjama'xi chi tan oxi ixmaka'.
An Jesús nawlh: —KimPay, k'ajamala'mixinin, mu wa ntu tak'atsay tuchini ta'ilhtuycha. —Chi talamala'pitsilhcha an ixla'chit an Jesús, wa ta'amanalh suerte.
Chi chux an lapanakni sa'cha ixtala'ts'in, chi masi an jamach'alhkatni ixtamamaxaniycha, ixtalajuniy: —Ali'in jama'alhtaxtulh, kama'alhtaxtukalhcha ix'akstu li Cristo sawalh, yu sakxtuta Dios.
An soldadojnin wachucha ixtamamaxaniy, waniycha ixtala'an ixtama'ot'uycha vinagre
chi ixtajuniy: —Li ixrejk'at'i judiojnin, k'at'a'alht'axt'ucha mi'akstu.
An la ix'akpuxni ists'o'nikanta tan ixnajunta: "Aniy ixrejk'an Judiojnin".
Pumatam an yu ixjat'amakxtukmuk'akanta an Jesús, ixlilakajuniycha, ixjuniy: —Li Cristojk'at'i, k'ama'alht'axt'uk'acha chi akilama'alhtaxtuw.
An pumatam la'a'aymalh juniy: —Masi wanajch'a ch'uni ma'alh'ajnant'a'un jant'u t'alhamniya an Dios.
Kitnan t'acha'anawi li chuncha kama'alh'ajnaw, mu mapalht'awnawi yu ilhtutaw tala'alhin, pero aniy lapanak tu tu'u tala'alhini ilhtuta.
Chi juniy an Jesús: —Jesús, ak'imp'ast'ak'a'a akxni k'ach'alhk'atnana'acha.
Pus an Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Uxint'i chaway ak'int'ap'ina'acha tan lhi'acha alin jatsukunti, sawalhi aniy yu ijkunan.
Ka tacha atunkujuncha sta las tres yu ta'oxaycha, chux an lakaat'un taputs'isilh.
An wilhchan taputs'isilh, chi an la'ch'it an ix'uk'alh laka tajtan lht'it'in tapu'exli, tukan ixpaytat aklht'uyi walh.
Akxni an Jesús, p'ascha t'asalh najun: —KimPay, an kintakuwin la mimakacha ikma'axta'niyan. Chi akxni chunchacha naw'olh, nilhcha.
An capitán akxni la'ts'ilhcha li chunchacha tapasalh xta'nilhcha lhimala'puchajuni an Dios, najun: —Chun sawalh, aniy lapanak tu tu'u ixtala'alhin.
Ixchuxk'an an yu chunchacha tala'ts'ilh tacha an tapasalh, ta'ancho'olhcha, jalaktankilhaksalhi'ankalhcha.
Ixchuxk'an an yu ixjamispay an Jesús chi an t'akunin yu ixtat'amintachalh sta la'acha'an Galilea wa ma'atcha ixtalakaminachalh tacha an ixtapasay.
Ixt'ajun pumatam lapanak ixjunkan José, jamacha'a Arimatea, xala'acha'an an Judea. Yucha wachu ixma'ta'ayxt'o'a an laka ay junta yu ixta'ilhtuy an Judiojnin,
pero mu yucha oxi lapanak chi ixkiklaka'iy Dios, yucha ntu oxi ixliwilay tacha an tatamakawlh laka junta, mu yucha wachu ixpakxan'iya an ixlich'alhkat Dios.
Yucha la'alhi an Pilato chi sk'inilhi an ixlakatunaj an Jesús.
Akxni ma'alhtajulhcha an laka cruz, la'apamililhcha laka sábana, chi maknulhcha tan ixtantipujkanta a'stitawka la'stu de chiwx, jantuka' k'is xamati ancha ixmaknukan.
Akxni chuncha tapasalh sawalhcha ixtala'asijt'ajuni an lapanakni, mu katunkunanta xawilhchan jastaknat.
An t'akunin an yu ixtat'amintachalh an Jesús sta la'acha'an Galilea tat'a'alh, tala'ts'ilhi tan kimaknukalh chi tani lhimamakalhcha an ixlakatunaj.
Akxni ta'ancho'olhcha ixcha'ak'an, tamala'asijnilhcha laklhaklhi perjume yu lay lakatawk'akan; chi tajastaknalhcha akxni xawilhchan jastaknat, tacha najunta laka lhamap'a'sin.

A'taynicho'olhcha la'atam wilhchan, sast'icha samana, sawalh wats'isin ta'alhcha an t'akunin an tan ix'aknuy an Jesús, ixtat'a'antacha ali'in ixt'at'akunink'an chi ixtalhi'antacha an yu ixtamala'asijnita laklhaklhi perjume.
Walh akxni tacha'alh, tala'ts'in an aya chiwx an yu ixpumalaklhchawkanta an tan ix'aknuy, ma'osukanta.
Chi tatanulh, walh tu tala'cha'alhi an ixlakatunaj an Jamach'alhkat Jesús.
Pus tucha ixtalhimacha'xay, walh wa akxni tatalakasulh ixt'uyunk'an lapanakni waniy an tan ixtalakyanalh, wa la'xlimjnik'acha an ixla'ch'itk'an.
Chi mu ixtalaktalhanancha an t'akunin, tala'ta'antatawilhcha an lakaat'un, pus jajunkan: —¿T'asu li p'uxk'awyatcha an yu la'ajunta an tan tamanalh janinini?
Yucha ntu aniya t'ajun, yucha la'awcho'olh. K'ap'ast'akt'iti tacha an tajunin akxni an ixt'ajunka xalakaat'un Galilea,
pero tajunan: —Lhitask'iniya li an isTs'alh Lapanak kama'axta'kalhi la ixmakak'an an ma'lhta'alhinin, chi li kamakxtukmuk'akalh, pero kala'awcho'oya ixlila'at'utu wilhchan.
Wachuncha yu'uncha tapastaklhi tacha an ixnajunta,
pus tataxtulh an tan ix'aknuy, ta'ancho'olhcha chi tamak'ats'aanilhcha an ixpumakawtamk'an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús chi ixchuxk'ancha an ali'in tacha an tapasalh.
An t'akunin an yu tajamak'atsaaninilh yu'uncha an María Magdalena, chi Juana, chi María ixnati Jacobo, chi an ali'incha ixt'at'akunink'an yu ixtat'a'anta.
Pero an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, jantu ixtakiklaka'iya an t'akunin, ixtalhi'ilhtuy li wa lhilocojcha li katakiklaka'ilh.
Pero an Pedro jats'alaj'alhi an tan ixmaknukanta an Jesús, chi kiila'ts'ilhi li wa yucha an la'chitcha ancha ixlaktanun. Wachuncha alhcha ixcha'a, chi ixli'a'nicha tacha an tapasalh.
Wayuchaka anchunu wilhchan, ixt'uyunk'an an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, ixtita'an tanchun la'acha'an junkan Emaús, ka tacha la'akawtam kilómetrojo lhitamakawni an la'acha'an Jerusalén,
ixtalhilakchiwij'antacha chux tacha an laktapasalh.
Walh akxni chunchaka ixtalalhikikxtukulhi'anta, an Jesús wanicha jala'cha'alh, ixjat'alakjalhtanaj'antacha.
Pero an ixla'chulhk'an yu'uncha watachanu tu'ucha kajala'puchapalh para li ntu katamispalh.
An Jesús jajuniy: —¿Tisunch'a lhilakch'iwijp'int'at'it? Pus sa'cha tatayalh chi ixtata'oxila'alhicha.
Chi pumatam ixjunkan Cleofas alhtaylh, juniy: —An yu ntu jama'cha'an Jerusalén wa uxint'i yu nt'u k'a k'ats'ay tacha an tapasalh wa anika'.

Pus yucha ja'alhtaylh, jajuniy: —¿Tisuncha tapasalhi? Chi tajuniy: —Yucha an Jesús, jamacha'a Nazaret yu ixlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, chi alhp'asi lay ixlak'ilhtuy an tanlhun tapatsat, alhp'asi ixchiwiniy la`ix'ukxlakapu an Dios chi la ix'ukxlakapuk'an an lapanakni;
walh chi li laycha tama'axta'lhi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an kijamach'alhkatnank'an para li kamakxtukmuk'akalh chi li kama'nikalh.
Kitnan xakpakxan'iyaw li yuchacha akintama'alhtaxtuyan yu kwilaw Israel. Pero chaway la'at'utucha wilhchani yu chunchacha tapasalh.
Masi ali'in an t'akunin, yu ancha kintat'awilanan kintame'e'swayan, mu takilaka'alhi wats'isin an tan ix'aknuy an Jesús.
Ma ntu tu'u tanun, pus tacha'ancho'olh, tanajun ma tala'ts'ilh angelhnin yu ma tanajun li an Jesús la'ajunta.
Pus ali'in an yu kintat'aalach'a'o'ayan wachu takilaka'alhi an tan ix'aknuy an Jesús. Chi chuncha sawalhi takila'ts'ilh tacha an tanajun an t'akunin, pero an Jesús jantu tala'ts'ilh.
Wachuncha an Jesús jajuniy: —¡Laj'a'atu'axixin, sawalhcha laksniya k'iklak'a'iyat tacha an tanawlh an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios!
¿Chun tu ixlitask'iniya li an Cristo chuncha p'ulhnaj ka ixlaktapasanilh la ixjatsukunti aniy tanlhun, para li xli'astan kaxlimjcha juna chi ay tukani kala'ts'inkana'?
Pus tsukulhcha jalhixa'alayi an Jesús chux an tan lhichiwininta ixlakata yu yucha, sta la ixlaklibro an Moisés sta tacha an alin ali ixlaklibrojk'an an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
Akxni tacha'alhcha an la'acha'an tan ixtita'an, an Jesús ixlay li palay ma'ati ixti'an.
Pero yu'uncha p'asi tajunilh li anchacha kajat'atamakawlh, tajuniy: —Kakilat'atamakajucha, mu ta'oxaycha, taputs'isit'ajuncha. —Pus anchacha jat'atamakawlh.
Akxni sa'cha ixtalakwilanalh laka mesaj, xa'a'ilhcha an pan chi xta'lhicha lhimala'puchajun, puch'e'elhcha chi jala'xta'nilhcha.
Akxni chun tamispalhcha mu tachanu tajalakawanalhcha; pero la ixjalakawantik'ani la'mixpalh.

Chi ixtalajumpaxay: —Sawalh, ¿chun tu xakintaxawniyani an kijalhunutk'an la kintankilhaknik'an akxni an xakintat'alakchiwijmintan laka tij chi xakintalhixa'alayan an tacha ts'o'muk'akanta la ixchiwinti Dios?
Wachuncha jantu ali tapakxalh, watukan ta'ancho'olhi la'acha'an Jerusalén. Chi tala'cha'alhi an ixpumakawtamk'an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús tan ixtat'a'ayxto'nun an ali'in yu wachu ixtach'a'o'ay an Jesús,
ixtalajuniy: —Chun sawalh la'awcho'ota an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, chi talakasunilhi an Simón.
Pus akxni yu'uncha wachucha tanawlhi tani tala'ts'ilhcha an laka tij, chi li tamispalhi an Jesús akxni puch'e'elh an pan.
Chunchaka ixtalhilakchiwint'ajun aniy tanlhun, an Jesús japujatayachalhcha chi jajuniy: —¡Oxicha k'at'awlat'tit'i!
Pus yu'uncha sawalhcha talaktalhanalh, ixtanajun li sna wa uncha.
Pero an Jesús jajuniy: —¿T'asu li lakt'alhananatcha ch'i li nawnatcha li sna ntu kit'ini?
K'ala'ts'int an kimaka chi an kinch'aja', kit'in. Akilalakach'apaw chi k'ala'ts'int'itcha. Yu wa takuwincha ntu tu'u ixjakanit chi ixjalukut t'ach'a la'ts'inat iklhit'ajun.
Chunchacha jajun'olh chi ixjamasuniycha an ixlakmaka chi an ixlakch'aja'.
Pero mu yu'uncha ntuka' oxi ixtalhimacha'xay mu sawalhcha ixtalaj'achan chi sawalhcha ixtalhi'a'niy, pus jajuniy an Jesús: —¿T'u'u lhit'awnat aniy yu ukan?
Wachuncha taxta'nilh lakats'uniy jamaxkawawanti jatanti chi t'axkat.
Jama'lhtaylhcha chi ulhcha la ix'ukxlakapuk'an.

Xli'astan jajuniy: —Chunchuniya an klajuniw akxni an xaklat'a'aklat'awnaw: li xlitask'iniya li chuncha katapasa'olh tacha an kilhits'o'muk'akanta an la ixlamap'a'sin Moisés, chi an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, chi an Salmos.
Pus wachuncha ja'ilhtulhi li katalhimacha'xalhi an tan chuncha ts'o'muk'akanta;
chi jajuniy: —Chuncha ts'o'muk'akanta li an Cristo kaniya chi kala'awcho'oya ixlila'at'utu wilhchan;
chi li chux an laj'ay la'acha'anaxni kalhichiwinkalhi la ixtalakask'i li katakiklaka'ilhi an Dios, para li kajamala'mixinilhi ixtala'alhink'an. Sta la'acha'an Jerusaleni kapu'a'taynikana'.
Uxitnan k'ats'ayat'it'i tacha aniy laktapasalh.

Chi kit'in aklamakminiyawi an yu nawlh kimPay li kamakmina'; pero uxitnan k'asa' t'awlat'iti aniy la'acha'an Jerusalén, sta li akxni k'ala'a'iya'itcha an yu alhp'as k'ap'u'una'it an yu kaminanta lakt'iyan.
Xli'astan chux an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús jamaxtulhcha an la'acha'an Jerusalén, jalhi'alhcha sta la'acha'an Betaniaj, chi tamakch'ixlicha chi tapayninilhcha an Dios para oxi katatsukulh.
Akxni jalhitapayni'olhcha, wa akxni jamakawyawlhcha, chi alhcha lakt'iyan.
Yu'uncha akxni stakcha taxta'olh lhimala'puchajun, talaj'achaj'ancho'olhcha la'acha'an Jerusalén.
Chi lhilhiji ixtatsukuy an laka tajtan, ixtalakmilhpaniycha an Dios chi ixtaxta'nicha lhimala'puchajun. Chunchacha kajunlhi.
Akxni ntuka' tu'u ix'alin, ix'alincha pumatam yu junkan Chiwinti, chi an Chiwinti yucha an Diosi ixt'a'aklat'ajun, an Chiwinti yucha an Dios.
Akxni ntuka' tu'u ix'alin, yucha ixt'ajuncha, ixt'a'aklat'ajuncha an Dios.
Chi chux an laktanlhun, yucha pu'ilhtukalh, jantu tu'u an yu alin laktanlhun yu ntu yu kapu'ilhtukalh.
Mu yucha ixlhit'ajun an jatsukunti, chi an jatsukunti, ixjatapulhkunuk'an an lapanakni.
An jatapulhkunu mapulhkuyi an tan lakaaputs'isni, chi an jatats'isni jantu lay mamixiya an jatapulhkunu'.
Kilachilh pumatam lapanak yu ixmala'achatachalh an Dios, ixjunkan Juan.
Yucha kilhichiwinchilh an jatapulhkunu para li katapukiklaka'i'olhi an lapanakni, kijamak'ats'aanininchilhi ixlakata an jatapulhkunu'.
An Juan tu yu jatapulhkunu', yucha wa kijamak'atsanininchilh ixlakata an jatapulhkunu'.
An yu sawalh jatapulhkunu yu jamapulhkuni'ojoy chux an lapanakni kaminaka aniy lakamunulhpa'.
Chi akxni ixt'ajuncha an yu jatapulhkunu sawalh aniy lakaamunulhpa, masi yucha pu'ilhtukalh an lakaamunulhpa, an lapanakni ntu tamispalh.
Kilachilhi an la xlakaamunulhpa pero an yu ancha jamala'awnita jantu tala'a'ilh.
Pero ixchuxk'an yu tala'a'ilh, chi takiklaka'ilh, ja'ilhtulhi li xas'at'an Diosi katawalh.
Yu'uncha ntu wa laka jak'alhni tapula'ajun, chi ntu wa laka jakanit, chi ntu wa laka lapanak, yu'uncha Diosi jamala'awni laxtakuwink'an.
An Chiwinti junlhi lapanak chi kintakit'atawlhchin. Chi la'ts'iwi an ix'alhp'asninti, yu xta'niy an ixPay, mu wa ix'akstu isTs'alh, chi yucha lhuwi ixjamapayninti chi chux an ixchiwinti sawalh.
An Juán lhichiwinilh ixnajun: —Yucha aniya an yu xaklalhixa'alayaw, akxni xaklajunaw: "Yu aminta xli'astan palay lhitapalay, mu yucha o'sliyancha ixt'ajun, kit'in astani ikt'ajun".
Yucha pula'a'i'oyaw wa tuchicha, chi yucha ali ali lalhawayi ixjamapayninti.
Mu an lhamap'a'sin yucha an Moisesi puxta'kalh, pero an jamapayninti chi an yu sawalh yucha an Jesucristojo japu'ilhtukalh.
An Dios tu a'tam xamati la'ts'inta; pero an isTs'alh, mu wanajcha yucha an Dios, yucha kintamamispanin, mu yucha lhilhiji t'awilhchalh an ixPay.
Yucha anicha yu lhichiwiniy an Juan, akxni an judiojnin yu ixtat'ajun la'acha'an Jerusalén, tamala'achalh sacerdotejnin chi levitajnin para li kata'alh lhisakminin an Juán tichini yuchacha.
An Juán ixla'ts'awalanti nawlh, najun: —Kit'in jantuj Cristo.
Pus talhisakmi tajuniy: —¿Pus tisu uxint'icha? ¿Uxint'i Elías? Yucha najun: —Jantu, jantu kit'ini Elías. ¿Uxint'i yu lhich'iwini ixchiwinti Dios? Yucha ja'alhtaypalh: —Jantu.
Wachuncha tajuniy: —¿Pus tisu uxint'icha? Mu ajkamak'atsaaniyawi tichini uxint'icha an yu kintamala'achatacha'an. ¿Tisu uxint'icha kilajunawi?

An Juán ja'alhtaylh: —Kit'ini an chiwinti an yu ixchiwiniy p'as an tan wa sa' junita, tan ixnajun: "K'alats'awalat'iti an ixtij an Jamach'alhkat Cristo". Tacha an nawlh Isaías, yu ixlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
An yu ixjamala'achakanta li katakila'ts'ilh an Juán yu'uncha an fariseojnin.
Tajuniy an Juán: —¿Pus mu li ntu uxint'i Cristojk'at'i, chi ntu Elíask'at'i chi ntu uxint'i an yu kamina lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, tasu li jama'p'axanancha?
An Juán ja'alhtaylh: —Kit'in wa laka xkani ijkama'paxanan, pero t'a'aklat'awnat pumatami yu nt'u misp'ayat.
Yucha yu kamina ixli'astan, yucha masi wa ak'o'x'otnilhcha ixwarachi jantu ikt'acha'an.
Tan chuncha laktapasalh aniy tanlhun, la'acha'an tan junkan Betaniaj, ixtapiktutam an ayxkan junkan Jordán, ancha an Juan ixjama'paxanant'ajun.
Tunkunchalh an Juan, la'ts'ist'uk'acha an Jesús li ixla'antachalhcha, pus najun: —¡Yucha aniya yu ixborrego an Dios, yu lha'ulanalh, para li kamala'mixinilhi ixtala'alhin an lakaamunulhpa'!
Yucha an yu ijkuni akxni iknajun: "Xli'astan kit'in, kamina pumatam lapanak yu palay lhitapalay, mu yucha p'ulhnajcha ixt'ajun".
Kit'in wachu ntu xakmispay, pero para li katamispalhi an jamacha'an Israel, xliyu kit'in xajkama'paxanancha lakaxkan.
Atumpaj an Juan nawpalh: —Ikla'ts'ilhi an ixTakuwin Dios akxni ta'alhtajulh an lakt'iyan, watacha paloma, tan ixyalh.

Kit'in tu xakmispay; pero an yu kimakmilh li akmilh jama'paxana lakaxkan kijunilh: "An yu k'ala'ts'ina'a li kalakpatawlanta an ixTakuwin Dios akxni kata'alhtajuya, yucha yu jama'paxanan laka Stalan'a ixTakuwin Dios".
Chi kit'in kla'ts'ilhcha, pus iknajuncha li aniy yucha isTs'alh an Dios.
Tunkunchalh an Juán anchacha ixt'awpalay ali ixt'uyunk'an ixt'alhtanan.
Chi la'ts'ilhi an Jesús li ancha ix'aklat'ajun, pus an Juán najun: —¡Yucha anu yu ixborrego an Dios yu lha'ulancha makminkanta!
An ixt'uyunk'an ixt'alhtanan an Juán ta'alha'asmatlhi, pus tach'a'o'alhi an Jesús.
An Jesús tala'asp'itlhi pus jala'ts'ilhi li ixtach'a'o'ata, chi jajuniy: —¿T'isunch'a p'uxk'awyat'iti? Yu'uncha tajuniy: —¿T'anisch'a wilht'i Maestro?

Pus an Jesús jajuniy: —K'at'at'itcha chi k'ala'ts'ina'itcha. Yu'uncha tat'a'alhcha chi takila'ts'ilhcha tan ixtawlay, chi mu ixta'oxaycha ka tacha las cuatrojcha, pus tat'atamakawchalhcha yu akxni ixtunkujunta.
An Andrés, ixt'ala'ajun Simón Pedro, yucha xapumatam an ixt'uyunk'an an yu ta'alha'asmatlhi an Juan chi tach'a'o'alh an Jesús.
Chi an Andrés watukan la'alhi an ixt'ala'ajun yu junkan Simón, chi juniy: —Ikla'cha'aw an Cristo.
Pus t'a'alhcha an tan ixt'awnachalh an Jesús, chi an Jesús juniy an Simón: —Uxint'i Simonk'at'i, ists'alh Jonás, chaway Cefascha k'a'unk'ana'a (nawputun Pedro).
Tunkumpalhchalh, an Jesús k'uxa'alh xalakaat'un Galilea, walh paxto'lhicha an Felipe, pus juniy: —Ak'int'ap'it'icha.
An Felipe, jamacha'a Betsaida, tan ixla'acha'ank'an an Andrés chi an Pedro.

An Felipe la'cha'alh an Natanael, pus juniy: —Ikla'cha'awcha an yu ts'o'muk'ata an Moisés an laka lhamap'a'sin, chi an tacha ixtanajun wachu an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios: Yucha an Jesús, ists'alh José, jamacha'a Nazaret.
An Natanael najun: —¿Jamacha'a Nazaret, laycha oxi tu'u kaminchalh ancha? An Felipe alhtaylh juniy: —Li k'at'at'icha k'ala'ts'ina'acha.
Akxni an Jesús la'ts'incha li la'antachalhcha an Natanael, najun: —¡Aniy minta pumatam jamacha'a Israel, yu ntu ja'o'xcho'onun!
An Natanael ja'alhtayanalh: —¿T'asich'a k'ilhimisp'ayi? An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Akxni ntuka' ixt'asaniyan an Felipe, ikla'ts'inani akxni ixyat'i ixtamp'in an xak'iw higo.
An Natanael, juniy an Jesús: —¡Maestro, uxint'i isTs'alhk'at'i Dios! ¡Uxint'i ixRey an la'acha'an Israel!
Yucha alhtaylh juniy: —¿K'iklak'a'iya mu wa xliyu ijkunan li kla'ts'ini an ixtamp'in xak'iw higo? Tacha aniy palay k'ala'ts'ina'a yu palay laj'ay tanlhun.

Chi nawpalay an Jesús: —Sawalhi an yu klajunaw, ati'anta uxitnan k'ala'ts'ina'it'iti an lakt'iyan katati'ayanta chi k'ajala'ts'ina'it'iti an ix'angelhnin an Dios tacha tatach'ixa chi tata'alhtajuy la ix'ukxni an isTs'alh Dios.
Xlila'at'utucha wilhchan walh, tama'xto'kalh la'acha'an Caná, xalakaat'un Galilea, chi ancha ixt'ajun an ixnati Jesús.
Chi an Jesús chi an ixt'alhtanan wachu jamak'atsaanikalhi li kata'alh.
Walh ancha min'olhcha an yu ixlaj'otkan xaxkan uvaj. Pus wachuncha an ixnati an Jesús, juniy: —Jantucha tu'u an xaxkan uvaj.
An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —¿Chi kit'in tasu li k'i'unicha? Jantuka' chini kimpanch'e'ex.
An ixnati an Jesús, jajuniy an yu ixtamala'pitsi tanlhun: —Chux yu tajunan, yucha yuch'ach'a k'a'ilht'ut'it.

Ancha ixlakwilh la'achaxan wa tacha a'xaw de chiwx, yu ixpumukan xkan, cincuentaj u setentaj litro xkani lay ixputajuy, yucha ixtaxa'a'iy an judiojnin akxni ixta'ilhtuy yu tacha ixtamasunita ixlakpaynink'an para li katastalan'alh.
An Jesús jajuniy: —K'ala'la'ts'amat laka xkani anchunu lakwilh yu pumukan xkan. Pus oxicha tala'la'tsamalh.
Chi xli'astan jajuniy: —Chaway k'amak'ut'utcha lakats'uni chi k'alhip'inichi'itcha an yu la'ts'ilhi'anta aniy wayt. Pus talhi'anilhcha.

Kilhk'atsalhcha an yu ixla'ts'ilhi'anta laka k'atan li junitacha tacha xaxkan uvaj an xkan, masi yucha ntu ixk'atsayi tanchuncha minchalh. Pero an yu ixtamala'pitsi tanlhun yu'uncha ixtak'atsay, mu yu'uncha tamakutulh an xkan an laka pozo. An yu ixla'ts'ilhi'anta laka k'atan t'asanilhi an yu tama'xt'o'a lapanak,

chi juniy: —Watichicha lapanak p'ulhnajcha yu an oxi xaxkan uvaja xt'a'a, chi akxni lhucha laj'otkanta, yucha an yu palaycha wa aktayi xt'a'a, walh chi uxint'i an yu oxi lhi'ot'at ma'at'aka sta astan.
Yucha anicha yu p'ulhnajcha malaksulh an Jesús, la'acha'an Caná xalakaat'un Galilea, masulhcha li alhp'asi yucha, chi an ixt'alhtanan takiklaka'ilhcha.
Xli'astan akxni chunchacha tapasalh, an Jesús jat'a'alhcha an ixnati chi an ixjat'ala'awnin chi an ixt'alhtanan la'acha'an Capernaúm; anchacha tatamakawlh, jantu la'alhuw wilhchan.
Mu wanicha ixminta ixk'atan paxku, ixk'atank'an an judiojnin, an Jesús alh la'acha'an Jerusalén.
Walh an lakatajtan jala'cha'alh an yu ixtast'ay torojnin chi borregojnin chi palomajnin chi an yu ixtamapaxay tumin, anchacha ixtalakwilanalh.

Mu chunchacha jala'ts'in an Jesús, pus xa'a'ilh ma'atam lazo, ilhtulhcha ixpa'ayna'na, wanaj jatamakxtu'olhi an lakatajtan chux an ixborregojnink'an chi an ixtorojnink'an an lapanakni; chi tilhcha jamaj'anilhi an ixtumink'an an yu ixtamapaxay tumin chi jala'ma'pusp'itnilhcha an ixmesajk'an.
Jajuniy an yu ixtast'ay paloma: —¡K'alakt'amakxt'ut'iti an tanlhun aniy, jant'u k'a'ilht'ut'iti mimpast'ank'an an ixcha'a kimPay!
Pus akxni tapastaklhicha an ixt'alhtanan li ts'o'muk'akanta, tan najunta: ¡Sawalh aklhitalh'amna an mincha'a'!
An judiojnin tajuniy an Jesús: —Li ch'unch'ach'a lay, ¿tisuncha akilamasuniyaw li t'ach'ip'ini li ch'unch'ach'a k'alat'i?
An Jesús jajuniy: —K'alakt'ilhit'iti aniy tajtan, walh chi wa la'at'utu wilhchan akyawcho'oya'.
Pus an judiojnin tajuniy: —¿Wa la'at'utu wilhchani k'ayawch'o'oya'a? Aniy tajtan t'up'uxamchaxan (46) k'ata yawkalh.
Pero an Jesús yucha an ixlakatunaja ixjuniy.
Xliyu akxni la'awcho'olhcha, an ixt'alhtanan tapastaklhi li chuncha ixnajunta, pus takiklaka'ilhi an tan ts'o'muk'akanta chi an ixchiwinti an Jesús.
Akxni la'acha'anka Jerusalén ixt'awnachalh an Jesús, la ixk'atan Paxku, ixluwk'ani takiklaka'ilh, mu ixtala'ts'incha tacha an tu'u ixlak'ilhtuy yu ntu wa tichicha lay ilhtuy.
Pero an Jesús jantu ixjalhiwilay, mu yucha ixjamispa'ojoy.
Yucha ntu xamati ixma'lhtask'iniy kajunilh tani ixlaycha xamati'. Mu yucha ixjamispani'ojoyi an ixjalhunutk'an an lapanakni.
Ixt'ajun pumatam lapanak yu'uncha an yu ixjajunkan fariseojnin, ixjunkan Nicodemo, an judiojnin xa'ayi ixta'ilhtuta.

Aniy lapanak la'alhi an Jesús puts'ista, chi juniy: —Maestro, ijk'atsayawi li Diosi mala'achatacha'an para li akilamiw masuninin, mu ntu xamati lay kati'ilhtulh t'ach'a an lak'ilht'uy tanlhun yu wa tichicha lapanak li yu ntu Dios t'a'aklat'ajun.
An Jesús juniy: —Sawalhi aniy yu ijkunan, yu ntu sast'i tsukucho'oy jantu lay katila'ts'ilh an ixlich'alhkat Dios.
An Nicodemo juniy: —¿Tasicha lay kalhitsukucho'olh xamati li papacha? ¿Laycha kapalaktajucho'olh ixnati chi katsukupalh?
An Jesús juniy: —Kit'in sawalhi aniy yu ijkunan, li yu ntu tsukuyi laka xkan chi la ixTakuwin an Dios, jantu lay katitanuchalh an la ixlich'alhkat Dios.
Yu wa laka lakatunaja pula'ajun, wa lakatunaj, yu laka Takuwin pula'ajun, yucha takuwin.
Jant'u k'alhi'a'nit'i li ijkunan: "Li lhitask'iniya li sast'i kala'awcho'okalh".
An un wa lhitanchuncha minachalh, chi masi k'a'asmatt'icha makat'ajun, pero nt'u k'ak'ats'ati tanchuncha minachalh chi tanchuncha ti'an. Chuncha yu la'ajun laka Takuwin.
An Nicodemo lhisakmilh juniy: —¿Chi tasicha aklhit'alalhi?
An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Uxint'i li xamaestro la'acha'an Israel, ¿ch'i nt'u k'ats'ayi aniy tanlhun?
Sawalhi an yu ijkunan, kitnan iknawnawi yu ijk'atsayaw, chi yu ikla'ts'intaw kitnan, iknawnaw; pero uxitnan jant'u k'iklak'a'iyat'iti an yu klajunaw.
Li nt'u k'iklak'a'iyat'iti an yu klalhixa'alayaw yu wa aniy lakaamunulhpa alin, ¿t'asu laych'a k'alhik'iklak'a'iya'it an yu lakt'iyan alinachalhi?
Jantu xamati anta an lakt'iyan, wa yucha an yu ancha minchalh, an yu kijunchilh isTs'alh Lapank.
Chi tacha an tanxtukmuk'alhi an tsapulh an Moisés an tan wa jasa'nik'a lakaat'un, chuncha wachu an yu kijunchilh isTs'alh Lapanak kaxtukmuk'akana laka k'iw,
para li watichicha yu kakiklaka'iya, katsuku'alhiya', jantu katits'an'alh.

Mu an Dios sawalh jamapayniya an lapanakni yu tat'ajun an lakamunulhpa', yucha lhixta'lhi an isTs'alh masi wa ix'akstu, para li yu kiklaka'iy jantu kats'an'alh, kalhitsukulhi jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy.
An Dios jantu mala'achachalh an isTs'alh aniy lakaamunulhpa para li kamilh jalhitama'chapunu', yucha minta jama'alhtaxtunu'.
Yu kiklaka'iy jantu katimama'alh'ajnikalh, pero yu ntu kiklaka'iy yucha o'sliyancha li kamama'alh'ajnikana', mu ntu kiklaka'iya an isTs'alh Dios.

Yucha aniya ixlakata an lhima'alh'ajnat, li an jatapulhkunu yucha kilachilhcha aniy lakaamunulhpa', pero an lapanakni ntu tala'ts'imputulh, palay ta'achanilhi an lakaputs'isni, mu wa yu ntu oxi laktanlhuncha ixta'ilhtuy.
Watichicha yu wa tanlhuncha yu ntu oxi lak'ilhtuy, jantu la'ts'imputuni an jatapulhkunu', chi ntu k'uxa'ani tan pulhkuy para li ntu katasulhi yu an ilhtuy.
Pero yu ilhtuyi yu laj'oxi tanlhun yucha tan pulhkuyi an, para li katasulhi li an yu ilhtuy yucha an tacha najun Dios.
Xli'astan an Jesús ali an ixt'alhtanan ta'alhcha xalakaat'un Judea, anchacha ixtat'awnachalh chi ixjama'paxanancha an Jesús.
Chi an Juán, tanchun junkan Enón wani Salim ancha ixjama'paxanan, mu ancha lhuwi ix'alin xkan. Ixtalaj'a'paxacha an lapanakni akxni ixtacha'an,
mu an Juan akxni ntuka' ixmalaklhchawkan.
Wachuncha an ixt'alhtanan an Juan chi ali'in judiojnin tsukulhcha talalhikikxtukuyi ixlakata an stalan'anti.
Chi tala'alhi an Juan, tajuniy: —Maestro, an yu ixt'ayan an ixtapiktutam ayxkan Jordán, an lapanak an yu jalhixa'alat'i, wachu jama'paxanan, chi yucha tala'an'ojoy.
An Juán jajuniy: — Jantu xamati lay la'a'i t'u'u li ntu yucha an Diosi xta'niy.
Uxitnan k'ats'ayat'iti li iknajun li ntu kit'ini ijCristo, kit'in wa p'ulhnajcha kimakminkanchalh.

Lakatam tan tama'xto'kan, an ts'alh yucha yu lhit'ajun an ixli'it, chi an ix'amigo an ts'alh an yu tama'xt'o'a, yu wani t'ayalh chi alha'asmat'a yu najun, sawalhcha achan. Xliyu kit'in an ki'achat a'tsay.
Yucha task'iniya li kata'ayalhi laka lhitapalat, chi kit'in aktalakat'ikt'ilh.
Yu talhman mintachalh jantu xamati ixt'achun. Chi yu wa aniycha lakaat'un alin wa de lakaat'uncha, chi wa yu aniycha alini lhichiwiniy. Pero yu lakt'iyan mintachalh jantu xamati ixt'achun,
chi yucha lhichiwiniy yu la'ts'intacha chi asmattacha, pero ntu xamati kiklaka'iy.
Li xamati kiklaka'iy an tacha najun, yucha najuni li sawalhi an tacha najun an Dios,
mu an yu Dios makminta, yucha an ixchiwinti Diosi lhichiwiniy, chi mu an Dios yucha jantu wa jatapulhkanti xt'a'a an ixTakuwin.
An Dios mapayniya an isTs'alh, pus ma'axta'ni'olhi an laktanlhun la ixmaka'.

Yu kiklaka'iya an isTs'alh Dios lhit'ajuncha an jatsukunti yu ntu katimin'olh; pero yu ntu kiklaka'iputun jantu katila'ts'ilhi an jatsukunti, yucha kala'a'iya an ay lhima'alh'ajna yu kaxta'niya an Dios.
Akxni k'atsalhi an Jesús li an fariseojnin tak'atsalhi li ixnawkan li an Jesús palay ixjama'paxanan chi an Juan jantu,
masi an Jesús jantu yu ixjama'paxanan, yu'uncha an ixt'alhtanan,
an Jesús taxtulhi xalakaat'un Judea k'uxa'ancho'olhi xalakaat'un Galilea.
Chi ixlitask'iniya li kala'pusli o'sliyani xalakaat'un Samaria.
Pus cha'alhcha lakatam xala'acha'an Samaria, junkan Sicar, wani la ixlakaat'un an Jacob yu ixta'nitacha an ists'alh José.
Ancha ix'ulata ixpozojo an Jacob, pus anchacha sa' tawilh an Jesús, mu sawalhcha ilho'onta la ixjalhtanti, wa k'ischa ix'atunkunt'ajuncha.
Walh cha'alh pumatam t'aku, jamacha'a Samaria, ixmakutuycha xkan, pus an Jesús juniy: —Ak'int'a'ott'ika lakats'uniy mixkan.
Mu an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús ixta'anta an la'acha'an tamawnin yu kata'uya'.

An t'aku jamacha'a Samaria alhtaylh juniy: —¿Tasu li k'isk'inicha xkan li akt'a'otni li uxint'i jamacha'a Judeajk'at'i chi kiti'n ijkamacha'a Samariaja? Chuncha junilh mu an judiojnin chi an samaritanojnin jantu ixtalala'ts'imputum.
Pus an Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —Li k'a ixk'ats'at'i yu xt'a'a an Dios, chi tichini yuchacha an sk'iniyan xkan, uxint'i yucha k'a isk'inin, chi yucha ka ixta'nini xkan yu la'ajunta.
An t'aku juniy: —Jamach'alhkat, jant'u t'u'u lhit'a'un yu k'ap'umak'ut'u an xkan chi an pozo putalhman. ¿T'anisch'a k'a'iya'a xkan yu ak'ixt'a'niya'a yu la'ajunta?
¿Chu sna palay ayk'at'i, palay jantu an kimpayk'an Jacob yu kintaxta'nin aniy pozo, tan otlhi xkan chi an ixjas'at'an chi ixjatapakxat?
An Jesús juniy: —Watichicha yu ot'a aniy xkan kakikxixpala',
pero yu ka'ot'a an xkan yu kit'in akxta'niya jantucha a'tam katikikxixli. Mu an xkan yu kit'in akxta'niya la ixjatsukunticha kataxtutawla yu kaxta'niyacha ixjatsukunti yu ntu min'ojoy.
An t'aku juniy: —Ak'ixt'a'nini yu yucha xkani, jamach'alhkat, para li ntucha ali ajkikxixli chi ntucha ali akmilh makutunu aniy.
An Jesús juniy: —K'ap'inchi t'asanini mint'apapa chi k'at'at'ana'acha.
An t'aku alhtaylh juniy: —Jantu tu'u kint'apapa'. An Jesús juniy: —Chunchacha sawalhi t'ach'a an na'un li ntu tu'u mint'apapa',
ixkisinchak'ani jamak'a'unt'a chi chaway an yu lhit'a'un jantu mint'apapa'. Sawalhi an yu na'un.
Akxni chunchacha alha'asmat'a an t'aku, juniy: —Jamach'alhkat, kit'in iklhiwilay ka ixchiwinti Diosi lhich'iwiniy.
Kitnan an kilakpaynink'an aniy a'stitawk'a ixtatapaynini Dios, pero uxitnan yu judiojnin nawnat li la'acha'an Jerusaleni katapayninikalh.
An Jesús juniy: —Aniy ijkunan sawalh, kachina panch'e'exi akxni k'at'ap'ayniniya'it'it an Dios wa tanchuncha masi ntucha aniy a'stitawk'a chi Jerusalén.
Uxitnan jant'u k'ats'ayat'iti t'ich'ini t'ap'ayniniyatcha, pero kitnan ijk'atsayawi tichini iktapayniniyawcha, mu tuchi lhita'alhtaxtukan ixlakatak'an an judiojnin.

Pero an panch'e'ex kachinacha, chi chawaycha, akxni an yu ixlisawalh tatapayniniy an Dios katatapayniniya laka takuwin chi ixlisawalh, chi mu wachu an Dios, an yu tatapayniniy japuxkajuyi li katatapayninilh.
An Dios wa Takuwin, chi an yu tatapayniniy laka takuwin chi ixlisawalh task'iniya li katatapayninilh.
An t'aku juniy an Jesús: —Ijk'atsayi li kamina an Mesías, yu junkan Cristo; akxni kaminacha akintajun'oyani an tanlhun.
An Jesús alhtaylh: —Yucha kit'in, kit'in yu ikt'achiwint'awnan.
Wa akxni tachincho'olhcha an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, pus ixtalhi'a'niycha li ixt'achiwint'ajun pumatam t'aku'. Pero ntu xamati lhisakmilh tani ixnajuncha an t'aku u tuchini ixlit'alakchiwint'ajuncha.
Wachuncha an t'aku makaw'ulalhi an ix'a'xaw, chi alhcha jamak'atsanini an la'acha'an an lapanakni, jajuniy:
—K'at'at'it, ka'aw la'ts'inin pumatam lapanak yu kijunilhi tuchini k'ilhtutacha. ¿Jantu yucha an Cristojcha?
Pus tataxtulhi an la'acha'an chi tala'cha'alhi an Jesús.
An ixt'alhtanan an Jesús yu'uncha ixtalhitapayniniyanalh, ixtajuniy: —Maestro, k'awaycha.
Yucha jajuniy: —Kit'in iklhit'ajun la'atam wayt yu uxitnan jant'u misp'ayat.
Pus an ixt'alhtanan ixtanajun: —¿Xamati sna lhiminilh tu'u yu ka'ulh?
An Jesús jajuniy: —Kit'in kiwayt yucha li ak'ilhtulh tacha an lakask'in an yu kimakmintalh, chi li ak'ilhtu'olhi an ixtapatsat.
Uxitnan nawnat: —Ts'an'ayka la'at'at'i malhkuyu para li kajap'uxnunkalhcha; pero kit'in klajunaw li k'alhak'ap'up'it'itcha an jach'ananti, mu k'at'atacha para li kajap'uxnunkalhcha.

Yu ma'tapatsay an tan jap'uxnunkan kamapalhnikana', chi mach'ixtami jatawk'ati an yu ma'tapatsay para li ka'alilh jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam katimin'olh, chi katalaj'achana an yu jach'ananalh ali an yu jap'uxnun.
Ts'awjcha tacha an nawkan, li: "ali'ini yu tach'an chi ali'ini an yu tajap'uxnun".
Kit'in klamak'antaw para li k'ap'uxt'iti yu ntu uxitnan lhit'ap'ats'at'it, ali'ini yu tatapatsalh, chi uxitnanch'a yu oxi la'a'iyat an yu talhitapatsalh yu'uncha.
Ixluwk'an an lapanakni an yu ancha jamacha'an anchunu xala'acha'an Samaria takiklaka'ilhi an Jesús, xliyu tacha an ixjajunitacha an t'aku', li an Jesús junilhi tuchini ix'ilhtutacha.
Wachuncha tala'cha'alhi an jamacha'an Samaria an Jesús chi tajuniy li ma kajat'atamakawlh, pus jat'atamakawlhcha la'at'uy wilhchan.
Palaycha ixluwk'ani takiklaka'ilh an Jesús, mu wanajcha yucha ixta'alha'asmat'a.

Chi ixtajuniy an t'aku: —Jantucha wa xliyu iklhikiklaka'iyaw li t'ach'a an na'un, wanajcha kitnani ik'alha'asmat'aw chi ijk'atsayawi li aniy yucha sawalhi yu jama'alhtaxtunun aniy lakamunulhpa', aniy Cristo.
La'puslicha la'at'uy wilhchan, an Jesús taxtulhcha xalakaat'un Samaria, alhcha xalakaat'un Galilea.
Mu wanaj yucha ixnajunta, li yu lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios jantu la'a'ikani la ixla'acha'an.

Akxni cha'alhcha Galilea, an jamacha'an Galilea tala'a'ilhcha an Jesús, mu ixtala'ts'intacha tacha an ixlak'ilhtutachalh tanlhun an la'acha'an Jerusalén, akxni k'atan ixjunita, mu yu'uncha wachu ixta'anta an lakak'atan.

Pus an Jesús a'tamcha ampalhi Caná, xala'acha'an Galilea, tan an ix'ilhtuta tacha xaxkan uva wa de xkan. Walh an la'acha'an Capernaúm ixt'ajun pumatam xa'ay ixt'atapatsan an rey, wa ixta'an'ay ists'alh.
Akxni asmatlhi an ixt'atapatsan an rey li an Jesús Galileajcha ixt'ajun, la'alh chi ixtapayninicha li kat'a'alhi la ixcha'a para li kak'uch'unilhi an ists'alh, mu ixnit'ajuncha.
Wachuncha an Jesús juniy an lapanak: —Uxitnan li nt'u la'ts'inat'iti tu'u yu lhi'a'nin jant'u jak'iklak'a'i'ninat'it.
An xa'ay ixt'atapatsan an rey juniy: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, li ntuka' niya an kints'alh watukancha ak'int'ap'it'i.
An Jesús juniy: —K'ap'inch'o'ochicha mincha'a', amints'alh t'ajun. An lapanak kiklaka'ilhi tacha an junilh an Jesús, pus alhcha.
Akxni ixcha'ant'ajuncha la ixcha'a, an ixma'tsukunin talakatastuklhicha, tajuniy: —Amints'alh ta'oxilhcha.
Pus jalhisakmilhcha tuchi panch'e'excha akxni ta'oximaj'ayacho'olhcha. Tajuniy: —Kutanchacha ta'oxay, la unaj, akxnicha makawlh an alhp'as iskakat.
Pus an ixpay an ts'alh lhimacha'xalhcha li chunchacha horaja ixjunita akxni an junilh an Jesús: "Amints'alh t'ajun". Pus kiklaka'ilhcha yucha chi chux an yu ta jalhila'ts'in.
Yucha aniycha yu ixlitipat'uycha yu laj'oxi masulh an Jesús, akxni minchalh xalakaat'un Judea chi cha'alhcha xalakaat'un Galilea.
Xli'astan jumpalh, an judiojnin ixta'ilhtuy la'atam k'atan, pus an Jesús tama'ast'a'alhi Jerusalén.
An Jerusalén, alin lakatam tan nap'an tajun xkan, lakakisi xamalhticha lhit'ajun. Tan junkan lhihebreo Betesda. Wani tan junkan ixmalhtichak'an borregojnin
An tan ixlakputanukanachalh, lhuw ta'an'anini ixtalakmanalh, yu la'la'lhtulu'un, yu lakch'anlht'ulukun, chi yu wa ixtalaklakalhtukulunta, ixtapakxancha li kalaklalh an xkan.

Mu an tan nap'an ixtajun xkan ixlila'paj'ayan ixta'alhtajuy pumatam ix'angelh an Dios chi ixlaklaycha an xkan, pus yu p'ulhcha ixtajuy an lakxkan akxni ixlaklaycha, ixtak'uch'uycha, watuchicha ta'an'at ka ixlitsukulh.
Ancha ixmalh pumatam lapanak la'ap'uxamkawtsajincha k'ata ixta'an'ajmalh.
Pus akxni an Jesús la'ts'ilhi li ancha ixmalh, chi k'atsalhi li ma'anchacha chuncha ixta'an'ajmalh, juniy: —¿T'ak'uch'up'ut'un?
An ta'an'an alhtaylh juniy: —Jamach'alhkat, jantu xamati kintamaj'oy an tan wilh xkan akxni laklay, akxni wa ik'amputunka pumatamcha las tajuyachalh.
Pus an Jesús juniy: —K'a'ost'aycha, k'asakt'icha aminputamat ch'i k'alht'ancha.
Pus wa akxni anchunu lapanak ta'oxilhcha, saklhicha an ixputamat chi jalhtanajtsukulhcha. Akxni chuncha tapasalh, akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchan.
Wachuncha an judiojnin tajuniy an yu k'uch'uk'alh: —Chaway wa jastaknankan wilhchan, tu'oxi li ch'ixlit'a'un amimputamat.
Yucha jajuniy: —An yu kink'uch'ulh yucha kijuniy: "K'asakt'icha amimputamat ch'i k'alht'ancha".
Pus tajuniy: —¿Tisiyuchacha yu junan: "Li k'asakt'icha minputamat ch'i k'alht'ancha?
Pero an lapanak an yu k'uch'ukalh tu ixk'atsayi tichini yuchacha an yu k'uch'ulh, mu an Jesús tucha aniy ixt'ajun an tan lhilhuw ixlakyakalh.
Xli'astan an Jesús la'cha'alh an lakatajtan chi juniy: —Chaway t'ak'uch'ut'icha, jant'uch'a ali k'a'ilht'u mintala'alhin para li nt'u t'u'u k'ap'ut'ap'asa yu palay makxkay.
An lapanak alhcha chi jalakjunilhcha an judiojnin li yucha an Jesusi yu k'uch'ulh.
Pus an judiojnin ixtalhich'a'o'aycha an Jesús, ixtama'niputuncha, wa xliyu li ixlak'ilhtuyi aniy tanlhun akxni masi wa jastaknankan wilhchan.
An Jesús jajuniy: —An kimpay masi tacha chaway tapatsay, kit'in wachu iktapatsay.
Pus an judiojnin palaycha ixtalhima'niputun li ixnajun li yucha Ists'alh Dios, chi li yucha tapatsayi akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchan, tacha Dios.

An Jesús jajuniy: —Aniy klajunaw sawalh: Jantu lay tu'u kati'ilhtulhi an Ists'alh Dios wa ix'akstucha ka'ilhtuputulh, yucha ilhtuy yu la'ts'in ilhtuy an ixpay. Chux yu ilhtuy an ixpay wanajcha chuni ilhtuy an Ists'alh.
Mu an ixpay mapayniya an Ists'alh chi masuniya chux tacha an lak'ilhtuy; chi palay kalakmasunikana yu palay laj'ay tanlhun, yu sawalhch'a k'alhi'a'niya'it'it uxitnan.
Mu tacha an ixPay jamala'awniya an janinin chi jaxta'niy jatsukunti, an isTs'alh wachu jaxta'niy jatsukunti yu jaxta'niputun.
An ixPay jantu xamati lhimuk'ay tuchini ilhtutacha xamati', yucha an isTs'alhi ma'axta'nita li kanawna tuchini yu ilhtutacha xamati',
para li lhichuxi kakiklaka'ikalh chi kalhiwilakalh an isTs'alh tacha kiklaka'ikan an ixPay. Yu ntu kiklaka'iya an Ists'alh Dios, wachu ntu kiklaka'iya an ixpay, yu mala'achatachalh.

Aniy klajunaw sawalh: Yu asmat'a an kinchiwinti chi kiklaka'iya an yu kimala'achatachalh lhit'ajuni jatsukunti yu ntu min'ojoy, jantu katima'nikalh, yucha la'puslicha lakalhinin, lakajatsukunticha cha'alh.
Kamina panch'e'ex chi sawalh, chi an panch'e'ex chawaycha, akxni an janinin kata'alha'asmat'a an Ists'alh Dios; chi an yu kata'alha'asmat'a katatsukuya'.
Mu tacha an ixpay lhit'ajuni jatsukunti, wanajcha chuni ilhtuta an ists'alh li kalhitsukulhi jatsukunti,
chi atumpaj, xta'nipalhi lhich'alhkat li yucha kanawna tuchini ilhtulhcha atam, mu yucha Ists'alh an Dios.
Pero nt'u k'alhi'a'nit'iti ani, mu kachina panch'e'ex akxni ixchuxk'an an yu ta'aknunun kata'alha'asmat'a an ixchiwinti;
chi yu ta'ilhtulhi yu oxi tanlhun katatak'ut'acha chi katala'awcho'oyacha ixpujun'alhincha; pero yu ta'ilhtulhi yu ntu oxi, katala'awcho'oya para li katama'alh'ajnanacha.

Jantu layi tu'u k'ilhtuy wa ki'akstucha ak'ilhtuputulh; tacha k'asmat'a kijuniy an kimpay chunchacha k'ilhtuy, pus an yu k'ilhtuy ts'awj, mu ntu yu wa kit'incha iknajuni k'ilhtuy, yu najun an kimpayi k'ilhtuy, yu kimakmintalh.
Li wa ki'akstucha aklhichiwinkalhk, an yu aknawna jantu katilhitapalalh.
Pumatami yu kilhichiwiniy kit'in, chi jk'atsayi li tacha an kilhichiwiniy sawalh.
Uxitnan jamala'ach'anit'iti yu kata'alh lhisakminin an Juán tichini yuchacha, chi yucha ts'ajwi lhichiwinilh yu sawalh.
Pero ntu lisna wa ijkiklaka'it'ajuncha xamati wa lapanak; aniy klajunaw para li uxitnan k'at'a'alht'axt'ut'it.
An Juán tachanu la'atam pumaklhku ixjunita, yu ixma'tajiy chi ixmapulhkuy, chi uxitnan p'ulaj'ach'amp'ut'unt'iti an ixjatapulhkunu wa tam pants'ik'is.
Pero kit'in klalhiminitaw yu palay laj'ay pujamak'atsaninti, an Juán palay wa lakat'ikt'i. Yu k'ilhtuy kit'in, yucha yu kilhijuniy an kimpay, chunchacha putasuy li yucha an kimpayi kimakminta.
An kimpay an yu kimakminta wachu kilhichiwiniya kit'in, masi uxitnan t'u a'tam alha'asmatt'at'it ch'i nt'u a'tam la'ts'int'at'it,
ch'i nt'u mak'awniyat'iti li an ixchiwinti kataputsuku'alhin, mu nt'u k'iklak'a'iyat'iti an yu mala'achatachalh.
Sawalhcha ixlak'anti p'unawnat an tan ts'o'muk'akanta an ixchiwinti Dios, mu lhiwilayat li anch'a la'ch'ip'imp'ut'unat an jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy, chi ancha kilhichiwininta,
walh tu kilala'minputunawi para li k'alhits'uk'ut'iti an jatsukunti.
Kit'in jantu yu iklhakapu'an li an lapanakni ayi akintala'ts'ilh.
Atumpaj klamispayawi uxitnan chi ijk'atsayi li nt'u lhit'awnat'iti an xjamapayninti Dios.
Kit'in yucha an kimpayi kimakminta, walh chi ntu kilala'a'iyaw; pero li xamati lapanak ka ixmilh yu wa ix'akstucha kaxk'uxamilh, yuch'a k'axla'a'it'it.
¿Tasich'a k'ajalhik'iklak'a'inina'it uxitnan li wa mi'akstuchak'ani sawalh lalhiwilayat'iti, ch'i nt'u p'uxk'awyat'iti yu ix'alhp'asninti an yu wa yuchacha Dios sawalhi?
Jant'u k'ana'unt'it li sna akla'alhtasuyawi la ix'ukxlakapu an kimpay; yucha an Moisesi kata'alhtasuyan, an yu uxitnan k'iklak'a'iyat.
Mu li uxitnan k'axk'iklak'a'it'iti an Moisés, kit'in wachu xakilakiklaka'iw, mu an Moisés yucha kilhits'o'muk'alh.
Pero li nt'u k'iklak'a'iyat'iti an yu ts'o'muk'ata, ¿t'asich'a k'alhik'iklak'a'iya'it kinchiwinti?
Xli'astan, an Jesús alhcha an ixtapiktutam xalakxkan la'acha'an Galilea, jumpalhkan Tiberias.
Wanaj lhilhuwi ixch'a'o'akanta, mu ixtala'ts'incha tacha an ixjak'uch'uy an ta'an'anin.
Wachuncha tama'ast'a'alhcha tanchun a'stitawk'a chi anchacha sa' tawlhchalh ali an ixt'alhtanan.
An Paxku iso'omintacha, ixk'atank'an an judiojnin.
Akxni an Jesús talakatiyawlh chi la'ts'ilhi li wanajcha lhilhuw, lhisakmilhi an Felipe juniy: —¿Tanischa kajatamawniyaw pan aniy lapanakni para li kata'ulhcha?
Pero an Jesús yucha wa ixjunicha an Felipe, wa xlila'ts'intanuycha, mu yucha ixk'atsaycha tani kalhit'alayacha.
An Felipe najun: —Masi la'at'uy ciento wilhchan aklhima'tapatsalh jantu katicha'alhi para li lakts'unijcha kata'ulh.
Xapumatam an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús, junkan Andrés, ixt'ala'ajun Simón Pedro, juniy an Jesús:
Aniy t'ajun pumatam ts'alh lhit'ajun a'xkisi pan de cebada chi la'at'uy jatanti; pero ¿tisuncha li wanajcha lhilhuwi?
Wachuncha an Jesús jajuniy: —K'aja'unitka li katalaktawilhka'. Ancha wastakcha ixjala'awnininta, pus talaktawilhcha, katacha la'akisi milh lapanakni.

An Jesús xa'a'ilhcha an pan, chi xli'astan xta'lhicha lhimala'puchajun, chi jaxta'nilhcha an ixt'alhtanan, chi yu'uncha tamala'pits'inilhcha ixchuxk'an an lapanakni yu ancha ixtawilanalh; chi an jatanti wanajcha chuni ilhtulh, chi jaxta'nilhcha, tacha oxicha talhikiklalh.
Akxni talaj'o'atsa'olhcha, an Jesús jajuniy an ixt'alhtanan: —K'amach'ixt'amitcha an yu xajchalh lakt'ikt'i, para li ntu tu'u kats'an'alh.
Pus tamach'ixtamilhcha la'akawt'uy kanastaja an xala'tach'e'en yu xajchalh an yu ta'ulh an a'xkisi pan de cebada.
An lapanakni akxni chunchacha tala'ts'ilh ilhtulh an Jesús, ixtanajun: —Yucha aniycha sawalhi an li yu kamina lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios aniy lakamunulhpa'.
Pero an Jesús jalhimacha'xanilhi li ka'asi talhi'amputuna para li kata'ilhtulh rey, pus ampalhi an a'stitawk'a wa ix'akstu.
Akxni tats'isilhcha, an ixt'alhtanan an Jesús ta'alhcha an lakxkan,
chi tatajulhcha lakatam laka barco, ixtapatakutt'ajuncha an lakxkan, ixtita'ancha la'acha'an Capernaúm. An Jesús tuka' ixjala'cha'an, walh chi puts'istacha ixjunita.
Wa akxni an lakxkan ts'ukulhcha laklay, mu p'ascha ixmin un.
Katacha la'akisi u la'achaxan kilometrojo ixta'antachalh, tala'ts'ilhcha an Jesús li ix'ukxjalhtanaj'antachalhcha an lakxkan chi wanicha ixla'antachalh an barco, pus tatalhamnilh.
Pero yucha jajunilh: —¡Mu kit'in, t'u k'alakt'alhanant'it!
Pus wachuncha yu'uncha ixtalaj'achancha akxni jala'cha'alh an laka barco, chi an barco cha'alhcha an tan ixtita'an lakaat'un.

Tunkunchalh, an lapanakni yu ixtawilananchalh an ixtapiktutam lakxkan, talhakapu'alhi li an Jesús jantu jat'a'alhi an ixt'alhtanan an laka barco, tak'atsalhi li wa ix'akstuk'ani ta'alh chi mu wa la'ata'mi barco ancha ixwilh.
Pero ali barco yu ixtamintachalh la'acha'an Tiberias, ixtacha'anta wani an tan ixtalak'uta pan, akxni ixta'ojotacha lhimala'puchajun an jamach'alhkat Jesús.
Pus akxni an lapanakni tala'ts'ilhi li an Jesús jantu tu'u ancha ixt'ajun, chi an ixt'alhtanan, talaktajulhi an laka lakbarco ta'alhcha puxkawnini la'acha'an Capernaúm an Jesús.
Akxni tacha'alhcha an ixtapiktutam lakxkan ancha tala'cha'alh, pus tajuniy: —Maestro, ¿t'asu wananch'a ch'it'a aniya?
An Jesús ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —Ijk'atsaycha, xliyu kilalhipuxkawyaw mu oxi o'ats'at'it akxni an lakwa'int'it, jantu xliyu kilalhipuxkawyaw li wa lhimach'a'xat'itcha an t'ach'a la'ts'int'it.

Jant'u k'alhit'ap'ats'at'iti an wayt yu wa lakp'uch'i u wa min'ojoy, yucha an yu ntu min'ojoyi k'alhit'ap'ats'at'it, yu xt'a'a jatsukunti yu ntu min'ojoy, yu kataxta'niyan an Ists'alh Dios, mu an Dios, an ixPay Jesús yucha ma'axta'nilh.
Wachuncha tajuniy: —¿Tisuncha ak'ilhtu para li ak'ilhtucha an tapatsat yu tacha lhi'achaniy an Diosi?
An Jesús ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —An tapatsat yu an Dios lakask'in, yucha li k'ak'iklak'a'it'iti an yu mala'achatachalh.
Pus tajuniy: —¿Pus tisuncha akilamasuniyaw para li akla'ts'iwcha chi aklakiklaka'iwcha? ¿tisuncha tapatsati ilht'uyi?
An kilakpaynink'an ixtajunita ta'ulhi an pan yu patajulh lakt'iyan an tan wa lakaaxixnicha lakaat'un, tacha ts'o'muk'akanta tan najunta: "Jamawalh xapan lakt'iyan".
Pus an Jesús jajuniy: —Aniy klajunaw sawalh, jantu yu an Moisesi yu taxta'nin an xapan lakt'iyan, yucha an kimpayi yu taxta'niyan an yu xapan sawalh lakt'iyan.
Mu an ixpan an Dios yucha an yu minchalh talhman chi xta'niya jatsukunti an lakaamunulhpa'.
Yu'uncha tajuniy: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, lhilhiji akilaxta'niw yu yucha pan.
An Jesús jajuniy: —Kit'ini ikpan yu xt'a'a jatsukunti. Yu akint'amina jantu a'tam katichawanalh, chi yu kinkiklaka'iy jantu a'tam katikikxixli.
Pero tacha klajuniwcha, masi kilala'ts'inawcha jant'u jak'iklak'a'ininat.
Ixchuxk'an yu kijaxta'niy an kimpay, akintala'mina', chi yu kintala'min jantu aktijasastuklhi.
Mu kit'in ikminchalh an lakt'iyan para li ak'ilhtulhi yu tacha lhi'achaniy an kimpay yu kimakmintachalh, jantu yu kit'in iknajun.
An kimpay yu kimakminchalh lakask'in li ntu k'is tu'u akma'ats'an'alh yu yucha kijaxta'niy, yucha lakask'in li ajkamala'awnilhi akxni xati'astancha wilhchan kuna'.

Chunchuniya lakask'in an kimpay, li ixchuxk'an an yu tala'ts'in an Ists'alh Dios chi takiklaka'iy, katalhits'ukulhi jatsukunti yu ntu min'ojoy; chi kit'in ajkamala'awnicho'oya akxni xati'astancha wilhchan kuna'.
An judiojnin tsukulhcha talhichiwiniy, xliyu najun: "Kit'in pan yu ta'alhtajulh lakt'iyan",
chi ixtalaknawpalay: —Aniy ¿chun ntu yu an Jesús an ists'alh José? jamispayawi ixpay chi ixnati. Chi chaway najun li lakt'iyani minchalh.
An Jesús ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —Jant'uch'a ali k'alakna'unt'iti wa siya uxitnancha.
Jantu xamati lay akintich'a'o'alh li an kimPay yu kimakmintalh jantu kilhiminiy, para li lay akmala'awnicho'olh axkni xati'astancha wilhchan.
An la ixlibrojk'an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios najunta: "Yucha an Diosi kajamalaklani'oya ixchuxk'an". Pus ixchuxk'an yu ta'asmatniya an kimpay chi talaklaniya yu jamasuniy, akintach'a'o'aya'.
Chi ntu nawputun li sna xamaticha la'ts'ilh an kimpay; wa kit'ini yu kla'ts'intacha, mu ancha ikminchalh tan wilhchalh.
Aniy sawalhi an yu klajunaw, yu kinkiklaka'iy lhit'ajunijatsukunti yu ntu min'ojoy.
Kit'in pan yu xt'a'a jatsukunti.
Amilakpaynink'an ixtajunita ta'ulhi an xapan lakt'iyan an lakaxixni lakaat'un, walh chi lanani tanilh.
Pero kit'in iklhichiwiniy pan yu lakt'iyan minachalh; yu yucha uy, jantu katinilh.

Kit'ini an pan yu la'ajunta yu lakt'iyan mintachalh; yu yucha uy aniy pan, katsuku'alhiya'. An pan yu kit'in akxt'a'a, yucha an kilakatunaj. Aklhima'axt'a'a ixlakata tacha an t'aw'ok'an aniy lakaamunulhpa'.
Wachuncha an judiojnin tsukulhcha talhilakchiwiniy, talajuniy: —¿Tasicha akintalhimawayan ixlakatunaj aniya?
An Jesús jajuniy: —Chun sawalhi aniy yu klajunaw, li nt'u k'at'i'ut'iti an xakanit an Ists'alh Dios ch'i nt'u k'at'i'ott'iti an xak'alhni, jant'u k'at'ilhits'uk'ut'iti an jatsukunti.
Yu ka'uya an kijakanit chi ka'ot'a an kijak'alhni katsuku'alhiya', akmala'awnicho'oya akxni xati'astancha wilhchan kuna',
mu an kijakanit yucha yu wayt sawalh, chi an kijak'alhni yucha yu lhi'ot'at sawalh.
Yu uyi an kijakanit chi ot'a an kijak'alhni akimputsuku'alhiya chi akputsuku'alhiya'.
Tacha an kimakmilhi an yu lhit'ajun jatsukunti kimpay, chi yucha ikput'ajun, wanajcha chuni yu aki'uya akinputsukuya'.

Yu iklhichiwiniy yucha an pan yu minchalh an lakt'iyan. Aniy pan jantu tacha an yu talak'ulh amilakpaynink'an ixtajunita, an tan wa ixjaxixnintacha lakaat'un, yu'uncha masi ta'ulh talaknilh. Yu ka'uya an pan yu iklalhixa'alayaw kit'in, yucha katsuku'alhiya'.
Chuncha nawlh an Jesús akxni ixmasut'ajun lakatajtan an la'acha'an Capernaúm.
Akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi, ixluwk'an an ixt'alhtanan tanajun: —Tacha aniy najun lhima'anxkay; ¿tisiyuchacha lay kakiklaka'iya'a?
An Jesús lhakapu'alhi li an ixt'alhtanan wa ixtalhichiwiniya tacha an jajunilh, pus jajuniy: —¿Jant'u oxi lhiwilayat?
¿Li k'a ixla'ts'int'iti an Ists'alh Dios katach'ixcho'olh tan p'ulhnaj ixwilhchalh, t'asu k'a ixna'unt'itcha?
An takuwin yucha yu xt'a'a jatsukunti; an lakatunaj yucha yu ntu tu'u lhitapalay. An chiwinti an yu klalhixa'alayaw yucha takuwin chi jatsukunti.
Chi ta'alinka yu uxitnan yu ntuka' tajakiklaka'inin. Mu an Jesús yucha ixk'atsaycha ixlip'ulhnaj ixjuntachalh, tichini yu'unchacha yu ntu tajakiklaka'inin, chi tichini yuchacha yu kama'axt'a'a'.
Chi nawpalay: —Xliyu klalhijunaw li ntu xamati lay akintila'milh li ntu yu an kimpay makawniy.
Wachuncha, ixluwk'an an yu wachucha ixtat'alhtanan an Jesús tamakawlhcha, jantucha ixtach'a'o'ay.
Pus an ixpumakawt'uyk'an ixt'alhtanan jajuniy an Jesús: —¿Uxitnan wach'uch'a k'uxap'inat'it?
An Simón Pedro alhtaylh: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, ¿tisiyuchacha akch'a'o'ayawi? Aminchiwinti yucha yu xt'a'a jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy.
Chi kitnan ijkiklaka'itawcha, chi ijk'atsayawcha li uxint'i Cristo, Ists'alh Dios yu la'ajunta.
An Jesús alhtaylh juniy: —¿Jantu kit'ini klasakxtutaw amimpumakawt'uyk'an? chi xapumatam de uxitnan yucha xapay makxkay'un.
An Jesús yucha an Judas Iscarioteje ixlichiwint'ajun, ists'alh tichi Simón, mu yucha yu kama'axt'a'a', masi yucha yu ixlipumakawt'uychak'an ixtajunita an ixt'alhtanan.
Xli'astan an Jesús, xalakaat'un la'acha'an Galileajcha ixt'awnachalh, mu ntu ixtawlhputuni xalakaat'un Judea, wa xliyu an judiojnin wa ixtama'niputun.
Pero mu wanicha ixminta ixk'atank'an an judiojnin akxni ixtala'la'oxiy ixmulht'a'ak'an de jach'itin,
pus an ixjat'ala'awnin an Jesús tajuniy: —K'at'axt'ucha aniy, k'ap'inchicha la'acha'an Judea, para li wachucha katak'atsalhi amint'alhtanan an t'ach'a lak'ilht'uy tanlhun laj'oxi tapatsat,
mu ntu xamati lapanaki li yu lakask'in li kamispakalh, tan wa la'asa'nik'acha kalak'ilhtulh tu'u'. Li lak'ilht'uycha aniy tanlhun, k'alak'ilht'ucha tan ixlitalakasun.
Masi ixjat'ala'awnin jantu ixtakiklaka'iy.
Pus an Jesús jajuniy: —Kit'in tuka' chini kimpanch'e'ex, pero uxitnan minpanch'e'exk'an lhilhiji alin.
Uxitnan tulay taxkayani an lapanakni, pero kit'in kintaxkajiy, mu kit'in xla'ts'awalanti iknajun li an yu ta'ilhtuy tu oxi.
K'ap'inchi'itcha uxitnaniy laka k'atan, kit'in ntuka' akti'alh, mu ntuka' chini kimpanch'e'ex.
Chuncha jajunilh, chi yucha an la'acha'an Galileajcha tamakawlh.
Pero xli'astan akxni ta'alhcha an ixjat'ala'awnin, wachucha alhi an laka k'atan, wa la'asa', jantu xamati mak'atsaanilh.
An judiojnin ixtapuxkajuycha an laka k'atan, chi ixtanajun: —¿Tanischa t'ajun anchunu lapanaki?
An lapanakni sawalhcha ixtalhichiwiniy an Jesús. Ali'in ixtanajun: —Yucha oxi lapanak. Pero ali'in ixtanajun: —Jantu, wa ja'o'xcho'oycha an lapanakni.
Pero masi chunchacha, jantu xamati ts'awjcha ixlichiwiniy an Jesús, mu ixjatalhamnikani an judiojnin.
Ixpaytatcha an k'atan, an Jesús tanulhcha an laka tajtan chi tsukulhcha jamasuniy.
An judiojnin ixtalhi'a'niycha, ixtanajun: —¿Tasicha sawalhcha lhilajk'atsay li ntu tu'u jatalanininta?
An Jesús ja'alhtaylh: —An tacha kmasuy jantu kinawin, ixnawin an yu kimala'achatachalh.
Yu ilhtuputuni tacha an lhi'achaniy Dios, kak'atsayacha li an tacha ikmasuy Diosi kilhijuniy u wa kit'incha iknajun.

Yu wa ix'akstucha lhichiwinkan, wa ix'akstucha puxkajuy yu sawalhcha kapulhiwilakalh; pero yu yucha lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti an yu mala'achatachalh, yucha xasawalh, chi ntu tu'u yu ntucha oxi ka'ilhtulh.
Pero yucha an Moisesi taxta'nin an lhamap'a'sin, walh ch'i nt'u k'iklak'a'iyat. ¿Tasu li kilama'niputunawcha?
An lapanakni ta'alhtaylh, tajuniy: —Wa lakpach'apayan makxkay'un, ¿tisiyuchacha ma'niputunani?
An Jesús ja'alhtaylh, jajuniy: —Sawalhch'a lhi'a'niyat'iti masi wa la'atamcha tu'u ikmasulh akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchan.

Pero an Moisés tajunini li k'ala'ak'axwililich'uk'up'uxt'iti mi'a'axt'a'ak'an, pero ntu yu tukani lhinajun, yu'uncha an yu t'a ixjalhila'ts'inat'it. Chi masi akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchan, ak'axwililich'uk'up'uxat'iti ix'a'axt'a'a xamati lapanak.

Li an lapanak akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkani ix'a'axt'a'a akxni ntu tapatsakan wilhchan para li an ixlamap'a'sin Moisés jantu kats'an'alh, ¿tasu li lhit'alh'amnatcha li wanaj ijk'uch'u'ojoyi kit'in ta ixlila'a'ay an lapanaki?
Jant'u k'alhich'iwinint'iti xamati wa xliyu t'ani la'ts'inatcha, akxni t'u'u nawnat, k'ana'unt yu ixla'ts'awalanti.
Pus wachuncha ali'in jamacha'an Jerusalén ixtalaknajun: —¿Jantu yucha aniy lapanaki yu tapuxkajuy li tama'niputun?
Chi aniya t'ajun, ixlitalakasuni chiwiniy chi ntu tu'u tajuniy. ¿Xliyu sna li takiklaka'ilhcha an jamach'alhkatni li yucha Cristo sawalh?
Pero mu kitnan k'atsayawi tanchuncha mintachalh aniy, pero akxni kamina an Cristo, jantu xamati katik'atsalh tanchuncha kaminanta.

Pus wachuncha an Jesús ja'alha'asmatlhicha, mu ixmasut'ajun an laka tajtan, pus p'ascha jajuniy: —¡Pus kakilamispayaw ch'i k'ak'ats'ayat'it'i tanchuncha ikmintachalh! Pero kit'in tu wa kijatalapututcha li ikminta, yu kimakmintachalh yucha yu sawalh, uxitnan t'u misp'ayat.
Kit'in ikmispay, mu yucha ikpula'awlh, chi yucha kimala'achatachalh.
Pus wachuncha ixtach'apayawputuncha; pero ntu xamati maktapujulh, mu ntuka' ixcha'ani ixpanch'e'ex.
Ixluwk'ani takiklaka'ilh an Jesús chi ixtanajun: —Akxni kamina an Cristo ¿chu sna palay kalak'ilhtuya tanlhun yucha?
An fariseojnin ta'alha'asmatlhi an lapanakni li chunchacha ixtalhichiwiniy an Jesús; pus an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an fariseojnin tamala'achalhi lapanakni para li katach'apayawlh.
An Jesús najun: —Wa lakats'uniycha panch'e'exi aklat'a'aklatsukuyaw, chi xli'astan akla'ancho'oyacha an yu kimakmintachalh.
Akilapuxkawyaw, pero ntu akintilala'cha'aw chi tan ikti'an jant'u lay k'at'ip'it'it.
Wachuncha an judiojnin ixtalajuniy: —¿Tanischa ka'ana aniy li ntucha lay katila'cha'awi? ¿Kajala'anacha sna an yu ta'a'pitsinin jamacha'an Grecia chi yu'unchacha kajamasuniya'?
¿Tasicha nawputun li najuncha li "Akilapuxkawyaw, pero ntu akintilala'cha'aw, mu tan ak'ana uxitnan nt'u lay k'at'ip'it'iti'?
Akxni wa x'amancha wilhchan an laka k'atan, mu yucha yu palaycha ixlitapalay, an Jesús tayalhcha chi p'ascha najun: —Li xamati kikxixa, akila'milhcha, chi ka'ot'a' xkan.
Tacha an najunta an tan ts'o'omuk'akanta ixchiwinti Dios, li yu kinkiklaka'iy, tachanu ma'alhuw ayxkani la ixpulakni kap'ats'alaya xkan yu la'ajunta.
An Jesús nawputun li yu katakiklaka'iya, katala'a'iya an ixTakuwin Dios, mu akxni an ixTakuwin Dios tuka' ixmakminkan.
Wachuncha an ali'in tacha an lhilhuw ixlakyakalh, akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi, ixtanajun: —Aniy yucha ixchiwinti Dios sawalhi lhichiwiniy.
Ali'in ixtanajun: —Aniy yucha an Cristo. Pero ali'in ixtanajun: —Jantu, an Cristo jantu la'acha'an Galileaja katiminchalh.
An tan ts'o'muk'akanta najunta li an Cristo yucha an rey Daviti kapu'a'p'unminanta, yucha jamacha'a Beléni ixjunita, ancha kaminanta an Cristo.
Pus an lapanakni ixlakata an Jesús tatala'apitsilhcha.
An ali'in lapanakni ixtach'apayawputuncha an Jesús, pero ntu xamati ch'apayawlh.
An yu ixtajalhistaknan an laka tajtan ta'ancho'olhcha an tan ixtat'awnachalh an fariseojnin chi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin, walh akxni tacha'alhcha jalhisakmikancha tuchini ntucha talhilhi'alh.
Yu'uncha taja'alhtayanalh: —¡Tu a'tam chuncha xamati lapanak kachiwinilh!
Pus an fariseojnin tat'alajuniy: —¿Uxitnan wach'uch'a o'xch'o'ok'ant'it?
¿Chu sna xamati kiklaka'iy an kijefejnink'an u an fariseojnin?
An lapanakni an yu takiklaka'iy wa ntu tak'atsay an lhamap'a'sin, tu oxi tacha an talay.
An Nicodemo, pumatam fariseo yu ixkila'pixiyalhnanta an Jesús la'atam jatats'isni, jajuniy:
An la kilhamap'a'sink'an tasuyi li jantu layi katima'niw xamati lapanak li ntu alha'asmat'awi yu najun, para li kak'atsawi tuchini yu ilhtutacha.
Yu'uncha tajuniy: —¿Chu wachu jamacha'a Galileajk'at'i? K'ap'unawi an tan ts'o'muk'akanta para li k'ak'ats'at'i li Galilea tu a'tami ancha katiminchalh yu kalhichiwinina ixchiwinti Dios.
Chi atamj atamjcha ancho'olh la ixcha'a'.
Pero an Jesús alhcha an a'stitawk'a tan junkan laka 'olivojnin.
Wats'isin chincho'olhcha an laka tajtan, pus ta lhichux tacha an wilakalh an la'achan tala'cha'alhcha, chi yucha tawilhcha, tsukulhcha jamasunin.
Wachuncha an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin chi an fariseojnin talhicha'anilh pumatam t'aku', yu ta'a'taymalh tan ixa'alat'ajun yu ntu yu ixt'apapa', ixtan'ajnicha tayawlh an tan lhilhuw ixlakyakalh,
chi tajuniy an Jesús: —Maestro, aniy t'aku a'taymakalh tan ixa'alat'ajun lapanak,
chi an la ixlamap'a'sin Moisés kintajunan li yu chuncha lay t'aku aklakat'alhma'niyaw. ¿Uxint'i t'asich'a na'uni?
Chunchacha ixtajuniy wa ixtalhila'ts'intanuycha, para li ka'alilhcha yu katapu'alhtasulh. Pero an Jesús ix'antawilh chi ixjats'o'nuncha la ixmaka an lakaat'un.
Walh ali ixtalhisakmi, pus tats'awalatawilh chi jajuniy: —Yu ntu tu'u ixtala'alhin yuchacha p'ulhnaj kamakat'alh'anilh.
Chi a'tam ta'an tatawlhpalh, tsukunipalh jats'o'nuni an lakaat'un.

Pus an lapanakni mu ta'alha'asmatlhicha tacha an jajunilh an Jesús, tapastaklhi li wachu talhit'ajuni ixtala'alhink'an, pus talak'ancho'olhcha, p'ulhnajcha yucha an yu laktatanincha talak'alh, chi xli'astan yucha an palayka lakts'alanin, xli'astan wa yucha an t'akucha chi an Jesuscha tatamakawlh.
Pus tats'awalatawilhcha an Jesús chi mu ntucha xamati la'ts'in wa yucha an t'akucha, pus juniy: —¿Tanischa tat'ajun yu ixta'alhtasuyani? ¿jantu xamati lakat'alhman?
An t'aku alhtaylh: —Jantu, jantu xamati kilakat'alhmalh. Wachuncha an Jesús juniy: —Kit'in wachu ntu aktilakat'alhman; k'ap'inch'o'ochicha pero nt'uch'a ali k'a'ilht'u mintala'alhin.

An Jesús a'tam ixjajumpalayi an lapanakni, ixjajuniy: —Kit'ini xajatapulhkunu an lakaamunulhpa', yu akinch'a'o'aya ntu wa lakaaputs'isni katitsukulh, kalhitsukuya an jatapulhkunu yu xt'a'a jatsukunti.
Wachuncha an fariseojnin tajuniy: —Uxint'i wa mi'akst'uch'a lhich'iwink'an, aminchiwinti ntu lhitapalay.

An Jesús jajuniy: —Masi wa ki'akstucha iklhichiwinkan, an kinchiwinti lhitapalay, mu ijk'atsayi tanchuncha ikmintachalh chi tanchuncha ikti'an; pero uxitnan nt'u k'ats'ayat tanchuncha ikmintachalh chi tanchuncha ikti'an.
Uxitnan ch'unch'ach'a lhich'iwinat t'anisch'a la'ts'inat lay an lapanak, pero kit'in tu xamati iklhichiwiniy.
Chi li iknajuni tani laycha xamati, an yu iknajun yucha sawalh, mu ntu wa ki'akstucha iknajun, ali an kimPay yu kimakmintachalhi iknawnaw.
An la milhamap'a'sink'an ts'o'muk'akanta li akxni ixt'uyunk'an yu tala'ts'ilh wa tami tanajun, an ixchiwintik'an lhitapalay.
Kit'in iklhichiwinkani wa ki'akstucha, pero an kimPay yu kimakmintachalh wachu kilhichiwiniy.
Yu'uncha tajuniy: —¿Tanischa t'ajun mimpayi? An Jesús jajuniy: —Uxitnan tu kilamispayaw chi an kimPay wach'u nt'u misp'ayat; li xakilamispaw, an kimPay wach'u k'a ixmisp'at'it.
An Jesús chuncha nawlh akxni ixmasut'ajun an laka tajtan, tan ixlakwilh yu pumujukan tumin yu ixla'ulanankan, chi ntu xamati ch'apayawlh mu ntuka' ixcha'ani ixpanch'e'ex.
A'tam jajumpalhi an Jesús: —Kit'in ikti'ancha, chi uxitnan akilapuxkawyaw, pero uxitnan la mintala'alhink'ani k'alakniya'it. Tan ikti'an kit'in, uxitnan jant'ulay k'at'ip'it'it.
Pus an judiojnin ixtanajun: —¿Tasu li chunchacha najunili tan ti'an kitnan ntulay kati'awi? ¿Sna wa ka'akstuma'nikanacha?
An Jesús jajuniy: —Uxitnan aniy talaktsini mincha'ak'an, pero kit'in awint'i talhman; uxitnan aniy lakaamunulhpa k'at'amak'awna'it, pero kit'in jantu ikde aniy.
Xliyu klalhijunaw li la mintala'alhink'ani k'alakniya'it'it; mu li ntu kilakiklaka'iyawi li kit'in, la mintala'alhink'ani k'alakniya'it'it.
Wachuncha tajuniy: —¿Tisu uxint'icha k'at'i? An Jesús jajuniy: —Yu p'ulhnajcha klajuntaw.

Wanaj lhuwi yu aknawna chi yu aklajunaw t'ani layatcha; pero an yu kimakmintachalh yucha sawalhi an yu najun, chi kit'in, wanajcha yu iklajunaw aniy lakaamunulhpa an yu k'alha'asmat'a an yu kimakminta.
Pero yu'uncha ntu talhimacha'xalhi li yucha an ixPayi ixjalhixa'alat'ajun.

Pus an Jesús jajuniy: —Akxni talhmancha k'amuk'aya'it an yu ists'alh lapanak kijunchilh, akxnich'a k'ak'ats'aya'it li kit'in, chi li ntu tu'u k'ilhtuy yu wa kit'incha iknajun, kit'in ikchiwiniy tacha kimasuniy an kimPay,
mu an yu kimakminta aniya kint'a'aklat'ajun; jantu wa ki'akstucha kimakajunta an kimPay, mu kit'in lhilhiji k'ilhtuy yu oxi lhiwilay.
Akxni chunchacha naw'olh an Jesús, ixluwk'ani takiklaka'ilh.
An Jesús jajunilh an judiojnin an yu ixtakiklaka'itacha: —Li k'iklak'a'iyat sawalhi an kinchiwinti, kint'alhtanan sawalhi k'a'una'it'it;
k'amisp'aya'it'iti an yu sawalh, chi an yu sawalh katama'alhtaxtuniyan chi k'amak'awk'ana'it'itcha.
Yu'uncha ta'alhtaylh: —Kitnan yucha an Abrami ikpu'a'p'unmintacha'aw, chi ntu a'atam xamati la ixmaka akintalhitsukun, ¿t'asu li na'uncha li akmakawkanawcha?
An Jesús jajuniy: —Sawalhi an yu klajunaw, watichicha yu ilhtuy tala'alhin, la ixmaka an tala'alhini t'ajun.
Chi an yu wa putapatsakancha lapanak, jantu ma'tawlh'alhiya an laka cha'a tan putapatsakan, pero yu ancha xajas'at'a yucha tawlh'alhiy.
Xliyu li an yu isTs'alh lapanak kijunchilh ta'ilhtuyancha li k'amak'awk'antcha, uxitnan k'amak'awk'ana'itcha sawalh.
Ijk'atsaycha li yucha an Abrami p'u'a'p'unt'anchi'it; pero kilama'niputunaw, mu ntu kilakiklaka'iyawi an kinchiwinti.
Kit'in iklhichiwiniy yu an kimPay kimasunita; ch'unch'ach'a wach'u ilht'uyat yu alha'asmat'at mimpayk'an.
Yu'uncha ta'alhtaylh tajuniy: —¡Kitnan kimpayk'an yucha an Abram! Pero an Jesús jajuniy: —Li ixjas'at'an Abram sawalhi uxitnan, k'a ix'ilht'ut'iti tacha an ilhtulh yucha.
Pero chaway uxitnan kilama'niputunawi li klalhixa'alayaw yu sawalh, yu k'alha'asmatta an Dios. An Abram jantu a'tam chuncha lalh.
Uxitnan wanajch'a ch'uni layat tacha lay mimpayk'an. Yu'uncha tajuniy: —¡Kitnan tu ixjas'at'an yu wa aya kalalhcha lapanak! ¡Wa pumatami kimPayk'an, Dios!
Wachuncha an Jesús jajuniy: —Li mimPayk'ani Dios ixwalh, xakilamapayniw, mu kit'in tan wilhchalh Diosi ikminchalh chi anicha ikt'ajun, jantu wa ki'akstucha ijk'uxamilh, Diosi kimala'achatachalh.
¿Tasu li ntu lay kilalhimacha'xaniyaw an kinchiwinti? Wa xliyu ntu kila'asmatniputunaw.

Uxitnan mimpayk'an yucha an xapay makxkay un, chi yuch'ach'a ilht'unip'ut'unat yu lhinajun. Yucha sta akxni ilhtukanchalh an lakamunulhpa, sta akxnicha jama'ninilh, chi ntu a'tam najunta yu sawalh, mu ntu tu'u yu sawalh kanawlh yucha. Akxni maslakatinin, najuncha tanischa yucha, mu yucha maslakatini chi xapay maslakatinti.
Pero kit'in, mu iknajun yu sawalh, tu kilakiklaka'iyaw.
Uxitnan, ¿tisiyuchacha lay kanawna li iklhit'ajun tu'u tala'alhini? Chi li iknajun yu sawalh, ¿tasu li ntu kilakiklaka'iyawi?
Yu xas'at'a Dios, an ixchiwinti Dios asmat'a; pero uxitnan nt'u asmat'at'iti mu ntu xas'at'an Dios.
An judiojnin tajuniy an Jesús: —Sawalhcha tacha an iknawnaw li jamacha'ak'at'i Samaria chi li makxkay'uni lakpach'apatan.
An Jesús jajuniy: —Kit'in tu tu'u kilakpach'apata makxkay'un. Kit'in ijkiklaka'iy an kimPay, yucha yu k'ilhtuy, pero uxitnan wa kilamamaxaniyaw.
Kit'in tu kit'ini yu ikpuxkajuy kinta'ayaxtu, alini yu yucha puxkajuy, chi yucha yu kanawna li oxi u jantu yu ilhtuy atam.
Sawalhi aniy yu klajunaw, yu kiklaka'iya an kinchiwinti, jantu a'tam katinilh.

An judiojnin tajuniy: —Chaway oxicha ijk'atsaw li wa lakpach'apatan makxkay'un sawalh. An Abraham chi an ali'in yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios talaknilh, chi uxint'i na'un: "Yu kinkiklaka'iy ntu a'tam katinilh".
¿Chu sna palay ayk'at'i, palay wa lakat'ikt'i an kimpayk'an Abraham? Yucha nilh, chi an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios wachu talaknilh. ¿Tisu milhijunt'ich'a na'uni?
An Jesús jajuniy: —Li wa kit'incha ikla'ayakan, an kinta'ayat tu tu'u lhitapalay; pero yu kila'ayay yucha an kimPay, an yu unat li miDiosk'an.
Pero uxitnan t'u misp'ayat. Kit'in ikmispay; chi li aknawlh li ntu ikmispay, wa ikmaslakatinicha tacha uxitnani akwalh. Kit'in ikmispay sawalh, chi ijkiklaka'iya tacha an najun.
An Abram, yu p'u'a'p'unt'anchi'it lhi'achalhi li kala'ts'ina kiwilhchan, chi la'ts'ilh, pus achalhcha.
Wachuncha tajuniy an judiojnin: —Jant'uk'a' lhit'a'uni t'up'uxamkaw (50) k'ata, ch'i na'un li la'ts'int'acha an Abram.
An Jesús jajuniy: —Sawalhi aniy yu klajunaw, akxni ntuka' istsukuy an Abraham, kit'in xakt'ajuncha.
Pus wachuncha talaksaklhicha chiwx ixtalakat'alhmaputuncha, pero an Jesús tats'e'lhi chi taxtulhcha an laka tajtan; chi japujataxtu'olh, alhcha.
Tan ixla'pust'ajun an Jesús, la'ts'ilh pumatam la'lhtuluw lapanak, wa chunchacha tsukulh.
An ixt'alhtanan tajuniy: —Maestro, ¿tisiyuchacha ilhtulh ixtala'alhin li chunchacha la'awlhi, ixpaynin u yucha?
An Jesús jajuniy: —Jantu xliyu aniy wa ka'ilhtulhcha tu'u ixtala'alhin u an ixpaynin, wa xliyu an Dios masuputuni ixtapatsat laxlakatunaj aniy lapanak.
Li tunkuka, task'iniya li ka'ilhtuw an ixtapatsat an yu kimakmintalh, mu mintacha an jatats'isni, akxni ntucha lay tapatsakan.
Li ikt'ajunka an lakaamunulhpa, ikxajatapulhkunu an lakamunulhpa'.
Akxni chunchacha naw'olh, a'chujlhicha an lakaat'un, chi ilhtulhcha pulh'om. Lakpuxapamuk'alhcha an la xla'chulh an yu ntu ixjalakawanan lapanak.
Xli'astan juniy: —K'ap'inchicha la'puch'a'a an tan nap'an wilh xkan junkan Siloé (nawputun "mala'achakanta"). Pus alhcha la'puch'a'a', walh tasp'itcho'ochalh, ixjalakawanancha.
An yu wani ixjalakt'awilh la ixcha'a chi an yu ixtala'ts'in tan ixtawlay isk'in tu'u la'a'tayjun, ixtanajun: —¿Chu ntu yu an aniy, an sa' ixtawlay isk'in la'a'tayjun?
Ali'in ixtanajun: —Mu chun, yucha. Ali'in ixtanajun: —Mu jantu, masi wanaj chuncha tasuy tu yu'. Pero yucha ixnajun: —Chun, kit'in.
Wachuncha talhisakmilh tajuniy: —¿Ch'i t'asich'a laych'a lhijalak'awanan chawayi?

Yucha jajunilh: —Yucha anchunu tajuniy li Jesusi ilhtulh pulh'om, chi kilakpuxapamuk'alhcha, xli'astan kijuniy: "K'ak'ila'p'uch'a'acha an laka Siloé, tan nap'an tajun xkan". Pus k'alhcha, chi kla'puch'a'alhcha, walh ijkalakawanalhcha.
Pus tajuniy: —¿Tanischa t'ajun anchunu lapanaki? Yucha jajuniy: —Jantu ijk'atsay.
Talhi'alhcha an tan ixtawilanalh an fariseojnin an yu la'lhtuluw ixjunita lapanak.
Akxni la'oxilh an pulh'om an Jesús chi malakawanilhcha an yu ntu lay ixjalakawanan akxni ntu ixtapatsakan wilhchani ixjunita.
An fariseojnin wachu talhisakmipalhi tani laycha lhijalakawanalh. Pus yucha jajuniy: —Wa kilakpuxapamuk'alhcha an pulh'om, chi kla'puch'a'alhcha chi chaway ijkalakawanancha.

Pus an ali'in fariseojnin ixtanajun: —Anchunu lapanak tu Diosi makmintalh, mu tapatsayi akxni masi ntu tapatsakan wilhchan. Pero ali'in ixtanajun: —¿Pero tasicha lay kalhilak'ilhtulh aniy tanlhun li wa ma'lhta'alhinicha? Pus tatala'apitsilhcha, tatakilhmakt'uyulhcha.
Wachuncha talhisakmipalh a'tami an yu la'lhtuluw ixjunita lapanak, tajuniy: —An yu malakawanin, ¿tisu lapanakch'a na'uni? Yucha najun: —Kit'in iknajun pumatam yu lhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
Pero an judiojnin jantu ixtakiklaka'iya li la'lhtuluwi ixjunita chi li laycha ixjalakawanan, wanaj tat'asanilh ixpay chi ixnati
chi talhisakmilhcha, tajuniy: —¿Yucha aniya mints'alhk'an, yu nawnat li wa la'lhtuluwi tsukulh? ¿Tasicha lhijalakawanan chawayi?
An ixpaynin taja'alhtayanalh tanajun: —Ijk'atsayawi li aniy kints'alhk'an, chi li wa la'lhtuluwi tsukulh;
pero ntu ijk'atsayaw tani lhijalakawanancha chaway, chi ntu ijk'atsayaw tichini malakawanilhcha. Yuch'ach'a k'alhisakmit, mu aycha, yuchacha katajunan.
An ixpaynin wa chuncha tanawlh, mu ixtatalhanan, mu an judiojnin ixtatamakajuntacha li yu kanawna li an Jesús yucha Cristo, katamakxtukana an tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a yu tajakiklaka'inin.
Xliyu talhinawlh an ixpaynin: "Yuch'ach'a k'alhisakmit, mu aycha".
An judiojnin a'tam tat'asanipalhi an yu la'lhtuluw ixjunita, chi tajuniy: —Akilajuniw yu sawalh la ix'ukxlakapu Dios. Kitnan ijk'atsayawi li anchunu lapanak wa ma'lhta'alhini'.
Yucha jajuniy: —Li ma'lhta'alhini, kit'in tu ijk'atsay. Yu ijk'atsay, li ntu lay xajkalakawanan, pero chaway ijkalakawanancha.
A'tam talhisakmipalh tajuniy: —¿Tasicha ilhtuni? ¿Tasicha ilhtulh li malakawanincha?
Yucha jajuniy: —Klajuniwcha, pero ntu kilakiklaka'iyaw. ¿Tasu li a'tam aklajumpalawi? ¿Chu wachu sna ixt'alhtanani ump'ut'unat'it?
Wachuncha tamamaxanilhcha, chi tajuniy: —Uxint'i ka ixt'alhtanak'at'i anchunu lapanak, pero kitnan ixt'alhtanan an Moisés.
Kitnan ijk'atsayaw li an Dios xa'alalhi an Moisés, pero anchunu lapanak tu ijk'atsayaw tanchuncha minchalh.
An yu la'lhtuluw lapanak ixjunita jajuniy: —¡Pus yuchacha yu lhi'a'nincha! Uxitnan t'u k'ats'ayat tanchuncha minchalh, walh chi kit'in kimalakawanilhcha.
Chi k'atsayawi li an Dios tu ja'asmatniya an ma'lhta'alhinin, pero yu kiklaka'iya an Dios chi ilhtuniya yu najun, yucha asmatni.
Tu a'tam asmatkanta li xamati lay kamalakawanilh yu wa la'lhtuluw la'awlh.
Li aniy lapanak tu Diosi makmintalh, tulay tu'u ka'ilhtulh.
Pus yu'uncha tajuniy: —Uxint'i wa tala'alhinch'a p'uts'uk'u, ¿chi uxint'icha akilamasuniyaw? Pus tatamakxtulhcha an tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakiklaka'inin.
Walh an Jesús k'atsalhi li tatamakxtulh, pus akxni paxto'lhi lhisakmiy juniy: —¿Uxint'i k'iklak'a'iya an isTs'alh Dios?
Yucha alhtaylh juniy: —¿Jamach'alhkat, tisiyuchacha, para li ajkiklaka'ilh?
An Jesús juniy: —La'ts'int'a'uncha, kit'in, yu t'ach'iwint'a'un.
Wachuncha an lapanak tatso'ottatawlhnilhcha la ixlakapu an Jesús, chi juniy: —Ijkiklaka'iyani, Jamach'alhkat.
An Jesús juniy: —Kit'in ikminta nawna aniy lakaamunulhpa tanyuchacha yu oxi chi yu jantu, para li an yu ntu tajalakawanan, katajalakawanalh, chi an yu tajalakawanan ntu katajalakawanalh.
Ali'in fariseojnin yu ancha ixtat'ayanalh, mu ta'alha'asmat'acha, pus tajuniy: —¿Chu wachu la'la'lhtulu'uni kitnan?
An Jesús ja'alhtaylh jajuniy: —Li la'la'lhtulu'uni k'a ix'unt'it, jantu tu'u k'a ixlits'ukut mintala'alhink'an, pero mu nawnat'iti li jalak'awananat'it chaway amintala'alhink'an minkwentajk'an.
Aniy yu klajunaw sawalh, yu ntu la xamalhticha putanuyachalh an la ixkurralhk'an an borregojnin yu lakatami putanuyachalh, wa ja'alhawna'.
Pero yu la xamalhticha putanuyachalh, yucha yu jalhist'ak'a an borregojnin.
An yu jalhistaknan laka malhticha yucha mati'anicha an yu jalhist'ak'a ixborregojnin chi la ixta'a'utchak'ani jamapa'a'uy la'atamin, pus ta'alhmispaycha, chi jamaxtuycha.
Chi akxni tataxtu'ojoycha, jatap'ulhniycha, pus an borregojnin tach'a'o'aycha mu ta'alhmispaycha.
Pero yu ntu tamispay tu tach'a'o'ay, wa talakats'alhni mu ntu ta'alhmispay.
An Jesús chuncha jalhimalakxtunilh, pero yu'uncha ntu talhimach'axanilh.
Pus a'tam jajumpalhi an Jesús, jajuniy: —Aniy klajunaw yucha sawalh, kit'ini ixmalhtichak'an an borregojnin.
Akxni ntuka' xakmin, ixchuxk'an an yu p'ulhnaj takilachilh wa ja'alhawnan, pero an borregojnin jantu ta'alha'asmatlhi.
Kit'in, ikmalhticha, yu kit'ini kimputanuy kata'alhtaxtuya'. Katanuya chi kataxtuya chi kala'cha'ana jats'in.
An ja'alhawna yucha wa mintacha ja'alhawana', chi minta jama'nini, chi minta jalakt'ilhini'; pero kit'in ikminta para li k'alhits'uk'ut jatsukunti, chi li lhuwi k'alhits'uk'ut jatsukunti.
Kit'ini yu oxi ijkalhist'ak'a an borregojnin. Yu oxi jalhist'ak'a an borregojnin lhima'axt'a'a ixjatsukunti.

Pero li yu wa mapalhnikancha tapatsay, akxni la'ts'in min an ma'tili jamakajuncha an borregojnin chi jats'alaycha, mu ntu yu yu jalhist'ak'a sawalh chi mu ntu ixnawin. An ma'tili ja'uycha an borregojnin chi tatalaktilhacha.
Anchunu lapanak jats'alay mu yucha wa yucha an ixtalhajacha lhakapu'an, jantu yu an borregojnin sawalhi jalhakapu'an.
Kit'ini yu oxi ijkalhist'ak'a an borregojnin, chi ijkamispayi yu kinawin, chi yu'uncha kintamispay,
tacha kimispay an kimPay chi kit'in ikmispay wachu'. Ki'tin ijkalhima'axt'a'a kijatsukunti an borregojnin.

Atumpaj ijkalhit'awpalay ali kiborregojnin yu ntu aniy tatanumanalh aniy laka kurralh; yu'uncha wachu ajkalhimina chi akinta'asmatniya kinchiwinti, walakatamcha katatsuku'oya chi wa pumatami yu kajalhist'ak'a'.
An kimPay xliyu kilhimapayniy, mu kit'in ikma'axt'a'a an kijatsukunti para li ajkama'lhtayanancho'olh.
Jantu xamati kimaxtuniy an kijatsukunti, wa ki'akstucha ikma'axt'a'a. Ikt'acha'ani li akma'axta'lhi chi li akla'a'icho'olh. Aniy, yucha an kimPayi chuncha kilhijunilh.
An judiojnin a'tam tatala'apitsipalhi akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi.
Ixluwk'ani yu yu'uncha ixtanajun: —Wa loko chi wa lakpach'apata makxkay'un, ¿tasu li takiklaka'icha?
Pero ali'in ixtanajun: —Tu xamati yu wa lakpach'apata makxkay'un chuncha kachiwinilh. ¿Chu sna layi an makxkay'un kajamalakawanilh yu wa la'la'lhtulu'un?
An la'acha'an Jerusalén ixk'atanit'awkan, ixlakata yu ixpupastakkan an ay ixtajtank'an. Ixpaku lhik'asnini ixjunita.
Chi an Jesús an laka tajtani ix'aklat'ajun, an lhilaxmalhticha Salomón.

Walh an judiojnin tala'atanchanulh chi tajuniy: —¿Tasu wa tiwanancha chuncha akilalhilatsukuyaw li ntu oxi kilajunaw li sna uxint'i Cristojk'at'i? Li uxint'i Cristojk'at'i ixla'ts'awalanticha akilajuniw.
An Jesús jajuniy: —Mu klajunawcha, pero ntu kilakiklaka'iyaw. An tanlhun an yu klak'ilhtuy la xtalakask'i an kimPay, yuchacha masuy;
pero uxitnan nt'u k'iklak'a'iyat'it, mu uxitnan ntu kiborregojnin.
An kiborregojnin yu'uncha kinta'alhmispay, chi ijkamispay chi kintach'a'o'ay.
Kit'in ijkaxta'niy jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam katimin'olh, chi ntu a'tam katitanilh, chi ntu xamati akintijamaxtunilh.
An kimPay yucha ntu xamati ixt'achun, yucha yu kijaxta'nilh an borregojnin chi ntu xamati katijama'xa'axtulh an kimPay.
An kimPay chi kit'in wa la'atami ijkuntaw.
Wachuncha an judiojnin ixtalakat'alhmaputumpalaycha, ixtalaksak'acha chiwx.
Pero an Jesús jajuniy: —Lhuwcha tanlhun yu laj'oxi tu'u klamasuniw yu ixnawin an kimPay; ¿tanyucha yu akilalhilakat'alhmayawi?
An judiojnin tajuniy: —Jantu xliyu li aktilalhilakat'alhmaw li laj'oxi tanlhun ilht'uy, aklalakat'alhmayaw mu wa aya uniya an Dios. Wachu wa lapanak k'at'i, chi uxint'icha na'un li Dios k'at'i.
An Jesús jajuniy: —¿Chu ntu ts'o'muk'akanta an la milhamap'a'sink'an tan najun?: "Kit'ini iknajun, uxitnan diosnin".
Li an Dios, diosnini jajunilh an yu takilhichiwinchilh ixchiwinti, pus k'atsayawi li an tan chuncha ts'o'muk'akanta jantu layi ntucha katikiklaka'iw.
Chi li an Dios kisakxtulh chi kimakmilhcha aniy lakaamunulhpa, ¿tasu li nawnatcha li wa aya ijkuniycha, li iknajun li kit'ini iksTs'alh Diosi?
Li ntu yu k'ilhtuy an tapatsat tacha an ilhtuy kimPay, jantu akilakiklaka'iw.
Pero li chuncha k'ilhtuy, masi ntu akilakiklaka'iw, yucha an yu k'ilhtuycha k'ak'iklak'a'it, para li wa xawa'a'tamch'a k'ak'ats'at li an kimPay kinput'ajun chi kit'in yucha ikput'ajun.
A'tam ixtach'apayawputumpalay, pero an Jesús tama'a'osli.
Ampalhcha ixtapiktutam an ayxkan tan junkan Jordán, tan ixlip'ulhnaj ixjama'paxanan an Juán, anchacha tamakawchalh.
Ixluwk'ani ixtala'cha'an, chi ixtanajun: —Chun sawalh, masi an Juán tu tu'u masulh yu la'lhi'a'nin, pero tacha an lhichiwinilh aniy lapanak chun sawalh.
Ixluwk'ani ancha takiklaka'ilh an Jesús.
Ixt'ajun pumatam lapanak wa ixta'an'ay ixjunkan Lázaro, jamacha'a Betaniaj, la ixla'acha'an an Marta chi an ixp'isa'a María.
Aniy María ixt'alajamatsan an Lázaro, yucha yu lhich'ampaxalh perjume an Jamach'alhkat Jesús chi ch'anxakalhcha la ix'ay.
Pus an ixt'uyunk'an ixt'alajamatsanan an Lázaro, tamala'achanilhi chiwinti an Jesús tan tajuniy: —Jamach'alhkat, an yu map'ayniy wa ta'an'ay.
An Jesús, akxni asmatlhi, najun: —Aniy ta'an'at jantu katijama'ninilh, yucha apalij wa kapumasukana an ixta'ayat Dios, chi an ixta'ayat an isTs'alh Dios.
Chi masi sawalh ixmapayniya an Jesús an Marta, chi an ixp'isa'a chi an Lázaro,
la'at'uy wilhchani tawlhpalhchalh an tan ixt'ajun masi junikalhcha li an Lázaro wa ixta'an'ay.
Xli'astan jajunilh an ixt'alhtanan: —Ka'ampalawi la'acha'an Judea.
An ixt'alhtanan tajuniy: —Maestro, tuka' ma'ani an judiojnin yu ancha ixla'acha'ank'an ixtalakat'alhmaputunan, ¿ch'i a't'amch'a t'ip'imp'alay?
An Jesús jajuniy: —¿Chu ntu la'akawt'uy horaja lhit'ajun an wilhchan? Yu akxni tunkuwi jalhtanan tu kati'ayst'uk'ukalh, mu la'ts'ini an xajatapulhkunu aniy lakamunulhpa';
