ixtaxta'nicha an yu ixjamala'achata an Jesús, para li katamala'pitsilhcha, tanichunchacha ixtama'lhtask'iniy atamj atamj.
Pumatam levita yu ixjunkan José, jamacha'a Chipre, yu talhimapa'a'upalh an yu ixjamala'achata Jesús ma Bernabé, nawputun ists'alh yu jama'oxamixinin,
yucha ixlit'ajun la'atam ixlakaat'un, walh st'alh chi an tumin jaxta'nilhcha an yu ixjamala'achata an Jesús, para li yu'unchacha katala'ts'ilh tani katalhimala'pitsilhcha.
Pero ixt'awpalay pumatam lapanak ixjunkan Ananías yucha wachu st'alh xlakaat'un ali an ixt'iwi ixjunkan Safira.
Aniy lapanak, wa tamcha t'ak'atsalh an ixt'iwi, taxa'a'ilhcha tachuni an tumin chi an ali tama'axta'nilhcha an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús.

An Pedro juniy: —Ananías, ¿tasu li mak'awnincha an satanás li yuchacha kajunin t'uch'ini k'a'ilht'ucha, ch'i maslak'at'ij'wat'icha an Stalan'a Takuwini? Uxint'i xa'a'it'i an ali tumin an yu map'alhnik'a ixlakata an lakaat'un.

¿Chu ntu milakaat'uni ixjunita? Ch'i li st'at'icha, ¿An tumin jantu mi'anuncha ixjunita? ¿T'asu li ch'unch'ach'a p'ast'akt'i k'a'ilht'u? Jantu yu an lapanakni ja'o'xch'o'oy, yucha an Diosi o'xch'o'oy.
Akxni chunchacha asmatlhi an Ananías, alo'cha ta'a'talh chi nilhcha. Chi ixchuxk'an an yu tak'atsaalh, sawalhcha talaktalhanalh.
Wachuncha tichi yu'uncha ts'alan, tala'apamililhcha an janini chi ta'alhcha maknunin.
Pants'ik'ischa walh katacha la'at'utucha hora la'pusli tanuchalhcha an xt'iwi an Ananías, jantu xk'atsayi tuchini tapasalhcha.
An Pedro lhisakmilh juniy: —¿Ch'unch'a lhist'at'it an lakaat'un t'ach'a an nawnat'it? Ak'i'un. —An t'aku ja'alhtayanalh najun: —Chun, wachuncha iklhist'aw.
An Pedro juniy: —¿Tasu li wa t'amch'a k'ats'ayat para li k'alhila'ts'int'anutcha an ixTakuwin Diosi? Anucha tamincho'ota an yu takimaknulh amint'apapa', chaway uxint'icha wachu katalhi'anan.
Wanaj wa akxni an Safira alo'cha ta'a'talhi la xjach'aja an Pedro. Pus akxni tatanuchalhcha an ts'alan, tala'ts'in nitacha. Pus ta'alhcha maknunini la xpa'xti an tan takimaknulh an ixt'apapa'.
Chi ixchuxk'an an yu ixtajakiklaka'inincha, chi ixchuxk'an an lapanakni an yu tak'atsaalh tacha an tapasalh, sawalhcha ixtalaktalhanan.

Lhuw tanlhun yu ntu watichicha lapanak lay ilhtuyi ixjapu'ilhtukan an yu ixjamala'achata an Jesús chi lhuw tanlhuni ixjapumasukan an la'acha'an; chi wa lakatami ixtata'ayxt'o'a an tan ix'a'apacha'a'ikanta tajtan, tan ixjunkan ja'a'apacha'a'inti yu ix'anu Salomón.
An akilhmaktamin lapanakni, jantu k'is xamati ixjat'atala'xto'putun an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha, pero sawalh oxi ixjalhiwilakan.
Chi ali tatalhawalhi yu tajakiklaka'inilhcha, takiklaka'ilhi an lapanakni chi an t'akunin.
Chi an ta'an'anin ixjamamakancha an laka lajcalle la xputamatk'an, para li akxni kala'pusacha an Pedro masi wa ixma'stele'cha kala'cha'alh xapumatam.

Tanlayjcha la'acha'anaxni yu wanicha ixlaklhitamakajun an la'acha'an Jerusaleni xtalakminachalh an lapanakni, ixtalaklhicha'ancha an ta'an'anin chi yu wa ixtala'apaxto'tacha tanlhun lakmakxkay'un; chi ixchuxchak'ani ixjak'uch'ukan.
An yu xa'ay tukan sacerdote chi ixchuxk'an an yu xtach'a'o'ay, an yu xjajunkan saduceojnin, tala'talh'amalhcha, t'ilhcha xtala'ts'in,
pus jach'apayawkalhcha an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús chi jamalaklhchawkalhcha lakatam laka pulach'in tan wa para tichicha.
Pero pumatam ix'angelh an Dios malhti'alhi an xamalhticha an pulach'in akxni puts'ista ixjunita chi jamaxtulh jajuniy:
"K'ap'inchi'it an laka tajtan, ancha k'aja'una'it an lapanakni chux aniy chiwinti yu xt'a'a jatsukunti".

Akxni chunchacha ta'asmatlhi, tunkunchalh wats'isin, tatanuchalhcha an laka tajtan chi tsukulhcha tamasuy. Wachuncha, an xa'ay tukan sacerdote chi an yu ixtach'a'o'ay, tat'asanilhi ixchuxk'an an yu laktatanincha israelitajnin, chi talhinawlhcha li kaja'ankalhcha maxtuka an laka pulach'in.
Pero akxni tacha'alhcha an laka pulach'in an yu ixtajalhistaknan, jantucha tu'u ixtatanumanalh. Pus ta'ancho'olh chi takijamak'atsaaninilhcha,
tanajun an yu ixtajalhistaknan: —An pulach'in oxi xlaklhchajuy akxni ikcha'aw, chi an soldadojnin an xlakapu an malhticha tajalhistaknanta; pero akxni ikmati'awcha, tu xamati ikla'cha'aw pulakni.
Akxni chunchacha asmatlhi an xa'ay an yu ixtajalhistaknan laka tajtan chi an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin ixtanajun: —¿Tisu katapasayacha li tacha anicha talayi?
Wachuncha pumatam jala'cha'alh chi jajuniy: —An yu xjamalaklhch'awt'at'it laka pulach'in, an laka tajtani tamasunit'ajun an lapanakni.

Pus an xa'ay an yu ixtajalhistaknan laka tajtan jat'a'alhi an yu ixtat'ajalhistaknan, ta'alhcha puxkawnin, pero ntu talhitama'chapulh, mu wachu ixtatalhanani li an lapanakni katatalh'amalh chi kajalakt'alhmakalh.
Akxni jalhicha'ankalhcha an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús, jalhi'ankalhcha la x'ukxlakapuk'an an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an yu xa'ay sacerdote jajuniy:

Kitnan klajuniwcha li nt'uch'a k'is k'amasut'iti xchiwinti an Jesús, walh chi uxitnan wanajcha ta xlijalhi'ay an la'acha'an Jerusaleni lakmasut'at chi kitnancha kilalhimuk'aputunaw li ma'nikalh an Jesús.
An Pedro chi an ali'in an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús, taja'alhtayanalh: —Kitnan kilhi'ilhtutk'ani li ajkiklaka'iwi an Dios, yucha p'ulh ajkiklaka'iyaw, jantu yu an lapanakni.
An ixDiosk'an an yu ta xajkalhila'ts'inaw mala'awnicho'olhi an Jesús, yuch'a an yu ma'nit'it uxitnan akxni muk'at laka cruz.

An Dios ma'ostayanicho'olh chi tan oxicha ixpa'xti ulachalh, chi chaway yuchacha ilhtuta li akintatap'ulhnin chi akintama'alhtaxtun, para li an kint'a'israelitajnink'an katakiklaka'ilhi an Dios chi chuncha kajamala'mixinikana ixtala'alhink'an.
Tacha ani laktapasay kitnan ijk'atsayaw chi wachu k'atsayi an Stalan'a Takuwin, yu an Dios jaxta'niy yu takiklaka'iy.
Akxni chunchacha ta'asmatlhi, sawalhcha talhitalh'amalh chi ixjama'niputunkancha an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús.

Pero an jamach'alhkatni ixt'ajun pumatam yu ixjunkan Gamaliel yucha an yu xjajunkan li fariseojnin. Aniy lapanak sawalh ixtakiklak'a'iya an lapanakni, mu xamaestro wachu lhamap'a'sini ixjunita. Pus tayalh chi lhinawlh li kajamaxtukalhka tam pants'ik'is ma'spa an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús.
Chi xli'astan jajunicha an ali'in xt'ajamach'alhkatni: —Kint'a'israelitajnin, k'ajalajk'ats'anant'iti t'ani ja'ilht'up'ut'unat'itcha ani lapanakni.

K'ap'ast'akt'iti li tawananchacha ixjuntachalh ixt'ajun yu Teudas ixjunkan, yu ixnajun li xlitapalay lapanak, chi katacha la'at'at'i ciento lapanakni yu wa tamcha ixtat'ak'atsay. Pero an Teudas ma'nikalh, chi an yu xtach'a'o'ay tatalaktilh'olh, pus wachuncha yu kiputamaktalh.

Ampalh wilhchan akxni an isakkan censo, ixt'awpalay pumatam lapanak yu an ixjunkan Judas, jamacha'a Galilea chi wachu tach'a'o'alhi ali'in. Pero xli'astan wachu ma'nikalh, chi ixchuxk'an an yu ixtach'a'o'ay tatalaktilh'olh.
Pus yu chaway kit'in klat'alajunaw li k'ajamak'a'unt'iti ani lapanakni, jant'u t'ani k'aja'ilht'ut'it. Mu li ani yu tala't'ajun wa ix'anuchak'an an lapanakni, wa kala'pusa'.
Pero li Diosi jalhijuni, jant'u lay k'at'ijalhajat'it. K'ajalajk'ats'anant'it, jantu junita Dioscha t'alasat'awnat'it. Pus wachuncha an ixt'ajamach'alhkatni takiklaka'ilh.
Chi xli'astan jat'asanicho'okalhcha an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús, chi stakcha ja'ayna'kalh chi jajunikalhcha li ntucha ali katalhichiwinilhi xchiwinti an Jesús, chi wachuncha jamakawkalhcha.

An yu xjamala'achata an Jesús sawalhcha ixtalaj'achani akxni tataxtulhcha an tan ixtawilanalh an jamach'alhkatni. Wa xliyu an Dios ja'ilhtulhi li katat'acha'alhi li kajalhimama'alh'ajnikalh ixlakata an xta'a'ut Jesús.
Chux wilhchani ixtamasuy chi xtalhichiwiniy an Jesús yu Cristo. Ixtalhichiwiniya an laka tajtan chi lakatamincha laka lakcha'a'.

Anchunu panch'e'ex, mu an yu ixtajakiklaka'inincha palay palay ixtatalhaway, an yu lhigriego xtachiwiniy tsukulhcha tat'alalhichiwiniya an yu lhi'hebreo xtachiwiniy, ixtanajun an yu lhigriego xtachiwiniy li ma an yu ntucha tu'u xt'apapak'an t'akunin, an yu griegajnin, ma ntucha oxi xjaxta'nikan an tanlhuncha yu ixjamala'pitsinikan yu x'ukan.

Wachuncha an xpumakawt'uyk'an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús, tama'ayxto'olhi ixchuxk'an an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha chi tajuniy: —Jantu oxi xajachalh li kitnan tucha ali aklhichiwiniwi an ixchiwinti Dios wa xliyu li wa akmala'pitsiwcha an tanlhun.

Pus chawayi kint'ala'awnin, klajunaw mu milhuk'an k'ajap'uxk'a'ut xpumatujunk'an lapanakni yu de uxitnan yu jalhiwilayat li oxi katatapatsalh chi yu oxi tajalakpastaknan chi yu lhuw talhit'ajun an Stalan'a Takuwin, para li yu'unchacha ajkama'axta'niw li kata'ilhtulh ani tapatsat.
Kitnan aktaylhi'anawi aktapayniyaw chi aklhichiwininaw an ixchiwinti Dios.

Pus ixchuxk'ani an lapanakni oxi talhiwilalh, chi tasakxtulhcha an Esteban yu sawalhcha ixlhit'ajun an Stalan'a Takuwin chi sawalh xjakiklaka'inin, chi tasakxtulhcha an Felipe chi Prócoro, chi Nicanor, chi Timón, chi Parmenas chi Nicolás, pumatam jamacha'a Antioquía, yu wa junlhi judio.
Wachuncha jalhi'ankalhcha tan xtat'ajun an xpumakawt'uyk'an an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús chi yu'uncha talhitapaynilhcha chi tamo'slanilhcha ixmakak'an an xpumatujunk'an lapanakni.
An ixchiwinti Dios palaycha ta'a'pitsilh, chi an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha palaycha lhuwi xtajunita an Jerusalén. Chi xluwk'an masi an yu sacerdotejnin xtajunita takiklaka'ilhcha wachu'.
An Esteban sawalhcha ixlhit'ajun i an x'alhp'asninti Dios chi an xjamapayninti. Pus tanlhuncha lay xlak'ilhtuy chi layi xjalakmasuni an lapanakni ix'alhp'asninti an Dios.

Ixta'alin lapanakni yu xtalhitapa'a'uy Jama'alhtaxtukantacha, wa lakatami ixtata'ayxt'o'a. Wachuncha yu'uncha, ali ali'in an jamacha'an Cirene chi jamacha'an Alejandría chi yu jamacha'an Cilicia chi yu jamacha'an Asia, tsukulhcha tat'alaxtukuyi an Esteban.
Pero ntu lay xtalakatast'uk'a, mu yucha, yucha an jatapast'ak'at an yu ixta'niy an Stalan'a Takuwini ixpuchiwiniy.
Pus ani lapanakni tatamaw'ilh tichi yu'uncha lapanakni para li katanawlhcha li an Esteban ta'alha'asmatta tan wa aya lhichiwiniy an Moisés chi an Dios.

Chunchacha lay tapuma'talh'amalh an lapanakni, chi an laktatanincha chi an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin. Pus an Esteban tatayla'alhcha chi tach'apayawlhcha, talhi'alhcha la x'ukxlakapuk'an an xjamach'alhkatk'an judiojnin.
Atumpaj tapuxkawlhcha yu katamaslakatinilh, yu tanawlh: —Aniy lapanak wa lhilhijcha wa aya lhichiwiniy ani stalan'a tajtan chi an lhamap'a'sin.
Ik'alha'asmat'awi li ma an Jesús an jamacha'a Nazaret ma kalakt'ilhiya ani tajtan chi ma kamapaxa'oya an tanlhuncha yu lhismanitawcha ilhtuyaw yu kintamakawnin an Moisés.
An jamach'alhkatni chi ixchuxk'an an yu ancha ixtawilanalh, akxni ta'ukxpula'ts'ilh an Esteban, wa tacha wa ix'ukxpucha angelhi ixjunita.
Chi an yu tukancha xa'ay sacerdote lhisakmilhcha an Esteban, junkan an Esteban li sna sawalhcha tacha an xtalhichiwiniy.

Pus yucha ja'alhtayanalh, jajuniy: "T'ala'awnin, chi xalakpaynin, akila'asmatniw: An yu ay Dios sawalh talakasunilhi an kimpayk'an Abraham, akxni ixt'ajun an xalakaat'un Mesopotamia, akxni ntuka' ix'an tawlhna la'acha'an Harán,
chi junilh: "K'at'axt'ucha, chi k'amak'awcha amilakaat'un chi an yu t'a jalhila'ts'in, an tan akmasuniyancha lakaat'uni k'ap'inchi'.
Pus wachuncha an Abraham taxtulhcha an xalakaat'un Caldea chi alhcha tawlhna Harán. Xli'astan nilhcha an xpay, chi an Dios anicha lakaat'uni lhimilh an Abraham, tan chaway uxitnan anich'a wilat.

Pero an Dios tu tu'u xta'nilh an Abraham aniy lakaat'un, masi tan wa katach'atalhcha. Pero an Dios junilhi an Abraham li kaxta'niya aniy lakaat'un para li akxni kaniyacha, yu tacha jalhila'ts'ini ix'anuk'an kajuna', masi akxni an Abraham jantuka' tu'u ixjas'at'an ixjalhit'awnikan.

Atumpaj, an Dios juniy an Abraham li an yu ta kajalhila'ts'ina katatawla lakatam lakaat'un tan tu ix'anuk'an. Chi wa kastakcha japutapatsakana', la'at'at'i ciento k'ata wa kastakcha jalhitama'chapukana'.
Pero an Dios jumpalay wachu: "Pero kit'in ajkamama'alh'ajniya anchunu lapanakni yu wa kajaputapatsayacha amijas'at'an, chi xli'astan katataxtuyantacha chi anicha akintat'atapatsaya'."

An Dios t'atamakawlhi an Abraham li an lapanakni kajalak'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkana'. Pus xliyu akxni la'tsalhcha la'atsajin wilhchan ixt'ajun an Isaac, ists'alh an Abraham, yucha akaxwililich'uk'up'uxlicha. An Isaac, wanajcha chuni ilhtulh yu ists'alhcha, ixjunkan Jacob, chi an Jacob wanajcha chuni ja'ilhtulh ists'alan, yu'uncha yu tawalhcha xapaynin an kilhmakkawt'uy lapanakni yu israelitajnin.
Ani sts'alan an Jacob, yu xapaynincha xtajunita, taxkaylhi an xapumatam ixt'ala'ajunk'an yu junkan José, pus tast'amaka'alhcha xalakaat'un Egipto. Pero mu an Dios xlistakta an José,

pus ma'osuni'olhi chux an ixma'alh'ajnat. Chi xta'nilhi oxi jatapast'ak'at, chi an Dios ilhtulhi li an Faraón oxi kalhiwilalh an José, mu yucha rey ixjunita an Faraón an xalakaat'un Egipto. Chi an Faraón ilhtulhcha an José li kawalh ay jamach'alhkat an xalakaat'un Egipto chi malhistaknilhcha an la ixcha'a'.
Walh anchunu panch'e'ex alilhcha chawan chi ay lhima'alh'ajna, ta xlijalhi'ay an Egipto chi an xalakaat'un Canaán, jantucha tu'u xtalhit'ajun yu kata'ulh an yu ta xjalhila'ts'inaw.
Pero akxni k'atsaalhi an Jacob li an Egipto ix'alini yu ukan, jamala'achalhi an ists'alan, an yu ta xjalhila'ts'inaw ma'anchacha. Akxnicha yu p'ulhnajcha ma'at tajalhtanalh.
Akxni xlipu'a't'uycha takilalh Egipto an xjat'ala'awnin an José, jajunilhcha li yucha xt'ala'ajunk'an. Pus an Faraón k'atsaalhi tanchuncha xmintachalh an José.
Xli'astan, an José lhinawlhcha li an ixpay, yu junkan Jacob chi ixchuxk'an an yu ta jalhila'ts'in kata'alhcha xalakaat'un Egipto. Ixpumat'utump'uxamkawkisik'an (75) lapanaknicha xtajunita.
Pus chunchacha yu pu'alhcha tawlhna xalakaat'un Egipto an Jacob; chi anchacha nichalh, chi an kilakpaynink'an wachu'.

An ixlakatunaj an Jacob chi an ali'in, la'acha'an Siquemcha jalhi'ankalh, anchacha jamaknukanchalh, lakatam tan xlamaknukan, tan an Abraham tachun lakatumini xjalhitamawnita an ists'alan tichiyucha lapanak yu ixjunkan Hamor, an Siquem.
Akxni wanicha xchint'ajun wilhchan tacha an xt'atamakajunta an Dios an Abraham li ka'ilhtuya, an kilapanaknik'an xtatalhawatacha an xalakaat'un Egipto. Wanajcha xluwk'ani xtajunita.
Chi akxni, tsukulhcha ch'alhkatnan pumatam rey an Egipto yu ntu xmispay an José.
Aniy rey wa ja'o'xcho'olhi an kilapanaknik'an chi stakcha jalhitama'chapulh. P'asi jajunilh li katamakawlhi xjas'at'ank'an yu wa xtat'ajunka chi li kachajcha tanilh.
Aniy panch'e'ex akxniy tsukulh a Moisés. Sawalhcha k'usi jas'at'a ixjunita, chi an xpaynin wa la'at'utu malhkuyu talhistaklhi la ixcha'ak'an.
Akxni takimakawjulhcha laka kanasta an lakxkan, an istsi an Faraón makutulh, pus lhi'alh chi yuchacha la'ayalh tachanu ists'alhcha.
Chi chunchacha a Moisés tamatalaninilhcha la xjatapast'ak'atk'an an jamacha'an Egipto, pus sawalhcha alhp'asi walh la xchiwinti chi laka laktanlhuncha yu xlak'ilhtuy.
Akxni t'up'uxamcha k'ata lhitsukulh an Moisés, pastaklhi li ka'alh jala'pixiyalhna an xjat'ala'awnin israelitajnin.
Pero akxni la'ts'ilhi li pumatam yu jamacha'a Egipto, wa stakcha xlitama'chaput'ajuni pumatam yu israelitaj, an Moisés lhi'a'tayjulh, ma'nilhi an yu jamacha'a Egipto.
Wa xliyu an Moisés xpast'ak'a li an xjat'ala'awnin israelitajnin katalhimacha'xalhi li yucha kajapuma'alhtaxtuya an Dios; pero yu'uncha ntu talhimacha'xalh.

Tunkunchalh, a Moisés jala'cha'alh xt'uyunk'an ixt'a'israelitajnin xtala'ayt'ajun chi yucha jalamamakawniputulh, para li wa oxicha katalalhi'alh, jajuniy: "Uxitnan lhit'ala'awnin; ¿t'asu li wa lalhit'ama'ch'ap'up'axayatcha?"
Wachuncha an yu wa xlitama'chaput'ajun an pumatam, jatisamaj'analh, tisamaj'ankalhi an Moisés chi junkan: "¿Tisi yuchacha ulan milhijuez u li xa'aych'a k'a'unt'i, para li akilalaj'aymawcha?
¿Sna wach'u k'ima'nip'ut'un, t'ach'a ama'nit'i an jamacha'a Egipto kutanchacha?"
Akxni chunchacha asmatlhi an Moisés oslicha, alhcha xalakaat'un Madián. Anchacha ma'tawlhchalh chi jalhitsukunikanchalhcha xt'uyunk'an xjas'at'an.
T'up'uxamcha k'ata la'pusli, tanchun lakak'iwin, wani a'stitawk'a yu junkan Sinaí, talakasunilh pumatam angelh, akxni ixma'tajita la'atam jach'itin, an laka jikmi ancha talakasulh an angelh.
A Moisés lhi'a'nilhcha tacha an la'ts'ilh, chi akxni palaycha stalh alhi para li palaycha oxi kala'ts'ilh, alha'asmatlhicha chiwinilh an Dios, tan najun:
"Kit'ini xDiosk'an an yu t'a xjalhila'ts'in, kit'ini xDios an Abraham chi an Isaac chi Jacob." Wachuncha an Moisés tsukulhcha jaxk'ip'ip'itnin la xtalhanti, jantucha xlaka'amputuni an tan xma'tajita.
Pus an Dios juniy: "K'alakch'ant'axt'u amihwarachi, mu an t'an yat'i stalan'a lakaat'un.

Oxi kla'ts'in tacha tama'alh'ajnan an kilapanakni, an yu tat'awnachalh xalakaat'un Egipto, k'asmat'a tacha tachiwiniy li tama'alh'ajnan, pus chaway ikta'alhtajuta para li akjalhi'a'tayjulh. Chaway, k'at'at'icha, akmak'anani xalakaat'un Egipto."

Masi yu'uncha wa xtala'amaj'anta a Moisés akxni an tajunilh ¿tisiyuchacha ulan uxint'i milhijuez u li xa'aych'a k'a'unt'i? An Dios mala'achalhi tachanu xa'ay chi tachanu jama'alhtaxtunu a Moisés, yucha an angelh an yu talakasunilh tan xma'tajita jach'itini t'amala'achalh.

Yucha a Moisési jakimaxtulh an xalakaat'un Egipto an yu ta xjalhila'ts'inaw. Pero anchunu xalakaat'un Egipto, a Moisés, xlip'ulhnaj tanlhun yu la'lhi'a'nin tu'u ilhtulh, yu ntu wa xamaticha lapanak lay ilhtuy. Chi an alamalh tan junkan Slapulh Alamalh chi an lakak'iwin akxni t'up'uxam k'ata ancha ixtat'ajun, wachu lhuwi lak'ilhtulh tanlhun.
Ani Moisés yucha yu jajunilh an israelitajnin: "An Dios ka'ilhtuya li yu de uxitnan, katsukulh pumatam yu kalhichiwinina an xchiwinti, tacha kit'in."

Chi akxni an jamacha'an Israel wa lakatami xtat'aw'ojoy an lakak'iwin, an angelh wanajcha yu an Moisesi yu ixa'alay an a'stitawk'a tan junkan Sinaí. Chi ancha wachu xtat'ajun an kilakpaynink'an, yucha ani Moisesi yu la'a'ilh an chiwinti yu xt'a'a jatsukunti para li akintajunancha.
Pero an kilakpaynink'an xtajunita, jantu takiklaka'iputulh, wa tala'amaj'alh, tak'uxa'ancho'olhi xalakaat'un Egipto.
Tajuniy an Aarón: "Akila'ilhtuniw dios yu akintatap'ulhnin, mu ntu ijk'atsayaw tani lalhcha a Moisés an yu kintamaxtucha'an Egipto."

Pus wachuncha akxnicha ta'ilhtulh la'atam yu tacha xdioschak'an ixtala'ts'in de jas'at'a toroj chi tama'ninilhcha lhuw jatapakxat. Talha'ulananilhcha chi ta'ilhtulhcha la'atam k'atan ixlakata an xdiosk'an de jas'at'a toroj yu wa yu'unchacha ta'ilhtulh.

Chi tacha anicha tatapasalh, an Dios jamakawlhcha, chi jamakawnilhcha li tacha xdioschak'ani katala'ts'ilh an st'akunin an yu tawilananchalh lakt'iyan. Tacha an najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta la xlibrojk'an an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, tan najunta: "Israelitajnin: ¿Chu sna kit'ini kilama'niniw jatapakxat chi kilaja'ulananiw akxni xt'awnat'it t'up'uxam k'ata an lakak'iwin?

Li mu jantu, uxitnan yuch'a p'as lhak'ap'up'it an ixcha'a midiosk'an Molok chi an ist'aku an midiosk'an Renfán chi an yu wa uxitnanch'a jalak'ilht'ut yu tacha midioschak'an jala'ts'inat. Chaway xliyu uxitnan aklamak'anawi palay awint'i la'puskan la'acha'an Babilonia."

An kilakpaynink'an xtajunita xtalhit'ajuni an lakak'iwin an tabernáculo, yu ixpuma'akanta an tan ists'omuk'akanta an lhamap'a'sin. Chi ani tabernáculo ts'ajwi xla'oxikanta tacha lhijunilh an Dios a Moisés. An Dios yucha lhijunilh a Moisés li kala'oxilhi an tabernáculo xt'atam tukan tacha masunilh.

An kilakpaynink'an xtajunita tajama'tayanalhi ani tabernáculo, chi an yu tat'a'alhcha an Josué xtalhi'anta akxni tamaxtulh an xlakaat'unk'an an akilhmaktamin la'acha'an, yu an Dios jamakawnilh an kilakpaynink'an. Ancha xtalhit'ajun an tabernáculo sta akxni ixt'ajun an David.
Chi an Dios oxi la'ts'ilh an David chi an David sk'inilhi an xDios Jacob li kaxta'nilhi tan kala'oxinilh ixcha'a'.
Pero yucha an Salomoni yu la'oxinilh ixcha'a an Dios.
Masi an Dios yu wilhchalh lakt'iyan, jantu wa laka cha'acha yu wa lapanaknicha tala'oxiya putawlay. Tacha nawlh an yu xlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios:
An lakt'iyan yucha kimputawlan. Chi an lakaat'un yucha ikputach'atay. ¿Tanyucha cha'a yu akilala'oxiniyawi? —najuni an Dios— ¿U tanischa tan ajkastaknana'a?
Kit'ini iklak'ilhtu'olh chux an tanlhun.

Chi jajumpalay an Esteban: —Uxitnan wa minchunchachak'ani jant'u k'is ja'asmatnanat'it, uxitnan lhit'awnat mi'a'ax'olhk'an chi mijalhunutk'an yu nt'u p'ak'iklak'a'ininat'it. Wa lhilhijch'a t'alaxt'uk'uyat an Stalan'a Takuwin. Wa mijalakt'atamchak'ani amilakpaynink'an xtajunita.

¿An yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, tisiyu'unchacha yu ntucha talhitama'chapulh amilakpaynink'an xtajunita? Amilakpaynink'an yu'uncha tala'ma'nilhi an yu xtalhichiwiniy li kamina yu ts'awj katsukuya lapanak, chi chaway li kilachilhcha, uxitnan o'xch'o'ot'it ch'i ma'nit'it.
Uxitnan li yucha an angelhnini p'u'unk'anat'it an lhamap'a'sin, jant'u k'iklak'a'iyat'it.
Akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi an Esteban, tala'talh'amalhcha, wa xwat'at'acha xtalaktasat'ajun, xtaxkajicha an Esteban.
Pero an Esteban, mu sawalhcha ixlhit'ajun i an Satalan'a Takuwin, yucha tala'st'alh chi la'ts'ilhi tacha an xlimj junita an Dios, chi an Jesús tan oxicha xpa'xti an Diosi sa' ixyalh.
Pus an Esteban najun: —¡Jo', k'ala'ts'int'it! An lakt'iyan lhti'ay, chi an isTs'alh Dios tan oxicha ixpa'xti an Diosi yachalh.
Pero yu'uncha t'ak'alhcha jalak'akatuch'apakalh, chi p'ascha talakt'asalh, tatayla'alhcha an Esteban.
Tamaxtulhcha an la'acha'an an Esteban, chi talakat'alhmalhcha. An yu xta'alhtasuy an Esteban tamalhistaknilhcha an xla'la'ch'itk'an tichiyucha ts'alh junkan Saulo.
Akxni xtalakat'alhmat'ajuncha an Esteban, tapaynilh, najun: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, k'ala'a'it'i an kintakuwin.
Chi istso'ottayka, p'asi chiwinilh najun: —Jamach'alhkat, jant'u k'ajalhak'ap'up'ininini ani tala'alhin. Akxni chunchacha nawlh, nilhcha.

An Saulo ancha ixt'ajun, wa tamcha xma'k'atsay li tama'nilhcha an Esteban. Anchunu wilhchan tsukulhcha jach'a'o'akani an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha an la'acha'an Jerusalén. Ixchuxk'ani tatalaktilh'olh, talak'alhcha an xala'acha'anaxni Judea chi Samaria, pero an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús yu'uncha jantu.
Tichi yu'uncha lapanakni yu wachucha xtajakiklaka'inin tamaknulhcha an Esteban chi stakcha talhi'alhulh.

Pero an Saulo yucha wa xjalhitama'chapuyi an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha chi xjach'a'o'ayi lakatamincha lakalakcha'a', ixkilaktanuycha, xjala'xa'axtuycha an lapanakni chi an t'akunin, xjalhi'ancha lakapulach'in.
An yu xtataxtutacha an la'acha'an Jerusalén xtalhichiwiniycha an laj'oxi chiwinti wa tanchuncha xta'an.
An Felipe, yucha la'acha'an Samariaja alh, chi tsukulhcha jalhixa'alayi an Cristo.
Xtata'ayxt'o'acha an lapanakni chi xchuxchak'ani sa' xta'alha'asmat'a an Felipe, chi xtala'ts'incha tacha an xlakmasuy tanlhun yu x'ilhtuy yu xmasuy ix'alhp'asninti Dios.

Lhuw lapanakni yu wa xtala'apaxto'ta lakmakxkay'un xjak'uch'uycha. An lakmakxkay'un akxni xtamakajuncha xamati lapanak, xtat'asaycha. Chi xluwk'an yu wa xtalaklakalhtukulunta chi yu wa la'ch'anlh'awilin xtajunita xjak'uch'uycha.
Tacha ani xtapasay, an la'acha'an, an lapanakni sawalhcha xtalaj'achan.
Chi ancha ixt'ajun pumatam lapanak yu ixjunkan Simón, xlip'ulhnaj jachawana ixjunita, chi stakcha xjalaj'o'xcho'ota an jamacha'an Samaria. Xjalhimasuni li sawalhcha xlitapalay lapanak.
Iixchuxk'an lakt'ikt'in chi laj'ajin, sawalhcha ixta'asmatni, ixtalaknajun: "Tacha aniy masuy yucha an ay ix'alhp'asninti Dios".
Sawalhcha xta'asmatni, mu an tacha ixjachawanan ma'anchacha stak xjapulaj'o'xcho'olhit'ajun.
Pero akxni takiklaka'ilhcha an Felipe tacha an xlichiwiniy laj'oxi chiwinti, ixlakata an xlich'alhkat Dios chi an Jesucristo, xtalaj'a'paxacha an lapanakni chi an t'akunin.
Chi an Simón wachucha kiklaka'ilh, chi akxni a'paxlicha lhilhijcha xch'a'o'ay an Felipe, sawalhcha xla'lhi'a'niya tacha an xla'ts'in xlaktapasay tanlhun chi tacha an xtata'oxicha an ta'an'anin.

Tak'atsaalhcha an xtamala'achanin an Jesús an yu xtat'awnachalh la'acha'an Jerusalén, li an la'acha'an Samaria ta'asmat'acha an ixchiwinti Dios. Tamala'achalhcha an Pedro chi an Juan la'acha'an Samaria.
Chi akxni tacha'alhcha Samaria, talhitapaynilhcha an yu tajakiklaka'inilhcha an yu ancha jamacha'an, para li katala'a'ilhi an Stalan'a Takuwin.
Mu ntuka' xamati xla'a'i yu yu'uncha. Wa xtalaj'a'paxtaka la xta'a'ut an Jamach'lhkat Jesús.
Wachuncha an Pedro chi an Juan talaklakpach'apalhcha an lapanakni, chi chuncha tala'a'ilhcha an Stalan'a Takuwin.
An Simón akxni la'ts'ilhi li an Stalan'a Takuwin xjala'chincha an lapanakni akxni xtajalakpach'apaninincha an xtamala'achanin Jesús, ixjaxta'nicha tumin.
Chi jajuniy: —Wachu akilaxta'niwi an x'alhp'asninti Dios, para li yu wachu aklakpach'apalh wachu kala'a'ilhi an Stalan'a Takuwin.
Wachuncha an Pedro alhtaylh juniy: —K'at'ats'an'a'o amintumin, mu uxint'i wa laka tumini t'amawp'ut'un an yu xt'a'a Dios.
Uxint'i jant'u t'ach'ip'ini li k'ala'a'it'i, mu la x'ukxlakapu an Dios jantu ts'ajwi t'ajun mijalhunut.
T'ach'a ani jant'uch'a k'is oxi lay, jant'uch'a ch'uni k'alat'i, k'at'ap'ayninini an Dios, kalats'inawcha li sna kamala'mixinini li ch'unch'ach'a p'ast'ak'a.
Mu kla'ts'inani li wa lhaxk'ayanani li tu'u' ch'i jant'u lay mak'awt'ijlay.
An Simón ja'alhtayanalh: —K'at'ap'ayninit'iti an Dios kilakata para li ntu tu'u katapasalh tacha an kilajunaw.

Xli'astan akxni talhichiwin'olhcha an ixchiwinti Dios an Pedro chi an Juan, ta'ancho'olhcha la'acha'an Jerusalén, chi talhichiwinilhcha wachu an laj'oxi chiwinti lakalhuw xala'acha'anaxni an xalakaat'un Samaria.

Pumatam x'angelh an Dios xa'alalh an Felipe, junkan an Felipe: "K'a'ost'aycha chi k'ap'inchi anu lhitalaktsin (sur), la xatij la'acha'an Jerusalén, an tan la'pusta tij tan lakak'iwin, yu wakcha anta la'acha'an Gaza."

Pus an Felipe ostayalh chi alhcha, walh an lakatij paxto'lhicha pumatam lapanak jamacha'a Etiopía. Aniy lapanak xa'ayi ixjunita, ixtesorero an xarreina Etiopía chi kilalh la'acha'an Jerusalén, kitapayninilh an Dios.
Chi xti'ancho'oycha xla'acha'an, sa'cha xtajun la xkarro, xpunawlhi'antacha an yu ists'o'ta an Isaías yu xlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
Pus an xTakuwin Dios juniy an Felipe: "Waniya k'ap'inchi an tan la'pust'ajun an carruaje".
Akxni an Felipe cha'alhcha, asmat'acha li an jamacha'a Etiopía xpunawlhi'antacha an yu ists'o'ta an Isaías, pus juniy: —¿Lhimach'a'xayi an yu p'una'un?

An lapanak jamacha'a Etiopía ja'alhtayanalh najun: —¿Tasucha lay aklhimacha'xaya li ntu xamati kijuniy tuchini nawputuncha? Pus an Felipe junkan li katajulhcha an laka carruaje chi li kapiktutawilhcha an lapanak jamacha'a Etiopía.

Tan an xpunawt'ajun an ixchiwinti Dios, an tan najunta: Wa tacha wa la'atamcha borregojo lhi'ankalh tan kama'nikana', chi wa tacha wa la'atamcha borrego yu ntu k'is t'asay akxni la'asitkan, jantu k'is ta'elh'a'mix'alh.
Stakcha tamamaxanilh, walh chi ntu xamati lhi'a'tayjulh. An xjatsukunti ma'osukalhi aniy lakaat'un. Jantu xamati lay katinawlh tichini yu'unchacha yu tapu'a'p'un'alh.

An jamacha'a Etiopía juniy an Felipe: —Lamapaynin ak'i'uni tichini yuchacha lhichiwiniy an lapanak an yu xlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios. ¿Wa x'akstucha lhichiwinkan tacha ani najunta u xamati apumatami lhichiwini?
Pus an Felipe tsukulhcha lhixa'alayi an tacha xpunawt'ajun ixchiwinti Dios, an jamacha'a Etiopía. Junilhcha an laj'oxi chiwinti yu lhichiwiniy an Jesús.
Chi wakcha ta'alh, walh tacha'alhcha tan xwilh xkan, an jamacha'a Etiopía najun: —Aniy wilhi xkan, ¿jantucha layi ani ak'a'paxli?
Pus an Felipe juniy: —Li xlisawalh chux la mijalhunuti k'iklak'a'iy an Dios, laych'a k'a'a'p'axt'i. Pus an jamacha'a Etiopía najun: —Ki't'in ijkiklaka'iya li an Jesucristo isTs'alh an Dios.
Wa chuncha lhinawlhi li kasa' yawkalhi an carruaje, chi an xt'uyunk'an tata'alhtajulhcha, an Felipe ma'paxalhcha.
Akxni tatakutlhicha an lakxkan, an ixTakuwin Dios lhi'alhcha an Felipe, chi an xa'ay lapanak jamacha'a Etiopía tucha la'ts'incho'olh; pero sawalhcha x'achani taylhi'alh xtij.
An Felipe akxni k'ats'aanalh la'acha'an Azotojcha xt'awnachalh, chi lakatamj lakatamjcha la'acha'anaxni ix'an lhichiwiniy an laj'oxi chiwinti, sta la'acha'an Cesareajcha cha'alh.
An Saulo ali ali xtaylhi'anta xjala'me'e'sway li kajama'niya an yu xtakiklaka'iy an Dios. Pus xliyu lhila'alhi an xa'ay tukan sacerdote,

chi sk'inilhcha jalhiki tan tasuy li laycha ka'alh an laka lakcha'a tan ixtaputa'ayxt'o'a an yu judiojnin an la'acha'an Damasco, para li ka'alhcha japuxkawna an yu xtach'a'o'ay an Sast'i Tij, t'akunin chi lapanakni, para li kajalhi'alhcha tacha tach'inin an la'acha'an Jerusalén.
Pero akxni wanicha ixcha'ant'ajun la'acha'an Damasco, la'atam jatapulhkunu minchalh an lakt'iyan, wanaj la'atanchanu'olh, wa xlimjnik'acha.
Pus an Saulo alo' ta'a'talh, chi asmat'a junkan: —"Saulo, Saulo, ¿t'asu li k'ilhit'ama'ch'ap'uycha?"
An Saulo najun: —¿Tisu uxint'icha Jamach'alhkat? An yu xchiwiniy alhtaylh juniy: —Kit'in Jesús, kit'ini k'ilhit'ama'ch'ap'uy.
K'a'ost'aycha chi k'ap'inchicha an la'acha'an. Anchacha k'a'unk'ana'a t'uch'ini k'a'ilht'uya'acha.
An yu xtat'a'anta an Saulo sawalhcha xtalaktalhanan, mu ta'asmatlhi tacha an chiwinkalh, pero ntu xamati tala'ts'ilh.
Wachuncha an Saulo ostayalhi an lakaat'un, pero akxni tala'pumix'alh, jantucha lay ixjalakawanan. Pus wa tama'ch'apalhi'alhcha la'acha'an Damasco.
Ancha la'at'utu wilhchani xwilh jantu lay xjalakawanan chi ntucha xwajin chi ntucha x'ot'a tu'u'.

An la'acha'an Damasco xwilh pumatam lapanak yu xkiklaka'iy Dios, ixjunkan Ananías, chi an Jesús talakasunilh, wa tacha la'puminatnalh, chi juniy: —Ananías. Yucha ja'alhtayanalh najun: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús ¿tisuncha?, anicha ikyalh.

An Jamach'alhkat Jesús juniy: —K'a'ost'aycha, chi k'ap'inchi an laka tij tan junkan Ts'awj. K'ap'uxk'awya'a pumatam lapanak jamacha'a Tarso, junkan Saulo, an la ixcha'a Judasi k'ap'uxk'awya'a, mu chaway yucha tapaynit'ajun,
chi la'ts'in tacha la xla'puminatnat pumatam lapanak junkan Ananías. La'ts'in li tanuchalh chi lakpach'apalh para li laycha kajalakawanancho'olh.

Akxni chunchacha asmatlhi an Ananías najun: —Jamach'alhkat Jesús, wanajcha xluwk'ani kintalhixa'alata anchunu lapanak chi kintajun'ojotacha tacha jala'lhitama'chapuy an yu takiklaka'iyan, an la'acha'an Jerusalén.
Chi chaway anicha minta, mu yu'uncha an xalaj'ajincha sacerdotejnini tamakawni li kamilh, para li kajalhi'an'olhcha tacha tach'inini an yu ta'a'atant'asayan.

Pero an Jamach'alhkat Jesús juniy an Ananías: —K'ap'inchi', mu anchunu lapanak iksakxtutacha para li kakilhichiwinilhcha tan tawilanalh yu ntu judiojnin, chi li kajajunilhi kinchiwinti an rejnin chi an yu judiojnin.
Kit'in akmasuniya tacha kastak ma'alh'ajnana kilakata.

Pus an Ananías alhcha an laka cha'a tan xtanumachalh an Saulo. Akxni tanuchalhcha an Ananías lakpach'apalhcha an Saulo chi juniy: —Kint'ala'ajun Saulo, an Jamach'alhkat Jesús an yu talakasunin laka tij t'an xp'ut'ant'a yucha kimala'achachalh, para li laych'a k'ajalak'awanch'o'o chi li sawalhch'a k'alhits'uk'u an Stalan'a Takuwin.
Wa akxni, an la xla'chulh an Saulo, patajunilh wa tacha x'ayxk'ip'it jatanti chi jalakawanancho'olhcha. Wachuncha an Saulo tayalhcha chi a'paxlicha.
Xli'astan waycho'olhcha chi k'ut'ilhcha juncho'olh, chi anchacha jat'atamakawlh an jamacha'an Damasco yu an xtakiklaka'iy an Jesús, lanan la'alhuw wilhchani jat'atamakawlh.
Chi wa chuncha an Saulo tsukulhcha lhichiwiniya an Jesús, isTs'alh Dios, an laka lakcha'a an tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an lapanakni.

Ixchuxk'an an yu xta'alha'asmat'a xtalhi'a'nicha chi ixtanajun: —¿Chu ntu yu ani lapanak an yu xjalhitama'chapuy an yu takiklaka'iy Jesús an Jerusalén? ¿Jantu yuchacha yu ani chilh, para li kajalhi'alhcha chi kajama'axta'nilhcha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin?
Pero an Saulo ali xlichiwiniya alhp'as an xchiwinti Jesús, xjajuniya li an Jesús yucha Cristo. Pus tucha xtalhimacha'xayi an judiojnin yu la'acha'ancha Damasco xtawilanalh.
La'alhuwcha wilhchani la'pusli, an Judiojnin wa tamcha tak'atsaalh li katama'niyacha an Saulo,
pero yucha k'atsaalh. Ts'isi chi tunku xtapakxan'icha an la xalakmalhticha an la'acha'an, para li laycha katama'nilh.
Pero an yu xt'alhtanancha an Jesús xtajunita tamujulh laka la'atam ay kanasta chi yuchacha tapuma'alhtajulh puts'ista an laka axi, yu xla'acho'oni'ojoy an la'acha'an, chi chunchacha lay osli.
Akxni cha'alhcha la'acha'an Jerusalén an Saulo, xjat'atala'xto'putuncha an yu xtakiklaka'iy Jesús, pero yu'uncha ixchuxk'ani wa xtatalhamni, mu ntu xtalhiwilayi li wachucha xkiklaka'i.

Wachuncha an Bernabé lhi'alhi an Saulo an tan xtat'ajun yu xjamala'achata an Jesús chi jajunilhcha li an Saulo la'ts'ilhi an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, an laka tij, chi li xa'alalh, chi li an la'acha'an Damasco an Saulo jantu wa talhanajlhichiwinilhcha an xchiwinti Jesús.
Pus an Saulo jat'atamakawlhcha an la'acha'an Jerusalén, anchacha xjat'a'aklat'ajun. Jantu wa xtalhanajlhichiwiniycha an xchiwinti Jamach'alhkat Jesús.
Xjat'achiwiniycha chi xjat'alakikxtukuycha an judiojnin yu xtachiwiniy lhigriego, pero yu'uncha wa xtama'niputun.
Akxni tak'atsaalhi an yu takiklaka'iy Jesús li wa tama'niputun, talhi'alhi an Saulo la'acha'an Cesarea, chi ancha tamak'alhcha la'acha'an Tarso.

Wachuncha an yu xtakiklaka'icha an Dios ta xlijalhi'ay an xalakaat'un Judea chi Galilea chi Samaria lhi'achacha xtawilanalh chi alhp'ascha xtajun la ixtakuwink'an chi xtakiklaka'icha an Dios, chi an Stalan'a Takuwin ali ali xjalalhaway.
An Pedro xjala'pixiyalhnant'ajuni an ixlapanakni Dios, chi wachu alh jala'ts'ini an yu xtawilananchalh la'acha'an Lida.
Walh ancha la'cha'alh pumatam lapanak junkan Eneas, la'atsajincha k'ata ixta'an'ajmalh, wa xlakalhtukulunta.
An Pedro juniy: —Eneas, an Jesucristo kak'uch'uyan, k'a'ost'aycha, ch'i k'asakt'icha amimputamat. An Eneas watukan ostayalh.
Ixchuxk'ani tala'ts'in'olh an yu xtawilanalh la'acha'an Lida chi an la'acha'an Sarón chi takiklaka'ilhcha an Jesús.

Anchunu panch'e'ex an la'acha'an Jope ixt'ajun pumatam t'aku yu xjakiklaka'inin, ixjunkan Tabita, lhigriego nawputun Dorcas. Ani t'aku wa tanlhuncha yu laj'oxi x'ilhtuy chi xja'a'tayjuycha an yu xtama'lhtask'iniy tanlhun.
Pero chilh panch'e'ex an Dorcas ta'an'alh chi nilh. Akxni paxa'okalhcha, an ixlakatunaj pulaktamcha laka cha'a tan xlitala't'uycha juntachalhi mamakanchalh.

An la'acha'an Lida wani la'acha'an Jopeje xlitamakajun, chi an Pedro ancha xt'awnachalh Lida, pus akxni tak'atsaalhi an yu xtajakiklaka'inin li ancha t'awnachalh an Pedro, tamala'achanilh xt'uyunk'an lapanakni tan tajuniy: —Pedro, k'at'at'i watukani an la'acha'an Jope".

Pus an Pedro jat'a'alhi la'acha'an Jope. Akxni cha'alhcha, talhi'alhcha an tan xmachalh an lakatunaj, chi ixchuxk'an an yu maticha xt'apapak'an t'akunin xtalhi'alhuncha. Tala'atanchanulhcha an Pedro chi tamasunilhcha yu xlak'ilhtuta la'la'ch'it an Dorcas akxni ixt'ajunka'.

Wachuncha an Pedro jajuniy li katataxtu'olhka', chi xli'astan yucha tatso'ottalhcha chi tapaynilhcha chi sa'cha xla'ts'ini an yu xnitacha, chi juniy: —¡Tabita, k'a'ost'aycha! An T'aku jalakawanalhcha, chi akxni la'ts'ilhcha an Pedro, ostawilhcha.
An Pedro ma'ch'apachalh chi ma'ch'apayawlhcha, pus akxni jat'asanilhcha an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha chi an t'akunin yu ntucha tu'u xt'apapak'an, xla'awcho'otacha jamasunicho'olh.
Tacha ani tapasalh wanajcha lajk'atsa'okalhi an Jope, chi lhuwi yu takiklaka'ilh an Dios.
An Pedro la'alhuw wilhchani tamakawlh an la'acha'an, la ixcha'a tichiyucha lapanak yu xla'tapatsay jaxt'a'an, ixjunkan Simón.
An la'acha'an Cesarea ixt'ajun tichiyucha lapanak ixjunkan Cornelio, xakapitan la'atam batallón yu ixjunkan Italiano.
Aniy lapanak chi chux yu xtawilanalh la ixcha'a xtakiklaka'iya an Dios. Chi ixja'a'tayjuyi an judiojnin, la'lhuwi ixt'a'a tumin chi lhilhiji xtapaynini an Dios.
La'atam wilhchan katacha las trescha yu puta'oxaycha, la'puminatnalh, sawalhcha oxi la'ts'ilh pumatam x'angelh an Dios, tanuchalhcha an tan xwilh chi juniy: —¡Cornelio!

An Cornelio wa sa'cha xla'ts'ini an angelh chi masi sawalhcha ixtalhanan lhisakmilh, juniy: —¿T'isunch'a lak'ask'ini Jamach'alhkat? An ángelh alhtaylh juniy: —An Dios lhakapu'ani amintapaynit ch'i t'ach'a an ilht'uy li ja'a't'ay'uy an yu tama'lhtask'iniy la'a'tayjun.
K'amala'ach'at'i xamati an la'acha'an Jope, kaki'ilh tichiyucha lapanak junkan Simón, yu tajumpalay ma Pedro.
Ani yucha la ixcha'a tichi yucha yu wachu Simón junkani wilhchalh, yu la'tapatsay jaxt'a'an wani an alamalh.
Akxni ancho'olhcha an ángelh an yu xa'alalh an Cornelio, an Cornelio jat'asanilhcha xt'uyunk'an xma'tsukunin chi pumatamcha soldado yu oxi xt'alalhi'an yu xkiklaka'iy an Dios.
Jajun'olhcha tacha an la'ts'ilh, xli'astan jamala'achalhcha la'acha'an Jope.
Tunkunchalh, akxni x'atunkunt'ajuncha, laka tijcha xtat'ajun wanicha la'acha'an Jope, chi an Pedro yu an ta'alh puxkawnin tawk'alhcha la x'a'sti cha'a', alhcha tapaynini'.
Walh sawalhcha chawanalh, wa laycha tu'u ka'ulh, pero akxni xla'oxinit'awkanka yu ka'uyacha la'puminatnalh.
La'ts'in li an lakt'iyan tati'achalhcha chi ta'alhtajulhcha an lakaat'un wa tacha alhtam ay sábana, an tama'ats'astut'at'i xch'apanikantachalhcha an talhman.
Chi an la xpulaknicha an sábana watuchicha jatapakxat yu ma'at'at'i xch'aja xtatajumanalh chi yu wa tatatanxe'e'an chi yu tala'pa'achujlata.
Chi an Pedro asmatlhi chiwinkalh, nawkan: —Pedro, k'at'aycha, k'ajama'nit'icha ch'i k'aja'ut'icha.
An Pedro ja'alhtayanalh najun: "Jantu Jamach'alhkat, mu kit'in tu a'tam k'uta yu ntu oxi ukan chi yu nawkan li ntu stalan'a para li ak'ulh"
An yu chiwinilh a'tam xa'alapalhi an Pedro, junkan: "Yu Dioscha mastalan'anita jant'u k'a'uni li ntu oxi."
A't'utu chuncha junikalh, xli'astan an sábana tach'ixcho'olhcha an lakt'iyan.

An Pedro sawalhcha xpast'ak'a tuchini jumputuncha tacha an la'ts'ilh, walh tatayachalhcha laka malhticha an lapanakni yu xjamala'achata an Cornelio, mu talhasakminilhcha tanchuncha la ixcha'a yu junkan Simón.
Pus mu tacha'alhcha, pus p'ascha tachiwiniy talhasakminincha li ancha wilh yu junkan Simón yu talhimispapalay Pedro.
Pus wachuncha masi xpastakt'ajunka tuchini jumputuncha tacha an la'ts'ilh an Pedro, an xTakuwin Dios juniy: "K'ajala'ts'inchi', xt'utunk'an lapanakni tapuxkawyan.
K'at'aycha chi k'at'a'alht'a'ut'icha, k'ajat'ap'inchicha, jant'u t'u'u k'alhak'ap'up'i, mu kit'ini ijkamala'achatachalh."
Pus an Pedro ta'alhtajulh chi jajuniy an lapanakni: —Kit'ini an yu p'uxk'awyat'it ¿t'isunch'a la't'ant'at'iti?

Yu'uncha ta'alhtaylh tajuniy: —Yucha an kapitan Corneliojo kintamala'achatacha'an, yucha pumatam lapanak yu ja'asmatnan, kiklaka'iya an Dios, chi ixchuxk'an an judiojnin oxi talhiwilay chi tamapayni. Pumatam x'angelh an Diosi junilh li kat'asanin, para li k'ap'it'i la ixcha'a', chi li ka'asmatnini yu k'a'una'a.

Pus wachuncha an Pedro jatamaknulhcha pulakni chi anchacha tala'akujlhi anchunu jatats'isni. Tunkunchalh, jat'a'alhcha an Pedro, chi wachu tat'a'alhi ali'in yu xtakiklaka'iy an Jesús yu jamacha'an Jope.
La'atamcha wilhchan jumpalh tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Cesarea. An Cornelio sa'cha xjapakxan'ita, xjalakt'asanitacha yu ta xjalhila'ts'in chi yu oxi xjat'alalhi'an.
Akxni cha'alhcha an Pedro la ixcha'a an Cornelio, an Cornelio taxtulhcha, lakatastuklhicha chi tatso'ottanilhcha.
Pero an Pedro xa'ayawlh juniy: —K'at'ay, kit'in wachucha wa klapanak tacha uxint'i.
Akxni chunchacha xt'achiwint'ajun, tanulhcha laka cha'a an Pedro, walh la'ts'incha li wanaj lhilhuwi xlakwilakalh.

An Pedro jajuniy: —Uxitnan k'ats'ayat'iti li pumatam judio jantu jat'achiwiniya yu ntu xt'amacha'an chi ntu tanuyi la ixcha'ak'an, wa xliyu tumpaja yu kiklaka'iy lhamap'a'sin. Pero an Dios kimasunilhi li ntu xamati ajkunilh li lhkiliki u li ntu wa kint'atam.
Xliyu tacha kilamak'atsaaniw li akmilh, watukan ikmilh, jantu tu'u iknajun li ntu akmilh. Chaway ijk'atsaputuncha tuchini kilalhit'asaniyawcha.

An Cornelio juniy: —La'at'at'icha wilhchan xjuntachalh tacha chaway panche'ex ixjunita aniya xaktanun la kincha'a', xaktapaynit'ajun yu puta'oxaycha las tres, walh akxni kla'ts'in kintalakasunilhcha pumatam lapanak, an xla'ch'it wa xlimjnik'acha.
Kijuniy: —Cornelio, an Dios asmat'a amintapaynit chi past'ak'a an yu ilht'ut'a li ja'a't'ay'uy an yu tama'lhtask'iniy la'a'tayjun.
K'amala'ach'at'i xamati an la'acha'an Jope, para li kaki'ilh an Simón yu lhimispapalhkan Pedro. La ixcha'a yu wachu junkan Simoni wilhchalh, yu la'tapatsay jaxt'a'an chi wani an alamalhi wilhchalh.

Pus watukan iklhinawlhi li k'ap'ink'a puxkawka, walh chi uxint'i milhi'oxi lapanak ch'it'acha. Chaway kinchuxk'ani la x'ukxlakapu an Dios aniya ikt'awnaw, chi klakask'inaw li akilajun'ojowi chux yu an Dios junan li akilajuniw.
Pus an Pedro tsukulhcha chiwiniy, jajuniy: —Chaway iklhimacha'xaycha li sawalhi li an Dios jantu wa jasakxtunun,
watanchuncha la'acha'an jala'a'iya an yu takiklaka'iy chi ta'ilhtuy yu laj'oxi tanlhun.
An Dios jaxa'alalhi an jamacha'an Israel, jamak'atsanilhi an laj'oxi chiwinti yu xt'a'a oxi jatawlhnat, yucha an Jesucristojo puchiwinilh chi yucha kiJamach'alhkatk'an kinchuxk'an.
Uxitnan oxi k'ats'ayat yu tapasalh ta xlijalhi'ay an xalakaat'un Judea. Tan pu'a'taynichalh la'acha'an Galilea, akxni an Juan xlichiwinintacha li lhitask'iniya li kalaj'a'paxkalh.

K'ats'ayat'iti li an Dios xta'nilhi x'alhp'asninti chi Stalan'a xTakuwin an Jesús yu jamacha'a Nazaret, ch'i k'ats'ayat'iti li an Jesús tanlhun yu laj'oxiy x'ilhtuy chi xjak'uch'uyi watichicha yu an xapay makxkay'un xjamama'alh'ajni. Chuncha lay x'ilhtuy mu an Dios ixt'a'aklat'ajun.
Chi kitnan ijk'atsayawi chux tacha an lak'ilhtulh tanlhun an Jesús an xalakaat'un Judea chi an Jerusalén. Xli'astan tama'nilhcha, tamuk'alhcha lakatam laka cruz.
Pero an Dios mala'awnicho'olhi xlila'at'utu wilhchan, chi ilhtulhi li akintatalakasunini kitnan.
Jantu lhichuxi jatalakasunilh, wa kitnan yu an Dios kixtasakxtutancha xlip'ulhnaj, para li aknajuwi li kla'ts'inaw. Kitnan ikt'alakwajiw chi ikt'alaj'otwi akxni xla'awcho'otacha.
Chi yucha, kintamala'achancha li ak'awcha jalakjuninini an lapanakni li an Dios ulalhcha an Jesús xlijuez, ixjuesk'an an yu tala'ajunta chi an yu tanitacha.
Ixchuxk'an an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, xtalhichiwinintacha an Jesús, chi ixtanajuntacha li yu takiklaka'iy an Jesús, kajamala'mixinikana ixtala'alhink'an.
Chunchaka xchiwint'ajun an Pedro, walh an Stalan'a Takuwin jala'cha'an'olhcha ixchuxk'an an yu xta'alha'asmatt'ajun.
Pus an yu xtat'acha'anta an Pedro, an yu wachu xtakiklaka'iy an Jesús yu judiojnin, xtalhi'a'nicha li an Stalan'a Takuwin wachu jaxta'nikalhi masi an yu ntu judiojnin.
Mu an lapanakni tipalhuwcha yu tamcha chiwinti xtalakchiwiniy chi xtaxta'nicha lhimala'puchajuni an Dios.
Wachuncha an Pedro najun: —¿Laycha jantucha kamakawkalhi li katalaj'a'paxli ani lapanakni, yu tala'a'ilhcha an Stalan'a Takuwin tacha kitnan?
Pus lhinawlhcha li katalaj'a'paxlicha la xta'a'ut an Jesucristo. Xli'astan tatapaynisk'inilhcha an Pedro li kajat'atamakawlh la'alhuw lanan wilhchan.
An yu ixjamala'achata an Jesús chi an ixlapanakni Dios yu xtawilanalh an xalakaat´un Judea tak'atsaalhi li an yu ntu jamacha'an Judea wachu tala'a'ilhi an ixchiwinti Dios.
Pus an Pedro akxni cha'ancho'olhcha Jerusalén, an ali'in judiojnin yu wachu xtajakiklaka'inin xtajuni li ntu oxi xtalhiwilay.
Tajuniy an Pedro: —¿T'asu li jak'ila'k'ilat'icha an yu ntu judiojnin ch'i jat'alakwaycha?
An Pedro wanaj jajun'olhi tacha an tapasalh, sta tan pu'a'taynichalh, jajuniy:

Kit'in an la'acha'an Jopeje xakt'ajun, walh akxni xaktapaynit'ajun kla'puminatnalh, ikla'ts'ilh wa tacha la'atam ay sábana, an tama'ats'astut'at'i an lakt'iyani ixcha'anta chi x'alhtajuycha an tan xakt'ajun.

Chi oxicha iklhakapu'an para li oxicha akla'ts'ilh tuchini tajuncha an xpulakni, la'stu jatapakxati xtatajumanalh, yu xputach'ant'at'ik'an ta'alin aniy lakaat'un, chi yu ta'at'ajnan, chi yu tatatanxe'e'an, chi yu tala'pa'achujlata.
Chi k'asmat'a chiwinkancha, kijunkan: —Pedro, k'at'aycha chi wa tanyuchacha k'ama'nit'i, k'a'ut'icha.
Kit'in ik'alhtaylh ijkuniy: —Jantu, Jamach'alhkat, mu kit'in tu a'tam k'uta yu lhkiliki chi yu ntu oxi ukan.
Wachuncha an chiwinti, aminchalh lakt'iyan a'tam kixa'alapalh, kijumpalay: —Yu Dioscha mastalan'anita, jant'u k'a'uni li ntu oxi.
A't'utu chuncha tapasalh, chi xli'astan ch'ixcho'okalhcha an wa tacha sábana an lakt'iyan.
Walh wa akxni, tacha'alhcha an laka cha'a tan xakwilh xt'utunk'an lapanakni, yu kixtapuxkajuy, la'acha'an Cesareaja xjamakminkantachalh.
An xTakuwin Dios kijuni li ntu tani aknawlh ma ajkat'a'alhcha an lapanakni. Chi wachu kintat'akilalhi ani xpumachaxank'an t'ala'awnin; iktanu'ocha'awi la ixcha'a an lapanak an yu kint'asanilh.

Yucha kintajunini li an la ixcha'a la'ts'ilh pumatam angelh, ma ancha sa' xyalh chi an angelh ma juniy: —K'amala'ach'at'i xamati an la'acha'an Jope, para li kaki'ilhi an Simón yu lhimispapalhkan Pedro,
yucha kajunan tani laych'a k'alhit'a'alht'axt'uya'a chi chux a mifamilia.
Akxni ts'ukulhcha ijkaxa'alay, an Stalan'a Takuwin wanajcha chuni jala'chilh tacha kitnan p'ulhnaj kintala'chin.
Pus ancha ikpastaklhicha tacha an ixnajunta an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, tan an nawlh: —Chun sawalh an Juan wa laka xkani jama'paxanalh pero uxitnan an laka Stalan'a Takuwini k'ama'p'axak'ana'it.

Pus an Dios, mu li wanajcha chuni jaxta'niy tacha yu kitnan kintaxta'niyan yu kiklaka'itawcha an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo, ¿tisu kilhijunticha kit'in para li ajkunilhcha an Dios li ntu chuni ka'ilhtulhi?

Akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi an Pedro an t'ala'awnin yu jamacha'an Jerusalén, sa' talajkilhun'olh chi taxta'nilhcha lhimala'puchajuni an Dios, ixtajuniy: —¡Pus an yu ntu judiojnin wachu jamakawniya an Dios li katakiklaka'ilh, para li katalhitsukulhi an jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam katimin'olh!

Akxni tama'nilhcha an Esteban, an yu xtakiklaka'iy Dios ts'ukulhcha jach'a'o'akan, ixjaxkaykancha, pus an ali'in ta'os'alhcha la'acha'an Fenicia, chi la'acha'an Chipre, chi la'acha'an Antioquía. Anchacha xtalhixa'alayachalh ixchiwinti Dios an jamacha'an Judea, pero an yu ntu jamacha'an Judea, yu'uncha jantu.

Pero xta'alin wachu yu xtakiklaka'iy an Dios yu jamacha'an Chipre chi jamacha'an Cirene, yu'uncha tacha'alhi an la'acha'an Antioquía chi talhixa'alalh wachu an ixchiwinti Dios an yu ntu jamacha'an Judea, tajamakatsaaninilhi an xchiwinti Jamach'alhkat Jesús.
An x'alhp'asninti an Jamach'alhkat Dios ancha xjat'a'aklat'ajun, pus lhuw lapanaki yu makawlhcha tacha yu xlip'ulhnaj xkiklaka'i, chi takiklaka'ilhcha an Dios.
An yu xtajakiklaka'inin an la'acha'an Jerusalén, akxni chunchacha tak'atsaalh li xtapasay, tamala'achalhcha an Bernabé la'acha'an Antioquía.

Akxni cha'alhcha an Bernabé, la'ts'ilhcha tacha an Dios sawalhcha xjalakmapaynita, pus sawalhcha x'achan. Chi ixchuxk'ani jalhimap'a'silh li la xjalhunutk'an xlisawalhcha katataylhi'alh katach'a'o'alh an Jamach'alhkat Dios.
Mu an Bernabé sawalhcha oxi lapanaki ixjunita chi sawalhcha ixlhit'ajun i an Stalan'a Takuwin chi sawalhcha xkiklaka'iya an Dios. Chi lhuw lapanaki t'atala'xto'lhi an Jamach'alkat Jesús.
Xli'astan, an Bernabé alhcha la'acha'an Tarso, alhcha puxkawna an Saulo.

Chi akxni la'cha'alhcha aylhi'alhcha la'acha'an Antioquía. Ancha, kalaks tam k'ata tat'atawlhchalh an yu xtakiklaka'iy wachu an Dios, chi lhuw lapanakni tamasunilh. An la'acha'an Antioquiaja tan p'ulhnajcha jalhimapa'a'ukanchalh li Cristianojnin an xt'alhtanan Jesús.
Anchunu panch'e'ex xjuntachalh, tacha'alhi la'acha'an Antioquía ali'in yu xtalhichiwiniy an ixchiwinti Dios, la'acha'an Jerusaleni xtamintachalh.

Chi xapumatam de yu'uncha, yu ixjunkan Agabo, akxni sa'cha xyalh, an Stalan'a Takuwin machiwinilh, nawlh li ka'alina ay chawani ta xlijalhi'ay an lakaamunulhpa', chi tapasalh sawalh, akxni xch'alhkatnant'ajun an ay jamach'alhkat Claudio.
Pus an yu xtakiklaka'iy Dios yu jamacha'an Antioquía tapastaklhi li katamala'acha'nilhi la'a'tayjun an t'ala'awnin yu xtawilananchalh Judea, tacha yu laycha ixt'a'a atamj.
Chunchacha ta'ilhtulh, yu'uncha an Bernabé chi Saulojcha jamalhi'anikalh an tacha tala'xta'lhi an t'ala'awnin, para li katalhi'anilhcha an yu laktatanincha an la'acha'an Judea.
Anchunu panch'e'ex xjuntachalh, an rey Herodes tsukulhcha jalhinajuni li kajach'apayawkalhcha ali'in yu xtakiklaka'iy an Dios, para li kajalhitama'chapukalhcha.
Lhinawlhcha an Herodes li kama'nikalhcha laka espadaja an Jacobo, xt'ala'ajun an Juan.

Chi mu la'ts'ilhi an Herodes li oxi talhiwilalh an judiojnin, pus wachu lhinawlhi li kamalaklhchawkalhi an Pedro. Akxni chunchacha tapasalh akxni k'atan ixjunita, akxni x'ukan pan yu ntu tu'u lhiyalh lhamaskajan.

Akxni xch'apayawkantacha an Pedro, an Herodes malaklhchawlhcha, chi ancha kilhmakt'at'icha soldadojnini xtalhistakta. Xpumat'at'ik'an soldadojnini xtajunita kilhmaktamincha. An Herodes xli'ilhtuy li akxni kala'oyacha an xk'atan Paxku kajamalakasuniya an lapanakni .
Pus an Pedro oxicha xlistakkanta an laka pulach'in, pero an yu xtakiklaka'iy Dios alhp'asi xtataylhi'anta xtalhitapaynini.

Chi anchunu jatats'isni akxni an Herodes xpast'ak'acha li kamaxtuya katunkuna, an Pedro ilhtatay, la xpujank'an xt'uyunk'an soldadojnin, laka la'at'uy kadenajcha xma'ch'i'ulakanta. Chi an ali'in soldadojnin xtajalhistaknantacha an la xamalhticha an pulach'in.

Walh wa akxni cha'alh pumatam x'angelh an Dios, an laka pulach'in wanaj tapulhku'olh. An angelh pajach'apachalhi an Pedro, makujulh, chi juniy: —"Lascha k'at'ay". Pus wa akxni an kadena lakmakpatajulhi an Pedro.
Chi an angelh juniy: —"K'amala'ch'incha ch'i k'ach'ant'anut'icha amiwarachi". —Pus chunchacha ilhtulh an Pedro, chi an angelh jumpalay: —K'ap'ula'axt'a'k'acha ch'i ak'inch'a'o'acha.
Wachuncha an Pedro ch'a'o'alhcha an angelh, masi ntu xk'atsayi an Pedro li sawalh u jantu yu x'ilhtut'ajun an angelh. An Pedro ixnajun li sna wa xla'puminatnant'ajuncha.

Tala'puslicha tan p'ulh xtayanalh an soldadojnin chi tan xlilakat'uycha xtayanalh, chi akxni tacha'alhcha an laka malhticha wa x'akstucha tati'alh. Pus tataxtulhcha chi akxni tala'puslicha lakatam laka tij, an angelh wa x'akstucha makawlh an Pedro.

Akxni, an Pedro lhimacha'xalhcha. Chi najun: —Chaway oxicha ijk'atsay li yucha an Dios sawalhi mala'achachalh an x'angelh, para li akimilh ma'alhtaxtunu la xmaka an Herodes chi ixchuxk'an tacha an kixtalhitama'chapuputun an judiojnin.
Akxni lhimacha'xalhcha ixlakata aniy, an Pedro alhcha la ixcha'a a María, xnati Juan yu xtajumpalay Marcos, ancha lhilhuwi x'ayxto'kan xtatapaynit'ajun.
An Pedro akxni chiwinilhcha an laka malhticha yu yalh lhilaka tij, pumatam jatsi alh la'ts'ini tichini yuchacha. An jatsi ixjunkan Rode.
Akxni alhmispalhi li yucha an Pedro, wa x'achatcha jantu malhti'anilh, apalij jats'alajtanucho'olh chi jamak'atsaaninilhcha li yucha an Pedrojo yalh laka malhticha.
An yu xtatanumanalh pulakni tajuniy: —K'a wa lok'ojlay. Pero yucha jajuniy li sawalh, chi yu'uncha ixtanajun: —Jantu yu', yucha an x'angelh.
Pero an Pedro ali xchiwiniya an laka malhticha. Pus akxni tamati'anilhcha chi tala'ts'ilhcha, xtalaktalhanancha.

An Pedro jatamakyawnilh, jajuniy li wa sa'cha katalajkilhulh, chi jajunilhcha tani lhitaxtulhcha an laka pulach'in, li yucha an Diosi maxtulh, chi jajumpalay: —Tacha ani klajunaw k'ajamak'ats'aanit'iti an Jacobo chi an t'ala'awnin. Wachuncha taxtulhcha, chi lakatamcha ampalh.
Akxni tunkunchalhcha, wa tilhilhicha xtalayi an soldadojnin, mu ntu xtak'atsayi tani lhitaxtulhcha an Pedro chi tanchuncha ixt'ajun.

An Herodes lhinawlh li kapuxkawkalh, pero mu ntu lay tala'cha'alh, pus yucha an soldadojnini xkwentajk'an ja'ilhtunilh chi jalhinawlhcha kajama'ni'okalh. Xli'astan, an Herodes taxtulhcha Judea, alhcha tawlhna la'acha'an Cesarea.

An Herodes wa xjatalh'amniya an jamacha'an Tiro chi an jamacha'an Sidón, pero yu'uncha wa tami tak'atsaalh pus takila'kilalh. Talhipuxkawnilhi li oxi kajaxa'alalh xapumatam yu xt'atapatsay an rey Herodes. Chi mu wachucha xa'ayi yucha, pus yuchacha tajunilh li kajat'anawlhi li wa oxicha katat'alalhi'alh an Herodes. Mu an la'acha'an Tiro chi an Sidón ancha xta'an'ojoy lak'iinin tanlhun yu xtama'lhtask'iniy an la xlakaat'un rey Herodes.

An Herodes ja'ulanilh la'atam wilhchani tani wanancha katala'cha'ana pus takila'kilalhcha. Yucha xla'ch'itacha yu laj'oxi xla'ch'it yu xpurey, chi tawilhcha tan xtawlay tan xp'uch'alhkatnan chi jaxa'alalhcha.
Wachuncha an lapanakni tsukulhcha talakt'asay, ixtalaknajun: —"¡Aniy ixchiwinti dios jantu wa lapanak!"
Wa akxni pumatam x'angelh an Dios, ilhtulh li kata'an'alhi an Herodes, mu ntu tu'u xliwilay an Dios, pus nilhi an Herodes, wanaj pupa'olh tsapulh.
Pero an xchiwinti an Dios ali ali xta'a'pitsit'ajun, wa tanchuncha sicha xlichiwinkan.
Akxni an Bernabé chi an Saulo ta'ilhtu'olhcha xtapatsatk'an an la'acha'an Jerusalén, ta'ancho'olhcha, talhi'alhcha wachu an Juan yu xjumpalhkan Marcos.

An tacha xtata'ayxt'o'acha an yu xtajakiklaka'inin an la'acha'an Antioquía, xta'alin yu xtalhichiwiniy an ixchiwinti Dios chi yu maestrojnin. Yu'uncha an Bernabé, chi Simón yu xtajumpalay ma Ts'iti, chi Lucio jamacha'a Cirene, chi Manaén yu ayxtam t'ala'ayakalh an Herodes yu ch'alhkatnalh an la'acha'an Galilea, chi Saulojcha.

La'atam wilhchan akxni xtatapayninit'ajun an Dios chi ixtalhitask'ajay jantu ixtawajin, an xTakuwin Dios nawlh: —An Bernabé chi an Saulo, akilasakxtuniw, mu yu'uncha kata'ilhtuya an tapatsat yu ijkalhisakxtuta.
Pus wachuncha tatapaynilhcha chi talhitask'ajalhcha jantu ixtawajin, chi jalaklakpach'apakalhcha la ix'a'tsulhk'an chi ixli'astan jamala'achakalhcha tan kata'ana'.

An Saulo chi an Bernabé yucha an xTakuwin Dioscha jalhi'alh tan kata'alh, ta'alhcha la'acha'an Seleucia, chi ancha tapu'alhcha la'atam barco an la'acha'an Chipre, aniy lakaat'un wanaj la'atanchanu'ojota xkan.
Akxni tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Salamina, tsukulhcha talhichiwiniya an ixchiwinti Dios an laka lakcha'a tan xtaputa'ayxt'o'a an judiojnin. An Juan wachu ani xjat'a'anta tachanu x'a'tayjunchak'an.

Tata'a'cho'o'olhi aniy lakaat'un tan wanaj la'atanchanu'ojota xkan, chi tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Pafos, ancha tala'cha'alh pumatam lapanak yu jachawana', jamacha'a Judea, ixjunkan Barjesús, ani lapanak ixnajun ma xlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, pero ntu yu sawalhi xlichiwiniy.

Ani jachawanaj lapanak xt'atala'xt'o'a an gobernador Sergio Paulo, pumatam lapanak yu xjalakpastaknan. Ani gobernador lhinawlhi li kajakit'asanikalhi an Bernabé chi an Saulo, mu yucha x'asmatputuni an ixchiwinti Dios.
Pero an jachawanaj lapanak yu xtalhimapa'a'uy lhigriego Elimas, wa jat'atasp'itlhi, jantu xla'a'i li an gobernador kakiklaka'ilhi an Dios.
Pus an Saulo yu wachu jumpalhkan Pablo, mu sawalhcha ixlhit'ajun i an Stalan'a Takuwin, sa'cha la'pula'ts'in
chi juniy: —¡Isas'at'a xapay makxkay'un yu maslakatinin chi ayjunita, xt'alaxkayna chux yu oxi! ¿tasu li ali ali alhap'uyawlhip'iniya an xtij Diosi?

Chaway an Dios kamama'alh'ajniyan, k'ala'ach'ixlaya'a chaway chi ma'an lanani nt'u lay k'at'ila'ts'i an xjatapulhkunu wilhchan. Pus wa tukan ma'la'ats'isli an la xla'chulh an Elimas, chi xpuxkajuycha xamati yu kama'ch'apalhi'alh, mu ntucha lay xjalakawanan.
Akxni chunchacha la'ts'ilh an gobernador, jakiklaka'inilhcha, chi xli'a'nicha tacha an xtamasuy an ixchiwinti Dios.
An Pablo chi an xt'alhtanan tataxtunilhi la'acha'an Pafos laka barco chi tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Perge xalakaat'un Panfilia; pero an Juan jantu jat'a'alh yucha ancho'olhcha Jerusalén.

Chi akxni tataxtucho'olhcha la'acha'an Perge, ta'alhcha la'acha'an Antioquía xalakaat'un Pisidia. Ancha la'atam sábado, tatanulhcha lakatam laka cha'a tan xtaputa'ayxt'o'a an lapanakni judiojnin, chi sa'cha talaktawilh.

Akxni tapunaw'olhcha an lhamap'a'sin chi an xlamap'a'sink'an yu ma'anchacha xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, an xalaj'ajin an tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an lapanakni tanajun: —T'ala'awnin li sna tu'u k'anawna'it yu k'ajap'ula'oximaj'ayat'it an lapanakni, ch'awaych'a k'ana'unt'it.

Pus wachuncha an Pablo tayalh chi jatamakyawnilhcha, jajuniy li kasa'ka talajkilhulh, chi jajuniy: —Jamacha'an Israel chi masi yu ntu an mila'acha'ank'an, pero yu k'iklak'a'iyat'it an Dios, k'a'asmatt'it.

An xDiosk'an xalapanakni Israel yucha an yu ta xjalhila'ts'inawi jasakxtulh. Wanaj lhuwi ja'ilhtulh akxni wa xtaama'wilananchalhka xalakaat'un Egipto, ta ntu la ixlakaat'unk'an, chi xli'astan la x'alhp'asninti an Dios jamaxtulhi an la xalakaat'un Egipto.
An Dios lhitayanilhi an xlakatijlak'an an lapanakni t'upuxam (40) k'ata, an lakaalakxixni lakaat'un.
An xalakaat'un Canaán lakatujun la'acha'ani lakt'ilhilh an Dios, para li an xlakaat'unk'an ani la'acha'anaxni yucha an yu tacha xjalhila'ts'inawi kajaxta'nikalh.

Tacha ani tapasalh katacha la'at'at'i ciento at'up'uxamkaw k'ata (450) ta'a'ma'alh. Xli'astan an Dios jaxta'nilhcha juesnini an israelitajnin sta akxni ixt'ajun an yu xlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, yu ixjunkan Samuel.

Wachuncha an lapanakni task'inlhi pumatam rey yu kajach'alhkatnanilh, pus an Dios jaxta'nilhcha an Saúl, para li yuchacha kawalh rey. An Saúl ists'alh tichi yucha yu ixjunkan Cis, yu ta xlila'ts'in an Benjamin. An Saúl t'up'uxam k'ata ch'alhkatnalh.

Xli'astan akxni ma'osukalhcha xlirey an Saúl, yucha an Davidcha jaxta'nicho'olh an lapanakni an Dios para li yuchacha kajuncho'olh rey, an Dios nawlh: —An David, ists'alh Isaí oxi iklhiwilay, mu yucha ka'ilhtuya chux yu kit'in klakask'in.
Pumatam yu yucha pu'a'p'unminchalh ani David yucha an Jesús, chi an Dios mala'achalhi an Jesús para li ka'alh jama'alhtaxtunu xalapanakni Israel, tacha ixnajuntacha li ka'ilhtuya an Dios.
Akxni ntuka' xmin an Jesús, an Juan xjalhixa'alaycha an xalapanakni Israel an ixchiwinti Dios, xjajuniy li katakiklaka'ilhcha an Dios chi li katalaj'a'paxlicha.

Chi akxni an Juan ix'ilhtu'ot'ajuncha an xtapatsat, nawlh: —Kit'in jantu yu an yu uxitnan p'ast'ak'at'it; pero xli'astan kamina pumatam yu masi wa ak'ukxmala'xtunilhcha ixwarachi kit'in jantu k'is ikt'acha'an.
T'ala'awnin, yu p'u'a'p'unt'ant'achi'it an Abraham chi wachu uxitnan masi yu ntu Israelitajnin, pero yu k'iklak'a'iyat an Dios, aniy chiwinti yu puta'alhtaxtukan yucha para kitnan.

Mu an yu xtawilanalh la'acha'an Jerusalén, chi an xlakjamach'alhkatnik'an, jantu tamispalhi an Jesús chi ntu talhimacha'xalhi an xchiwintik'an an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, yu xpunawkan an laka cha'a tan tata'ayxt'o'a an lapanakni akxni jantu tapatsakan wilhchan. Xliyu akxni tama'nilhi an Jesús wa yu'unchacha tamuktaxtulh tacha an xnawkanta li katapasaya'.
Chi masi ntu k'is tu'u tala'cha'aninilh para li katama'nilhcha, tajunilhi an Pilato li kalhinawlhcha li kama'nikalh.
Wachuncha akxni ta'ilhtu'olhcha tacha an ixnajunta tan sts'o'muk'akanta li katapasaniya an Jesús, tama'alhtajucho'olhcha an laka cruz chi tamaknulhcha.
Pero an Dios mala'awnicho'olh.

Chi la'alhuw wilhchani an Jesús jatalakasunitsukulh an lapanakni yu xtat'a'anta la'acha'an Jerusalén, akxni tat'aminchalh sta xalakaat'un Galilea. Pus yu'uncha tala'ts'ilhi an Jesús chi chaway talhichiwiniycha la ix'ukxlakapuk'an an lapanakni.
Kitnan chaway klamak'atsaanit'awnaw an laj'oxi chiwinti yu an Dios jajunilh an yu ta xjalhila'ts'inaw li kamuktaxtuya'.

Chaway kitnancha kintamuktaxtunin, mu kitnancha xajas'at'an. Muktaxtuycha an Dios, mu mala'awnicho'olhcha an Jesús, tacha an ts'o'muk'akanta an la xchiwinti, tan junkan salmo segundo, tan najunta: "Uxint'i kints'alhk'at'i, mu kit'in chaway ikmala'awnicho'oncha."
An Dios ixnajuntacha li kamala'awnicho'oya', para li an ixlakatunaj jantu kalakp'uch'ilh, akxni nawlh: "Ak'ilhtuya sawalhi an laj'oxi chiwinti yu ijkunilh an David li ak'ilhtuya'."
Xliyu wachu an lakatam wachu nawpalata: "Jant'u k'at'imak'awi li kalakp'uch'ilh an ixlakatunaj amilapanak yu sakxt'u, yu t'atapatsayan."

Pus chun sawalh akxni ixt'ajun an David jatapatsanilhi an ali'in, tacha xlijunita an Dios li ka'ilhtulh, chi xli'astan nilhcha, pus jala'cha'ancho'olhcha an xpaynin, chi an ixlakatunaj lakp'uch'ilhcha.
Pero an ixlakatunaj an pumatam an yu Dios mala'awnicho'olh, yucha ntu lakp'uch'ilh.
Pus chaway k'ak'ats'at'itcha aniya t'ala'awnin, yucha an Jesusi p'umak'ats'aanik'anat'it li layi k'amala'mixinik'ana'it'it mintala'alhink'an.
Li k'iklak'a'iyat'iti an Jesús yuch'a k'ap'umala'mixinik'ana'it'it wa tuchicha mintala'alhink'an, yu nt'u lay mala'mixinik'ant'it an la xlamap'a'sin Moisés.
Pus k'ajalajk'ats'anant'it, para li ntu uxitnani ch'unch'a k'ap'ut'ap'asat tacha an tats'o'lhi an yu ma'anchacha xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, tan najunta:

"Uxitnan yu ntu k'is tu'u jalhiwilanant'it, k'alhak'ap'up'it'itcha, chi k'alhi'a'nit'itcha chi k'alaknit'itcha. Mu chaway ani panch'e'ex t'awnat'it kit'in k'ilhtuy la'atam tapatsat yu ntu k'is k'at'ik'iklak'a'it'iti masi xamati katajunan".

Akxni an Pablo chi an xt'alhtanan tataxtucho'olhcha an laka cha'a an tan tata'ayxt'o'a an lapanakni, an lapanakni tajuniy li ma akxni kachimpala wilhchan yu ntu putapatsakan ma a'tam katalhichiwimpalhi ani laktanlhun.

Pus akxni la'olhcha an lakchiwinti an laka cha'a, xluwk'an an judiojnin chi an yu wachucha judiojnin tajunlhi masi yu'uncha ntu Judea tatsukulh, tach'a'o'alhcha an Pablo chi an Bernabé. Chi yu'uncha tat'alajunilhcha li katach'a'o'a'alhilhcha sawalhi an Dios, mu yucha jat'asanij, mu jamapayni.
Akxni chimpalhcha wilhchan yu ntu putapatsakan, wanajcha lanan lhichux an la'acha'ani tata'ayxto'lhi an lapanakni para li kata'asmatlhicha an ixchiwinti Dios.
Pero an judiojnin, mu tala'ts'incha li wanajcha lhilhuw, pus talhitalh'amalhcha, tsukulhcha ta'alhapu'iyawniya an xchiwinti an Pablo, chi wa aya xtajunicha.

Pus wachuncha an Pablo chi an Bernabé, jo'ati tachiwinilh, ta'alhtaylh tat'alajuniy: —Kitnan lhitask'iniya li aklamak'atsaniwi an ixchiwinti Dios uxitnan p'ulhnaj, mu uxitnan judiojnin, pero li uxitnan jant'u asmatp'ut'unat'it ch'i li lhi'ilht'uyat'iti li nt'u t'ach'ip'inat'iti li k'alhits'uk'ut'it an jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy, ak'anawcha tan tu judiojnin tawilanalh.

Mu chuncha kintalhijunin an Dios. Yucha kintajunin: "Uxint'i k'ulatan tachanu jatapulhkunu para ixchuxk'an an yu ntu judiojnin, para li k'ajalhip'inini yu kataputa'alhtaxtuya', wa tanchuncha masi ma'at aniy lakaat'un."

Akxni chunchacha ta'asmatlhi, an yu ntu judiojnin talaj'achalhcha, chi tsukulhcha talaknajuni li an ixchiwinti Dios oxi, pus takiklaka'ilhcha ixchuxk'an an yu xjalhisakxtukanta li katalhitsukuya jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy.
Chi an xchiwinti an Dios wanajcha ta'a'pitsi'olhi ta xlijalhi'ay anchunu lakaat'un.

Pero an judiojnin tat'achiwinilh ali'in t'akunin yu xtapuxkajuy an Dios chi an yu xalaj'ajincha lapanakni xjalhiwilakan anchunu la'acha'an, para li kajach'a'o'akalhi an Pablo chi an Bernabé chi kajatamakxtukalhcha anchunu la'acha'an.
Pus wachuncha an Pablo chi an Bernabé talakch'ank'alhap'uxkalhi an po'xmi para li katala'ts'ilhi an lapanakni li ntu oxi tacha an talay, chi ta'alhcha la'acha'an Iconio.
Chi an xt'alhtanan an Jesús sawalhcha xtalhit'ajuni an Stalan'a Takuwin chi sawalhcha xtalaj'achan.

An la'acha'ancha Iconio, an Pablo chi an Bernabé wa ayxtamcha tatanuchalh an laka cha'a tan ixtaputa'ayxt'o'a an judiojnin chi xluwk'ani takiklaka'ilh an yu judiojnin chi an yu ntu judiojnin an tacha talhichiwinilh.
Pero an judiojnin an yu ntu xtajakiklaka'inin ta'ilhtulhi li an yu ntu judiojnin katat'alaxkaylhi an t'ala'awnin.

Pero an Pablo chi an Bernabé ma'ani ancha xtawilanalh, jantu xtatalhanani xtalhichiwiniy an ixchiwinti Dios, mu xtakiklaka'iya li an Dios ancha xjat'a'aklat'ajun. Xmasuyi an Dios li an yu ixtanajun, sawalh, mu an Pablo chi an Bernabé xjapu'ilhtuycha an Dios tanlhun yu la'lhi'a'nin, chi laycha xtajak'uch'unun.
An lapanakni yu ancha jamacha'an xtatala'apitsitacha, an ali'in xtat'a'ancha an yu judiojnin chi an ali'in yu'uncha an Pablojcha chi an Bernabé.
Pus akxni an yu judiojnin ali an yu ntu judiojnin tat'atamakawlhcha an jamach'alhkatni li kajalhitama'chapukanacha chi kajalakt'alhmakanacha an Pablo chi an Bernabé.
Walh yu'uncha tak'atsaalh, pus ta'alhcha la'acha'an Listra chi Derbe, xala'acha'anaxni an xalakaat'un Licaonia, chi alicha la'acha'anaxni yu anchacha xlak'alin.
Wachu talhichiwinilhi ancha an laj'oxi chiwinti.
An la'acha'an Listra ixt'ajun pumatam lapanak yu ntu lay xjalhtanan. Jantu a'tam xjalhtananta, mu wa ch'anlh'awilhi ixjunita, wachunchacha xla'ajunta. Aniy lapanak sa' xwilh,
x'asmatt'ajun yu xnawt'ajun an Pablo, walh an Pablo lhakapu'alh chi la'ts'ilhi li layi katak'uch'ulh, mu xjakiklaka'inin.
Pus an Pablo p'ascha junilh: —¡K'at'aycha ts'awjcha k'ap'ut'ay aminch'aja'! An lapanak t'ujcha tayalh chi tsukulhcha jalhtanan.

Akxni an lapanakni tala'ts'ilhcha tacha an ilhtulh an Pablo, tsukulhcha talakt'asay, xtalaknajuncha xlichiwink'an an de Licaonia: —¡Kintala'chintan diosnin yu wa tacha lapanakni, talhmani tamintachalh!
Chi an Bernabé talhimapa'a'ulhcha ma dios Jupiter, chi an Pablo ma dios Mercuriojcha, mu yucha yu xchiwiniy.
Chi an xasacerdote jupiter, yu xyalh xtajtan la xlakapu an la'acha'an, jalhimilhcha torojnin chi xanti, para li yucha ali an lapanakni katalha'ulananilhcha an Pablo chi an Bernabé.
Pero an Bernabé chi an Pablo tak'atsaalh, chi yu'uncha tala'lh'alhi an xla'ch'itk'an chi tapujatanulhi an lapanakni, p'ascha tanajun:

¡Lapanakni, ¿t'asu li ch'unch'ach'a layat'iti? kitnan wa lapanakni, tacha uxitnan, kitnan xliyu iklhimintaw li aklamak'atsaaniw an laj'oxi chiwinti, para li k'amak'a'unt'itcha aniy tanlhun yu ntu tu'u lhitapalay, chi li k'ak'iklak'a'it'itcha an Dios yu la'ajunta, yu ilhtulh an lakt'iyan chi an lakaat'un, chi an alamalh chi chux yu ancha lak'alin!
Masi minchalhcha panch'e'ex an Dios makawlhi li atamj atamj kalalhcha wa tani laputuncha,

pero ntu a'tami ntucha kamasulhi tichini yuchacha yucha, tacha an laj'oxi tanlhun x'ilhtuy; mu yucha yu tamakminiyan an xkan chi li oxi kalak'alilh an jach'ananti, chi yucha yu taxta'niyan li lhuwi ka'alilh yu k'a'ut'it chi k'alaj'ach'ant'it.
Pero masi chunchacha tajunilh an lapanakni, sawalhcha lhima'anxkayi talhiwilalh an Pablo chi an Bernabé para li an lapanakni jantu kataja'ulananilh.

Chi wa akxni tacha'alhcha tichi yu'uncha judiojnin jamacha'an Antioquía chi jamacha'an Iconio, chi yu'unchacha ta'ilhtulh li tamcha katapastaklhi an lapanakni; pus talakat'alhmalhcha an Pablo, chi mu talhi'ilhtulh li tama'nilhcha, taxa'axtulhcha an la'acha'an.

Pero akxni an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha tata'ayxto'lhicha xtuntala'acho'o an tan xmalh an Pablo, yucha ostayalhcha chi tanupalhchalhcha a'tami an la'acha'an, chi akxni tunkunchalhcha ta'alhcha ali an Bernabé la'acha'an Derbe. p
Akxni jamak'atsaaninin'olhcha an laj'oxi chiwinti an la'acha'an Derbe, tan wanaj lhuw tajakiklaka'inilh, ta'ancho'olhcha la'acha'an Listra chi Iconio chi Antioquía.

Ani la'acha'anaxni tat'alamachapulhi an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha, xtat'alajuni li oxi katataylhi'alh an la xjakiklaka'intik'an, tat'alajuni li para lay tanukanachalh an la xlich'alhkat Dios lhuw tanlhuni ma'alh'ajnankan.

Chi an Pablo chi an Bernabé talhka'ulapalh yu laktatanincha para li katala'ts'ilhi'alhcha an ixlapanakni Dios. Chi akxni tatapayni'olhcha chi tatask'aja'olhcha jantu xtawajin, an Pablo chi an Bernabé tama'anxta'nilhcha an Dios an lapanakni an yu jalhka'ulakalh, mu yucha an Diosi yu xtakiklaka'iy.
Yu'uncha tala'puslicha xalakaat'un Pisidia chi tacha'alhcha xalakaat'un Panfilia.
Talhichiwinilhcha an ixchiwinti Dios an la'acha'an Perge chi xli'astan ta'alhcha an la'acha'an Atalía;

chi ancha tapu'alhcha barco la'acha'an Antioquía tan xtataxtunitachalh akxni ta'alhcha ilhtunin an tapatsat yu ta'ilhtu'olhcha, ancha tan xjajunkanta li Dioscha kaja'a'tayjulh para li kataki'ilhtulhi an tapatsat yu taki'ilhtu'olhcha.

Akxni tacha'alhcha Antioquía tama'ayxto'lhicha an yu xtajakiklaka'inin, chi tat'alajun'olhcha chux tacha an Dios japu'ilhtulh, chi li an Dios wachu tachanu jamalhti'anilhi an malhticha para li lay katajakiklaka'inilh an yu ntu judiojnin.
Chi an Pablo chi an Bernabé ma'ancha tat'atamakawlh ancha an yu xtajakiklaka'inin.

Tichi yu'uncha lapanakni yu xtamintachalh xalakaat'un Judea, tacha'alhi la'acha'an Antioquía. Chi tsukulhcha tamasuniya an t'ala'awnin li ma ntu katitata'alhtaxtulhi li ntu jalaj'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkani x'a'axt'a'ak'an, tacha najunta an la xlamap'a'sin Moisés.

An Pablo chi an Bernabé yu'uncha ntu xtala'a'iya tacha ani xtamasuy an tichi yu'uncha lapanakni, stak tat'alakikxtukulh, wachuncha, t'atawlhkanchalhi li an Pablo chi an Bernabé chi ali'incha, kata'alhi la'acha'an Jerusalén, para li katakit'ach'iwinilhi an yu xjamala'achata Jesús chi an yu laktatanincha, yu xalaj'ajin, ixlakata an yu talalhikixtukuy.

Pus jamala'achakalhcha, yu'uncha an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha tajamala'achaninilh, chi akxni xtala'pust'ajuncha xalakaat'un Fenicia chi Samaria ixtanajuncha li an yu ntu judiojnin tamakawlhcha yu xtakiklaka'iy p'ulhnaj, para li katach'a'o'alhcha an Dios. Pus ixchuxk'an an t'ala'awnin sawalhcha xtalaj'acha'ni akxni chunchacha tak'atsaalh.

Akxni an Pablo chi an Bernabé tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Jerusalén, an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha chi an yu xjamala'achata Jesús chi an laktatanincha oxi tala'a'ilh. Chi yu'uncha tanaw'olhcha chux yu an Dios jat'a'ilhtulh.

Pero ali'in lapanakni an yu xjajunkan fariseojnin, yu xtajakiklaka'ininta, tatayalh, tanajun: —Lhitask'iniya li kajalaj'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkalhi ix'a'axt'a'ak'an an yu ntu judiojnin yu tajakiklaka'inintacha, chi kajajunikalhi li kata'ilhtulhi an xlamap'a'sin an Moisés.
Pus wachuncha tata'ayxto'lhicha an yu xjamala'achata Jesús chi an laktatanincha, para li oxicha katalhilakchiwinilh an yu talalhikikxtukuy.

Xli'astan akxni stakcha lalhikikxtukukalh, an Pedro tayalhcha chi jajuniy: —T'ala'awinin, uxitnan k'ats'ayat'iti li ma'anchacha an Dios kisakxtulhi de kitnan, para li ajkamak'atsaanilhi an laj'oxi chiwinti an yu ntu judiojnin, para li yu'uncha katajakiklaka'inilh.
Chi mu an Dios yucha mispa'ojoyi chux jalhunut, yucha masulhi li wachu jala'a'i, mu jaxta'nilhi an Stalan'a Takuwin tacha kitnan kintaxta'nin.
An Dios tu tu'u najun li yu'uncha tamj chi kitnan tamcha, yu'uncha wachu jamastalan'anilhi xjalhunutk'an, mu tajakiklaka'inilhcha.
Pus chaway, ¿tasu li wa lhila'ts'inatcha an Dios li ja'unatcha ani yu tajakiklaka'inincha li katak'uk'alhcha ts'ink'i tak'uk'at yu an ta xjalhila'ts'inaw chi kitnan tu lay lhi'anawi?
Jantu chun, kitnan k'atsayawi li ntu tu'u ilhtutaw masi ta'alhtaxtutawcha, ta'alhtaxtutaw wa xliyu an Jamach'alhkat Jesús kintamapayniyan, tacha jamapayni yu'uncha.
Pus wachuncha wanaj sa' talajkilhun'olh, chi xta'asmat'acha tacha ixtanajun an Pablo chi an Bernabé, li an Dios xjapu'ilhtuycha tanlhun yu sawalh la'lhi'a'nin an tan xtawilanalh an yu ntu judiojnin.
Akxni tachiwin'olhcha an Jakobo, najun: —T'ala'awnin, akila'asmatniw,
an Simón kintajunincha tacha an Dios oxi wachu ja'ilhtuy wa xlikutsajka an yu ntu judiojnin, wachu jasakxtuyi yu yu'uncha para li katawalhi xjas'at'an.
Tacha ani tapasay, ts'ajwi t'ala'an tacha an tats'o'lhi an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, tan najunta:
Xli'astan akmincho'oya chi akla'oxicho'oya an ixcha'a David yu ta'a'talh. Akla'oxicho'oya an yu tilaktamakawwilh, oxi ak'ilhtucho'oya',
para li an ali'in akintapuxkawlh chi ta kilhmakchux lapanak yu ikjasakxtuta li katamispalh kinta'a'ut.
Chuncha najun an Dios yu lak'ilhtuy ani laktanlhun, yu wa ma'anchacha lakmispakan.
Pus yu kit'in iknajun, an yu ntu judiojnin yu tamakajuncha yu xtakiklaka'iy xlip'ulhnaj chi tach'a'o'aycha Dios, jantu layi katijajunkalhcha li kata'ilhtulhi tu'u yu ntu lhitask'ini.

Oxicha li jats'o'nikancha li ntucha kata'ilhtulhi yu jasmala'aninin, ixlakatak'an an tacha la'laa'oxikanta yu tacha ixdioschak'an xtala'ts'in, chi li ntucha katalaxa'alalhi yu ntu talat'at'ajun, chi li ntucha kata'ulhi jatapakxat yu wa aksk'anj'uta chi an xak'alhni tu'u jatapakxat.
Mu ma'anchacha ta'alin lakatamin la'acha'anaxni, yu talhichiwiniy an xlamap'a'sin Moisés chi tamin sábado punawkani yu yucha an laka lakcha'a tan puta'ayxto'kan.

Wachuncha an xjamala'achata Jesús chi an laktatanincha chi ixchuxk'an an yu xtajakiklaka'inin, tasakxtulhi lapanakni yu de yu'uncha para li katat'amak'alhcha la'acha'an Antioquía an Pablo chi an Bernabé. Yu sakxtukalh yucha an Judas yu xtajumpalay ma Barsabás chi pumatam yucha an Silas. Aniy lapanakni xtalhitapalayi tacha an xtat'ajun t'ala'a'wnin.

Chi yu'unchacha japumala'achakalh aniy cartaj: —"Kitnan yu kintamala'achayan an Jesús chi an laktatanincha mijat'ala'awnink'ani uxitnan, ijkala'axa'alayawi an t'ala'awnin yu ntu judiojnin yu tawilanalh la'acha'an Antioquía chi xalakaat'un Siria chi xalakaat'un Cilicia.
Ijk'atsayawi li tichi yu'uncha lapanakni yu ntu kitnan ijkamala'achaw, aniya tataxtulh, chi li sawalhcha tama'achapuyani uxitnan la xchiwintik'an, chi li tamala'a'o'xcho'oyancha.
Xliyu iklhipastakkwi mu chuncha yu oxi iklhiwilaw li ajkalhka'ulaw lapanakni yu kitnan para li kata'ancha'an la'ts'inin ali an yu sawalhcha oxi ijkalhiwilayaw kint'ala'awnink'an Bernabé chi an Pablo.
Yu'uncha an xjatsukuntik'an wa k'is k'ischa tata'alhtaxtulh ixlakata an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo.
Pus klamak'aniyacha'awi an Judas chi an Silas, yu'unchacha katajunan la xkilhnik'an chux aniy tanlhun.
Mu an xTakuwin Dios chi kitnan oxi iklhiwilayaw li ntucha ali k'amak'uk'ak'ant'iti ali tanlhun, kalayantacha t'ach'a ani unk'anat'it,

li nt'uch'a k'a'ut'iti an lhiway yu xja'ulanikantacha an yu tacha ixdioschak'an tala'ts'in an lapanakni. Ch'i li nt'uch'a k'a'unit'iti xak'alhni tu'u jatapakxat, chi yu wa aksk'anj'uta jatapakxat, ch'i li nt'uch'a k'ajaxa'alat'iti yu nt'u t'at'awnat'it. Li ch'unch'ach'a k'a'ilht'uya'it aniy tanlhun, oxich'a k'ats'uk'uya'it'it. Iklala'axa'alayaw".
Pus akxni tajala'axa'alanan'olhcha, ta'alhcha la'acha'an Antioquía, chi akxni tacha'alhcha, tama'ayxto'lhicha an t'ala'awnin chi taxta'nilhcha an carta.
Akxni an t'ala'awnin tapunawlhcha, sawalhcha xtalaj'achan, mu xjama'oximaj'ayaycha tacha an ixnajunta.
Chi mu an Judas chi an Silas wachu ixchiwinti Diosi xtalhichiwiniy, pus sawalhcha tama'oximaj'ayalh chi sawalhcha tamachapulhi an t'ala'awnin an la xchiwintik'an.
Chi alhcha panch'e'ex ancha xtat'ajun, an yu ancha jamacha'an t'ala'awnin tamala'achacho'olhcha lakalaj'oxi chiwinti, para li kata'ancho'olhcha tan tawilananchalh yu tamala'achalh.
Pero an Silas yucha oxicha lhiwilalh li anchacha katamakawlh.
Chi an Pablo chi an Bernabé yu'uncha la'acha'an Antioquiajcha tatamakawlh, ixtamasuy ali chi xtalhichiwiniy ali an ixchiwinti Dios, ali an ali'in lapanakni.
Alhcha panch'e'ex, an Pablo juniy an Bernabé: —Ka'ampalawcha jala'pixiyalhnin an t'ala'awnin ta lakachux an la'acha'anaxni tan lhichiwintawcha an ixchiwinti Dios, para li kak'atsawi tani tat'ajuncha.
An Bernabé ixnajun li kaxjat'a'alh an Juan yu xtajumpalay ma Marcos,
pero an Pablo najun li ntu ka'alh, mu an Marcos an la'acha'an Panfilia wa xjat'alamakajunta chi ntucha ali xjat'ataylhi'anta an tapatsat.
Pus yuchacha ixlakata li ntu wa tam tapastaklhi, an Pablo chi an Bernabé talamakawlhcha. An Bernabé t'a'alhcha an Marcos, tapu'alhcha barco la'cha'an Chipre,
chi an Pablo yucha an Silascha t'atala'xto'lhi. Chi xli'astan an t'ala'awnin tapayninilhcha an Dios para oxi kaamapaynilhi an Pablo, chi ancha tataxtulhcha,
xalakaat'un Siria chi Ciliciaja tala'puschalh, xtat'alamachapuycha an t'ala'awnin yu ancha jamacha'an, yu ancha xtala'ta'ayxt'o'a.

Xli'astan an Pablo cha'alhcha la'acha'an Derbe chi lakatam la'acha'an tan junkan Listra, ani la'acha'an la'cha'alh pumatam yu xjakiklaka'inin, ixjunkan Timoteo, ists'alh tichi yucha t'aku judia yu xjakiklaka'inin chi yu xpay griego.
An t'ala'awnin yu jamacha'an Listra chi jamacha'an Iconio oxi xtalhichiwiniy an Timoteo.

Pus an Pablo oxi lhiwilalh li kat'a'alh, pero p'ulhnaj ilhtulhi li ka'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxk'alh an x'a'axt'a'a, ixlakatak'an an jamacha'an Judea yu ancha xtalakwilanalh, mu ixchuxk'ani xtak'atsay li an xpay an Timoteo jamacha'a Grecia.
Ta lakachux la'acha'an xtala'pus'anta, tamak'atsaanilhi an t'ala'awnin an xlamap'a'sink'an an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús chi an laktatanincha yu xtat'awnachalh Jerusalén.
Pus ta kilhmakchux tacha an xtata'ayxt'o'acha an yu xtakiklaka'icha Dios, oxicha xtajakiklaka'inin, chi palay palay xtatalhawayi an yu xtajakiklaka'inin tamin wilhchan.
Chi mu an Stalan'a Takuwin jantu jamakawnilhi li katalhichiwinilhi an ixchiwinti Dios an xala'acha'anaxni Asia, pus ta'alhcha xala'acha'anaxni Frigia chi la'acha'an Galacia.
Chi akxni tacha'alhcha tanchun xalakaat'un Misia, de ancha xtak'uxa'ancha xalakaat'un Bitinia, pero an xTakuwin Jesús jantu jamakawnilh.
Pus wa wak tala'pusli xalakaat'un Misia, ta'alhcha la'acha'an Troas.

Ancha an Pablo, puts'ista jala'awanalh, tan la'ts'ilh pumatam lapanak jamacha'a Macedonia, anchacha sa' xyalh chi xtapaynisk'inikancha an Pablo ixjunkan: —"K'at'at'i la'acha'an Macedonia chi akilalhi'a'tayju".

Akxni chunchacha la'ts'ilh an Pablo, xli'astan watukan ikmala'asijniwi para li ak'aw la'acha'an Macedonia, mu oxicha xajk'atsayaw li yucha an Diosi kixtat'asaniyan para li ancha aklhichiwiniw an laj'oxi chiwinti.
Pus la'acha'ancha Troas xakt'awnaw, ikpu'awcha barco lakatam lakaat'un yu la'acho'oni'ojoy xkan ixjunkan Samotracia, chi tunkunchalh ik'awcha la'acha'an Neápolis;

chi de ancha ik'awcha la'acha'an Filipos, ani la'acha'an Filipos yucha yu palay xlitapalay an xalakaat'un Macedonia chi yucha la'atam la'acha'an tan xtawilanalh yu jamacha'an Roma, anchacha xakt'awnaw lanan la'alhuw wilhchan.

La'atam sábado iktaxtuw ma'spa an la'acha'an, ik'awcha waniy lakatam ayxkan, tan a'tajcha xtapaynikan, chi ancha, iklaktawlawcha, chi xajkalhixa'alayawcha an ixchiwinti Dios an t'akunin yu ancha xta'ayxto'nun.

Xapumatam ani t'akunin ixjunkan Lidia, jamacha'a Tiatira, yucha ist'ay la'ch'it yu xtapalh la'lhuw, chi mu ixkiklaka'iya an Dios, sa'cha ix'asmat'a an yu xaknawt'awnaw, walh an Jamach'alhkat Dios malhti'anilhi an xjalhunut, para li sawalhcha kalhakapu'alhi an yu xnawt'ajun an Pablo.

Akxni a'paxlicha an Lidia wanaj jat'a'a'pax'olhi chux yu ta jalhila'ts'in, chi xli'astan sawalhcha kintatapayninin kintajunan: —Li nawnatchaa li ijkiklaka'icha sawalhi an Dios, k'at'atcha tamakawnini an la kincha'a'. Pus kintamatanunini ak'aw tamakawnin an laxcha'a'.

A'tam walh, akxni xakti'anaw an tan tapaynikan, ikpaxto'wi pumatam jatsi yu ixlhit'ajun la'atam takuwin yu xpala'ts'ikutunun. Ani jatsi wa xputapatsakancha, mu esclavaja ixjunita, xjalhit'ajun xpatronin yu wanajcha la'lhuw tumini xtapulhajay li xla'ts'ikutunicha tu'u xamati'.

An Pablo chi kitnan tsukulhcha kintach'a'o'ayani an jatsi', chi p'ascha ixt'asay ixnajun: —¡Aniy lapanakni yucha an Dios yu wilhchalh talhmani tat'atapatsay, tamak'atsaaniyani an tij yu puta'alhtaxtukan!

Chi mu wanajcha la'alhuw wilhchani chuncha xlay, pus an Pablo ja'scha mawalh, chi juniy an makxkay'un, an yu ixlakpach'apay an jatsi: —¡La ixtalakask'i an Jesucristo ijkunan k'amak'awcha an jatsi'! Pus wanaj wa akxni, an makxkay'un makawlhcha an jatsi'.
Pero akxni an xpatronin an jatsi tala'ts'ilhcha li ntucha lay ali katitapulhajalh, tach'apayawlhcha an Pablo chi an Silas, talhi'anilhcha an jamach'alhkatni an ixtan'ajni la'acha'an.
La xlakapucha an jueznini jalhicha'ankalh, chi tanajun an yu xtalhi'anta an Pablo chi an Silas: —Aniy lapanakni yu'uncha judiojnin chi wa tachiwiwayi an lapanakni ani kila'acha'ank'an,
chi tanlhuncha tamasuy yu kitnan jantu katimakaju li chunchacha ka'ilhtukalh, mu kitnan jamacha'an Roma.

Pus wachuncha an lapanakni tala'talh'amalhcha, jaxkaykalhcha an Pablo chi an Silas, an jueznin talhinawlhcha li kajala'la'a'exkalhcha an xla'ch'itk'an chi li kajala'na'makalhcha laka lakmakat'ikt'i k'iw.
Akxni stakcha jala'na'ma'okalh jamakawkalhcha, chi lhijunkalhcha an yu xjamalaklhchawnan laka pulach'in li oxi kajalhistaklhi.
An yu xjamalaklhchawninin akxni chunchacha lhijunikalh, jakitamaknulhcha tan wa anchacha juntachalh pulakni an laka pulach'in chi jalakch'ampa'asi'ulalhcha laka k'iw.
Walh ka tacha xjaytatnant'ajuncha, akxni an Pablo chi an Silas xtatapaynit'ajun chi xtalakmilhpanit'ajun an Dios, an ali'in tach'inin wa sa'cha xta'alha'asmat'a.

Walh wa akxni p'asi laklalh an lakaat'un, wanaj lakchikix'olhi an xjach'aja an pulach'in. Chi wachuncha wanaj la'tati'a'olhi an xamalhticha an pulach'in, chi wanaj la'tax'ot'olhi an cadenaj an yu xjapulakch'i'ulakanta ta ixchuxk'an an tach'inin.
Wachuncha akxni kujlhi an yu xjamalaklhchawninin chi xla'la'ts'incha an malhticha li xla'ti'a'ojoy, matakutulhi an x'espada chi xma'niputunkancha, mu ixnajun li sna ta'os'olhcha an tach'inin.
Pero an Pablo p'asi xa'alalh, juniy: —¡Jant'u t'ani k'a'ilht'uk'a, mu iktanuma'ojo!
