Pus wachuncha an jamalaklhchawna sk'inlhi jatapulhkunu chi jats'alajtanulhcha pulakni, wa xk'ip'ip'icha xlay la xtalhanti chi jatatso'ottatawlhnilhcha laxjach'ajak'an an Pablo chi an Silas.
Chi xli'astan jamaxtulhcha chi jajuniy an Pablo chi an Silas: —¿Tasicha aklalh para li akta'alhtaxtulh?
An Pablo chi an Silas tajuniy: —Wa k'ak'iklak'a'it'icha an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, walh k'at'a'alht'axt'uya'a chi chux yu t'a jalhila'ts'in.
Chi an yu xjamalaklhchawninin talhixa'alalhcha an ixchiwinti Dios chi chux yu xtawilanalh la ixcha'a'.
Wa yucha anchunu xapanch'e'ex jatats'isni, an jamalaklhchawnini jala'ch'a'anilhcha tan xtalajk'atsanini an Pablo chi an Silas. Chi xli'astan, yucha, chi chux an yu ta xjalhila'ts'in talaj'a'paxlicha.
Wachuncha an yu xjamalaklhchawninin, jalhi'alhcha an Pablo chi an Silas la ixcha'a chi jamawalhcha, chi chux an yu ta xjalhila'ts'in sawalhcha xtalaj'achan wa xliyu takiklaka'ilhcha an Dios.
Tunkunchalhcha wats'isin, an juesnin tamala'achanilhi policiajnin an yu xjamalaklhchawninin tan tajuniy li kajamakawlhcha an Pablo chi an Silas.
An yu ixjamalaklhchawninin juniy an Pablo: —An juesnin kintamak'atsaani li ma aklamakajucha, pus chaway laych'a k'ap'inch'o'ot'it, jantu tu'u alin.

Pero an Pablo jajuniy an yu xjamala'acha'kanta policiajnin: —Li stakcha kintala'na'makani tan lhilhuw kintala'ts'inkanan masi ntu p'ulhnajcha la'ts'inkalhi li tu'u tala'alhini k'ilhtuyaw chi kintamalaklhchawkancha masi kitnan wachu Romanojnin, ¿chaway wa la'asa'cha kintamakawcho'okanan? ¡Jantu!, wanaj yu'uncha akintamin maxtunin.
Pus wachuncha an policiajnin chunchacha tamak'atsaanilh an juesnin tacha an tanawlh an Pablo chi an Silas, pus xtalaktalhanancha, mu tak'atsaalhcha li wachu Romanojnin.
Chi xli'astan an juesnin tala'alhcha an Pablo chi an Silas, ixtask'incha laamala'mixin, chi jamaxtukalhcha an Pablo chi an Silas, xjatapaynisk'inikancha li ma katataxtulhcha an la'acha'an.
Akxni tataxtulhcha laka pulach'in an Pablo chi an Silas, ta'alhcha la ixcha'a an Lidia, chi tat'alakila'ts'ilhcha an t'ala'awnin, takit'alama'oximaj'ayalhcha, xli'astan ta'alhcha.
Akxni tala'puslicha an Pablo chi an Silas la'acha'an Anfípolis chi la'acha'an Apolonia, tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Tesalónica, tan xyalh a'atam cha'a yu xtaputa'ayxt'o'a an judiojnin.
Chi an Pablo, mu chunchacha xlismanita, pus jala'alhi an tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a, chi la'at'utu sábadojo xjat'alakikxtukut'ajun. An Pablo an la ixchiwinti Diosi xla'ts'ilhi'anta.
Ixjajuniya li an Cristo xlitask'iniya li kaxnilh chi ixli'astan kala'awcho'oya tacha tapasalhcha. Ixjajuniy: —Aniy Jesús yu klalhixa'alayaw yucha Cristo.

Ali'in an judiojnin takiklaka'ilh, pus tach'a'o'alhcha an Pablo chi an Silas. Wachu xluwk'ani an yu tachiwiniy lhigriego takiklaka'ilh, yu xtatapayniniy an Dios, chi xluwk'ancha t'akunin yu xjalhila'sikan.

Pero tacha ani xtapasay, an judiojnin yu ntu xtajakiklaka'inin talhaxkayanalhcha, chi tama'ayxto'lhicha lapanakni yu wa ay xtajunita, yu wa xtalaktijuntsukuycha lakalaktij, para li katala'talh'amalhcha chi katajalaktilhnilhcha an la'acha'an. Atumpaj tacha'alhcha an la ixcha'a Jasón, xtapuxkajuycha an Pablo chi an Silas, para li katamaxtulhcha chi katama'axta'nilhcha an lapanakni.

Pero mu ntu tala'cha'alhi ancha, yu'uncha an Jasón chi ali'incha t'ala'awnini jala'xa'alhi'ankalh tan xtawilananchalh an xajamach'alhkatni an la'acha'an, ixtanajun: —¡Aniy lapanakni yu wanajcha ta xlijalhi'ay an lakaamunulhpa tajalakt'ilhi'ulanan, wachucha taminta aniy,
chi aniy Jasón la ixcha'acha ja'ulata! ¡xchuxk'an ani lapanakni jantu ta'ilhtuyi tacha an najun xlamap'a'sin an ay jamach'alhkat, yu'uncha tanajun li ma t'awpalay pumatam rey, ma Jesusi junkan!
Akxni chunchacha ta'asmatlhi an lapanakni chi an jamach'alhkatni jantucha k'is oxi talhiwilalh.
Pero an Jasón chi an ali'in jamakawkalh, mu tamakawlh tumin chi tanajun li ntu katita'osli.
Akxni puts'istacha ixjunita, an t'ala'awnin watukan tamala'achalhi an Pablo chi an Silas la'acha'an Berea. Wa tacha tacha'alh, ta'alhcha an laka cha'a tan ixtata'axt'o'a an judiojnin.

Chi ani judiojnin mu yu'uncha palay oxi xtajalakpastaknan, jantu tacha an jamacha'an Tesalónica, pus sawalhcha oxi talhiwilalh an ixchiwinti Dios, chi lhilhiji xtapunajun an ixchiwinti Dios, para li katak'atsaalh li sawalhi an yu xjajunkan.
Pus wanajcha xluwk'ani yu yu'uncha tajakiklaka'inilh, chi wachu xluwk'ani tajakiklaka'inilh an jamacha'an Grecia, t'akunin yu xjalhiwilakan chi lapanakni.

Pero akxni an judiojnin yu jamacha'an Tesalónica tak'atsaalhi li an Pablo wachu xlichiwiniya an ixchiwinti Dios an la'acha'an Berea, ta'alhi ancha chi tsukulhcha tama'talh'amani an lapanakni chi xtajalaktilhnincha.
Wachuncha an t'ala'awnin watukan tamala'achalhi an Pablo la xkilhtu an alamalh, pero an Silas chi an Timoteo ancha tatamakawlh Berea.
Yu tat'a'alh an Pablo tat'acha'alhi sta la'acha'an Atenas. Xli'astan akxni tamincho'ochalhcha, jalhimap'a'sikanchalhcha li an Silas chi an Timoteo watukan katala'cha'ana an Pablo.

An Pablo akxni xjapakxan'iyachalhcha la'acha'an Atenas an Silas chi an Timoteo, jantu k'is oxi lhiwilalh akxni la'ts'ilh an la'acha'an li wa stakcha xlak'alin tanlhun yu tacha xdioschak'an xtala'ts'in an lapanakni.

Xliyu xjalhit'alakikxtukuycha an laka cha'a tan xtata'ayxt'o'a an judiojnin chi ali'incha an yu xtatapaynini an Dios, chi tamin wilhchan wanajcha chuni xjat'alakixtukuy an yu xtata'ayxt'o'a an pulakni la'acha'an.

Chi wachu ali'in lapanakni yu sawalh xtajatalaninin yu xjajunkan epicúreos chi yu xjajunkan estoicos tsukulhcha tat'alakikxtukuyi an Pablo. Ali'in ixtanajun: —¿Tasucha nawputun ani p'ululu kilhuyalhi? Chi ali'in ixtanajun: —Wali pumatam yu jalhichiwiniy yu tumpaj diosnin. Chunchacha xtajuni an Pablo, mu yucha xjalhixa'alay an laj'oxi chiwinti, yu xchiwinti an Jesús, chi ixlakata tani kalhila'awcho'okanacha.
Wachuncha talhi'alhcha tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a juesnin, laka Areópago junkan, chi tajuniy: —¿Tisu la'sast'icha lhamap'a'sini yu kilalhiminitawi, layi akilajuniw?
Mu wa tayawi ik'asmat'aw tacha an kilalhixa'alayaw, chi ijk'atsaputunawi tuchini jumputuncha.
Chunchacha ixtanajun mu ixchuxk'an an jamacha'an Atenas chi an yu ancha xtawilanalh yu ntu an jamacha'an wa yuchacha yu sawalh xta'asmatputun yu wa sast'ika tu'u xtapasay chi xtalhichiwinicha.
An Pablo tayalhi la xpujank'an yu'uncha, an laka Areópago, chi jajuniy: —Jamacha'an Atenas, chux tacha ani klala'ts'inaw uxitnan, sawalhch'a jak'iklak'a'ininat'iti layat.

Mu akxni ijkilaka'alh an tan t'ap'ayniniyat midiosk'an, ikla'cha'alh la'atam tan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan tan chunchuni ts'o'kanta: "PUMATAM DIOS YU NTU MISPAKAN". Pus an yu uxitnan t'ap'ayniniyat masi nt'u misp'ayat, yucha yu klamintaw lhixa'alanin.
Yucha Dios yu ilhtulh an lakaamunulhpa chi chux an laktanlhun yu ancha lak'alin, yucha xaJamach'alhkat an lakt'iyan chi an lakaat'un. Yucha ntu ani wilh laka tajtan tan wa lapanaknicha tala'oxita.
Chi yucha jantu ma'lhtask'iniya li xamati tu'u ka'ilhtunilh, mu yucha yu kintaxta'ni'oyan kijatsukuntik'an, chi an un chi chux an ali laktanlhun.
Wa pumatam lapanaki pu'ilhtu'olh ta kilhmakchux tat'ajun an lapanakni, para li ta xlijalhi'ay an lakaat'un, katatawlh'olh, chi jamasunitacha an panch'e'ex chi tanchuncha katatawla',
para li katapuxkawlhi an Dios, masi wa kap'a'aj p'a'ajcha tajalakch'apanalh, chi katala'cha'alhcha, masi an Dios yucha ntu ma'ati t'ajun, yucha waniya t'ajun tan t'awnaw.
Mu yucha an Diosi yu pula'awtaw chi yucha pulaklayaw chi yucha put'awnaw, tacha tanawlh wachu an ali'in minpoetajnink'an, akxni tanawlh: "Kitnan Diosi kintamala'awnitan."
Pus, mu Diosi kintamala'awnitan, jantu layi katipastakwicha li an Dios tachanu la'atam lha'aman de oro u de plataj u de chiwx, yu tacha an ta'ilhtuy lapanakni, yu wa tacha tapast'ak'acha.
An Dios jantu jalhakapu'aninilhi xtala'alhink'an an lapanakni tawananchacha, li ntu tu'u xtak'atsay, pero chaway watanchuncha chi ta lhichux, najuni an Dios li kamapaxawi kijatapast'ak'atk'an.

Mu an Dios ulata la'atam wilhchani akxni chux an lakaamunulhpa kala'ts'ina tani ixt'ajuncha atamj, oxi u jantu. Pumatam lapanak yu yucha sakxtuta chuncha kapu'ilhtuya', chi yucha kintamasunitancha ta kinchuxk'an li sawalhi li chuncha kuna', mu yucha mala'awnicho'olh.
Akxni chunchacha ta'asmatlhi an lapanakni ixlakata li kala'awcho'okana, wa xtalhilakts'i'incha chi ali'in ixtanajun: —Apu'a'tami akla'alha'asmat'aw t'ach'a ani nawt'a'un.
Wachuncha an Pablo jamakawlhcha.

Pero ali'in tach'a'o'alhcha chi takiklaka'ilhcha. An yu takiklaka'ilhcha, xapumatam ixjunkan Dionicio, yucha wachu xma'ta'ayxt'o'a an laka Areópago, chi pumatam t'aku yu ixjunkan Dámaris chi ali'incha.
Xli'astan akxni chunchacha laktapasalh, an Pablo taxtulhcha an la'acha'an Atenas chi alhcha la'acha'an Corinto.

Ancha la'cha'alh pumatam lapanak judio ixjunkan Aquila, jamacha'a Ponto, wa xmintachalhka xalakaat'un Italia ali xt'iwi junkan Priscila, wa xliyu an jamach'alhkat Claudio xlinajunta li ixchuxk'an an judiojnin katataxtulhi an la'acha'an Roma. Pus an Pablo jala'alh.
Chi mu wanajcha yu tapatsati xta'ilhtuy yu x'ilhtuy an Pablo, pus jat'atamakawchalhcha, wa lakatamcha xtatapatsay, yu'uncha wa xtala'oxiy cha'a yu wa de lona.

Chi tamin sábado, an Pablo an laka cha'acha an tan ixtaputa'ayxt'o'acha an lapanakni, ix'an, xjaxa'alaycha an lapanakni chi xlipuxkawnicha tani kajalhimatanunilhcha katajakiklaka'inilh an judiojnin chi an yu ntu judiojnin.

Akxni taminchalhcha Macedonia an Silas chi an Timoteo, tacha'alhcha tan ixt'ajun an Pablo, wachuncha an Pablo wa yuchacha p'as tayla'alh lhichiwiniy an ixchiwinti Dios chi xjajunicha an judiojnin li an Jesús yucha Cristo.

Pero yu'uncha wa tsukulhcha tat'atasp'it'a chi xkayajcha xtajuni, pus an Pablo k'alhalhi an xla'ch'it tan japujunicha li ntu oxi tacha an talay, chi jajuniy: —Uxitnani mintala'alhink'an li ts'an'a'oyat'it; kit'in tu kintala'alhin. Chaway kit'in ikti'ancha an tan tawilananchalh yu ntu judiojnin.

Pus taxtulhi an Pablo an laka cha'a an yu xtaputa'ayxt'o'a an judiojnin, chi alhcha la ixcha'a tichi lapanak junkan Ticio Justo, yucha wani la xpa'xti an laka cha'a tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an judiojnini ixwilh, chi yucha xkiklaka'iya an Dios.

Chi an Crispo, yu xa'ay an laka cha'a an tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an judiojnin, chux an yu ta jalhila'ts'in takiklaka'ilhi an Dios. Chi wachu wanaj xluwk'an an jamacha'an Corinto akxni ta'asmatlhicha an chiwinti, takiklaka'ilh chi talaj'a'paxlicha.
La'atam jatats'isni an Dios juniy an Pablo la ixjala'awanti: —"Jant'u k'at'alhan, jant'u sa' k'ak'ilhu, ali k'alhich'iwini an kinchiwinti,
mu kit'in iklhistaktan, chi ntu xamati lay ta kati'ilhtun, ani la'acha'an wanaj lhuwi yu kintakiklaka'i".
Pus an Pablo tam k'ata apaytatcha tamakawlh an la'acha'an Corinto, xjamasunicha an ixchiwinti Dios.
Pero akxni an Galión, gobernador ixjunita an xalakaat'un Acaya, an judiojnin tata'ayxto'lhi chi tat'alaxtukulhcha an Pablo, chi talhi'alhcha laka jamach'alhkat,
tajuniy an gobernador: —Aniy lapanak wa stakcha jamatanunit'ajuni an lapanakni li ma katakiklaka'ilhi an Dios, tacha ntu chun najunta an laka lhamap'a'sini jajuniy ma kata'ilhtulh.
Walh akxni an Pablo xchiwimputuncha, an Galión jajuniy an judiojnin: —Judiojnin, li ixlakata tu'u yu ay tala'alhin u ay jama'ninti kaxwalh, kit'in xakla'asmatniw,
pero mu wa ixlakatacha chiwinti chi ta'a'ut chi milhamap'a'sink'an, pus mi akstuchak'ani k'alats'awalat'it, kit'in tu ikma'tanuputuni tan ancha.
Wachuncha jatamakxtulhcha an jamach'alhkat an lapanakni an tan xtawlay.

Xli'astan t'o'cha tach'apachalhi an Sóstenes, yu xa'ay an laka cha'a an tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a judiojnin, chi wa ancha, la xlakapucha an tan xtawlay jamach'alhkat, stakcha talakasamalh. An Galión tu tu'u xlakapu'an tacha an xtapasay.

An Pablo la'alhuka wilhchani ancha xwilh an la'acha'an Corinto. Xli'astan jamakawlhcha an t'ala'awnin chi, alicha an Priscila chi an Aquila taxa'a'ilhcha xtijk'an para li kata'alhcha xalakaat'un Siria. Chi akxni tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Cencrea, an Pablo uksp'iruncha ta'a'sitlhi, mu chunchacha xlitamakajunta. Tataxtupalh Cencrea tapu'alhcha laka barco para li katacha'alhcha Siria.
Chi akxni tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Éfeso, an Pablo jamakawlhcha an Priscila chi an Aquila, alhcha laka cha'a tan ixtata'ayxt'o'a an lapanakni, jat'achiwinilhcha an judiojnin yu ancha xtata'ayxt'o'a.
Chi yu'uncha xtatapaynini li ali kaxjat'atamakawlh, pero an Pablo jantu tamakawputulh,
yucha wa jajuniy: "Li Diosi chuncha lakask'in, aklamimpalawi lala'pixiyalhnin". Chi xli'astan taxtulhcha la'acha'an Éfeso, pu'alhcha barco.
Akxni cha'alhcha la'acha'an Cesarea, alhcha la'acha'an Jerusalén, alhcha jala'axa'alana an yu ancha xtajakiklaka'inin, chi xli'astan alhcha la'acha'an Antioquía.
Alhcha wilhchan, a'tamcha ampalhi an xala'acha'anaxni an xalakaat'un Galacia, chi xalakaat'un Frigia, xjat'alamachapuycha an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha.
Anchunu panch'e'ex cha'alh pumatam judiojo an la'acha'an Éfeso, ixjunkan Apolo, yucha jamacha'a la'acha'an Alejandría, sawalh xjalakpastaknan chi oxi xmispay an ixchiwinti Dios.
Aniy lapanak oxi xmatalaninikanta an la xtij Dios, chi sawalhcha tachapuni xlichiwiniy an Jesús chi ts'ajwi xlichiwiniy, masi wa yuchaa xmispay an xjama'paxanti Juan.

An Apolo tsukulhcha chiwiniya an laka cha'a an tan xtaputa'ayxt'o'a an lapanakni, jantucha k'is xkiktalhanan, pero akxni ta'alha'asmatlhi an Priscila chi an Aquila, ta'aylhi'alhi tan wa xpu'akstu chi palaycha oxi talhixa'alalh an ixchiwinti Dios.

Akxni an Apolo k'uxa'alhcha xalakaat'un Acaya, an t'ala'awnin ta'a'tayjulh, tats'o'nilh la'atam carta li oxi katala'a'ichalh an t'ala'awnin an xalakaat'un Acaya. Akxni cha'alhcha Acaya, sawalhcha ja'a'tayjulhi an yu xtajakiklaka'inintacha ixlakata an xjamapayninti Dios.

Mu an Apolo alhp'asi xjajuniy la x'ukxlakapuk'an ixchuxk'an an judiojnin, chi sawalhi an yu xjajuni, pus tu layi ixtanajun li ntu chun, chi ixnajuni an Apolo li an Jesús yucha Cristo, mu an la ixchiwinti Diosi xla'ts'ilhi'an.

Akxni an Apolo la'acha'anka Corinto xt'awnachalh, an Pablo an tan la'a'a'stitawk'ancha xlakwilhkanchalh la'acha'anaxni la'pusli chi cha'alhcha la'acha'an Éfeso, ancha jala'cha'alh ali'in yu xtajakiklaka'inin.
Jajuniy: —¿Uxitnan la'a'itcha an Stalan'a Takuwin akxni jak'iklak'a'inint'itcha? Yu'uncha ta'alhtaylh tajuniy: —Jantu a'tam k'asmattawi tuchini yu Stalan'acha Takuwin.
An Pablo jajumpalay: —Pus, ¿tisu a'paxatch'a yu la'a'it'iti? Yu'uncha tajuniy: —Yucha an xjama'paxanti Juan.
An Pablo jajuniy: —Chun sawalh, an Juan xjama'paxaycha yu xtakiklaka'icha an Dios, pero xjajuniy li katakiklaka'ilhi an yu astan mintachalh. Yu xjajumputun li katakiklaka'ilhi an Jesús.
Akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi an Pablo, talaj'a'paxlicha la xtalakask'i an Jamach'alhkat Jesús;
chi akxni an Pablo jalaklakpach'apalhcha, wachucha jala'chilhi an Stalan'a Takuwin chi tamcha xtalakchiwiniy yu tumpaj chiwinti chi xtalhichiwiniycha an ixchiwinti Dios yu katapasaya'.
Katacha xpumakawt'uyk'an lapanakni xchuxchak'an.

An Pablo la'at'utu malhkuyu ix'ant'ajun an laka cha'a an tan xtaputa'ayxt'o'a an judiojnin, xlichiwiniycha an ixchiwinti Dios, chi ntu k'is xtalhanan, xjalhixa'alaycha chi xlipuxkawnicha tani kajalhimakiklaka'inilhcha an xlich'alhkat Dios.

Pero ali'in yu sawalhcha laj'axixin, jantu tajakiklaka'inimputulh, apalijcha la x'ukxlakapuk'an an lapanakni wa aya xtalhichiwiniycha an xtij Dios. Wachuncha an Pablo jalaj'oslicha, chi jalhi'alhcha an yu xtajakiklaka'inin lakatam lakaskwela, la'iskwela tichi yucha ixjunkan Tirano, anchacha lhilhij xchiwiniy an Pablo.
La'at'uy k'ata chuncha ilhtulh, pus ixchuxk'an an yu xtawilanalh xalakaat'un Asia, yu judiojnin chi yu ntu judiojnin, ta'asmatlhi an ixchiwinti Dios.
Chi an Dios, laj'aycha tanlhun yu ntu wa xamaticha lapanaki pu'ilhtulh an Pablo.
Masi wa payojcha u wa la'ch'itcha li xla'ala'cha'an an Pablo chi li xjalhi'anikancha an ta'an'anin, xtatak'uch'uycha, chi an lakmakxkay'un xtamakajuncha an ta'an'anin.

Pero ali'in judiojnin yu ancha xtalak'aklat'ajun, yu xtatamakxtuy an lakmakxkay'un la ixlakatunajk'an an lapanakni, wachu talhila'ts'intanulhi katajak'uch'unulh la xtalakask'i an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, chi xtajunicha an lakmakxkay'un: —¡La xtalakask'i an Jesús yu lhichiwiniy an Pablo, klajunaw k'at'axt'utcha!
Yu chuncha xta'ilhtuy, tichi yu'uncha xpumatujunk'an sts'alan tichi lapanak ixjunkan Esceva, yu xa'ay ixjunita an sacerdotejnin.
Pero la'atam wilhchan an makxkay'un ja'alhtaylh, jajuniy: —"Kit'in ikmispayi an Jesús chi an Pablo, pero uxitnan, ¿tisu uxitnancha?

Wa akxni, an lapanak an yu xla'apaxto'ta makxkay'un jatayla'alh, chi wanaj jalhaja'olh, mu sawalhcha k'ut'ilhi ixjunita, stakcha jala'lhitama'chapulh chi wa laj'alhalhancha talakats'alalh, xjalakmak'atsanitacha.
Chux an yu xtawilanalh la'acha'an Éfeso, an judiojnin chi yu ntu judiojnin, tak'atsaalh, pus sawalhcha xtalaktalhanan. Chi chunchacha an xta'a'ut an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, palaycha xpumispakan.
Xluk'an wachu xtacha'an an yu xtajakiklaka'inintacha chi ixtanajuncha tuchini yu ntucha oxi xta'ilhtuta xlip'ulhnaj. Tan laj'asmatkancha ixtanajun.

Chi xluwk'ani an yu xtajachawanan talaklhicha'alhcha an xlibrojk'an chi tala'xawalhcha, tan jala'ts'inkan. Akxni put'e'ekalhcha tani chunchacha tawlachalh xtapalh an libro an yu la'xawakalh, tawlhchalhi li tacha a'xt'up'uxamkaw (50) milh tumin de plataja xtapalay.
Pus chunchacha an xchiwinti an Jamach'alhkat Dios palaycha xta'a'pitsiy, chi xtasuycha an x'alhp'asninti.

Akxni chunchacha laktapasalh, xli'astan, an Pablo pastaklhi li ka'alh la'pixiyalhna an xalakaat'un Macedonia chi an xalakaat'un Acaya, chi ancha ka'anchalhcha sta la'acha'an Jerusalén. Chi xnawpalay li ka'anacha Jerusalén, ka'ampala la'acha'an Roma.
Pus wachuncha p'ulhnajcha jamala'achalhi xalakaat'un Macedonia an xt'uyunk'an x'a'tayjunin, yu'uncha an Timoteo chi an Erasto, pero yucha lananka ma'ani tamakawlh xalakaat'un Asia.
Anchunu panch'e'ex an la'acha'an Éfeso sawalhcha xlilaxtukukani ixlakata an xtij Dios,

tichi yucha lapanak ixjunkan Demetriojo chuncha x'ilhtuy, yucha xla'tapatsay plata, chi xlak'ilhtuycha lakt'ikt'i templo de lha'aman de plata, yu xlimalakxtuycha an ixtajtan diosa yu ixjunkan Artemisa, chi sawalhcha la'lhuw tumini xtapulhajay an yu yucha xtala'tapatsay.
Pus an Demetrio jama'ayxto'olhi ixchuxk'an an yu yucha tapatsat xtalak'ilhtuy chi jajuniy: —"Lapanakni, uxitnan k'ats'ayat'iti li oxi wilaw, ixlakata ani tapatsat ilhtuyaw.

Pero chaway la'ts'inatcha ch'i asmat'atcha li an yu tajuniy li Pablo laknawt'ajuncha li yu wa la xmakacha lapanak la'oxikanta dios, jantu dios sawalh, chi chunchacha lhuw lapanak makiklaka'inita, chi ntu wa ani la'acha'an Éfeso, wachu lanan ta xlijalhi'ay an xalakaat'un Asia.

Tacha ani tapasay sawalhcha lhima'anxkay, layi kats'an'alh an kintapatsatk'an, chi an xtajtan an ay diosa Artemisa wachu ntucha katilhitapalalh, jantucha tu'u katilhiwilakalh an xta'ayat ani diosa yu chux an xalakaat'un Asia tapayninikan chi chux lakaamunulhpa'".
Akxni chunchacha ta'alha'asmatlhi sawalhcha tala'talh'amalh, chi p'ascha talaknawlh: —¡An Artemisa yucha ay, xdiosajk'an jamacha'an Éfeso!

Pus wachuncha jantucha xtak'atsay tani katalalhcha an lapanakni chux an la'acha'an. Tatayla'alhcha an Gayo chi an Aristarco, xt'uyunk'an lapanakni jamacha'an Macedonia, yu xtat'a'anta an Pablo, watatacha jala'xa'alhi'ankalhi sta laka cha'a tan ixtaputa'ayxt'o'a xtapulakchiwiniy.
An Pablo xtanuputunachalh, para li kaxjat'achiwinilhi an lapanakni, pero an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha wachu, tu tamakawnilh.
An xajamach'alhkatni Asia, an ali'in oxi xjat'alalhi'an an Pablo, pus yu'uncha talhinawlhi li kajunkalhi an Pablo li ntu katanulh.
An tan lhuw x'ayxto'kan tucha xamati xlimacha'xay tuchini xtapasaycha, wa tamj tamjcha xtalaknajun, chi lanan ixchuxk'ani jantu xtak'atsay tuchini xtaalhii'ayxto'nuncha.

An judiojnin tatisamaka'alhi an Alejandro la x'ukxlakapuk'an tan an lhuw xlakyakalh. An Alejandro jatamakyawnilhi li kasa' talajkilhulhi an lapanakni, para li laycha kachiwinilh, chi li kajalhi'a'tayjulhi an judiojnin.
Pero akxni tak'atsaalhi li an Alejandro wachu judío, wa ayxtami talakt'asa'olh ka tacha la'at'uy hora, xtalaknajun: —¡An Artemisa yucha ay, ixdiosajk'an jamacha'an Éfeso!

Wachuncha an yu ixmats'o'lhi'anikan tanlhun an la'acha'an, akxni laycha sa' jamakilhunilh an lapanakni, jajuniy: "Jamacha'an Éfeso, chux an lakaamunulhpa k'atsakani li yucha ani la'acha'ani lhistakta an xtajtan an ay diosa Artemisa, chi an yu patajulh an lakt'iyan yu xt'achuncha tasuy an diosa.
Chi mu ntu layi xamati katinawlh li ntu sawalhi aniy, wa k'asa'ch'a t'awlat'it, chi nt'u t'u'u k'a'ilht'ut li nt'u oxi p'ast'ak'at p'ulhnaj.
Aniy lapanakni yu uxitnan jalhit'ant'at'it jantu tu'u ta'alhajuy an laka tajtan chi ntu tu'u wa aya talhichiwiniy an kidiosajk'an.
Li an Demetrio chi an yu tat'atapatsay, li xamati jantu oxi talhiwilaniy, ta'alini juesnin chi jamach'alhkatni, anchacha kata'alh lats'awalanin tuchini talats'awalaputuncha.
Chi li uxitnan tu'u atumpaja lak'ask'inat, laka juntaja kalhilakchiwinkana'.
Yu tacha chaway ani tapasay layi akintalhi'alhtasukan li wa jalakt'ilhi'ulananawcha, chi ntu tu'u lay katinaju tuchini ixlakatacha li tacha anicha tapasay li akintalhisakmikan."
Akxni chunchacha naw'olh an yu ists'o'lhi'an tu'u an la'acha'an jamala'pitsicho'olhcha an lapanakni.
Akxni sa'cha juncho'olh an tacha xtala'talh'amanta an lapanakni, an Pablo jat'asanilhi an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha chi jamap'a'silhcha. Chi xli'astan jat'alamakawlhcha, alhcha la'acha'an Macedonia.
Kilajkila'olhi yu ancha xlak'alin la'acha'anaxni, sawalhcha xjat'alamachapuyi an t'ala'awnin la xchiwinti, chi xli'astan cha'alhcha xalakaat'un Grecia,

ancha la'at'utu malhkuyu tamakawlh. Chi akxni tukancha xtajuputun laka barco, para li ka'alhcha la'acha'an Siria, k'atsaalhi li an judiojnin xtatamakajuntacha li ta kata'ilhtuya', pus wa chuncha an Pablo wa lakaat'uni pu'ancho'olh, a'tam la'puspalhi la'acha'an Macedonia.

Yu tat'a'alhi sta xalakaat'un Asia yu'uncha an Sópater, jamacha'a Berea, ists'alh tichi Pirro; chi tichi yucha Aristarco, chi Segundo, jamacha'a Tesalónica, chi Gayo, jamacha'a Derbe, chi Timoteo; chi yu jamacha'an xalakaat'un Asia yu'uncha an Tíquico chi Trófimo.
Aniy yu'uncha tatap'ulalhcha chi la'acha'ancha Troasi kintapakxancha'an.

Kitnan, akxni la'puslicha xawilhchan akxni ukan pan yu ntu tu'u lhiyalh lhamaskajan, iktaxtucha la'acha'an Filipos laka barco, chi la'akisicha wilhchan walh, ijkataymawcha la'acha'an Troas, ancha la'atujun wilhchani iktamakaju.

Yu p'ulhnajcha xawilhchan an samana, ikta'ayxto'wicha, para li akla'ch'e'ewcha an pan, chi an Pablo xjamasunicha an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha. Chi mu katunkunanta kataxtuyacha an Pablo, pus stakcha chiwinilh sta jaytatnancha.
Tan xak'ayxt'o'aw lakatam laka cuarto tan talhman juntachalh, wanaj la'alhuw pumaklhku xlakpulhkuy,

walh pumatam ts'alh ixjunkan Eutico sa' xwilh an laka ventana, chi mu an Pablo wanajcha panijniya chiwinilh, pus lhtataputulhcha an ts'alh, walh akxni oxicha ilhtatay, patajulh, xlitala't'utucha juntachalh an cha'a' tan patajulh, chi akxni tasaklhi xnitacha.
Wachuncha an Pablo ta'alhtajulh, chi lhnujuncha ukxtawk'alhi an ts'alh chi la'atanulhcha, chi jajuniy: —Jant'u k'alakt'alhanant'it, mu la'ajunta.
Xli'astan an Pablo tawk'acho'olhcha an laka cha'a, chi la'ch'e'elhcha an pan, chi ulhcha, chi wachuncha taylhi'alhi chiwiniy sta wats'isincha walh. Xli'astan alhcha.
Chi an ts'alh an yu patajulh laka ventana, la'ajunta talhi'alh, pus yucha sawalhcha taputa'oximaj'ayalh.
Kitnan iktap'ulawcha ik'aw laka barco sta la'acha'an Asón, ixpiktu alamalh, para li ak'itijlawcha an Pablo, mu yucha chunchacha ixnajunta chi yucha wa lakaat'uni pu'alh.
Akxni kla'cha'awcha la'acha'an Asón an Pablo, tajulhcha an laka barco chi ik'awcha la'acha'an Mitilene.

Chi akxni iktaxtupalawcha ancha, tunkunchalh ikla'pus'wicha xlakapu la'atam ay t'un yu junkan Quío, wanaj la'atanchanu'ojota an xkan, chi tunkumpalhchalh, ikcha'awcha la'acha'an Samos ixkilhtu alamalh. Chi a'tam tam wilhchan ikpu'ampalaw an barco, ikcha'awcha la'acha'an Mileto ixkilhtu alamalh.

Chunchacha iklhit'alaw para li an Pablo tu sawalh kata'a'ma'alhi xalakaat'un Asia, yucha ntu k'uxa'alhi la'acha'an Éfeso, mu sawalhcha so'ojo ixcha'amputun la'acha'an Jerusalén, chi ixnajun li wa kaxlalhcha akxni la xk'atancha Pentecostés anchacha kastsukuchalh.
Akxni la'acha'anka Mileto xt'awnachalh an Pablo, lhinawlhi li kajat'asanikalhi an yu xalaj'ajin xtajunita yu xtajakiklaka'inin an la'acha'an Éfeso.
Chi akxni tala'cha'alhcha jajuniy: "Uxitnan k'ats'ayat'iti tani xaklaat'a'aklat'awnawcha an xalakaat'un Asia sta akxni wa ikticha'alh.
Lhilhiji xaktapatsaniy an Dios chux laka jakilhpatinijk'atsat, chi laka lhuw alhut, chi ikla'ts'ilhi tanlhuncha yu la'lhima'anxkay yu an judiojnin kixtapulhitama'chapuputun.
Kit'in o'sliyani iklamak'atsaaniw yu oxi para uxitnan, tan lhilhuw xaklamak'atsaaniyaw chi la mila'cha'anink'an.
An judiojnin chi yu ntu judiojnin ijkajunilhi li katakiklaka'ilhi an Dios chi an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo.
Chaway ikti'ani la'acha'an Jerusalén, yucha an Stalan'a Takuwini kimala'achay, pero kit'in tu ijk'atsayi tuchini akintapasaniyacha.
Wa x'amani ijk'atsay li chux an la'acha'anaxni tan ik'an, an Stalan'a Takuwin kijuni li an pulach'in kimpakxan'i chi lhuw lhima'alh'ajna.

Pero kit'in jantu tu'u iklhilhakapu'an an kijatsukunti yu wa para ki'akstucha, para li lhi'acha akt'ala'olh an kintapatsat chi an yu kilhijuni an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, li aklhichiwinilhi an laj'oxi chiwinti yu xjamapayninti an Dios.
Chi chaway oxicha ijk'atsay li ntu xamati uxitnan akintila'ts'incho'olh, yu iklajuntawcha an laj'oxi chiwinti.
Xliyu chaway iklalhijumputunaw li kit'in tucha kinkwentaja amijatsukuntik'an,
mu kit'in iklamak'atsaani'ojocha chux yu ka'ilhtuya an Dios, jantu tu'u yu ntucha aklajuniw.

Pus chaway k'ajalajk'ats'anant'itcha chi k'ajalhist'akt'itcha chux an yu tat'ata'ayxt'o'an, mu an Stalan'a Takuwin ta'ilhtuncha li k'a'unt'iti xalaj'ajin para li k'ajalhist'akt'iti an yu takiklaka'icha Dios, yu jatamawlh la xjak'alhni.
Ijk'atsayi li akxni ak'anacha katamina ali'in yu wa tacha laj'at'ajnaj ma'tilincha katalaya', chi wanaj kask'up tamaka'amputuna an yu tajakiklaka'inincha.
Chi masi wa siya uxitnancha kata'alina ali'in yu wa maslakatinticha katamasuya', para li an yu tajakiklaka'inincha katach'a'o'alhcha.
K'as'alaj ts'uk'ut'it; k'ap'ast'akt'iti li la'at'utu k'ata, tunku chi puts'ista, klamap'a'siwi atamjtamin laka alhut.

Chawayi t'ala'awnin, wa Dioscha k'ach'a'o'at'it, chi an xchiwinti yu pamapayninin, yucha layi ka'ilhtuya li k'at'a'ayat'iti la mintakuwink'an chi kataxta'niyani chux yu jajunita li kajaxta'niya an ixlapanak Dios.
Jantu xamati iksk'unla'ts'inita xtumin u xla'ch'it.
Uxitnan oxi k'ats'ayat'it li xaktapatsay, para li aklhitsukulhi yu xakma'lhtask'iniy chi an yu kixtat'a'aklat'ajun.

Lhilhiji klamasuniw li chuncha tapatsakan, para li lay ja'a'tayjukan an yu tama'lhtask'iniy la'a'tayjun, chi klamapast'ak'aniwi an ixchiwinti Jamach'alhkat Jesús, tan najunta: 'Palay oxi li xta'kan, walh jantu li wa jama'tayanankan'."
Akxni chunchacha naw'olh an Pablo, tatso'ottalhcha chi ixchuxk'ancha jat'atapaynilh.
Ixchuxk'ani talaj'alhulh chi tala'atanulhcha an Pablo chi tala'xtikilhtastuklhicha.
Sawalhcha xtala'ta'oxila'alhiy, wa xliyu jajuniy an Pablo li ntucha a'tam katitala'ts'ilh, wachuncha ta'alhcha makawnini sta laka barco.
Akxni ijkamakajucha an t'ala'awnin, wa ts'awjcha ikpu'aw an barco sta la'acha'an Cos, chi tunkunchalh ik'awcha la'acha'an Rodas, chi ancha ik'awcha la'acha'an Pátara.
An la'acha'an Pátara ikla'cha'aw la'atam barco yu xti'an xalakaat'un Fenicia, pus yuchacha ikpu'aw.

Akxni xakti'anawcha, iklaka'anawcha Chipre, yu lhtayan tantanun lakaat'un an lakxkan, chi lhilakijama'xichak'ani lhitamakawlh, wakcha ik'aw sta xalakaat'un Siria. Chi an barco, mu makawtijlalh tak'uk'ati an la'acha'an Tiro, pus anchacha iktakutwi.

Ancha ijkala'cha'aw an yu wachucha xtakiklaka'iy an Dios, pus anchacha ijkat'atamakajuw la'atujun wilhchan. Yu'uncha tajuniy an Pablo li ma ntu ka'alhi la'acha'an Jerusalén, yucha an Takuwini chuncha jajunilh.

Chi la'puslicha la'atujun wilhchan, iktaxtupalawcha ancha. An lapanakni yu kintakimakawyajun sta la xpiktu an la'acha'an, xtat'a'an'ojota ixt'iwik'an chi xas'at'ank'an. Chi an la xpiktucha an lakxkan, ikla'tatso'ottawcha chi iktapayniwcha.
Xli'astan, iklala'axa'ala'ojo iktajucha laka barco, chi an lapanakni yu'uncha talak'ancho'olhcha la ixcha'ak'an.
Iktaxtu la'acha'an Tiro, kitnan iktaylhi'ampalawi kijalhtantik'an laka barco chi ikcha'awcha la'acha'an Tolemaida, ancha ijkala'axa'alawcha an t'ala'awnin chi anchacha ijkat'atamakaju tam wilhchan.

Tunkunchalh iktaxtupalawcha chi ikch'aja'awcha la'acha'an Cesarea. Ancha ik'awcha la ixcha'a an Felipe yu xlichiwiniy an ixchiwinti Dios, yucha xapumatam an xpumatujunk'an yu xta'a'tayjuy an yu xjamala'achata an Jesús, chi anchacha iktamakaju.
An Felipe xjalhit'ajun xt'at'ink'an xjatsi'in, tuka' xjat'atsukukan, yu'uncha xtajamak'atsaanini yu xjajuniy an Dios yu katapasaya'.
Akxni la'alhuwcha wilhchan ancha xakwilaw, cha'alh pumatam lapanak ixjunkan Agabo, xalakaat'un Judeaja minchalh, yucha xlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.

Akxni kintala'cha'ancha tan xakt'awnaw, xa'a'inikalhcha an isinturón an Pablo chi pula'ma'ch'ikalhcha chi pulakch'anch'ikalhcha, chi najun: —An Stalan'a Takuwin najun li an la'acha'an Jerusalén, an judiojnin chuncha katach'i'ulaya an yu jamanawin ani sinturón chi katama'axta'niyacha an yu ntu judiojnin.
Akxni chunchacha k'asmatwi, an jamacha'an Cesarea chi kitnan iktapayniniwi an Pablo li ntu ka'alhi la'acha'an Jerusalén.

Pero an Pablo kinta'alhtajin: —¿Tasu li laj'alhunatcha, chi kilama'anta'oxila'alhiniyawcha? Kit'in iktapujuyi masi li akinch'i'ulakalh u masi sta akima'nikalh an Jerusalén, ixlakata an Jamach'alhkat Jesús.
Chi mu ntu layi klataminiw xjatapast'ak'at, wa ijkuniwcha li yucha an Dioscha ka'ilhtulh tani yu oxicha lhiwilay.
Xli'astan kla'asijwicha chi ik'awcha Jerusalén.

Ali'in an yu xtajakiklaka'inincha an jamacha'an Cesarea kintat'a'an, chi yu'uncha kintalhi'an la ixcha'a tichiyucha lapanak jamacha'a Chipre, ixjunkan Mnasón. Aniy lapanak ma'anchacha xjakiklaka'inin chi yucha kintaxta'nincha tan iktawlaw.
Akxni ikcha'awcha la'acha'an Jerusalén, an t'ala'awnin lhi'acha kintala'a'in.
Tunkunchalh, an Pablo kintat'a'ancha la'ts'inini an Jacobo, chi ancha wachu xtat'ajun ixchuxk'an an xalaj'ajin.
An Pablo jala'axa'alalhcha, chi xli'astan oxicha jajun'olh an tanlhun yu an Dios xpulak'ilhtuta an la xjatsukuntik'an an yu ntu judiojnin.

Akxni ta'asmatlhicha, oxicha xtalhipast'ak'a an Dios. Tajuniy an Pablo: —T'ala'ajun, k'ats'aycha li la'alhuw milh an judiojnini yu tajakiklaka'inin, yu tanajuni li lhitask'iniya li chuncha ka'ilhtukalh tacha an najun xlamap'a'sin an Moisés.

Chi jamak'atsanikanta li ixchuxk'an an judiojnin yu ntu xla'acha'ank'an tawilanalh, li uxint'i ja'uniya li ntu chuni kata'ilhtulh tacha an najunta xlamap'a'sin Moisés, chi li ntu kata'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxli ix'a'axt'a'ak'an an sts'alank'an chi li ntucha chuni kata'ilhtulh tacha yu lhismanitawcha tanlhun.
¿Tasucha kalhit'alayaw chawayi? Mu o'sliyani an lapanakni katak'atsaya li ch'it'ant'a.
Yu oxi kaxajchalh chunchuniya k'alhit'alat'i: Chaway aniy tat'ajun xt'at'ink'an lapanakni yu tajunilh an Dios li katamuktaxtuniya yu tat'atamakawlh.

K'ajat'ap'it'icha, chi wa ayxtamcha k'ajat'ast'alan'a chi k'ajamap'alhnincha yu tama'lhtask'iniy, para li yu'uncha kajalak'ukxwikkalhcha. Chuncha katak'atsa'oya li jantu sawalhi tacha an jajunkan li na'un. Katak'atsaya li uxint'i wach'u ilht'uyi tacha an najun xlamap'a'sin Moisés.

Chi an yu ntu judiojnin, an yu tajakiklaka'inincha, ijkats'o'nitawcha tacha an lhitamakawtaw, li ntu kata'ulhi an lhiway yu xjalha'ulananikantacha an yu tacha xdioschak'an tala'ts'in, chi li ntu kata'ulhi an xak'alhni watuchicha jatapakxat, chi yu wa aksk'anj'uy jatapakxat chi li ntu kataxa'alalhi xamati yu ntu tat'at'ajun.

Wachuncha an Pablo jalhi'alhcha an xt'at'ink'an lapanakni, chi tunkunchalh wa ayxtamcha jat'astalan'alh, xli'astan tanulhcha an laka tajtan, para li kanawnacha tani wanancha la'ojoy li lay stalan'ankan, para li atamj atamjcha kama'axt'a'a xla'ulan.

Akxni xla'ot'ajuncha an la'atujun wilhchan, tichi yu'uncha judiojnin yu taminchalh xalakaat'un Asia, tala'ts'ilhi an Pablo an laka tajtan, pus tsukulhcha tachiwiwayi an lapanakni, chi tatayla'alhcha an Pablo.

P'ascha xtalaknajun: "¡Jamacha'an Israel, akila'a'tayjuw! Yucha ani lapanaki yu wa tanchuncha kawalh, jalakmasunit'ajuni an lapanakni yu ntu oxi tanlhun para akintaxkaykan kitnan yu judiojnin, yucha masuy yu ntu yu an xlamap'a'sin Moisés, chi yu ntu oxi kapulhiwilakalh an tajtan. Atumpaj, yu chaway jatamaknuta an laka tajtan tichi yu'uncha jamacha'an Grecia, yu'uncha talhkilikiya an tajtan jantucha tu'u talhiwilay, walh chi ancha ixcha'a Dios."
Chunchacha ixtanajun, mu xlip'ulhnaj an la'acha'an xtat'ala'ts'inta an Pablo an Trófimo, jamacha'a Éfeso, pus ixtanajun li an Pablo xtamaknutachalhcha an laka tajtan.
Ixchuxk'an an lapanakni an yu ancha jamacha'an tala'talh'amalhcha, pus talakats'alajcha'alhcha. Tach'apayawlhcha an Pablo chi taxa'axtulhcha an laka tajtan, chi lascha talakmalaklhchawlh.
Akxni xtama'niputuncha an Pablo akxnicha wachu la'cha'alh chiwinti an xacomandante batallón, li ta xlijalhi'ay an la'acha'an Jerusalén an lapanakni xtala'talh'amancha.

Pus an comandante jama'ayxto'lhi an isoldadojnin chi an yu xalaj'ajincha palay chi talakats'alaj'alhcha an tan xtala'talh'aman an lapanakni. Akxni tala'ts'ilhcha an comandante chi an soldadojnin, jantucha ali talakasamalhi an Pablo.
Chi an comandante jala'cha'alhcha chi ch'apayawlhcha an Pablo, lhinawlhcha li kach'i'ulakalhcha laka ma'at'uy kadena. Xli'astan lhasakminilhcha tichini yuchacha, chi tuchini ilhtulhcha.
Pero wa tamj tamjcha xtalaknajun, pus an comandante tu layi tu'u xk'atsay, mu wa t'ililicha xtalakt'asay; pus lhinawlhcha li kalhi'ankalhcha tan tatawlachalh an soldadojnin.
Akxni cha'alhcha an Pablo an tan talakchaj talakchaj ixjunita tan xtatawlay an soldadojnin, an soldadojnin wa tach'ixli'alhcha, mu sawalhcha xtala'talh'amanta an lapanakni.
Astancha xtamintachalh, ixtalaknajun: "¡Kanilhcha!"
An Pablo akxni ixtamaknut'awkanachalhcha an tan tawilanalh soldadojnin, yucha juniy an comandante: —¿Layi akt'achiwinin lakats'uni? An comandante alhtaylh juniy: —¿Layi ch'iwiniy lhigriego?
Pus chuncha ka ntu uxint'i an lapanak, yu jamacha'a Egipto yu an tawananchacha jalhi'alh an lapanakni la'at'at'i milh, yu tajama'ninin chi jalhi'alhcha an tan wa lakaaxixnicha lakaat'un.

An Pablo alhtaylh juniy: —Kit'in ikjudío, tan ikla'awlh la'acha'an Tarso xalakaat'un Cilicia, kit'in xalapanak tan lhitapalay la'acha'an, pero lamaapaynin ak'imak'awninka li ajkaxa'alalh an lapanakni.

Pus an comandante makawnilhcha an Pablo li kajaxa'alalhi an lapanakni, pus tayalhcha an tan talakchaj talakchaj ixjunita, chi jatamakyawnilhcha li kasa'ka talajkilhulh. Akxni sa'cha lajkilhunkalh, jaxa'alalhcha lhi'ebreo, jajuniy:
"Yu lhit'ala'awnin chi xalakpaynin, k'a'asmatt'iti tacha ani aklajunaw, yu ikputa'a'tayjuy".
Akxni ta'asmatlhicha li lhi'ebrewi xjaxa'alay, palaycha sa' talajkilhun'olh. An Pablo taylhi'alhcha chiwiniy, ixnajun:

"Kit'in ikjudio. La'acha'an Tarso xalakaat'un Ciliciaja iktsukulh, pero ani la'acha'an Jerusaleni ikta'ayalh, chi yu kimatalaninilh yucha an Gamaliel, tacha an najunta la xlamap'a'sink'an an yu ta xjalhila'ts'inawi ijkatalaninilh, kit'in wa yucha an Dioscha yu iktapatsaniputun chux la kijalhunut, tacha uxitnan minchuxk'an ilht'uyat wachu yu chaway.
Wa xlip'ulhnaj sawalhcha xajkalhitama'chapuyi an yu xtakiklaka'iy ani sast'i tij, chi xajkach'apayajuy, xajkamalaklhchajuycha, t'akunin chi lapanakni.

An xa'ay sacerdote chi ixchuxk'an an xalaj'ajin yu'uncha oxi tak'atsay. Yu'uncha kintaxta'nilh jalhiki para li ajkalhi'anilh an kint'ajudiojnink'an la'acha'an Damasco, para li lay ajkach'apayawlh an yu takiklaka'iy Jesús, chi ajkalhimilhcha ani la'acha'an Jerusalén, para li kajamalaklhchawkalhcha chi kajamama'alh'ajnikalhcha.
Pero akxni laka tijka xakt'ajun, wanicha an la'acha'an Damasco, katacha atunkucha, minchalh an lakt'iyan la'atam alhp'as jatapulhkunu', wa xlimjnik'acha, wanaj kila'atanchanu'olh,
chi ikta'a'talh. Xli'astan k'asmat'a chiwinkancha, kijunkan: "Saulo, Saulo, ¿t'asu li k'ilhit'ama'ch'ap'uycha?"
Pus iknajun: "¿Tisu uxint'icha Jamach'alhkat?" Chi an yu ixchiwiniy kijuniy: "Kit'in ikJesús jamacha'a Nazaret, kit'ini k'ilhit'ama'ch'ap'uy".
An yu kixtat'a'anta tala'ts'ilhi an jatapulhkunu', pero ntu ta'alha'asmatlhi an yu kixa'alalh.

Chi kit'in ijkuniy an yu kixa'alalh: —¿Tisuncha lay ak'ilhtulhi Jamach'alhkat?, chi an jamach'alhkat Jesús kijuniy: "K'a'ost'aycha chi k'ap'inchicha la'acha'an Damasco. Anchacha k'a'un'ok'ana'a chux yu k'a'ilht'uya'a."
Chi mu an ix'alhp'asninti an jatapulhkunu kimala'ach'ixlalhcha, pus wa kintama'ch'apalhi'alhcha la'acha'an Damasco an yu xakintat'a'anta.

Ancha ixt'ajun pumatam lapanak ixjunkan Ananías, yucha sawalh xjakiklaka'inin chi ixkiklaka'iya an ixlamap'a'sin Moisés. Ixchuxk'an an judiojnin yu ixtawilanalh an la'acha'an Damasco sawalh oxi ixtalhipast'ak'a.
An Ananías kinkila'ts'ilh, akxni kila'cha'alh kijuniy: "Kint'ala'ajun Saulo, k'ajalak'awanch'o'ocha". Pus wanaj wa akxni wakcha ijkalakawancho'olh, chi laycha ikla'ts'ilh an Ananías.
Chi kijumpalay: "An xDiosk'an kilakpaynink'an sakxtuni para li k'ak'ats'at'i yu ilhtuputun, chi para li k'ala'ts'i yu Stalan'a Lapanak chi wanajcha yucha k'a'alha'asmatt'i la xkilhni.
Mu uxint'i k'anawna'a yu la'ts'i ta xlijalhi'ay an lakaamunulhpa', chi k'anawna'a t'uch'ini asmatt'acha chi t'uch'ini la'ts'int'acha.
Chi chaway t'uch'a ali k'ap'akxa, k'a'os'taycha, k'a'a'p'axt'icha, chi k'at'ap'ayninincha an Dios, k'ach'a'amaj'acha amintala'alhin."
"Akxni k'ancho'olhcha la'acha'an Jerusalén, k'alhcha tapaynini an laka tajtan, walh wa tacha wa kla'puminatnalh,
ikla'ts'in an Dios kijuniy: "K'aso'ocha, lasch'a k'at'axt'u an la'acha'an Jerusalén, mu ntu katitakiklaka'ilhi t'ach'a an k'ilhich'iwini."
Kit'in ijkuniy: "Dios, yu'uncha tak'atsayi li kit'in xak'an ja'ini an yu takiklaka'iyan, ta lakachux laka tajtan chi xajkalhi'ancha laka pulach'in chi xajkamuk'anicha.
Chi akxni tama'nilh an yu ixt'atapatsayan Esteban, yu xlichiwiniy minchiwinti, kit'in wachu ani xakt'ajun chi iknawlhi li kama'nikalhcha, sta xajkalhistaknita an xla'ch'itk'an an yu tama'nilh."
Pero an Dios kijuniy: "K'ak'ilht'aycha mintij, mu kit'in la'ma'at la'acha'anaxni akmak'anan."
An lapanakni wanaj wa ancha talhitayanilh ta'alha'asmatlhi, chi ixli'astan tsukulhcha talakt'asay, ixtalaknajun: "¡K'amala'mixit'icha aniy lapanak aniy lakamunulhpa' "!
Chi mu ali ali ixtalakt'asay chi ixtala't'alhtama'st'aycha ixla'la'chi'tk'an chi po'xmi,

pus an comandante lhinawlhcha li katamaknukalhcha an tan tawilanalh an soldadojnin an Pablo, chi lhinawlhcha li kala'ana'makalhcha, para li kanawlhcha tuchini ixlakatacha li an lapanakni sawalhcha xtalhilakt'asay.

Pero akxni xch'iyawkantacha para li ka'ayna'kanacha, an Pablo lhisakmilhi an kapitán yu ancha ixt'ajun, juniy: —¿Ch'unch'a lhi'unk'anat uxitnan li layi k'ala'ana'mat xamati yu xalapanak Roma, chi masi ntuka' k'atsakani li tu'u ilhtuta tala'alhin?
Akxni chunchacha asmatlhi an kapitán, alh mak'atsaanini an comandante, juniy: —¿T'isunch'a k'a'ilht'uya'a uxint'i? Aniy lapanak xalapanak Roma.
Pus wachuncha an comandante la'alhi an Pablo chi juniy: —Sawalhi li xalapanak Romajk'at'i? An Pablo alhtaylh juniy: —Chun.
An comandante najun: —K'it'in wanaj la'lhuw tumini iklhits'an'alh para li lay akwalh xalapanak Roma. An Pablo alhtaylh juniy: —Pus kit'in xalapanak Roma sawalh mu kit'in chuncha iktsukulh.
Wachuncha an yu kaxtala'ana'malh an Pablo talaj'oslicha, chi an comandante wachu', mu k'atsalhcha li wachu xalapanak Roma, chi xtalhanancha, mu yuchaa xma'ch'iyajuta.

Akxni tunkunchalhcha, an comandante, mu xk'atsaputuncha oxi tuchini yu xtalhi'alhtasuycha an judiojnin an Pablo, lakmakp'uxlicha an cadena chi lhinawlhcha li katata'ayxto'lhicha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi ixchuxk'an an xalaj'ajin lapanakni yu tama'ilhtuy junta. Wachuncha an comandante lhi'alhcha an Pablo chi la xlakapuchak'ani yawlh.
An Pablo sa'cha jala'ts'ini an yu xta'ilhtuy junta, chi jajuniy: —T'ala'awnin, kit'in sta chaway la x'ukxlakapu Dios ijk'atsayi li oxi ikt'ajun.
Pus wachuncha an Ananías yu xa'ay sacerdote ixjunita, jajunilhi an yu waniy xtat'ayanalh li katakiksalhi an Pablo.

Chi an Pablo alhtaylh juniy: —¡Uxint'i wa t'a'ukxp'ut'uyunun Diosi kakiksayan! Mu uxint'i li anch'unu wilht'i, para li lakalhamap'a'sini ak'ilats'awalanin ani yu klats'awalay, ¿chi tasu li k'ilhina'uncha li akinkiksakalhi?, jant'u ch'uni ilht'uy tacha an najunta lhamaap'a'sin.
An lapanakni yu wachu ancha xtat'ajun tajuniy an Pablo: —¿Tasu li t'ap'u'uych'a ch'unch'a xa'alay an xa'ay tukan isacerdote Diosi?

An Pablo jajuniy: —T'ala'awnin, kit'in tu xajk'atsay li yucha aniya yu tukancha xa'ay sacerdote, mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta ixchiwinti Dios, najunta: "Jant'u wa aya k'a'uni xapumatam yu ch'alhkatnan la mila'acha'an".

Chi an Pablo mu jalhakapu'alhi an lapanakni li an ali'in yu'uncha an saduceojnin chi an akilhmaktamin yu'uncha an yu xjajunkan fariseojnin, pus p'ascha jaxa'alalh jajuniy: —T'ala'awnin, kit'in ikfariseo, chi yu ta ijkalhila'ts'in wachu yu'un; chi tuchi kilhilhiminkanta aniy wa xliyu li ijkiklaka'iya li katala'awcho'oya an yu tanitacha.
Akxni chunchacha nawlh an Pablo, an fariseojnin chi an saduceojnin tsukulhcha talakikxtukuy, chi tatakilhmakt'uyulhcha an tan xta'ayxto'nun,
mu an saduceojnin tanajun li an yu talaknitacha jantucha a'tam katitala'awcho'olh, chi tanajun li ntu tu'u angelhnin chi li ntu tu'u takuwin, pero an fariseojnin yu'uncha tanajun li chun.

Pus wa t'ili t'ilicha xtalakchiwiniy, walh ali'in an xamaestrojnin lhamap'a'sin, yu xtat'a'an an fariseojnin, talaktayalh chi tanajun: —Aniy lapanak tu tu'u ilhtuta tala'alhin, ka sna pumatam angelh u takuwini xa'alalh.

Chi mu palaycha tala'talh'amalh an lapanakni, pus an comandante xtalhanancha li wa lay wanajcha lakt'ikt'i kata'ilhtu'olh an Pablo, pus lhinawlh li katamaxtulhi an soldadojnin chi li katalhi'ampalh a'tami an tan tatawlachalh.
Akxni taputs'isilhcha, an Dios talakasunilhi an Pablo, chi juniy: "Pablo, jo'ati k'anaw, mu t'ach'a lhich'iwiniya kinchiwinti ani la'acha'an Jerusalén, wanajcha chuni k'a'ilht'uya'a la'acha'an Roma".

Akxni tunkunchalhcha, tichi yu'uncha judiojnin wa tamcha tak'atsaalh li katama'niyacha an Pablo, tanajun li ntu katitawaylh chi li ntu tu'u katita'otlhi sta li ntu tama'niy, tanawlhi li chuncha katalaya sawalh.
Palay de t'up'uxam (40) lapanakni yu chuncha talhitamakawlh.
Chi tala'alhcha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xalaktatanincha judiojnin, chi tat'alajuniy: —Kitnan iktamakajucha laka lhi'ay junita li ntu tu'u akti'u sta li ntu ikma'niyaw an Pablo.

Chaway uxitnan chi an ali'in an yu tama'ilhtuy ay junta, k'ask'initcha an comandante li lhiy katalhiminincha an Pablo, k'a'unit li wa oxicha palay k'atsaputunkan tuchini yu ilhtutacha, chi kitnan akla'asijawcha akma'niyaw akxni ntuka' chin.
Pero an sts'alh yu xt'alajamatsan an Pablo, k'atsaalh, pus alhi mak'atsaanini an Pablo an tan xtawilananchalh soldadojnin.
Wachuncha an Pablo t'asanilh pumatam kapitán, chi juniy: —K'alhip'inichika ani ts'alh an comandante, mu tuchichun kajuna'.
Pus an capitán lhi'anilhcha an ts'alh an comandante chi juniy: —An tach'in Pablo kixa'alalh chi kijuni li ma aklhiminin ani ts'alh, ma tuchichun jumputunan.
An comandante ma'ch'apachalhi an ts'alh chi lakatamcha lhi'alh, juniy: —¿Tisu k'i'ump'ut'uncha?
An ts'alh juniy: —An judiojnin tatamakawlhcha li lhiy ma katajunan li k'alhip'i an Pablo an laka junta, ma wa palaycha oxi k'atsaputunkan tuchini ilhtutacha katajunan.

Pero nt'u k'ajak'iklak'a'it'i, mu palay de t'up'uxam ixlapanaknik'ani tatats'e'ta, tapakxan'iya an Pablo, chi laka lhi'ay junita tanajunta li ma ntu katitawaylh chi ma ntu tu'u katita'otlhi sta li ma ntu tama'ni an Pablo, chaway tala'asijtacha, wayuchacha tapakxan'i t'ani k'aja'una'acha.
Wachuncha an comandante mala'achacho'olhcha an ts'alh, chi juniy li ntu xamati kajunilh li kiimak'atsaanilh.

An comandante jat'asanilh xt'uyunk'an xkapitanin, chi jajunilh li katamala'asijnilh la'at'uy ciento soldadojnin yu wa tach'aja'an, chi t'utump'uxam (60) yu laka kawayo chi la'at'uy ciento yu talaklhi'an xpatipnik'an, para li kata'alh la'acha'an Cesarea las nueve, akxni puts'istacha.
Chi lhinawpalh li kamala'asijninikalh kawayojo an Pablo, para li kaputawk'alhcha, chi lhinawlhcha an comandante li oxi kalhicha'ankalh an Pablo la x'ukxlakapu an gobernador Félix.
An comandante, jat'amala'achalhcha a'xtam carta tan ixnajunta:
Kit'in Claudio Lisias, ikmala'achaniyan ani cartaja gobernador Félix, chi ikla'axa'alayan.
Aniy lapanak yucha an judiojnini tach'apayawlh, chi xtama'niputuncha, pero akxni ijk'atsalh li yucha xalapanak Roma, ijkat'a'alhi an kisoldadojnin chi ijkima'alhtaxtulh.
Chi mu ijk'atsaputulhi tuchini xtalhi'alhtasuycha, pus iklhi'alhi an xta'ayxto'nun an judiojnin,
walh ijk'atsalhi li yu xtalhi'alhtasuy, yucha an xlamap'a'sink'an yu'uncha; pero ntu tu'u yu kalhima'nikalhcha, chi masi wa kamalaklhchawkalhcha laka pulach'in.
Chi chaway mu ijk'atsalhi li an judiojnin wa tama'niputun, pus xliyu iklhimala'achaniyan; chi wachucha ijkajunilhi an yu ta'alhtasuy li la mi'ukxlakapucha katalats'awalalh tuchini talhimuk'aycha.
An soldadojnin tacha yu jalhijunkalhcha chunchacha ta'ilhtulh, talhi'alhcha an Pablo puts'ista la'acha'an Antípatris.
Tunkunchalh, an soldadojnin an yu wa xtach'aja'anta, tacha'ancho'olhcha xtatawlay, chi an yu laka kawayo xta'anta, yu'unchacha tat'a'alh an Pablo.
Akxni tacha'alhcha la'acha'an Cesarea, taxta'nilhcha an gobernador an carta chi an Pablo.
Chi akxni punaw'olhcha an gobernador an carta, lhasakminilhcha tanchuncha xla'acha'an an Pablo, chi akxni k'atsalhcha li jamacha'a Cilicia,
juniy: —Akxni katachinacha an yu ta'alhtasuyan, akxnicha ak'asmatniyan. Chi wachuncha lhinawlhcha li kalhi'ankalhcha an la xpalacio Herodes chi li oxi kalhistakkalh.

La'akisicha wilhchan la'pusli, an Ananías yu xa'aycha tukan sacerdote ixjunita, jat'acha'alhcha la'acha'an Cesarea ali'in an yu laktatanincha chi pumatamcha abogado ixjunkan Tértulo. Tala'cha'alhcha an gobernador para li kata'alhtasulhcha an Pablo.

Akxni lhicha'ankalhcha an Pablo, an Tértulo tsukulhcha ja'alhtasunun, juniy an Félix: —Lhimala'puchajuncha jamach'alhkat, mu milakata li oxi sa' wilakalh, chi lhuw tanlhuni oxi la'ts'ilhi'ankanta ani la'acha'an la mijatapast'ak'at.
Kitnan wa tanchuncha ikla'ts'inawi t'ach'a an t'ap'ats'at'a'un chi sawalhcha iklaxta'niyaw lhimala'puchajun.
Chi para ntucha ali akmama'tijlan, iktapayniniyanka li akila'asmatniwka tam pants'ik'is.
Aniy lapanak ikla'cha'antaw wa sawalhcha jalakt'ilhi'ulanan, wa sawalhcha jalama'ayniya an judiojnin ta xli'ay an lakaamunulhpa', chi yucha yu xa'ay an jajunkan li nazarenojnin.
Chi an laka tajtan ix'ilhtuputuni yu ntu makawkan ka'ilhtukalh, xliyu kitnan iklhich'apayaju, chi kitnancha xak'ilhtuputunaw tacha an najunta lakilhamap'a'sink'an.
Pero an Comandante Lisias kintama'xa'axtun,
chi jamala'achachalhcha yu katamin mak'atsaaninin tani klayawcha, para li aniya akmiw. K'alhisakmit'icha uxint'iy ani lapanak, k'ak'ats'aya'acha li chun sawalhi chux tacha an iklhi'alhtasuyaw.
An judiojnin yu ancha xtat'ajun wa tamcha ixtanajun.

Pus an gobernador tamakyawnilhi an Pablo li kachiwinilhcha, an Pablo najun: —Kinta'achanini akchiwinina aknawna kimputa'a'tayjun, mu ijk'atsayi li uxint'i ma'anch'ach'a wilhnin milhijues ani la'acha'an.
Uxint'i layi k'alhasakmin li sawalhi yu iknajun li wa la'akawt'uyka wilhchani ikchilh la'acha'an Jerusalén para li aktapayninilh an Dios,

chi ntu a'tami aki'a'taymakalhcha akt'alakikxtukulh xamati', u li ajkalaktilhlhicha an lapanakni an lakatajtan chi an lakalakcha'a tan tapula'ta'ayxto'palay, u wa tanchuncha an la'acha'an ajkalaktilhlhi.
Aniy lapanakni jantu layi katitamasulh tu'u para li katasulhcha li sawalhi yu kintalhi'alhtasuy.

Pero yu iknajun la mi'ukxlakapu: kit'in ikt'atapatsay an Dios yu xtakiklaka'iy an kilakpaynin tacha yu najuntacha ka'ilhtukalh yu Sast'i Tij, yuchaa an yu tajuniy ani lapanakni ma tumpaj jatapast'ak'ati yu ik'ilhtuy, mu kit'in ijkiklaka'i'ojoyi tacha an ts'o'muk'akanta laka laklibro yu puwilh lhamap'a'sin chi an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
Chi tacha yu'uncha tanajun, kit'in wanajcha chuni iknajun, ikpakxan'iya li an Dios kajamala'awnicho'oya an yu talaknitacha, yu oxi lapanakni chi yu wa ay tajunita.
Xliyu kit'in lhilhiji iklhit'alay li stalan'a kawalh kijatapast'ak'at la x'ukxlakapu an Dios chi an lapanakni.
La'alhuwcha k'ata ijki'aklatsukulh tan tumpaj la'acha'anaxni, chi chaway ijkalhiminitacha an yu ikpusaklhi tumin an jakilhpatinin chi akma'axtaniyacha lha'ulani an Dios.

Yucha xakla't'ajun akxni tichi yu'uncha judiojnin jamacha'an xalakaat'un Asia kintala'cha'alh an laka tajtan, chi kit'in xakstalan'antacha, pero jantu tu'u lhilhuw xt'awkan ancha chi ntu tu'u xajkalaktilht'ajun an lapanakni.
Yu'uncha yu ani kaxtatsukulh chi xakinta'alhtasulhcha li sna tu'u yu lay akintalhi'alhtasulh,
chi li jantu, yu'uncha anicha tat'ajuni katanawlh li sna tu'u tala'alhini kila'cha'aninikalh akxni xakilhi'ankanta laka ay junta yu ta'ilhtulh an judiojnin.

Yu ijk'atsay iknawlh chi p'asi iknawlh, ta'asmat'ojoy, sna yucha lay katajunilh, iknawlh: "Chaway uxitnancha kilajunt'awnaw li oxi u jantu, wa xliyu li ijkiklaka'iya li katala'awcho'oya an yu talaknitacha."

Akxni chunchacha asmatlhi an Félix, mu yucha oxi ixk'atsay ixlakata an sast'i tij, wachuncha makawlh ani lakchiwinti, jajuniy: —Akxni kaminacha an comandante Lisias, akxniy ajk'atsaya oxi tuchini ixlakatacha yu ani la't'ant'at.
Chi an Félix lhijunilhcha an capitán li an Pablo kalhistakkalh, pero li kamakawnilhi li layi ka'ilhtulh tu'u yu ilhtuputun, chi li an yu oxi xjat'alalhi'an an Pablo li layi katala'cha'alh.

La'puslicha wilhchan, a'tamcha cha'ampalhi an Félix, ixt'a'anta ixt'iwi ixjunkan Drusila, yucha judía. Pus an Félix lhinawlhcha li kakit'asanikalhi an Pablo, chi alha'asmatlhicha yu xlichiwiniy, an Pablo xlichiwiniy li kakiklaka'ikalhi an Jesucristo.

Pero akxni asmatlhicha an Félix li an Pablo xlichiwiniy li ts'ajwi katsukukalh chi li ka'akstu ilhtukawi li ka'ilhtuwi yu oxi, chi li Diosi kanawna akxni ka'ukla'oya tichini yu oxicha ixt'ajun chi tichini yu jantucha, an Félix talhanalh, pus junkan an Pablo: —K'ap'inchicha. Akt'asanipalanka akxni kapulhijumpala'.
Chi an Félix ixpakxan'i li an Pablo ka'ixta'nilh tumin, xliyu wanajcha a'lhuwi ixt'asani chi xt'alakchiwinicha.

La'at'uy k'ata chuncha la'pusli; xli'astan an Félix taxtucho'olhcha xligobernador, yucha an Porcio Festojcha tawlhnicho'olh, chi mu an Félix oxi ixjat'alamakawputun an judiojnin, pus malaklhchawlhka an Pablo.
An Festo cha'alhcha para li kajama'tayananacha xligobernador, chi la'at'utucha wilhchan la'pusli an la'acha'an Cesarea taxtulhcha, alhcha la'acha'an Jerusalén.
Ancha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xalaj'ajin judiojnin tachiwimaj'alhcha an Pablo la xmakni an Festo.
Wanaj wa lhilakatijtam tajunilhi li kalhinawlhi li an Pablo kalhi'ankalhi la'acha'an Jerusalén. Yu'uncha, yu xtapastakta, li an Pablo ka xma'nikalhi an laka tij.
Pero an Festo jajuniy li an Pablo kataylhi'ana katalaklhchawya la'acha'an Cesarea, chi jajuniy li wanaj yucha past'ak'a ka'ana wa tukan.
Jajuniy: —Xliyu amijamach'alhkatnik'an akintat'a'alhi la'acha'an Cesarea, walh lani li ani lapanak ilhtuta tu'u tala'alhin, anchacha lay k'a'alht'asuya'it.

An Festo ka tacha la'atsajin u la'akaw wilhchani ixt'ajun la'acha'an Jerusalén, chi wachuncha ancho'olhcha la'acha'an Cesarea. Tunkunchalh tawlhnilhcha xlich'alhkat chi lhinawlhcha li kalhi'anikalhcha an Pablo.
Akxni tanuchalhcha an Pablo, an judiojnin yu xtamintachalh Jerusalén tacha'alhcha chi tanlhuncha yu laj'alhp'asi talhi'alhtasulh, masi ntu inta lay putasulh li sawalh.
Chi an Pablo para li kaputa'a'tayjulhcha ixnajun: —Kit'in tu tu'u k'ilhtuta tu'u tala'alhin, u tu'u ak'ilhtunilh tala'alhin an xlamap'a'sink'an judiojnin, u an tajtan, u an ay xajamachalhkat Roma.
Pero mu an Festo oxi ixjat'atamakawputun an judiojnin, pus lhisakmilhi an Pablo, juniy: —¿K'uxap'ini Jerusalén para li ancha aklats'awalachalh milakata?
An Pablo alhtaylh, juniy: —La xlakapu xajamach'alhkat Romaja ikt'ajun, aniya lay akint'alats'awalakana'. Tacha uxint'i oxi k'ats'ay, jantu tu'u yu ntucha oxi ijka'ilhtunita an judiojnin.

Li tu'u k'ilhtuta tala'alhin yu lay akilhima'nikalh, aklhiniyacha, pero li ntu tu'u yu sawalh tacha an kintalhi'alhtasuy, jantu xamati t'acha'an lay akima'axta'lhi la xmaknik'an ani lapanakni. Yucha an ay jamach'alhkatcha iknajun li akijunilh li oxi u jantu tani iklaycha.

Wa chuncha an Festo jalhisakmilhcha an xt'ajamach'alhkatni tani yu oxicha kawalh, pus najun: —Mu li yucha an ay jamach'alhkatch'a na'un li kajunin li oxi u jantu t'ani laycha, yuch'ach'a k'ala'p'ina'a.
La'alhucha wilhchani la'pusli, an rey Agripa chi an Berenice ta'alh la'acha'an Cesarea, ta'alh la'axa'alanin an Festo.
Chi mu la'alhuw wilhchani ancha xtat'awnachalh, an Festo junilhi an rey ixlakata an Pablo. Juniy: —Aniy t'ajun pumatam lapanak yu an Félix malaklhchawlh.
Akxni xakt'awnachalh la'acha'an Jerusalén, an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi an xalaktatanincha judiojnin kintala'cha'alh, tan tachiwimaj'an ani lapanak, kintajuni li ma kama'nikalhcha.

Kit'in ijkajuni li an xajamach'alhkat Roma jantu chuni ilhtuy li kama'nilhcha xamati tach'in li ntu p'ulhnajcha jat'alats'awalayi an yu tachiwimaj'an, para li kachiwinilhcha wachu', li sna sawalh u jantu yu lhi'alhtasukan.
Xliyu akxni takilachilhcha yu'uncha, jantucha ikpakxanilh, wanaj wa tunkunchalh iktawilhcha la kintants'i an tan ikch'alhkatnan, chi iklhinawlhcha li kalhiminkalhcha an lapanak.
Pero an yu tacha'alhcha li xta'alhtasuycha, jantu tu'u talhimuk'alh tu'u yu kit'in xakpast'ak'a li sna yuchacha tala'alhini ilhtuta.
Yu xtalhimuk'ay wa ixlakatacha tanlhun yu takiklaka'i, chi tichiyuchacha Jesús yu nitacha, yu an Pablo najun ma la'ajunta.
Chi mu kit'in jantu ijk'atsay tani aklhit'alalhcha yu yucha ixlakata, iklhisakmilhi an Pablo li sna k'uxa'ani Jerusalén para li anchacha kat'alats'awalakanchalh aniy tanlhun.
Pero yucha najun li ma yucha an ay jamach'alhkatcha kat'alats'awalalh, pus kit'in iklhinawlh li katanulhka laka pulach'in sta li akxni laycha akmala'acha'niya an ay jamach'alhkat.
Wachuncha an rey Agripa juniy an Festo: —Kit'in wachu ik'alha'asmatputuni anchunu lapanak. An Festo ja'alhtayanalh, najun: —Lhiycha k'a'alha'asmat'a'a.

Tunkunchalh, an Agripa chi an Berenice sawalhcha oxi tala'mala'ch'ininta tacha'alh, chi tatanuchalhcha an tan kalakchiwinkana', tat'acha'alhcha an xalaj'ajin soldadojnin chi an xalaj'ajincha lapanakni an la'acha'an. An Festo lhinawlhcha li kalhiminkalhcha an Pablo,

chi najun: —Rey Agripa chi chux lapanakni yu ani kintat'a'ayxto'nunan: Anich'a la'ts'inat'iti ani lapanak. Chux an judiojnin wa lhuwcha tanlhuni talhi'alhtasuy, ta'alhtasuyi an la'acha'an Jerusalén chi ani Cesarea, chi ntu sa' talajkilhuni kintask'ini li ma kama'nikalhcha.

Pero kit'in iknajun jantu tu'u ilhtuta tala'alhin, para li kama'nikalhcha. Chi ix'akstu najun li yucha an ay jamach'alhkatcha ma kajunilh li oxi u jantu tani laycha, pus kit'in ikpastaklhicha li akmala'achaniyacha la'acha'an Roma an ay jamach'alhkat.

Pero mu ntu tu'u yu oxicha ajk'atsaalh ixlakata yucha, para li akts'o'nilhcha an ay jamach'alhkat, pus chaway uxitnancha iklalhiminitaw, pero uxint'i yu palay iklhisakmiyani rey Agripa, tani yu oxicha kawalh, para li xli'astan laycha tu'u akts'o'lhi.
Mu wanaj tucha k'is pujatapast'ak'ati li laycha akmala'achalh xamati tach'in li ntu tu'u iknajun tuchini lhi'alhtasukancha.
Wachuncha an rey Agripa juniy an Pablo: —Layi k'ach'iwin t'uch'ini nawp'ut'uncha yu tacha mimputa'a'tayjuncha. Pus an Pablo tamakch'ixli chi chunchunicha tsukulh chiwiniy:
Oxi ijk'atsan li chaway layi akchiwina la mi'ukxlakapu'u rey Agripa, para li aknawlh li ntu sawalhi chux tacha an kintalhi'alhtasuy an judiojnin.
Chi palaycha oxi iklhiwilay mu uxint'i oxi misp'a'o'oy tacha an talhismanita an judiojnin chi tacha aniy tanlhun yu iklalhikikxtukuyaw. Xliyu iklhisk'iniyan lamapaynin li xlak'anti ak'i'asmatnin.
Ixchuxk'an an judiojnin tak'atsayi tani kijatsukunticha, akxni xakt'ajun lakint'un chi la'acha'an Jerusalén, sta akxni wa ts'alhka xajkunita, tak'atsay.
Wachu tak'atsayi li kit'in wa ijkun'alhitacha fariseo, tan lakask'inkan li ts'awj sawalhi kamuktaxtukalh yu kiklaka'ikan, chi layi katanawlh li tanawputun.
Chi chaway xliyuchacha kintalhilhiminta ani li kanawkalhcha li oxi u jantu yu k'ilhtuy wa xliyu li kit'in ikpakxan'iya tacha an jajunilh an Dios an yu ta ixjalhila'ts'inaw.

An kilhmakkawt'uy kilapanaknik'an ta'alin xalakaat'un Israel, tapakxan'iya li tala'ts'imputuni li chuncha kuna tacha an nawlh an Dios, xliyu talhitapayniniya an Dios chi tat'atapatsayi tunku chi puts'ista. Rey Agripa, pus ixlakata yu tacha ani pakxan'ikan li ka'ilhtuya an Dios, an judiojnin yuchacha yu kintalhi'alhtasuy chaway.
¿Tasu li uxitnan jant'u k'iklak'a'iyat'iti li an Dios layi jamala'awnicho'oy an yu talaknitacha?
Kit'in xlip'ulhnaj xaknajun li oxicha li akstak tanchanilh yu ilhtuputun an Jesús jamacha'a Nazaret,

chi chunchacha k'ilhtulh an Jerusalén. Yu'uncha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnincha kintamakawnilh. Wanaj xluwk'ani ijkamalaklhchawlh laka pulach'in an yu xtakikla'i an Jesús; chi akxni xjama'nikancha, kit'in wa tamcha xakma'najun.

Kit'in wanaj a'lhuwi ijkamama'alh'ajnilh para li katanawlhcha li ntucha ali katitakiklaka'ilh, wa asi xajkamanawnicha. Wa tanchuncha an laka lakcha'a an tan ixtapula'ta'ayxt'o'a chuncha xajka'ilhtuy, chi sawalhcha xakintama'talh'aman, xaktapujuycha xajkach'a'o'ay masi lakatamincha la'acha'anaxni.
Yuchacha xaktila'ampalay la'acha'an Damasco, mu kintamakawnilhcha an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin chi yu'uncha kintasakxtulh.

Pero an laka tijcha, rey, ikla'ts'ilh la'atam alhp'as jatapulhkunu', atunkucha ixjunita, ani jatapulhkunu yu ikla'ts'ilh palay alhp'as, an wilhchan jantu, wanaj kila'atanchanu'olh chi an yu kixtat'a'anta.

Kinchuxk'ani kla'ta'a'taw, klaktama'ocha'aw lakaat'un, chi kit'in k'asmatlhi kijunkan lhi'ebreo: "Saulo, Saulo, ¿T'asu li k'ilhit'ama'ch'ap'uycha? Wa mi'akst'uch'a lhit'ama'ch'ap'uk'an li laych'a k'int'alasap'ut'un".
Pus wachuncha iknajun: "¿Tisi uxint'icha Jamach'alhkat?" An Jamach'alhkat ki'alhtaylh, kijuniy: "Kit'in Jesús, kit'ini k'ilhit'ama'ch'ap'uy".
Chaway k'a'ost'aycha, k'at'aycha, mu iktalakasunin para li uxint'i ak'int'at'ap'ats'at'icha chi k'anawna'acha t'ach'a ani la'ts'i chi yu aklakmasunipalanka'.
Kit'in ak'ilhtuya li ntu tani kata'ilhtun an judiojnin chi an yu ntu judiojnin, mu ancha akmala'achayan.

Ancha akmala'achayan an tan tawilanalh, para li k'ajamalak'awanit'i chi ntucha ali katalakalhtanalhi lakaaputs'isni, tan putunkucha katalakalhtanalh. Para li ntucha yucha an satanasi kajalhilatsukulh, yucha an Dioscha katach'a'o'alh, chi akintakiklaka'ilhcha. Walh lani kajamala'mixinikana ixtala'alhink'an, chi chuncha katala'a'iya yu kajaxta'nikana an la'stalan'an ixlapanakni Dios".
"Pus kit'ini rey Agripa, jantu wa ijkapmaj'alhi tacha an ikla'ts'ilh, yu lakt'iyan minchalh.

Yu p'ulhnajcha ijkamak'atsaanilh aniy chiwinti yu'uncha an jamacha'an Damasco chi ampalh yu'uncha an jamacha'ancha Jerusalen chi chux an la'acha'anaxni yu lak'alin an la xalakaat'un Judea chi wachu an yu ntu judiojnin, ijkajunicha li katakiklaka'ilhi an Dios chi li katach'a'o'alhcha chi li kata'ilhtulhcha tanlhun yu kataputasulhcha li sawalhcha li takiklaka'icha.
Yuchacha ixlakata li an judiojnin kintach'apayawlhcha an laka tajtan chi kixtama'niputuncha.

Pero an Dios yucha yu ki'a'tayjuy li sta chaway watachacha chuncha iknajun, ta lhichuxi ijkalhixa'alay Dios, laj'ajin chi lakt'ikt'in. Jantu tu'u yu ntucha chun ajkajunilh an lapanakni an tacha ixnajun Moisés chi an yu tacha ixtanajun yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, li katapasaya'.

Tan ixtanajun li an Cristo chuncha xt'acha'an li kaniya', pero xli'astan li yucha p'ulh kala'awcho'oya', chi li kajalhixa'alayacha chi jamasuniyacha an jatapulhkunu yu puta'alhtaxtukan an judiojnin chi an yu ntu judiojnin".
Akxni chunchacha naw'olh an Pablo yu tacha ixputa'alhtaxtuncha, an Festo p'ascha chiwinilh, najun: —¡Wa lok'ojlaycha Pablo! Wa xliyu sawalhch'a jat'alaninin wa lhilok'ojlach'o'oycha.
Pero an Pablo alhtaylh, juniy: —Kit'in tu wa iklokojo, Festo, kit'in yu iknajun sawalh chi pujalakpastaknat.

An rey Agripa oxi k'atsay yu tacha ani iknajun, xliyu ntu ijkiktalhanani la x'ukxlakapu', chi kit'in oxi ijk'atsay li yucha wachu oxi k'atsay tacha ani iknawt'ajun, mu yucha ntu wa intacha tapasata tan wa la'asa'nik'acha.
Rey Agripa, ¿K'iklak'a'iya an yu tanawlh an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios? Kit'in ijk'atsayi li k'iklak'a'i.
An rey Agripa alhtaylh chi juniy: —Wanaj wa puwalas ¿k'i'ilht'up'ut'uncha li ajkiklaka'ilhi Cristo?

An Pablo juniy: —Wa puwalas u ma'an, an Dios chunchacha kanawlh li uxint'i chi ixchuxk'an an yu kinta'alha'asmatt'ajun chaway, wachucha chuni katawalh tacha kit'in, pero yu'uncha jantu tu'u katitalhi'alh cadena.
Wachuncha tayalhi an rey chi an gobernador chi an Berenice chi ixchuxk'an an yu ancha xtaalakwilanalh,
chi tatala'xtinulhcha, ta'alhcha lakchiwinin. Ixtalajuniy: —Aniy lapanak tu tu'u ilhtuta yu laycha kalhima'nikalh; jantu t'acha'ani masi wa kamalaklhchawkalhcha.
Pus an Agripa juniy an Festo: —Layi kaxmakawkalh ani lapanak li ntu wa la'ayajcha najuni li yucha an ay jamach'alhkatcha kajunilh li oxi u jantu tani laycha.
Akxni nawkalhcha li akintamak'ankanancha xalakaat'un Italia, an Pablo chi an ali'in tach'inin jama'axta'nikalhcha pumatam capitán ixjunkan Julio, yu ixt'ajun la xbatayón an ay jamach'alhkat.

Chi ik'awcha, ikpu'awcha la'atam barco yu taxtuchalh la'acha'an Adramitio, tukancha ixti'an xalakaat'un Asia. Wachu ani ixt'ajun an Aristarco an tan xakt'awnaw, yucha jamacha'a Tesalónica, xalakaat'un Macedonia.

La'atamcha wilhchan juncho'olh, ikcha'awcha la xkilhtu an lakxkan, la'acha'ancha Sidón, ancha an Julio sawalhcha oxi ixa'alay an Pablo chi makawnilhcha li kajala'alh la'pixiyalhna an yu oxi xjat'alalhi'an chi li yu'unchacha katalhistaklhi.
Iktaxtupalaw la'acha'an Sidón iktaylhi'ampalawi kintijk'an laka barco, xakpamatanchananawcha an lhtayan tantanun lakaat'un an lakxkan, yu junkan Chipre, mu an un wa xakintalakatast'uk'an.
Wakcha ik'ukx'awi an lakxkan, wanicha an xkilhtu xalakaat'un Cilicia chi xalakaat'un Panfiliaja ikpu'aw, chi ikcha'awcha la'acha'an Mira, xalakaat'un Licia.
Ancha an ixkapitank'an an soldadojnin la'cha'alh la'atam barco yu xanawin la'acha'an Alejandría, ixti'an xalakaat'un Italia, pus anchacha kintamujun, para li aktaylhi'awcha kintijk'an.

La'alhuw wilhchani wa laksnicha ik'aw chi sawalhcha lhima'anxkayi ikcha'aw xlakapu an la'acha'an Gnido. Chi mu an un wa xakintalakatast'uk'an, pus tucha kintamakawnini aktaylhi'aw kintijk'an, pus an xlakapucha la'acha'an tan junkan Salmóni ik'aw, la x'a'lhch'a an lhtayan tantanun t'un an lakxkan yu junkan Creta, para li akpamatanchanawcha.
Chi masi sawalhcha lhima'anxkayi iktaylhi'aw kintijk'an an laka barco, wa chux ixkilhtu an lakxkan, ikcha'awcha tanchun junkan Buenos Puertos, wani la'acha'an Lasea.
Wa stakcha ikma'ats'an'awi panch'e'ex chi lhima'anxkaycha li ali xaktaylhi'awi kintijk'an an laka barco an lakxkan, mu iso'omintacha ixpaku lhik'asnin. Pus an Pablo jajuniy:
Kit'in kla'ts'in li ani jalhtanti lhima'anxkayi kajuna'a lapanakni, kama'ats'an'ayawi ani barco chi an xtak'uk'at chi sta layi kama'ats'an'aw an kijatsukuntik'an.
Pero an xkapitank'an an soldadojnin palay kiklaka'ilhi an yu jamanawin an barco chi an yu malhtanay, an Pablo tu asmatnilh.

Chi mu anchunu la xkilhtu lakxkan jantu oxi ancha aktamakawlh akxni lhik'asnin, pus lanan ixchuxk'ani tapastaklhi li palay oxi jantu an katatamakawlh, talhit'alalhi tacha'amputulh la'acha'an Fenice xalakaat'un Creta para li anchacha aktamakaju ixpaku lhik'asnin. An Fenice tan xlita'aknuyachalh wilhchani xlilaka'anta.

Akxni tsukulhcha mincho'oyachalhi an un yu wa laksni, lhitalaktsin, tapastaklhicha li laycha katataylhi'ancho'olh an ixtijk'an, pus tataxtulhcha, wa laxkilhtucha an Cretaja tapu'alh, ay t'un yu lhtayan tantanun an lakxkan, tapu'alhcha an barco.
Pero ntu tukancha ta'a'ma'alh, xli'astan kintapaxto'ni la'atam p'as un, yu junkan Eroclidón, chi p'ascha putalakanuchalh an barco,
pus tsukulhcha tisalhi'an. Chi mu ntucha layi xakmalaka'aniyaw an barco an tan xliminachalh an un, pus wa iklhitamakawniwcha li katisalhi'alhcha an un an barco.
Akxni xakla'pust'awnawcha lax'a'lhch'a yu junkan Clauda, la'atam kilht'ikt'i t'un yu lhtayan tantanun an lakxkan, lanancha ikpamatanchanaw, akxnicha asi ikch'apacha'aw an bote yu puta'alhtaxtukan.

Chi akxni tamujuchalhcha an bote an laka barco, xli'astan tala'ach'ilhcha laka lasojo an barco, para li kalhitayanilh. Wachuncha, mu xtatalhanani li p'asi katawj talakanuchalh an barco an tan opej opej ixlakwilh kukuj tan lhimapa'a'ukan Sirte, pus talakp'uxnilhi an la'lhmaniya la'ch'it an barco chi talhitamakawlhcha li yucha an uncha kajalhi'alh watanchuncha.
Tunkunchalh, an p'as un, p'aska ixlay, pus tsukulhcha talakmujuyi an lakxkan an yu xlaktajun an laka barco.
Xlila'at'utucha wilhchan walh, talakt'alhtamaj'olhcha an xalaktanlhun an barco an lakxkan.
Wachuncha la'alhuw wilhchani jantucha xtalakasuy an wilhchan chi an st'akunin, chi tacha an stakcha kixtaputalakanuyani an p'as un chi an xkan wanajcha xaknawnawi li ntucha aktita'alhtaxtu.

Chi mu wanajcha la'alhuw wilhchani jantucha xaklakwaynaw, an Pablo tayalhi lakimpujank'an chi najun: —¡Lapanakni, palay oxi xakila'asmatniw jantu kaxtaxtucha'awi Creta, chuncha ntu chuni kaxputapasaw tacha ani putapasayaw.
Chaway jant'u k'ala't'a'oxila'alhit'it, mu ntu xamati katinilh, wa yucha an barcojo kats'an'aya'.
Mu ts'isicha kintalakasunilh pumatam angelh, yucha an Dios yu ikt'alhtananta chi ikt'atapatsayi ixmala'achatachalh,
chi kijuniy: "Pablo, jant'u k'at'alhan, mu k'ach'ip'ina'a la x'ukxlakapu an ay jamach'alhkat Roma, chi milakata kajama'alhtaxtuni'oya an Dios ixchuxk'an an yu ani jat'at'anta laka barco."
Pus xliyu iklalhijunawi lapanakni, jo'at'i k'ana'unt'it, mu kit'in ijkiklaka'iya an Dios chi ijk'atsayi li chuncha katapasaya tacha an kijunilh an ángelh.
Pero inta tacha an lhtayan lhtayan laktantanun t'un an lakxkani katawj kitalakanuyaw.

La'atam jatats'isni akxni cha'alhcha la'at'uy samana xakt'awnaw laka barco an alamalh tan junkan Adriático, akxni wa tanchuncha xakintalhi'anan an p'as un, ka tacha ixjaytatnant'ajuncha an yu tatapatsay laka barco talhakapu'alhcha li xakcha'ant'awnawcha lakaat'un.
Chi talhkalhi tani xlitalhmancha an lakxkan, tak'atsalhi li 36 metrojo xlitalhman ixjunita, palaycha ik'aw, a'tam talhkapalh, akxni wa 27 metrojcha xlitalhman ixjunita.

Chi mu xtatalhanancha li wa lay katawj kitalakanulhi an barco an lakaachiwxin, pus tamujulhcha la'at'at'i yu lay kasa' putawilh an barco, lhilax'istaja tapumujulh, chi xtatapayninicha an Dios li katunkunlhicha.
Pero an yu xtatapatsay laka barco ixta'ostakutputun, pus tsukulhcha tama'alhtajuyi an bote yu puta'alhtaxtukan, ma wa katamujuyacha lhilaxkinkapu ali an yu sa' putawlay barcojo ixtalay.
Pero an Pablo jajuniy an kapitán chi an soldadojnin: —Li ani yu tatapatsay laka barco jantu kasa' titatajulh, uxitnan jant'u lay k'at'it'a'alht'axt'ut.
Pus wachuncha an soldadojnin tach'uk'ulhi an laso an yu xpulakch'i'ulakanta an bote yu puta'alhtaxtukan, chi tamaka'alhcha an lakxkan.
Wa tunkunminta, an Pablo ixchuxk'ancha jajunilh li tu'ucha kata'ulh, jajuniy: —La'at'uycha samanaja jant'uch'a t'u'u uyat'it, wa xliyu la'ts'imp'ut'unat'iti tuchini katapasayacha.
Chaway klask'iniyaw lamapaynin lananch'a k'a'ut'iti tu'u', mu chunchaa lhitask'ini, para k'ats'uk'ut'it, chi ntu xamati katima'ats'an'alh masi wa ma'atamcha ix'ay.
Akxni chunchacha nawlh an Pablo, xa'a'ilhcha a'xtam pan chi xta'nilhcha lhimala'puchajuni an Dios, tan ixchuxk'an xtayanalh. Chi an Pablo puch'e'elhcha chi tsukulhcha uy.
Xli'astan ixchuxk'an wachucha tatapujulhi tsukulh talak'uy.
An laka barco 276 lapanakni xak'antaw.
Akxni talaj'o'atsalhcha, tatamaj'olhcha an trigo an lakxkan para li ntucha ts'ink'i kawalh an barco.

An yu xtatapatsay laka barco jantu xtajala'mispanani tanchuncha an lakaat'un an yu xtala'ts'in, pero ixtala'ts'ini li oxi pukulhuk ixjunita an xtamp'in anchunu lakaat'un, pus ixtalhipuxkawnicha tani anchacha katalhimalakanu'ulachalh an barco.

Talakch'uk'ulhcha an laso an yu ixpulakch'ikanta an yu sa' xpu'ulakay barco, talakmakawjulhcha an lakxkan, chi an laso an yu ixpulakch'ikanta an yu pumalhtanakan an barco wachucha talakch'uk'ulh. Xli'astan tamuk'anicho'olhcha an xala'ch'it an barco, yu putalakanuy an un, para li kajalhtanalh, chi kacha'alhcha lakaat'un.

Walh lakatam tan opej lakanuwilhchalh kukuj, ancha tawj takinkalakanuchalh an barco, chi anchacha kinkala'awtawilh, jantucha lay ixlaklay chi an la x'istaj tsukulhcha talakt'ilhi, mu p'asi an tacha milh milh xlay an xkan.
An soldadojnin ixtama'niputuni an tach'inin, para li ntu katajaxk'iwitnijpatakutlhi chi kata'oslicha.

Pero an ixkapitank'an an soldadojnin, mu ixma'alhtaxtuputuni an Pablo, jantu jamakawnilh, apalij jajuniy li katatajulhcha p'ulhnaja an lakxkan li yu layi tajaxk'iwitnin, para li katacha'alhcha lakaat'un.
Chi an ali'in ma laka lht'a'alak'iwcha katapu'alh u laka tu'ucha xt'ata'aklhtanchajun an barcojo katapu'alh. Chunchacha yu kinchuxk'an ikcha'aw lakaat'un, ikta'alhtaxtu'ojo.
Akxni ikta'alhtaxtucha, ijk'atsaw li an tan xakt'awnaw lakaat'un yu wanaj la'atanchanu'ojota xkan ma junkan Malta.
Chi an yu ancha jamacha'an sawalhcha oxi kintala'ts'in; tamakilhnulhcha jikmi chi kinchuxchak'ani kintala'a'in, mu xliyu xmin an xkan chi lhik'asnini ixjunita.
Chi an Pablo laksaklhicha ix'a'atan'alat k'iw yu ixlakxixtacha chi map'ulhcha an laka jikmi, walh ancha taxtulh la'atam tsapulh, mu ix'ichicha, chi olencha maktawk'achalhi an Pablo.

Akxni an yu ancha jamacha'an tala'ts'ilhcha an tsapulh li olencha ma'ch'ita an Pablo, ixtalajuniy: "Aniy lapanak o'sliyani li jama'nini', masi li pa'osnuncha ani lakxkan, pero an Dios tu katimakawnilhi ali katsukulh."
Pero an Pablo tamajk'alhalhi an laka jikmi chi tap'ulhi an tsapulh, jantu tani lalh an Pablo.

An lapanakni yu'uncha ixtapakxan'icha li kamajk'unacha, u li kata'a'tayacha chi kaniyacha; pero mu panijnicha tapakxalh chi tala'ts'ilhcha li ntu tani lalh, pus tamcha tapastakpalh, ixtanajun ma dios.
Wani ancha an tan xakt'awnaw, ix'alin jalhi'ay lakaat'un, ix'anun tichiyucha lapanak yu xlitapalay ancha, ixjunkan Publio, yucha sawalhcha oxi kintala'a'in la ixcha'a la'at'utu wilhchan.

Walh an ixpay an Publio ixmalh la xputamat sawalhcha ixch'apata alhp'as iskakat chi wa ixak'alhnatantin; pus an Pablo alh la'ts'ini pulakni tan ixmachalh chi t'atapaynilhcha, xli'astan lakpach'apalhcha walh ta'oxilhcha.
Akxni chunchacha ilhtulh, an yu wachu ixtala'ta'an'ay yu de ancha, wachucha ixtala'cha'an chi ixjak'uch'uycha;
chi sawalhcha xkintalhakapu'ankanan chi xkintalhiwilakanan; chi akxni ikpu'ancho'ocha barco tanlhuncha kintamalhi'anin yu akma'lhtask'iniyaw.

La'at'utucha malhkuyu walh, xakt'awnaw anchunu lakaat'un yu wanaj la'acho'oni'ojoy xkan, xli'astan ikpu'awcha la'atam barco yu minchalh la'acha'an Alejandría, yu ancha ixtamakajunta ta ixlima'an ixpaku ixjunita lhik'asnin, an barco ix'ayts'o'ulakanta Cástor chi Pólux, yu tacha diosnincha xjala'ts'inkan an Alejandría yuchacha ixpumispakan.
Akxni ikcha'awcha la'acha'an Siracusa, la'at'utu wilhchani ancha iktamakajuw.
Chi akxni iktaxtunipalaw, wa japiktucha ikpu'aw chi ikcha'awcha la'acha'an Regio; tunkunchalh sua'a'acha ixminachalhi un yu lhitalaktsin, chi la'atam wilhchan jumpalh ikcha'awcha la'acha'an Puteoli.
Ancha ijkala'cha'aw ali'in t'ala'awnin chi sawalhcha kintask'inin lamapaynini li ajkat'atamakajuw la'atujun wilhchan, xli'astan ik'awcha la'acha'an Roma.

An la'acha'an Roma ancha tak'atsaalhi an t'ala'awnin li ik'antacha'aw, pus kintakitastukni sta la'acha'an Foro de Apio chi tan junkan las Tres Tabernas; chi akxni jala'ts'ilhcha an Pablo xta'nilhcha lhimala'puchajuni an Dios chi oximaj'aycha k'atsalh.
Akxni ikcha'awcha la'acha'an Roma, an Pablo makawnikalhcha li layi katawilh wa tanchuncha oxi lhiwilay laka cha'a', pero ixlistakta pumatam soldado.

La'at'utucha wilhchan la'pusli, an Pablo lhinawlh li kajat'asanikalhi an xalaj'ajin judiojnin an Roma, akxni tata'ayxto'lhicha jajuniy: —T'ala'awnin, kit'in jantu tani ijka'ilhtuy an judiojnin chi ntu tani iklak'ilhtuy tacha an xtalhismanitacha an yu ta ixjalhila'ts'inaw. Walh an la'acha'an Jerusalén ikma'axta'kalhi la xmakak'an an jamacha'an Roma,
chi yu'uncha kixtamakawputuni akxni kintalhisakmi'olhcha, mu ntu tu'u kintala'cha'aninilh tu'ucha ixlakata para li akima'nikalh.
Pero an judiojnin tanawlhi li ntu akimakawkalh, pus kit'in iknawlhi li yucha an ay jamach'alhkati yu akint'alats'awalalh, masi ntu tu'u yu ajkalhit'alaxtukulh an kint'amacha'an.
Pus chaway yuchacha ixlakata li iklalhit'asanitaw, para li aklala'ts'iw chi li aklaxa'alaw; mu tacha ani ikma'ch'ikanta laka kadena ixlakata tacha an tapakxan'iy an jamacha'an Israel li katapasaya'.

Wachuncha yu'uncha tajuniy: —Kitnan tu tu'u ijkama'tayanantaw tu'u karta yu kaminchalh la'acha'an Judea yu milakata, u li kaminchalh xamati kint'ala'ajunk'an yu ancha jamacha'a chi tu'ucha kalhi'alhtasun tu'u yu ntu oxi.
Kitnan ik'asmatputunaw t'uch'ini p'ast'ak'acha, mu ijk'atsayawi li wa tanchuncha jantu oxi lhipastakkan t'ach'a ani ma'ilht'uy tumpaj jatapast'ak'at.

Pus tajunilhcha tuchi wilhchancha katala'cha'ana an Pablo an tan ixwilh. Wanajcha lhilhuwi tala'cha'alh, chi an Pablo wats'isin sta ta'oxay ixjalhixa'alaycha an ixlich'alhkat Dios, xlipuxkawnicha tani kaxjalhimakiklaka'inilhcha ixlakata an Jesús, laxlamap'a'sin an Moisés chi tacha an tats'o'muk'ata an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
Ali'in takiklaka'ilhi tacha an ixnajun an Pablo, pero an ali'in jantu.

Chi mu ntu wa tami ixtak'atsay, akxni xtitalak'ancho'oycha, an Pablo jajunilh: —An Stalan'a Takuwin ts'ajwi jajunilh an yu t'a xjala'lhila'ts'inat akxni an Isaías yu xlichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios manawnikalh:
"K'ap'inchi ani la'acha'an chi k'aja'una'a: Masi sawalhch'a k'a'asmatt'it, jant'u k'at'ilhimach'a'xat'it; ch'i masi sawalhch'a k'ala'ts'int'it, jant'u k'at'imisp'at'it.

Mu an xjatapast'ak'ak ani la'acha'an sawalhcha t'ak'alha. An lapanakni taalaj'akatupats'ita chi taala'la'puts'inin, para li ntu lay katajalakawanalh chi ntu lay kataja'asmatnalh chi ntu lay katalhimacha'xalh; chi chuncha ntu lay akintitach'a'o'alh, chi ntu lay aktijak'uch'ulh."
Chaway k'ak'ats'at'itcha uxitnan, chaway ati'anta an ixjama'alhtaxtunti Dios yu'uncha an yu ntu judiojnincha kajamak'anikana', chi yu'uncha kata'asmat'a'.
Akxni chunchacha nawlh an Pablo, an judiojnin talak'ancho'olhcha, stakcha xtalalhikikxtukuy.
Chi an Pablo la'at'uy k'ata ancha ixwilh an laka cha'a tan wa ixmapalhlhi'an, chi oxi ixjala'a'i ancha watichicha yu ixtala'cha'an.
Ancha ixta'achanincha xlichiwiniy an xlich'alhkat Dios, chi xmasuycha ixlakata an Jesucristo, jantu xamati ixmama'tijlay.
Aniy jalhiki kit'ini ikts'o'lhi, kit'in ikPablo, kit'in ixma'tapatsan Jesucristo, yucha kint'asanilh chi kimala'achalhcha para li ajkamak'atsaaninilh an laj'oxi ixchiwinti Dios.
An Dios ma'anchacha chunchacha ixnajunta li ka'alina an laj'oxi chiwinti. Yu'uncha an yu xtalhichiwiniy xchiwinti chuncha japunawlh, chi ancha ts'o'muk'akanta an la ixchiwinti Dios.
Aniy laj'oxi chiwinti yucha an isTs'alh Diosi lhichiwiniy, yu kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo. Akxni lhitsukulh ixlakatunaj, yu ta ixjalhila'ts'in an Daviti japula'awlh.
Chi akxni la'awcho'olhcha, chunchacha lhimasulh li yucha isTs'alh Dios, ixlakata an Stalan'a Takuwin.
Ixlakata an Jesucristojo li an Dios kimapaynilh chi kimala'achalh, para li ta lakachux an la'acha'anaxni an lapanakni katakiklaka'ilh chi kata'asmatnilhi an Dios, para li katamapaynilh an xta'a'ut.
Uxitnan yu jamacha'an Roma wachu tat'asaniyani para li ixlapanaknicha an Cristojo k'a'unt'it.

Ani jalhiki ikts'o'a para ta lhichux wilakalh an la'acha'an Roma, mu an Dios jamapayni chi jat'asaniya para li katawalhi ixjas'at'an. An oxi ixjatawlhnat chi an ixjamapayninti kimPayk'an Dios chi yu wachu ixnawin an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo lhilhiji k'alhits'uk'ut'it.
Yucha an Jesucristojo ikpuxta'niy lhimala'puchajun an Dios milakatak'an chux uxitnan, mu wa tanchuncha si lhichiwinkani amijakiklaka'intik'an.
An Dios k'atsayi li lhilhiji iklapast'ak'aw akxni iktapayni. Kit'in chux la kijalhunuti iktapatsaniy an Dios, ijkamak'atsaaninini an laj'oxi chiwinti yu lhichiwiniy an isTs'alh.
Iksk'iniy an Dios li lay ak'anchalh para li aklala'ts'iw, chi kalaya li an Dios akimakawniya'.
Mu iklala'ts'imputunaw para li lay akla'a'tayju li k'ala'a'it'it yu tataxta'niputun an xTakuwin Dios, para li lajk'ut'ilini k'a'unt'it la mijakiklaka'intik'an,
chuncha iknajun, para li kalapula'oximaj'ayawi an yu kiklaka'itawcha.

Kint'ala'awnin, kit'in iklakask'in li k'ak'ats'at'iti li a'lhuwcha ikla'amputunacha'aw la'ts'inin, pero sta chaway wa tanlhuncha kila'mama'tijlay. Yu sawalhcha iklakask'in kit'in, ikla'a'tayjuputunawi li oxicha k'ajak'iklak'a'inint'it tacha ijka'a'tayjutacha tanlayj la'acha'anaxni.
An yu griegojnin chi an yu ntu griegojnin, chi an yu tajalakpastaknancha chi an yu ntu tu'u tak'atsay, ijk'atsan li tachanu ijkalhi'ani,
xliyu wachu sawalhcha iklalhijumputunaw an laj'oxi chiwinti yu wilat la'acha'an Roma.
Jantu ikt'amaxanani an laj'oxi chiwinti, mu yucha ix'alhp'asninti an Dios, yu taputa'alhtaxtuy ixchuxk'an yu takiklaka'i. P'ulhnaj yu judiojnin pero wachu yu ntu judiojnin.

An laj'oxi chiwinti yucha kintajunan li an Dios kintala'a'iyani li kiklaka'iyaw sawalh, wachuncha yu lay kala'a'in li kiklaka'ikan sawalh. Chuncha najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta ixchiwinti Dios, tan najunta: "Yu oxi t'a'aklat'ajun an Dios yucha an ixjakiklaka'inticha kaputsukuya'."
Mu an Dios masuyi sta an lakt'iyan ixtalh'amti, jamama'alh'ajniya an yu wa ay tajunita, an yu ntu oxi tat'ajun, an yu wa tatanchay an yu sawalh.
Mu chux yu alin yucha an Diosi tapumispay, mu wanaj yucha an Diosi jamasuni;

chi mu an yu ntu tasuy ixlaktanlhun Dios layi mispakan li oxi sa' lhatapastaknankan an yu lak'ilhtuta. Chi sta akxni ilhtukanchalh an lakaamunulhpa an Dios oxi tasuy li yucha Dios, chi an ix'alhp'asninti jantu inta kimaktay. Xliyu an yu wa tani talaycha, jantu lay katitanawlh li wa ntu tak'atsay.

Mu masi tamispaycha an Dios, jantu tala'ts'ini tacha Dios chi ntu taxta'niya lhimala'puchajun. Apalij wa tanlhuncha talakpast'ak'a yu wa lhitontojcha chi mu sawalhcha lakt'ak'alha an ixjalhunutk'an pus tu tu'u tak'atsay.
Masi li tanajuni li tajalakpastaknan, wa talaktontojlalhcha.

Mu an ixta'ayaxtu Dios yu ntu a'tam katinilh, talhimapaxalhi wa ixla'ma'stele'chak'an lapanakni yu lay taniy, chi masi wa ixma'stele'chak'an tanlhun ts'o'on chi tanlhuncha yu ixputach'ant'at'ik'an jatapakxat chi ts'apulin.
Xliyu an Dios jamakawlhcha para li kata'ilhtulhcha yu ta'ilhtuputun, chi atamj atamjcha talat'a'ilhtupaxalh la ixlakatunajk'an yu wa lhimaxancha.

An yu sawalh ixchiwinti Dios talhimapaxalhi wa maslakatinticha. Chi apalijcha yucha talhiwilay chi ay tala'ts'in an yu wa lak'ilhtutacha an Dios, jantucha yu apalij an Diosi yu talhiwilay. An Dios yuchaa la'la'oxilh an tanlhun, pus yucha an Diosi yu lhilhij lhitask'ini kaxta'nikalh lhimala'puchajun. Chunchaa kawalh.

Xliyu an Dios jamakawlhcha an lapanakni li katalalhcha wa tani talaputuncha, ta'ilhtulhcha yu wa lhimaxancha, asta an t'akunin jantucha yu wa ixt'apapak'ani ixtaxa'alay, yu tacha Dios makajun, tsukulhcha wa aya tat'alayi wa siya ixt'at'akuninchak'an.

Chi an lapanakni wachucha tamakawlhi yu makajun an Dios lay ka'ilhtukalh, jantucha wa ixt'iwik'ani ixtaxa'alay, tsukulhcha tak'atsani li wa aya katalalhcha wa siya lapanakni. Wa lhimaxancha talay, chi wa ix'akstuchak'ani tama'alh'ajnan la ixlakatunajk'an ixlakata tacha an wa aya talay.
Mu ntucha talhiwilayi an Dios li yucha Dios, pus yucha jamakawlhcha li kata'ilhtulhcha an wa laklhits'isitcha ixjatapast'ak'atk'an masi yucha jantu oxi li chuncha talay.
