An la xjatsukuntik'an wa tanlhuncha yu ntucha k'is laj'oxi ta'ilhtuy, wa aya talaycha, wa tala'alhincha ta'ilhtuy, wa talaksk'unla'ts'incha tanlhun chi la xkayt chi lalhitalh'amajla'ts'it tanlhun chi jama'ninti chi la xtukut chi ja'o'xcho'onti chi talh'amti chi maslakatinti.

Wa sawalhcha tajalhichiwininin, sawalhcha taxkajiya an Dios, jantucha k'is taja'asmatnan, wa tanlhuncha ta'ilhtuy yu ntu lhitapalay, wa lhilhijcha tapast'ak'a tani tamcha katalhi'ilhtupalh ixtala'alhink'an, chi palaycha jantucha tu'u talhiwilay ixlakpaynink'an.
Jantucha tajalakpastaknamputun, chi ntu ta'ilhtuyi yu tanajun li kata'ilhtuya', jantucha xamati tamapayni, jantucha xamati tamala'mixini tu'u'.
Oxi tak'atsay li yu wa tani kalayacha, yu tacha anicha talay, an Dios najun li katalakniya', walh chi ali ta'ilhtuyi yu'uncha, chi sawalhcha oxi tala'ts'in yu wachu chun ilhtuy.

Pus xliyu uxint'i li xamati wa aya lhich'iwiniy, jant'u k'at'imala'mixinik'a, wa tichicha uxint'i k'a'unt'i. Akxni xamat'i lhich'iwiniy wa mi'akst'uch'a p'uxk'a'uy yu lhima'anxkay, mu uxint'i wanajch'a ch'uni lay tacha yu'uncha talay.

Wa yucha an Diosi yu lay kajajuna li talhit'ajuni xtala'alhink'an an yu wa tanlhuncha yu ntu laj'oxi ta'ilhtuy. Mu k'atsayawi li an Dios yucha ts'ajwi kalaks lats'awalay an tanlhun, yucha ts'ajwi xt'a'a lhima'alh'ajna.
Uxint'i wa aya jalhich'iwiniya an ali'in, walh ch'i wanajch'a ch'uni lay, jant'u k'ap'ast'akt'i li sna k'at'a'alht'axt'uya'acha akxni an Dios kajamama'alh'ajniya'.
Uxint'i wa la'amaj'ani an Dios li mapayniyan chi li pakxaniyan para li k'ach'a'o'a, jant'u lhak'ap'up'ini li xliyu mapayniyan li yucha lakask'in li k'ak'iklak'a'it'i.

Uxint'i sawalhcha a'atu'axixik'at'i, jant'u ch'a'o'ap'ut'uni an Dios, wa mi'akstucha lalhawat'a'un lhima'alh'ajna, mu kachina wilhchan akxni an Dios katalakasuyacha para li kaxt'a'acha lhima'alh'ajna,
chi akxni an Dios, kajamapalhniyacha atamj atamj tuchinischa ilhtulh akxni ixt'ajun.

Kajaxta'niya jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy an yu ixtataylhi'anta ixta'ilhtuy tanlhun yu laj'oxi, yu ixtapuxkajuy an ixta'ayaxtu Dios yu xtapuxkajuy li oxi kajala'ts'inkalh chi tapuxkawlhi an jatsukunti yu ntu min'ojoy.
Pero an yu wa ixli'ayajk'atsanchak'an tala'amaj'alhi an ixchiwinti Dios, chi tataylhi'alhi yu ntu oxi, katala'a'iya an ay lhima'alh'ajna.
Katalhitsukuya lhima'alh'ajna chi yu ntu oxi k'atsat ixchuxk'an an yu wa tanlhuncha yu ntu oxi ta'ilhtuy, p'ulhnaj yu'uncha an judiojnini katama'alh'ajnana pero wachu an yu ntu judiojnin.

Pero an Dios kajaxta'niya ta'ayaxtu chi li kajalhiwilakalh chi li oxi katatawilh, ixchuxk'an an yu ta'ilhtuy yu laj'oxi tanlhun, yu'uncha an judiojnini p'ulhnaj chuncha kaja'ilhtuya', pero wachu an yu ntu judiojnin,
mu an Dios yucha ntu wa sakxtuyi yu oxi lhiwilay.

Ixchuxk'an an yu ta'ilhtuy ixtala'alhink'an, li ntu tamispayi an ixlamap'a'sin Moisés, wachuncha katats'an'acho'oya', chi an yu ta'ilhtuyi ixtala'alhink'an chi tamispaycha an lhamap'a'sin, ixlakata ani lhamap'a'sini kajapumama'alh'ajnikana'.
Chi ntu kanaju li oxicha tat'ajun la x'ukxlakapu Dios an yu wa ta'asmat'acha an lhamap'a'sin, yu oxicha ts'awj tat'ajun yu'uncha an yu tamuktaxtuy.
Mu an yu ntu judiojnin jantu tamispayi an lhamap'a'sin, walh chi wa la xjatapast'ak'atchak'an, ta'ilhtuy, pus chunchacha putasuy li para yu'uncha wachu an lhamap'a'sin.
Mu tamasuyi la xlakatijlak'an li talhit'ajuni an lhamap'a'sin la xjalhunutk'an, yucha an ixjatapast'ak'atchak'ani lhimasuy, chi yucha an ixjatapast'ak'atchak'ani kaja'alhtasuya u kajalhi'a'tayjuya

akxni kachinacha wilhchan li an Dios kanawnacha tani ixt'ajuncha atamj atamj, yucha an Cristojo chuncha kapu'ilhtuya', kak'atsakana masi yu ntu k'atsakan, tacha najunta an laka laj'oxi chiwinti an yu iklhichiwiniy.
Uxint'i judiojk'at'i unk'an, ch'i k'iklak'a'iya an ixlamap'a'sin Moisés, ch'i ayi p'uk'ats'an an Dios.
K'ats'ayi tani lhi'achanicha an Dios, chi an lhamap'a'sin masuniyani tani k'alhisakxt'ucha yu palay oxi.
K'ats'ayi li layi k'ajamalht'anat'i an la'la'lhtulu'un chi li layi k'ajamap'ulhk'unin an yu lakaaputs'isni tat'ajun.
K'ats'ayi li layi k'ajamap'a'sit'i an yu ntu tu'u tak'atsay chi li layi k'ajamap'a'sit'i an yu ntuka' oxi tajalakpastaknan, mu an laka lhamap'a'sini la'ch'ip'in an jatapast'ak'at chi an yu sawalh.
Pus oxich'a li jamasuniya an ali'in, ¿t'asu li nt'u masunik'ancha mi'akstu? Li lhich'iwiniya li ntu kaja'alhawanankalh, ¿t'asu li ja'alhawanancha?

Li na'uni li ntu katalaxa'alalhi yu ntu talat'at'ajun, ¿ch'i li xa'alaycha xamati uxint'i? Li jant'u k'is la'ts'imp'ut'uni an yu wa jala'la'oxikantacha an yu jajunkan li tacha diosnincha, ¿p'us ch'i li laj'alha'uycha an tanlhun yu laj'oxi an la xlaktajtank'ani?
P'ut'a'ayaycha an lhamap'a'sin, pero nt'u k'iklak'a'iya an Dios, mu nt'u ilht'uyi yu najun.
Xliyu najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: An yu ntu tajakiklaka'inin wa aya tajuniya an Dios, uxitnani minkwentajk'an".

Sawalhi li yu ilhtuyi tacha an najun ixlamap'a'sin Moisés, a'tayjuycha lanani li akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta an ix'a'axt'a'a; pero yu ntu ilhtuy, wa tachanu jantu akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta ix'a'axt'a'a.
Pus yu ilhtuyi tacha najunta an lhamap'a'sin, masi ntu akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta ix'a'axt'a'a, kala'ts'inkana tachanu chuncha, masi jantu.

Yu ilhtuyi an lhamap'a'sin masi ntu tu'u akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta ix'a'axt'a'a la ixlakatunaj, layi kajuna li ntucha oxi tacha lay an yu mispaycha lhamap'a'sin chi masi akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta ix'a'axt'a'a, mu li yucha ntu muktaxtuyi an lhamap'a'sin.
Mu para li ajkunikalh li ikjudio jantu wa xliyu li kila'ts'inkancha li ikjudio, u li akijunikalh li ki'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta ki'a'axt'a'a jantu wa xliyu li katasulhcha la kilakatunaj.

Yu judio sawalh sta la xpulakni chuncha najun chi li iknajuni li ki'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta ki'a'axt'a'a yucha li ch'uk'up'uxnikantacha yu ntu oxi la kijalhunut. Jantu yu akinti'ilhtulh chuncha li wa intacha stak ts'o'muk'akanta yu ka'ilhtukalh, yu chuncha ka'ilhtuyan sawalh yucha an Takuwin. Yu chuncha sawalh, yucha maklachalhcha, chi ntu yu an lapanakni katitajunin, yucha an Dios.
¿Tisu xli'oxinticha li kajunkalh judio u li ka'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkalh x'a'axt'a'a xamati'i?
Wanaj lhuw sawalhi tuchini xli'oxicha. Yu p'ulhnaj, wa xliyu yu'uncha an judiojnini an Dios jaxta'nilh an ixchiwinti.
Ali'in judiojnin jantucha takiklaka'iy. Chaway ¿tasu tapasaycha? ¿An Dios jantucha kati'ilhtulhi yu najun li ka'ilhtuya'?

¡Jantu! An Dios yucha kataylhi'ana yu najun li ka'ilhtuya', mu yucha yu najun ilhtuy sawalh, masi chux an lapanakni wa katamaslakatinilh. Mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta najun: Ch'unch'a k'ap'ulhiwilak'ana'a li sawalhi yu na'un t'ani yu k'ach'iwinina'acha, chi k'alhajat'achi akxni katajunan li oxi u jantu t'ani laycha.

Chi li chunchachaa putasuy li sawalhi an yu najun an Dios, akxni tu'u yu ntu oxi ilhtuyaw, ¿tasucha kanawnawi? ¿kanawnawi li an Dios tu oxi li kintamama'alh'ajniyan? (Ikchiwiniy tacha chiwiniy yu wa lapanak).
Jantu, jantu layi chuncha katinaju, mu li an Dios jantu oxi yu ilhtuy, ¿tasucha lay kalhinawna li oxi u jantu yu ilhtuy an lapanak yu wilh aniy lakaamunulhpa'a?
Pero li yucha an kimaslakatinti ilhtuy li palay kaputa'alhp'asnilhi an yu sawalh ixchiwinti Dios, ¿Tasu li kijunkancha li ikma'lhta'alhini'i?

Li chuncha, apalij ak'ilhtulhi yu ntu oxi para li katapasalhi yu oxi. Chunchacha tanajun ali'in li ma chuncha yu ikmasuy, para li kalhiwilakalhi li ma ntu sawalhi yu iknajun; pero an yu chuncha tanajun katala'a'iya lhima'alh'ajna.

¿Pus t'asuch'a p'ast'ak'at'iti? ¿sawalhcha oxi t'awnaw kitnan yu judiojnin chi an yu ntu judiojnin jantu? ¡Jantu sawalh! Mu lhimasutawcha li chux kitnan yu judiojnin chi an yu ntu judiojnin, an tala'alhin kintalaklhajayan.
Tacha ts'o'muk'akanta la ixchiwinti Dios: "¡Jantu xamati t'ajun masi wa pumatamcha yu ts'awj katsukulh sawalh!
Jantu xamati lhimach'a'xay yu oxi, jantu xamati yu kapuxkawlh Dios.
Ixchuxk'ani tapu'alh tan tu oxi tij, ixchuxk'ani ta'ilhtulh ixtala'alhink'an. Jantu xamati yu ka'ilhtulh yu laj'oxi tanlhun, masi wa pumatamcha.
Wa tacha wa a'lho'o'cha ajkanta puta'aknuni an ix'ochuk'an. Tapumaslakatinini isima'atk'an. Talaktsin la ix'e'xt'a'ak'an tachanu la'stu ixvenenojk'an tsapulini talhit'ajun
chi an la xkilhnik'an wa la'stucha lhi'ay junita talhit'ajun chi talh'amti.
Sawalhcha layi talakats'alaj'an ta an jama'ninin;
chi wa la'stucha jalakt'ilhinti chi lhikilhpati alin la xtijk'an.
Jantu tamispayi an xatij yu oxi jatawlhnat.
Jantu a'tam tatalhamniya an Dios."

Pero k'atsayawi li chux an tacha najunta an la xlamap'a'sin Dios, yu'uncha jajuniy an yu ixli'ilhtutk'an li kata'ilhtulh tacha an najunta. Para li ixchuxk'ani kasa' talajkilhulh chi chux tacha an wilakalh an lakaamunulhpa yucha an Diosi kajajuna tanchuncha kata'ana atamj atamj;

mu ntu xamati lay katinawlh li muktaxtutacha tacha an najunta laka lhamap'a'sin, para li an Dios kanawlhcha li ts'awjcha sawalhi t'ajun, mu an lhamap'a'sin yucha wa kintapumak'atsaanikanancha li kitnan la'ma'lhta'alhinin.

Pero chaway an Dios masuycha li oxi kintala'ts'inan, pero ntu wa xliyu li muktaxtuyaw xlamap'a'sin. Chuncha ixtanajun an lapanakni yu tats'o'lhi an lhamap'a'sin chi an yu ma'anchacha ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios.
Li kiklaka'ikani an Jesucristo, an Dios chunchacha oxi jala'ts'in ixchuxk'an an yu takiklaka'i. Si kintala'a'ikanan, watichicha.
Ta lhichuxi ilhtukalh tala'alhin, pus tu xamati yu wa nicha katsukulh tan an alhp'as wilh Dios.
Pero an Dios la xjamapayninti oxi jala'ts'in an lapanakni, chi ntu tu'u jach'inin. Yucha an Jesucristojo chuncha pu'ilhtuy, mu an Cristo yucha kintama'alhtaxtuncha.

An Dios ilhtulhi li yucha an Cristojo yu akintapumala'mixinikan kintala'alhink'an, akxni an maj'alh xak'alhni. Chi para li akimala'mixinikalh chux kintala'alhin yucha li ajkiklaka'ilh an Cristo. Chunchacha pumasuy an Dios li oxi kintala'ts'inan; kintamala'mixiniyani an kintala'alhink'an yu ix'ilhtutaw ixlip'ulhnaj,
mu yucha ntu wa lasi talh'aman. An Dios masuputuni li yucha ts'ajwi t'ajun, wachu chuni ja'ilhtuy an yu takiklaka'iy an Jesús.
Jantu layi tu'ucha katipu'ayajk'atsaw la x'ukxlakapu Dios, ¿tasu'u? Wa xliyu ntu muktaxtuyawi an lhamap'a'sin, ajnik'acha wa kiklaka'iyaw.
Xliyu lhinawnaw li an Dios yucha kanawna li oxicha t'ajun yu jakiklaka'inin, jantu yu wa xliyu muktaxtuycha an lhamap'a'sin.
¿Chu sna an Dios wa ixDiosk'an an judiojnin? ¿Jantu wachu ixDiosk'an an yu ntu judiojnin? Li mu chun.
Wa pumatami t'ajun Dios. Yucha kanawna li oxi tat'ajun la xjakiklaka'intik'an an yu judiojnin chi an yu ntu judiojnin.
Chi chuncha, ixlakata an jakiklaka'inti ¿jantucha lhitapalayi an lhamap'a'sin? ¡Chun, lhitapalay! Apalij iknawnaw li lhitapalayi an lhamap'a'sin.
¿Pus tisu lhajaxtulhcha kanawnaw an Abrahami, yu kimpayk'an ixjunita?
Mu li an Abraham kaxla'ts'inkalhi li ts'ajwi ixt'ajun wa xliyu li tacha an ixlak'ilhtuycha tanlhun, kax'alilhi tuchini kaxputa'ayalhcha masi ntucha x'ukxlakapu Dios.
Mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta najun: "An Abraham kiklaka'ilhi an Dios, chi an Dios nawlhi li an Abraham ts'ajwi t'ajun."
Pus chaway, li xamati tapatsay, yucha mapalhnikan mu yucha lhajaxtulhcha, jantu tu'u yu wa xta'nikancha.
An Dios yucha oxi la'ts'in an ma'lhta'alhini yu kiklaka'iy, xliyu li xamati kiklaka'iy, an Dios najuncha li ts'awjcha t'ajun anchunu lapanak, masi ntu tu'u ka'ilhtulh yu lhinawkan.
Wanaj yucha an Daviti nawpalh li sawalhcha oxi li yu an Dios oxicha la'ts'in, pero jantu wa xliyu li tu'ucha yu oxicha lak'ilhtuy.
An David nawlh: "¡Sawalhcha oxi para yu'uncha yu an Dios jamala'mixiniya wa tanlhuncha yu ntu oxi ta'ilhtuta, chi ntucha jalhakapu'aniniya an ixtala'alhink'an!
Sawalhcha oxi para yucha anchunu lapanak li yu an Jamach'alhkat jantucha lhakapu'aniniya ixtala'alhin."

¿Aniy oxinti wa yu'uncha an yu jalak'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta ix'a'axt'a'ak'ani lay tala'a'i u wachu layi tala'a'i an yu ntu chun tajunita? Najucha li an Dios lhakapu'aninilhi an xjakiklaka'inti an Abraham, chi nawlhcha li ts'awjcha t'ajun.
Pero, ¿Tasu wanancha lhakapu'aninilhi? ¿Xli'astancha akxni akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkalhcha ix'a'axt'a'a u xlip'ulhnaj? Xlip'ulhnaj.

Chi xli'astan an Abraham akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkalhcha an ix'a'axt'a'a, tan kaputasulhcha li an Dios mispalhcha li ts'awjcha ixt'ajun, mu ixjakiklaka'inin. Pus chunchacha an Abrahan yuchacha walh ixpayk'an an yu tajakiklaka'inin, masi yu ntu tu'u jalak'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta ix'a'axt'a'ak'an; chi wanajcha chuni yu'uncha an Dios jala'ts'incha li ts'awjcha tat'ajun.

Chi an Abraham wachu ixpayk'ani masi an yu jalak'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkanta ix'a'axt'a'ak'an li ta'ilhtuyi tajakiklaka'inin tacha ix'ilhtuy an kimpayk'an Abraham akxni ntuka' ix'akaxwililich'uk'up'uxkan ix'a'axt'a'a.

An Abraham junikalhi li yucha chi an yu tapu'a'p'unminchalhcha li yu'uncha katala'a'iya aniy lakaamunulhpa'; pero tacha ani junikalh li kaxta'nikana jantu xliyu li muktaxtulh an lhamap'a'sin, tuchi chuncha lhijunikalh wa xliyu xjakiklaka'inin.

Chi mu li yu'uncha kaxtala'a'ilh an lakaamunulhpa an yu wa laka lhamap'a'sin taput'ajun, pus an jakiklaka'inti jantucha tu'u kaxlitapalalh chi tacha an nawlh an Dios li ka'ilhtuya, jantucha tu'u kaxlitapalalh.
Yu ntu muktaxtuyi an lhamap'a'sin kala'a'iya ma'alh'ajnat ixlakata xtala'alhin, pero tan tu tu'u ali'in lhamap'a'sin, wachu ntu tu'u alin tala'alhin.

Xliyu li tacha an najun an Dios li ka'ilhtuya, yu katala'a'iya yu'uncha an yu takiklaka'i, pus an Dios kajamapayniya mu li tajakiklaka'inin. Ixchuxk'an an yu tapu'a'p'unminchalh an Abrahami katajama'tayanana', chi ntu wa yu'uncha an yu talhit'ajun an lhamap'a'sini katitala'a'ilh, wachu katala'a'iya an yu talhit'ajun jakiklaka'inti yu tacha ixlhit'ajun an Abraham. Chi kitnan yucha an Abrahami kimpayk'an.

Tacha najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "Kit'ini k'ilhtutan li k'a'unt'i ixpayk'an kilhmaklhuw lapanakni". An Abraham kiklaka'ilhi an Dios, chi ani Dios yucha jaxta'niya jatsukunti an janinin chi lak'ilhtuyi an tanlhun masi yu ntuka' lak'alin.

Akxni masi watali jantucha layi chuncha kawalh, an Abraham kiklaka'ilh chi pakxan'ilh, pus chunchacha yu walh "xapay wanaj kilhmaklhuw lapanakni", chunchacha walh tacha yu ixjunitacha an Dios akxni junilh: "Chuncha xlilhuw katajuna yu katapu'a'p'un'anan."

An ixjakiklaka'inti an Abraham jantu t'iya' lalh, masi yucha ixla'tsat'ajuncha tamciento k'ata chi ixlakapu'ancha li yucha chi an ixt'iwi yu ixjunkan Sara tachanu ixtalaklakanicho'otacha chi lakpapanincha ixtajunita para li lay katajamas'at'analh.
An Abraham kiklaka'ilhi tacha an junilh an Dios, jantu a'tami nawlh li sna kajuna u jantu, apalij wa palay p'as kiklaka'ilh, ayi ilhtulh an Dios.
Lhiwilalh sawalhi li an Dios layi ilhtuy sawalh yu najun.
Pus an Dios lhakapu'aninilhi xjakiklaka'inti an Abraham chi yuchacha ixlakata li la'ts'ilhcha li ts'awjcha t'ajun.
Chi ntu wa ixlakatacha an Abrahami lhits'o'muk'akalh li lhakapu'ankalh,
wachu kilakatak'an. Mu an Dios wachu kintalhakapu'aniniyani kijakiklaka'intik'an, li kiklaka'iyawi an yu mala'awnicho'olh an Jesús, yu kiJamach'alhkatk'an,
yu ma'axta'kalh laka lhinin ixlakata kintala'alhink'an, chi yucha la'awcho'olhi para li an Dios oxicha akintala'ts'in.
Pus mu an la kijakiklaka'intik'an an Dios kintapula'ts'inancha li chuncha ts'awjcha t'awnaw, pus oxicha t'a'aklat'awnaw an Dios. Yucha an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristojo chuncha kintapu'ilhtukanan.

Chi ixlakata an Jesucristojo li lay la'cha'anaw an Dios, mu jakiklaka'ininaw, para li lay kalhitsuku an ixjamapayninti. Chi lajk'ut'ilini la kijakiklaka'intik'an chi sawalhcha laj'achanawi li pakxan'iyawi li kama'cha'anawi tan xlimj wilhchalh Dios.
Chi ntu wayu', wachu laj'achanawi masi akxni lhima'alh'ajna; mu k'atsayawi li an lhima'alh'ajna kintalak'ut'iliyan para li kalhitayaniw,
chi li lhitayaniyaw, chunchacha kintapula'ts'inkanan li jakiklaka'ininaw sawalh, chi li sawalhi li jakiklaka'ininaw, alhp'ascha pakxan'iyaw an yu kala'a'iyaw.
Chi an yu pakxan'iyaw jantu akintita'o'xcho'on, mu an Dios wanajcha la'tsama'ojota an la kijalhunutk'an an ixjamapayninti, yucha an Stalan'a ixTakuwin yu kintaxta'nitani chuncha pu'ilhtulh.
Akxni kitnan tu lay kaxta'alhtaxtu, mu kitnan ixt'alaxkay an Diosi ixjuntaw an Cristo kintalhinini akxni tukan ixpaku'.
Chi sawalh lhima'anxkayi li xamati lapanak kalhinilh yu oxi lapanak. Pero kasna layi xamati lapanak kalhima'ats'an'aputulh ixjatsukunti ixlakata yu sawalh oxi lapanak.
Pero an Cristo yucha nilhi kilakatak'an masi kitnan wa stakcha ixlit'awnawi kintala'alhink'an. Chunchacha an Dios kintamasunin ixjamapayninti.
Oxicha kintala'ts'inan mu an Cristo kintalhimaj'an xjak'alhni, xliyu chaway palaycha k'atsayaw li sawalhi li kata'alhtaxtuyaw an la xtalh'amti Dios.

Chi mu li akxni ixt'alaxkayka Diosi ixjuntaw walh kintat'ala'oxamixnini akxni kintalhinin an isTs'alh, pus chaway palaycha li o'sliyani li kata'alhtaxtuyawi ixlakata an ixjatsukunti an Cristo, mu chaway an Dios t'ala'oxamixniwcha.
Chi ntu wayu', chaway wachu sawalhcha laj'achanawi tacha an ilhtulhcha an Dios. Oxicha t'alalhi'antaw an Dios, yucha an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristojo put'ala'oxamixniw.
Wa pumatam lapanaki yu putanuchilh an tala'alhin aniy lakaamunulhpa', chi an tala'alhin putanuchilhcha an lhinin, chi an lhinin lhichuxcha jala'cha'an'ojoy, mu ta lhichuxi ilhtukalh tala'alhin.
Akxni ntuka' tu'u ix'alin lhamap'a'sin, ix'alincha tala'alhin an lakaamunulhpa'; pero mu ntu tu'u ix'alin lhamap'a'sin, pus tulayi ixjalhimuk'akan li ixta'ilhtuyi tala'alhin an lapanakni.

Pero sta akxni ixt'awnachalh an Adán, chi sta akxni ixt'ajuncha an Moisés ixchuxk'ani talaknilh. An Adán nilhi mu ntu asmatnilhi an ixlamap'a'sin an Dios. Chi wachu talaknilhi an ali'in masi yu ntu ixt'achun tala'alhin ixta'ilhtuta tacha an ilhtulh Adán. An Adán wa ixpumasukancha an yu xli'astanka kamina'.

Pero an ixtala'alhin an Adán jantu wa ixt'atami an yu kintaxta'niyan an Dios. Wanaj lhilhuwi nikalh masi wa pumatami yu ilhtulh tala'alhin; pero an xjamapayninti Dios yu kintapuxta'niyan pumatam lapanak, yu junkan Jesucristo, yucha ntu mapalhkan, wa xta'kancha, chi yucha palay ay, chi yucha oxi para lhuw lapanak.

An ixtala'alhin wa pumatam lapanak, jantu lay katinawkalh li wa xt'atami an yu xt'a'a Dios, mu wa la'atam tala'alhini yu puchilh an lhinin, pero an xjamapayninti an Dios yucha makmilh wa xliyu lhuw tala'alhini alin, chi yuchacha oxicha kintapula'ts'in.

Pus mu li an lhinin ch'alhkatnalhcha wa xliyu masi wa pumatam lapanaki ilhtulh tala'alhin, pus palaycha an Dios kajaxta'niya an lapanakni lhich'alhkat an laka sast'icha jatsukunti. Wa pumatam lapanaki yu kapuxta'kana xjamapayninti, yucha an Jesucristo, yucha yu oxicha kintapula'ts'inan.
Tacha ilhtulhi an ixtala'alhin Adán li lhichuxi kalakni'okalh, wanajcha chuni an Jesucristo yu ts'awj muktaxtulh, kinta'ilhtu'oyani li oxi akintala'ts'inkan para li kalhitsukuwi jatsukunti.

Mu wa pumatam lapanaki yu ntu ja'asmatnalh, walh chi wanaj lhuw lapanakni yu tawalh ma'lhta'alhinin; pus wanajcha chun, wa pumatam lapanaki yu ja'asmatnalh, walh wanaj lhuw lapanakni yu oxicha jala'ts'inkalh.
An lhamap'a'sin makminkalh para li an tala'alhin palay oxi katasulh; pero akxni palaycha alilhi an tala'alhin, an Dios palaycha jamapayninilh.

Chi tacha an tala'alhin ch'alhkatnalhcha chi lhimilhcha an lhinin, wanajcha chuni an ixjamapayninti Dios ch'alhkatnalh chi kinta'ilhtuncha li ts'awjcha katsukuw chi kintaxta'niyancha jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam katimin'olh; yucha an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristojo kintapuxta'nikan.
¿Chi tasu kanawnawcha? ¿Ali ka'ilhtuyawi kintala'alhink'an para li an Dios akintamapaynin?
¡Jantu! Kitnan tachanu nitawcha para li ntucha ali ka'ilhtuwi tala'alhin; ¿chi tasucha li ali ka'ilhtuyawi tala'alhini?
¿Jant'u k'ats'ayat'iti uxitnan li akxni laj'a'paxwicha t'atala'xt'o'awcha an Cristo Jesús chi wachucha t'aniyawi tacha akxni an nilh?
Pus li laj'a'paxawcha kintat'amaknukanancha an Cristo chi niyawcha para li kala'awcho'o chi sast'icha jatsukunti kalhitsukucho'ow, tacha an Cristo mala'awnicho'okalh la x'alhp'asninti an kimPayk'an.
Li t'atala'xt'o'awcha an Cristo la xlinin tacha yucha nilh, pus wanajcha chuni kat'atala'xt'o'aw tacha an la'awcho'olh.

K'atsayawi li yu tacha p'ulhnajcha ixt'awnaw, anchacha t'axtukmuk'akalh an Cristo, para li an kijatsukuntik'an yu wa sawalhcha ix'ilhtuy tala'alhin, kanilhcha, chi chuncha jantucha yu an tala'alhini akintalhilatsukun;
mu yu nitacha, ma'alhtaxtukalhcha an laka tala'alhin.
Li kitnan t'anitawcha an Cristo, kiklaka'iyawcha wachu li kat'a'aklatsukuyaw.
K'atsayawi li an Cristo, la'awcho'olh chi ntucha a'tam katinilh. An lhinin tucha layi ta kati'ilhtulh.
Mu an Cristo akxni an nilh, akxnicha wanajcha ixpujun'alhin laklhaja'olh chux an tala'alhin, chi chaway li yucha la'awcho'otacha, yucha para yucha an Dioscha li t'ajun.
Wanajcha chuni uxitnan, k'alhi'ilht'utcha li laknit'atcha, jantucha layi k'at'i'ilht'ut tala'alhin, pero la'awt'at'iti para Dios, t'at'ala'xt'o'at'iti an Cristo Jesús.
Pus jant'uch'a k'amak'awnit'iti li ali katalaklhajani an tala'alhin an la milakatunajk'an, yu lay niy, chi li ali katamatanunini katama'ilhtun an wa tanlhuncha lakask'in an lakatunaj.

Jant'uch'a k'ama'axt'a'nit'iti amilakatunajk'an an tala'alhin, para li lay kapu'ilhtukalh yu ntu oxi. Apalij k'at'ama'axt'a'nit'it an Dios, tacha yu laknit'atcha, pero chaway la'awch'o'ot'atcha, chi k'ama'axt'a'nitcha amilakatunajk'an an Dios para li yuchacha kapu'ilhtulh yu oxi tanlhun.
Chuncha an tala'alhin tucha layi katich'alhkatnalh la mijatsukuntik'an, mu uxitnan jantu yu an lhamap'a'sini p'ut'awnat'it yucha an ixjamapayninti Dios.
¿Chi chaway tasucha?, ¿Ali ka'ilhtuyawi kintala'alhink'an mu li ntu yu an lhamap'a'sini yu kiklaka'iyaw li yucha an ixjamapayninti Dios? ¡Jantu!

Uxitnan oxi k'ats'ayat li t'ama'axt'a'niyat pumatam patrón para li wa kataputapatsancha chi li yuchacha k'a'asmatnit'it, yucha ani patroni ixma'tapatsanin k'a'una'it chi yucha k'a'asmatniya'it. Pus wanajcha chuni aniy, li yuch'a asmatniyat an tala'alhin, yucha katalhi'ananiy laka lhinin, pero li asmatniyat'iti an Dios, yucha oxicha katala'ts'inan.
Pero lhimala'puchajuncha an Dios, mu masi uxitnan xlip'ulhnaj yucha an tala'alhini ixta'a'ch'apatan, chaway xlichuxcha mijalhunutk'ani asmat'at'it t'ach'a an masunik'ant'at'it lhamap'a'sin.
Uxitnan ma'alht'axt'uk'antcha tacha an ixta'a'ch'apatan an tala'alhin, chaway yucha an laj'oxicha tanlhuni ch'a'o'at'at.

Tacha ani klajuniw, wanaj klalhixa'alaw yu oxi misp'ayat'it, wa xliyu uxitnan lhima'anxkayi para li k'alhimach'a'xat. Xlip'ulhnaj uxitnan ma'axt'a'nit'iti amilakatunajk'an an tanlhun yu ntu laj'oxi chi x'ilht'uyatcha mintala'alhink'an, pero chaway k'ama'axt'a'nitcha amilakatunajk'an an Dios, oxich'a yu k'ap'u'ilht'ut chi wa yucha an Dioscha k'at'a'aklats'uk'ut.
Uxitnan akxni yuchaka an tala'alhin ixta'a'ch'apatan jantu yu ixt'at'ap'ats'ayat an yu oxi tanlhun.
¿Chi tisuncha yu oxi la'ch'ip'init an t'ach'a ixlayat'iti? Chaway uxitnan wa lhimaxananatcha anchunu tanlhun, mu yucha wa laka lhinincha kalhi'an.

Pero chaway, li ma'alht'axt'uk'antcha tacha an ixta'a'ch'apatan an tala'alhin, chi ixma'tapatsanincha an Diosi ilht'uk'ant'it, chaway oxicha t'a'aklat'awnat an Dios, yucha k'ap'uch'ip'ina'itcha an laka jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy.
Mu yu xatalhaja an tala'alhin yucha lhinin; pero yu xt'a'a an Dios yucha jatsukunti, yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy, yucha an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristojo kintapuxta'nikanan.
Kint'ala'awnin, uxitnan misp'ayat'iti an lhamap'a'sin, ch'i k'ats'ayati'ti li an lhamap'a'sin alhp'asi li an lapanak t'ajunka'.

Tacha pumatam t'aku yu t'at'awkan, li t'ajunka ixt'apapa kat'atawla an ixt'apapa tacha najunta laka lhamap'a'sin, pero li an ixt'apapa an t'aku nicha, an t'aku putaxtunicha an laka lhamap'a'sin, yu ixput'at'ajun an ixt'apapa'.

An t'aku li t'atsukupalay pumatam lapanak chi li t'ajunka yu ixt'apapa, wa aya laycha, pero li an ixt'apapa nitacha, chuncha putaxtunicha an laka lhamap'a'sin, chi laycha kat'atsukucho'olh pumatam lapanak chi chuncha jantucha wa aya lay.

Wanajcha chuni uxitnani kint'ala'awnin, akxni ch'a'o'atcha an Cristo t'anit'itcha, pus akxni jantucha yu an lhamap'a'sini xtach'alhkatnaniyan. Tachanu k'at'at'ala'xt'o'ch'o'otcha pumatam, kanaju, an yu nilh chi xli'astan la'awcho'olh. Chunchacha lay ka'ilhtuyaw yu oxi lhiwilay an Dios.
Mu akxni wa la'ma'lhta'alhinincha ixt'awnaw, an la kilakatunajk'an kintamakujunini yu ntu laj'oxi tanlhun an lhamap'a'sin, chi wa para laka lhinincha junlhi an tanlhuncha yu ixlak'ilhtuyaw.

Pero chaway makajuwcha an lhamap'a'sin yu kixta'a'ch'apatan, tachanu lakniwcha. Chaway kintamakajuncha, chaway yucha an ixTakuwincha Diosi put'atapatsayaw. Jantucha yu ma'anchacha lhamap'a'sini put'atapatsayaw.

¿Chi chaway kanawnaw li sna tala'alhini an lhamap'a'sin? ¡Jantu, jantu tala'alhin! Pero kit'in yucha an lhamap'a'sini ikpumispalh tuchini yu tala'alhincha. Jantu a'tam xajk'atsalhi tuchini jumputuncha yu sk'unla'ts'inkan tu'u' li an lhamap'a'sin tu tu'u kaxnawlh: "Jant'u k'ask'unla'ts'i tu'u'".

Chi an tala'alhin apalij wa pu'ilhtulhi yu ntu oxi an lhamap'a'sin, wa stakcha kima'ilhtulhi li aklaksk'unla'ts'ilhi chux an tanlhun yu ntu oxi; mu akxni ntu tu'u lhamap'a'sin, jantu alhp'asi an tala'alhin.
Ix'alin panch'e'ex akxni jantu laka lhamap'a'sin xakt'ajun, pero akxni chilhcha an lhamap'a'sin an tala'alhin la'aw'icho'olh chi kit'in iknilhcha.
Chunchacha apaliji an lhamap'a'sin yu xakixta'nilh jatsukunti, apalij wa ikpunilhcha.
Mu an tala'alhin apalij wa pu'ilhtulhi yu ntu oxi an lhamap'a'sin, chi ki'o'xcho'olh, an tala'alhin yucha an lhamap'a'sini kimpuma'nilh.
Pus an lhamap'a'sin yucha stalan'a chi an chiwinti yu lhinawkan wachu stalan'a chi ts'awj chi oxi.

¿Chi chuncha xliyu li an yu oxi apalijcha wa ikpunilh? ¡Jantu, jantu xliyu'! Wa xliyu an tala'alhin, para li kalhimasulhi li tala'alhin sawalh, kima'nilh, yucha an yu laj'oxi tanlhuni kimpuma'nilh. Pus chunchacha an chiwinti yu nawkan li kamuktaxtukalh pumasukalhi li an tala'alhin tu k'is oxi.
K'atsayawi li an lhamap'a'sin laka takuwini minchalh, pero kit'in wa iklapanaklata. Kist'amaka'ankanta an laka tala'alhin.
An yu k'ilhtuy jantu iklhimacha'xay, mu ntu yu k'ilhtuy an yu k'ilhtuputun, apalij yucha an yu ntu k'ilhtuputuni k'ilhtuy.
Pus li apalij yucha ik'ilhtuy an yu ntu k'ilhtuputun, chunchacha ikpuk'atsay li an lhamap'asin oxi.
Pus tucha kit'ini ik'ilhtuy an yu ntu k'ilhtuputun, yucha an tala'alhin an t'ajun lakilakatunaj.
Mu kit'in ijk'atsayi li an la kilakatunaj tu tu'u alin yu oxi, mu masi k'ilhtuputuni yu oxi, jantu lay ik'ilhtuy.
An yu k'ilhtuputun yu oxi, jantu yu k'ilhtuy, apalij yucha k'ilhtuy an yu ntu oxi, walh chi ntu yu k'ilhtuputun.
Pus mu li k'ilhtuyi an yu ntu ik'ilhtuputun, jantucha kit'ini k'ilhtuy an yu k'ilhtuy masi tachanu kit'ini k'ilhtuy tasuy, yucha an tala'alhin an alin an la kilakatunaja chuncha ilhtuy.
Iklhakapu'ani li masi k'ilhtuputuni an yu oxi tanlhun, wa yucha an yu ntu oxi tanlhuni iklhit'ajun.
La kimpulakni ik'achaniya an ixlamap'asin an Dios,
pero ikla'ts'in tuchichun yu ki'ilhtuy li ntu lay oxi ajkalakpastaknalh, yucha an ixlamap'a'sin an tala'alhin, yu alin an la kilakatunaj chi oxicha kima'alhilata.
¡Paynicha kit'in! ¿Tisiyuchacha akima'alhtaxtuya aniy laka lakatunaj yu xt'a'a lhinini?

Wa yucha an Dios, yucha an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristojo akimpuma'alhtaxtuya', lhimala'puchajuncha an Dios. La kijatapast'ak'at k'ilhtuputuni an tacha najun ixlamap'a'sin an Dios, pero an la kilakatunaj ki'a'ch'apata an ixlamap'a'sin an tala'alhin.
Pus chaway tucha tu'u katijalhimama'alh'ajnikalh an yu tat'atala'xt'o'acha an Cristo Jesús, an yu ntu wa la xjatapast'ak'atchak'an tat'ajun an yu ta'ilhtuy an yu lhinajun an Takuwin.
Mu an ixlamap'a'sin an Takuwin yu xt'a'a jatsukunti, ixlakata an Jesucristo, kima'alhtaxtulh li xakt'ajun an la'ixlamap'a'sin an tala'alhin chi an lhinin.

Mu an Dios ilhtulhi yu an ixlamap'a'sin Moisés jantu lay ilhtulh. An ixlamap'a'sin Moisés ma'ats'an'alhi ix'alhp'asninti ixlakata li ntu lajk'ut'ilini an lapanakni li lay katamuktaxtulh. An Dios makmilhi an isTs'alh, wa tacha kitnan yu lay ilhtuyaw tala'alhini ixmakminta chi xlimakminta tachanu lha'ulan, ixlakata an tala'alhin. An isTs'alh Dios la ixlakatunaja ma'nilh an tala'alhin.

Chunchacha ilhtulh para li kitnan layi kamuktaxtu tacha an najunta ka'ilhtuw an lhamap'a'sin, mu ntucha wa kijalakpastaknatk'ani ilhtuyaw li t'awnaw, tacha an lakask'incha an Takuwini ilhtuyaw li t'awnaw.
An yu wa la xjatapast'ak'atchak'an taput'ajun, wa yuchacha tapast'ak'a katach'a'o'alh, pero an yu tat'ajun tacha an lakask'in ixTakuwin Dios, yu'uncha yucha tapast'ak'a.

Chi li wa yuchacha pastakkan akch'a'o'alh an yu wa kijatapast'ak'atchak'an ilhtuputun, yucha kalhi'an laka lhinin, pero li yucha pastakkan an tanlhun yu de laka Takuwin, yucha kalhi'aniy laka jatsukunti chi kaxta'nini oxi jatawlhnat.
An yu wa xjatapast'ak'atchak'an ta'ilhtuputun, yu'uncha taxkajiya an Dios, mu ntu ta'ilhtuniputuni an ixlamap'a'sin chi ntu lay ta'ilhtuy.
Xliyu li an yu wa tacha lakask'incha xjatapast'ak'atk'an taput'ajun, jantu lay oxi katijalhiwilalhi an Dios.

Pero uxitnan jantucha yu p'ut'awnat an yu wa mijatapast'ak'atchak'an lakask'in, yucha an tacha lhi'achanicha Takuwin, mu an ixTakuwin Dios la mijatsukuntichak'ani t'ajun. Yu ntu lhit'ajuni an ixTakuwin Cristo, jantu ixlapanak an Cristo.
Pero li an Cristo lhit'awnat'iti la mijatsukuntik'an, an ixTakuwin Dios t'ajun, mu an Dios tala'ts'inancha li ts'awjcha t'awnat masi akxni amilakatunajk'an kanilh ixlakata an tala'alhin.
Chi li lhit'awnat'iti la mijatsukuntik'an an ixTakuwin an yu mala'awnicho'olh an Jesús, wachu kataxta'niyani sast'i jatsukunti an la milakatunajk'an yu lay niy, mu an ixTakuwin lhit'awnatcha.
Pus chunchacha kint'ala'awnin, uxitnan yu wach'u k'iklak'a'iyat an Dios alini kilhi'ilhtutk'an, pero yu jantucha yu wa kijatapast'ak'atchak'an lakask'in.
Mu li uxitnan wa tacha an yu lakask'incha mijatapast'ak'atk'ani ilht'uyat, k'alakniya'it, pero li an la xTakuwin Diosi ma'niyat an wa tanlhuncha mijatapast'ak'atk'an, k'ats'uk'uya'it.
Ixchuxk'an an yu ixTakuwin Dios jamalhtanata, yu'uncha ixjas'at'an an Dios.

Mu uxitnan jantu ta'a'ch'apatan la'atam takuwin yu wa kata'ilhtupalan li wa k'alakt'alhanant'itcha, an Takuwin yu ta'a'ch'apatan yucha ta'ilhtuyan li ixjas'at'an Diosi k'a'unt'it. Yucha ani Takuwini yu lay pula'cha'anaw tan wilhchalh an Dios, chi nawnaw: "KimPay, kimPay".
Chi ani Takuwin t'atala'xt'o'a an kintakuwink'an para li kanawna li kitnan ixjas'at'an an Dios.

Chi mu ixjas'at'ancha an Diosi kitnan, wachu kala'a'iyawi yu an Dios kintajunan li akintaxta'niyan, kalhawat'alhitsukuyawi an Cristo, li t'ama'alh'ajnanaw para li wachu kat'atawlhcha'awi tan ka'ana tawlhna la xlich'alhkat.
Tacha an lak'alin lhima'alh'ajna yu chaway ani panch'e'ex, kit'in iknajun wanaj tu k'is tu'u katitasulh tacha an kala'ts'inaw xli'astan ixta'ayaxtu an Dios.
Chux tacha an alin aniy lakamunulhpa yu ilhtuta an Dios, sawalhcha so'ojo tala'ts'imputun tani wanancha kajamasuya an Dios tichini yu'unchacha yu tukancha ixjas'at'an.
Mu an yu ja'ilhtulh an Dios, jantu layi tacha'alh tan kaxtacha'alh. Chi li chunchacha tatapasalh jantu wa ixjatalapututchak'an, yucha an Diosi chuncha ilhtulh. Pero chuxi tapakxan'i
li an Dios kajama'alhtaxtuya'. Mu aniy wa tanlhuncha yu ntu oxi jalaklhilat'ajun. An Dios kajama'alhtaxtuya para li katacha'alhi an tan ay ixputa'alhtaxtuk'an an ixjas'at'an.
K'atsayawi li sta chaway chux tacha an lak'ilhtuta an Dios ma'alh'ajnan, chi najuni li tachalayjcha k'atsan, tacha pumatam t'aku akxni lhitsukuy ixjas'at'a.

Chi ntu wa yucha an tacha lak'ilhtutacha an Diosi tala'ma'alh'ajnan, wachu kitnan, yu lhit'awnaw an Takuwin, yu puk'atsayaw tuchini kala'a'iyawcha. Sawalhcha la'ma'alh'ajnanawi li chaway wa pakxan'iyawka akxni akintala'a'iyancha tacha ixjas'at'an an Dios, chi chunchacha yu kaputa'alhtaxtuya an kilakatunajk'an.

Tacha ani pakxan'iyaw chunchacha puta'alhtaxtuyaw, pero li tu'u ikpakxan'iy li yu tasuycha, yucha ntu lay aktijunilh li wa ikpakxan'ika', mu li yu tasuycha ¿tasucha wa aklhipakxan'iyaka li yu ikla'ts'incha?
Pero li yu wa pakxan'iyawka, yu ntuka' la'ts'inaw, xlak'anti kapakxan'iyaw.

Wanajcha chun an Takuwin kintalhi'a'tayjuyani akxni ntucha lajk'ut'ilin juntaw la kijakiklaka'intik'an. Mu ntu lay ts'awj tapayniyaw tacha yu ts'awjcha katapayniw, pero an Takuwin yucha tapayniniya an Dios kilakatak'an, jantu lay nawkan laka chiwinti tacha an tapaynini.

Chi mu an Dios yucha oxi laklhakapu'an an jalhunut, pus k'atsayi tuchini nawputuncha an Takuwin, mu an Takuwin tapayniniya an Dios ixlakatak'an an yu takiklaka'i, chi tacha yu lakask'in an Diosi tapaynini.
Chi k'atsayawi li an yu oxi talhiwilay an Dios, chux an laktanlhun laktapasay wa oxi japulhi'a'tayjuy. Yu'uncha yu an Dios jat'asanita.

An yu ixjamispaycha an Dios akxni masi ntuka' xtatsukuy yucha nawlh li wachucha tacha an isTs'alhi katawalh, para li xluwk'ancha lhit'ala'awnin katawalh, chi yucha an isTs'alh Dioscha yu xa'ay kawalh.

Chi yu yucha an Dioscha ixjasakxtuta akxni ntuka' xtatsukuy, wachu jat'asanilh, chi an yu jat'asanilh oxicha jala'ts'ilh, chi ani yu oxicha jala'ts'ilh ja'ilhtulhi li katalhitapalalhi an tan ch'alhkatnan.
¿Tasucha kanawpalawi? Li Diosi kintalhistaktan, ¿tisiyuchacha akintat'alaxtukuyani?
Li an Dios ma'axta'lhi laka lhinin an isTs'alh kilakatak'an kinchuxk'an, ¿tasucha li ntu wa ayxtam ali an isTs'alhi akintaxta'niyan chux an laktanlhuni?
¿Tisiyuchacha lay kaja'alhtasuya an yu Dios jasakxtuta, li yu oxicha jala'ts'in yucha an Diosi?

¿Tisiyuchacha lay akintalhimuk'ayan kintala'alhink'ani? Jantu xamati', an Cristo yucha kintalhinincha, pero masi chuncha, yucha la'awcho'olh chi chaway piktuwilhchalhcha tan oxi ixpa'xti an Dios chi lhisk'iniya kilakatak'an.

¿Tisiyuchacha lay akintama'osuyan la xjamapayninti Cristojo? ¿Yucha an lhima'alh'ajna u yucha an la'lhima'anxkay tanlhun u li kintach'a'o'akanan u chawan u li mati kila'ch'itk'an u tu'u yu lhima'anxkay u makxkayalhinin?
Tacha najunta tan ts'o'muk'akanta: Lhilhiji wa k'is ikt'awnaw laka lhinin milakata, Wa tacha wa borregojnincha akxni jalhi'ankan tan jama'nikani kinta'ilhtukanan.
Pero masi chuncha tapasay palay alhp'asi iklhajayacha'aw, yucha an yu kintamapayniyani kintalhi'a'tayjuyan.

Oxi ijk'atsay li ntu tu'u lay akintitama'osun la xjamapayninti Dios, jantu layi akintitama'osun an lhinin chi an jatsukunti chi an angelhnin chi an yu ntu laj'oxi lhich'alhkat chi an ix'alhp'asninti lakmakxkay'un chi yu wa tapasat'ajunka chi yu wa katapasayaka',

chi tan palay talhman chi tan palay talaktsin, chi watuchicha atumpaj yu tacha an lak'ilhtuta an Dios, tu tu'u yu lay akintitama'osunin an ixjamapayninti Dios, yu an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo kintapumasunin.
Tacha kit'in ixlapanak an Cristo, sawalhi an yu iknawt'ajun, jantu wa ikmaslakatinin. Atumpaj mu yucha an Stalan'a Takuwini malhtanata an kijatapast'ak'at, pus ijk'atsayi li aniy yucha sawalh.
Ay ta'oxila'alhiti iklhit'ajun chi an la kijalhunut wa paktsincha kixkani,
sta wa laycha li kit'in akts'an'alhcha, jantucha akt'ajalhtanalhi an Cristo, li sna chuncha yu lay akjalhi'a'tayjulh an kijat'ala'awnin, yu kint'ajudiojnin.

Yu'uncha jamacha'an Israel, yu'uncha yu an Dios jasakxtuta para li tacha ixjas'at'ancha katawalh. An Dios jamasunilhi an ix'alhp'asninti chi jat'atamakawlhi li yu'uncha ixlapanakni chi jaxta'nilhi lhamap'a'sin chi ja'ilhtulhi li yu'uncha ayi katala'ts'ilh an Dios, chi li katapakxan'ilhi tacha an jajunilh an Dios.

Yu'uncha ixlakpaynink'an oxi ixtat'a'aklat'ajun Dios ma'anchacha. Chi yu'uncha japula'awlh an Cristo, chi an Cristo yucha Dios, wa tanchun kawalhcha. Yucha lhilhiji kaxta'niw lhimala'puchajun. Chuncha kawalh.
Chaway jantu takiklaka'iy pero jantu iknawputun li an ixchiwinti Dios jantu lhitapalay. Yu tapasay, li ntu ixchuxk'ani an jamacha'an Israel ixjas'at'an an Dios.

Chi ntu wa xliyu li yucha an Abrahamcha tapu'a'p'unminchalh, chaway kanaju li sicha ixjas'at'an. An Dios junilh an Abraham: "Yu k'aja'una'a li uxint'i tapu'a'p'unmincha'an yu'uncha an yu katapu'a'p'unminanta an Isaac."
Nawputun, jantu ixchuxk'an an ixjas'at'an an Abrahami ixjas'at'an Dios, yu ixjas'at'an Dios yu'uncha an yu takiklaka'iy li ka'alina tani kalhita'alhtaxtukanacha, yu tacha an Dios junilh an Abraham.
Mu an Dios chunchuniya nawlh: "Ani minta k'ata, uxint'i Abraham chi uxint'i Sara, aklaxta'niyaw pumatam mints'alhk'an."
Chi ntu wa chunchacha tapasalh. An ixt'uyunk'an ists'alan an Rebeca wa pumatami ixpayk'an, yu ta ixlila'ts'inaw yu junkan Isaac.

Akxni ntuka' ixtatsukuy, akxni ntuka' tu'u ixta'ilhtuy yu oxi u yu ntu oxi, an Dios sakxtulh pumatam. Chunchacha pumasulh an Dios li yucha sakxtuy yu yuchacha sakxtuputun, jantu xamati sakxtuy wa xliyu oxicha tanlhun lak'ilhtuta,
an Rebeca junkan: "An xa'ay wa ma'tsuku apaliji kajuna', yucha an xalakat'ikt'i yu xa'ay kajuna'."
Chi chuncha ts'o'muk'ak'anta an tan najunta: " An Jacob ikmapayni, pero an Esaú jantu ikla'ts'imputun."
¿Chaway tasu kanawnawcha? ¿Kanawnawi li an Dios jantu oxi tacha an lay? Jantu layi chunchacha katinaju.
Mu an Dios juniy an Moisés: "Akmapayniya li yu ikmapayniputun."
Pus li kintasakxtukanan, jantu wa kitnancha lakask'iw u wa sawalhcha lhipuxkawniw, yucha an Diosi yu kintamapayniyan.
Chi an tan ts'o'muk'akanta, an Dios juniya an Faraón: "Kit'ini ik'ilhtun rey para li akpumasuni an ki'alhp'asninti chi para li kamispakalhi ta xlijalhi'ay an lakaat'un an kinta'a'ut."
Pus an Dios yucha mapayniya yu yucha mapayniputun, chi yucha wachu yu t'ak'alh ilhtuniy ixjalhunut yu chuncha ilhtuniputun.
Chi chaway ak'i'una'a: Li chuncha, ¿tasu li an Dios najuncha li yucha an lapanaki ixkwentaja, mu yu Dioscha chuncha najun jantu lay xamati katitanchanilhi?
¡Uxint'i lapanak! ¿Tisu milhijunticha para li k'at'alaxt'uk'ucha Diosi? ¿Chu sna an de t'un xaluj kajuna an yu la'oxilh: Tasu li t'ach'a k'ila'oxit'icha?

An yu la'la'oxiy tanlhun laka slaman'a t'un yucha yu lay kalak'ilhtuya an tanlhun tani yu ilhtuputuncha; layi ka'ilhtulh la'atam xaluj an laka slaman'a t'un yu sawalh lhitapalay chi layi ka'ilhtupalh la'atam yu wa kapumukalhcha jamakxtalh.
An Dios masi ixmasuputuni tani yu junitacha an ixjamama'alh'ajninti chi kaxmasulhi an ix'alhp'asninti, sawalh xlak'anti jalhitayanilh an yu ixtat'acha'an li kaxtama'alh'ajnalh chi kaxtats'an'alhcha.
Chi wachu masulhi an ixk'usinti la kijatsukuntik'an, mu kintamapaynin chi kitnancha kintamala'asijnin yu ma'anchacha para li kat'a'awi an tan xlimj wilhchalh.
An Dios kintat'asanincha, ali'in kitnan yu judiojnin chi an ali'in yu masi ntu judiojnin.
Tacha an najunta an la xlibro an Oseas: Ajkajuna li kilapanakni an yu ntu kilapanakni ixtajunita. Chi akmapayniya an yu ntu xakmapayni.
Chi an tan jajunkalh: Uxitnan yu ntu kilapanakni, ancha kajajunkana ixjas'at'an Dios yu la'ajunta.
Chi an Isaías jalhichiwinilh an jamacha'an Israel, najun: Masi an ixjas'at'an an Israel wanajcha ixluwk'ani katawalh tacha an alin kukuj alamalh, wa lakats'uniya katatamakawna yu katata'alhtaxtuya'.
Mu an Jamach'alhkat yucha kamuktaxtuya an ixchiwinti aniy lakamunulhpa', chi wa lasi ka'ilhtuya chi chuxi ka'ilhtu'oya'.

Tacha yu p'ulhnajcha najunta an Isaías: Li an Jamach'alhkat yu lhuw jalhit'ajun ixsoldadojnin jantu xakintamakawnini kijas'at'ank'an, ka tacha an la'acha'an Sodoma chi an la'acha'an Gomorraja ixputapasaw.
¿Chaway tasu kanawnawcha? An yu ntu judiojnin chi ntu ixtapuxkajuy Dios para li ts'awjcha katat'ajalhtanalh, yu'unchacha yu ts'awjcha tat'ajalhtanan mu takiklaka'iy.
Pero an israelitajnin masi ixtalhit'ajuni lhamap'a'sin tan ixtala'ts'in para li lay ts'awj kaxtat'ajalhtanalh an Dios, jantu lay tamuktaxtulhi anchunu lhamap'a'sin.

¿Tasu'u? Mu ntu la xjakiklaka'intik'ani tapuxkawlh, wachunchacha tapula'cha'amputulh tacha an talak'ilhtuycha tanlhun, wa li laycha kapula'cha'ankana chuncha. Jantu takiklaka'ilh xliyu tachanu japu'ayst'uk'ukalh an chiwx yu ja'ayst'uk'unun,
an yu lhichiwininta tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "Kit'in ak'ulaya an la'acha'an Sion, chiwx yu kaja'ayst'uk'ununa chi chiwx yu kaputa'a'takana'. Yu kakiklaka'iya jantu katitamaxanilh."
Kint'ala'awnin, yu sawalhcha lakask'in an kijalhunut chi an kintapaynit akxni iktapaynini an Dios ixlakatak'an an israelitajnin, li katata'alhtaxtulh.
Kit'in klajunaw, yu'uncha sawalhcha tat'atapatsaputuni an Dios; pero wa x'aman tacha an taputapatsaputun jantu tacha an najunta an yu oxi jatapast'ak'at.

Mu ntu tak'atsayi li yucha an Diosi yu ja'ilhtuy an lapanakni li ts'awj katatsukulh, wa tacha yu yu'unchacha tajatapastaknani tapuch'a'o'aputun an Dios, jantu ta'ilhtuyi tacha an najun an Dios yu ka'ilhtukalh para li oxicha kat'a'klatsuku.
Yu pu'ukla'olhcha an ixlamap'a'sin an Moisés yucha an Cristo, chi chux yu takiklaka'iy ts'ajwi katatsukuya'.
Chi tani yu ts'awjcha kat'ajalhtanankalh an Dios, an la xlamap'a'sin Moisés ts'o'lhi: "Yu kamuktaxtuya aniy lhamap'a'sin, yuchacha kaputsukuya'."

Pero yu yucha an jakiklaka'inti ts'awj put'a'aklat'ajun an Dios, ancha chunchuniya najun: "Jant'u k'ap'ast'akt'i k'anaw, ¿tisiyuchacha ka'ana lakt'iyani?" (mu chuncha tachanu nawt'a'un li kata'alhtajulhi lakaat'un an Cristo),
u k'anaw, "¿Tisiyuchacha ka'ana tan ta'aknunun an janinini?" (mu tachanu li nawt'a'un li ka'ostayalh an Cristo tan an tamanalh janinin)
¿Tisapujcha yu nawputun an tan najunta?: "An chiwinti wa niya lhit'a'un, la minkilhni chi la mijalhunut." Aniy chiwinti yu pujakiklaka'ininkan yucha yu iklhichiwininaw.
Li la minkilhnich'a p'una'un li an Jesús yucha Jamach'alhkat chi li k'iklak'a'iya la mijalhunut li an Dios mala'awnicho'olhi an Jesús laka lhinin, k'at'a'alht'axt'uya'a.
Mu la kijalhunutk'ani pukiklaka'ikan para li oxi k'at'a'aklats'uk'u an Dios, chi la kinkilhnik'ani nawkan tichini yuchacha an Jesucristo para li k'at'a'alht'axt'u.
An tan ts'o'muk'akanta najun: "Jantu xamati yu yucha kiklaka'iy chi wa kalhits'an'alhcha."
Jantu xamati yu ntucha kala'a'ikalh, yu judiojnin chi yu ntu judiojnin, mu an Jamach'alhkat, ta lhichuxi kiJamach'alhkatk'an chi lhuwi jaxta'niy t'u'u ixchuxk'an an yu ta'a'atant'asay.
Mu chunchuniya najunta: "Ixchuxk'an yu kata'a'atant'asaya an ixta'a'ut an Jamach'alhkat, katata'alhtaxtuya'."

Pero, ¿tasucha lay katalhi'a'atant'asaya li ntu takiklaka'ita? ¿Chi tasucha lay katalhikiklaka'iya li ntu a'tam ta'asmatta tan kalhichiwinkalh yucha? ¿Chi tasucha lay katalhi'asmat'a li ntu xamati yu kajalhixa'alalh an ixchiwinti?

¿Chi tasucha lay kata'ana lhichiwinin an ixchiwinti li ntu xamati jamala'achayi? Tacha najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "¡Sawalhcha oxi akxni li tachincha an yu talhichiwiniy an chiwinti yu oxi jatawlhnat chi talhichiwiniycha an laj'oxi chiwinti!"
Pero ntu ixchuxk'ani takiklaka'ilh an laj'oxi chiwinti yu puta'alhtaxtukan. Tacha najun an Isaías: "Jamach'alhkat, ¿Tisiyuchacha kiklaka'ita an kinchiwintik'ani?"
Pus chunchacha, li jakiklaka'ininkan wa xliyu li asmatkan an ixchiwinti Dios chi li asmatkan akxni lhichiwinkan an Cristo.

Chi chaway iknajun, ¿Sna ntu ta'asmatlhi aniy chiwinti? ¡Chun, ta'asmatlhi! An tan ts'o'muk'akanta najun: An ixchiwintik'an yu'uncha ta xlijalhi'ay an lakaat'uni asmatkalh, chi an ixchiwintik'an cha'alhi wa tanchun kawalhcha an lakaamunulhpa'.

Chi a'tam iknawpalay: ¿Sna an yu jamacha'an Israel jantu tak'atsay? Pero an Dios p'ulhnajcha manawnilhi an Moisés, najun: Akla'ilhtuyawi li k'ajask'unla'ts'init'iti yu talhit'ajun an lapanakni yu ntu kilapanakni; akla'ilhtuyawi li k'ajat'alh'amajla'ts'int'iti an lapanakni yu ntu ixtaja'asmatnamputun.
Chi an Isaías tapujulhi nawlh: Yu'uncha an yu ntu kixtapuxkajuyi kintala'cha'alh; Yu'uncha an yu ntu kixtalhasakminini kintamispalh.
Chi akxni yucha an israelitajnincha ixjalhichiwiniy an Isaías, najun: Tam wilhchani ikstak jat'asanilh an lapanakni yu ntu k'is taja'asmatnan chi ntu k'is tajakiklaka'inin."
Chaway iknajun, ¿Sna an Dios jantucha jala'ts'imputuni an ixlapanakni? ¡Jantu, jantu chun! Kit'in wachu xjas'at'a Israel, yu ta jalhila'ts'in an Abraham, chi yu ta ixjalhila'ts'in an Benjamín.

Yu ma'anchacha, an Dios yu'uncha an xjas'at'an Israelhi ja'ilhtulh ixjas'at'an, chi chaway tu jala'amaj'anta. ¿Jant'u k'ats'ayat'iti tani lhichiwinkantacha an Elías an tan ts'o'muk'akanta, li tani tapayninilhcha an Dios tan ja'alhtasulh an Israelitajnin? An Elías najun:
"Jamach'alhkat, jala'ma'ninik'a an yu ixtalhichiwiniy minchiwinti chi amintan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan talakt'ilhini'ojon chi wa ki'akstucha iktamakajunta chi wachu kintama'niputun."
Pero an Dios alhtaylh: "Ijkama'ata la'atujun milh lapanakni yu para kit'in, yu ntu tatatso'ottanita an dios Baal."
Pus chaway wanajcha chuni tatamakajunta lakats'uni yu de yu'uncha, yucha an Diosi jasakxtuta la xjamapayninti.
Chi li la xjamapayninti an Dios jasakxtuta, jantu wa xliyu li tu'u laj'oxi tanlhun ixta'ilhtuta, mu li chuncha kaxwalh, an ixjamapayninti Dios jantucha kaxjunkalhi li jamapayninti.
¿Chaway tasucha? An xjas'at'an Israel jantu tala'cha'alhi yu ixtapuxkajuy. Pero yu an Dios jasakxtulh yu'uncha tala'cha'alh. An ali'in ja'ilhtukalhi li t'ak'alh katalalh,

tacha najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: An Dios ja'ilhtulhi li an la xjatapast'ak'atk'an tu katajak'atsaanalh; chi jaxta'nilhi la'chulh yu ntu tapalakawanan chi a'ax'olh yu ntu tapa'asmatnan chi sta chaway chuncha talay.
Chi an David wachu najun: An tan talak'ilhtuy wayt is'apak'ani katatapalaxtunilh, para li kataputa'a'talh chi kajaxta'nikalhi lhima'alh'ajna.
Katala'la'ach'ixlalh para li ntu katajalakawanalh, katala'pula'alh'awilin'alhilhcha.

Chi chaway iknajun, ¿Li an judiojnin jalaj'ayst'uk'ukalhcha, ixpujun'alhinchak'ani tata'a'talh? ¡Jantu! Li an judiojnin jantu taja'asmatnalh, an ali'in chunchacha yu taputa'alhtaxtulh, para li an judiojnin katask'unla'ts'ilhcha an oxi jatsukunti yu talhit'ajun an yu ntu judiojnin.

Pus mu li an tala'alhin an yu ta'ilhtulh an judiojnin wa oxicha para an lakaamunulhpa xajchalh chi li tacha an tu oxi tat'axajchalh an judiojnin wa oxicha para an yu ntu judiojnini walh, ¡pus palaycha oxi kajuna para an judiojnin akxni katach'a'o'acho'oyacha an Dios!
Chi uxitnan yu ntu judiojnin aklajunaw tuchichun, mu li an Dios kimala'achaycha ak'alh jajunini an xchiwinti yu ntu judiojnin, yu para kit'in an kintapatsat sawalhcha lhitapalay.
Iklakask'in li an yu kijak'alhni talhit'ajun yu kint'ajudiojnin, kata'ilhtulhi an t'ach'a layat, para li katata'alhtaxtulh.

Mu li jala'amaj'ankalhi an judiojnin, chi oxi para an lakaamunulhpa walh, para li an lakaamunulhpa oxi kat'ajalhtanalh an Dios, an judiojnin yu'uncha wachu kajaxta'nikana jatsukunti akxni katach'a'o'acho'oyacha an Dios.

Pus mu li an yu p'ulhnajcha ilhtukan pan yucha ixnawincha Dios, an ali jax'ot'anti harina wachucha chuxi xnawin. Chi li a'atam k'iw ixnawincha an Diosi an ixjataxiyak, chux an ix'a'atan'alat wachucha chuxi ixnawin.

An judiojnin, yu'uncha xak'iw olivo, chi a'atancha'xmaj'ankalhi an ali ix'a'atan'alat ani olivo, chi yucha an wa xasimaroncha olivojo t'alamaklhtanchawcho'okalh, yucha uxint'i yu ntu judiojk'at'i. Chunchacha wa la'atamcha jatsukunti t'alhits'uk'u an olivo chi wanajcha yu mijataxiyak walh an ixjataxiyak.

Pero chaway jant'u k'anawi li uxint'icha tukan ch'i jant'uch'a t'u'u k'ajalhiwilat'i an yu tukan ix'a'atan'alat an olivo. Li ch'unch'a lay, k'ap'ast'akt'i li ntu uxint'i pula'awtan an ixjataxiyak an olivo, uxint'i yu wa p'ula'a'unt'a an ixjataxiyak an olivo.
Chi sna layi k'anawp'alh, "chun, pero laj'a'apacha'xmaj'ankalhi an ali ix'a'atan'alat an olivo chi kit'incha ikt'amaklhtanchawkalh".

Chun sawalh, pero tuchi jalhilaj'a'apacha'xmaj'ankalh wa xliyu jantu ixtajakiklaka'inin, chi uxint'i wa xliyu jak'iklak'a'inin xliyu t'alamaklht'anch'awk'acha. Pero jant'u k'anawi li uxint'icha tukan, apalij wa k'ak'iklak'a'it'i an Dios.
Mu li an Dios jantu jamak'akxanilhi an yu ixlaj'a'atan'alat tukan an olivo, uxint'i wachu ntu katimak'akxanin.

Chaway k'ala'ts'icha an Dios li yucha ntu k'is ay junita, pero wachu lakask'ini li ts'awj sawalhi katsukukalh. Jamama'alh'ajniya an yu ntucha takiklaka'iy chi uxint'i oxi la'ts'inan. Pero wachunchacha k'ats'uk'u'alhit'i tacha yucha lhi'achani, mu li jantu, uxint'i wachu k'ach'a'xmaj'anch'o'ok'ana'a.
Chi atumpaj li an judiojnin katajakiklaka'inincho'olhcha, kajamaklhtanchawcho'okana tan jacha'xp'uxkalh, mu an Dios layi kajamaklhtanchawcho'oya'.

Chi mu li uxint'i o'sliyancha wa xasimaronk'at'i olivo chi ch'a'x'ik'acha para li k'at'alamaklht'anch'awk'acha an yu oxiya olivo, ¡pus palaycha an judiojnin kajat'alamaklhtanchawcho'okana an tan jacha'xp'uxkalh xlijunti, mu yu'uncha ixlaj'a'atan'alat sawalhi an yu oxi olivo.

Kint'ala'awnin, iklakask'in li k'ak'ats'at'iti an ixlaktanlhun Dios yu ntu tasuy, para li nt'u k'alat li sawalhch'a k'ats'ayat, an ali'in xjas'at'an Israel t'ak'alh talay, pero wa kacha'ana panch'e'ex akxni katatanu'oyantacha ixchuxk'an an yu ntu xjas'at'an Israel.

Akxni chunchacha katapasaya, chux an xjas'at'an Israel katata'alhtaxtuya', mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta najunta: An yu kajama'alhtaxtununa Sioni kaminanta, chi kama'osuniya an Jacob an yu ntu oxi tanlhun.
Yucha anicha yu ajkat'atamakawna yu'uncha, akxni ajkama'osuniya ixtala'alhink'an".

Chi chaway an laka laj'oxi chiwinti, an judiojnin jala'ts'inkan tacha ixt'alaxkayk'an an Dios, para li uxitnan lay k'at'ajalht'anant'it an Dios, pero an Dios jamapaynika an judiojnin, ixlakata li yu'uncha an ixlakpaynink'ani yu jasakxtukalh.
Mu yu xt'a'acha an Dios jantucha kamaxtunicho'on chi li kat'asanin jantucha kamala'achacho'on.
Ma'anchacha ixjuntachalh, jant'u k'iklak'a'it'iti an Dios, pero chaway li an judiojnin jantu takiklaka'i, an Dios tamapayniyani uxitnan.
Pus wanajcha chuni yu'uncha chaway jantucha taja'asmatnan, pero wa xliyu li an Dios wachu katamapaynini uxitnan, chi chaway, para li wachu kajamapaynilhi an Dios an judiojnin.
Mu ta lhichuxi an Dios kintama'anun laka pulach'in tan ntu ja'asmatnanaw, para li kinchuxk'ani akintamapaynin.
¡Laj'ay tukani an laj'oxi ixtanlhun Dios chi an ixjatapast'ak'at chi an yu lajk'atsay! ¡Jantu xamati lay najun tuchini past'ak'acha, chi ntu xamati lay la'lhimacha'xani an ixtij!
¿Tisiyuchacha k'atsaani ixjatapast'ak'at an Jamach'alhkati? ¿Tisi yuchacha lay kamap'a'siya'a?
¿Tisiyuchacha lapanaki p'ulhnaj kaxta'nilh tu'u Dios para li yucha kamapusp'itnicho'olhcha?
Mu chux an tanlhun yucha an Diosi xt'a'a, chi yucha pulak'alin chi yucha ix'anun. ¡An Dios yucha ixpujun'alhini ay! Chunchacha kawalh.

Pus xliyu'u kint'ala'awnin, iklatapaynisk'iniyawi la xjamapayninti an Dios li k'ama'axt'a't'iti amilakatunajk'an tacha lha'ulan yu la'ajunta chi stalan'a chi yu lhi'acha kala'a'ilh an Dios. Anch'ach'a k'ap'umasuya'it li ay sawalhi lhiwilayat an Dios.

Jantucha wachu wa ch'uni k'ats'uk'ut yu tacha chaway t'awkan aniy lakaamunulhpa', k'amap'axatcha amijatapast'ak'atk'an para li katapaxalhcha amijatsukuntik'an chi laych'a k'ak'ats'at tani yu oxicha lhiwilay an Dios, kanaju, yu oxi, yu lhi'achanit chi yu ts'awj.

Tacha an kilhimap'a'sita an Dios la xjamapayninti, minchuxk'ani iklajunaw li ntu xamati kanawlh li palay lhitapalay, tacha yu xli'aycha mijakiklaka'intik'an taxta'nin an Dios chunchacha yu k'alhit'ap'alat.
Mu tacha an la kilakatunajk'an wanaj tipalhuwi t'o' la'nuyaw, chi ntu wa tipatamcha tu'u talhitapalay tacha an t'o' la'nuyaw, tipaspiti talhitapalay,
pus wanajcha chuni kitnan, masi wanaj kilhuk'an, wa la'atam lakatunaja pulhit'awnaw an Cristo, tacha la'atam lakatunaj wa stakcha la'nuy chuncha kitnan, wanaj lach'apa'otacha'aw.

An Dios tacha yu yuchacha kintaxta'niputun atamjtamin, chunchacha kintaxta'nin tipaspit tapatsat, li yu xta'nikalhi tapatsat para li kalhichiwinilh an ixchiwinti Dios, tani xli'aycha xjakiklaka'inti chunchacha kalhichiwinilh,
li yu kajatapatsaniya an ali'in, oxicha kajatapatsanilh, li yu kamasuya, kamasulhcha,

li yu kajat'alama'oximaj'ayaya an ali'in, kajat'alama'oximaj'ayalhcha, li yu kaja'a'tayjuya yu tama'lhtask'iniy tu'u, laka lhi'oxicha lapanaki ka'ilhtulh, li yu tu'u la'ts'ilhi'an, oxicha kala'ts'ilhi'alh, li yu jamapayninin lhi'achacha chuncha ka'ilhtulh.
Yu xlisawalhch'a k'alamap'aynip'axat atamjtamin, k'axk'a'it'iti an yu ntu laj'oxi tanlhun chi k'a'ilht'ut'iti an yu laj'oxi tanlhun.
Tacha lhit'ala'awnini k'alamap'aynip'axat, oxi k'alala'ts'int'it ch'i k'alalhiwilap'axat.
K'at'at'axt'unit'it, jant'u k'amalhe'nint'it, k'at'at'ap'ats'at'iti an Jamach'alhkat laka takuwin yu jo'at.
Lhi'acha k'ats'uk'ut ixlakata an yu p'akxan'iyat uxitnan; k'alhit'ayanit'iti an tanlhun lhima'alh'ajna, jantu a'tam k'ak'apmaj'ant'iti an tapaynit.
K'aja'a't'ay'ut'iti an kijat'ala'awnink'an yu wachu takiklaka'iy Dios li tu'u tama'lhtask'ini; oxi k'ajala'a'it yu tala'pixiyalhnanan.
K'ask'init'iti an Dios li oxi katatawilh an yu wa talhitama'chapuyan; k'ajalhisk'int'iti li oxi katatawilh chi ntu kajaxta'nikalhi tanlhun la'lhima'alh'ajna yu ntu oxi.
K'ajat'alaj'ach'ant'iti an yu talaj'achan chi k'ajat'alaj'alhunt'iti an yu talaj'alhun.
Wa tami k'ak'ats'at'it. Jant'u k'alaj'ayajk'ats'at'it, k'ajat'ak'ilhp'at'inijk'ats'at'iti an yu wa tajakilhpatinijk'atsay. Jant'u k'alat'iti li sawalhcha jalakp'ast'aknanat.
Uxitnan jant'u k'ajalhit'ama'ch'ap'ut'iti masi yu wa talhitama'chapuyan. K'a'ilht'ut'iti tanlhun yu laj'oxi la x'ukxlakapuk'an ixchuxk'an an lapanakni.
Li wa laycha, k'alhip'uxk'awnit'iti tani oxicha k'ajat'alalhip'in'o'ot chux an lapanakni.

Kint'ala'awnin, jant'u k'alhich'it'iti tu'u wa mi'akstuchak'an xamati', yucha an Diosi k'amak'awnit li kaxta'nilh lhima'alh'ajna; mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta najunta: "Kit'ini aklhach'inina', kit'ini akmapalhniya xamati'." Chuncha najun an Jamach'alhkat.
Pus li masi yu wa xkayan, li chawani, k'at'away, chi li kikxixa, k'at'a'ott'i, mu li ch'unch'a k'a'ilht'uya'a, k'a'ilht'uya'a li kalhimaxanalhi tacha an ixlakatijla pakxanta.
Jant'u k'alhit'amak'awi li kalaklhajan an yu ntu oxi tanlhun, apalij k'alaklhaja an yu ntu oxi tanlhun an laka laj'oxi tanlhun.
Chux lapanak kajak'iklak'a'ilhi an jamach'alhkatni, mu ntu xamati jamach'alhkat yu ntu yu an Dios kamakawnilh, chi an yu ta'alin, yucha an Diosi ja'ulata.
Pus yu ntu asmatni an jamach'alhkat, jantucha asmatnit'ajuni an yu Dios ulata. Chi an yu wa tat'alaxtukuy, kajamama'alh'ajnikana',

mu an yu tach'alhkatnan jantu tawilanalh para li katame'e'swalh an yu oxi tanlhun ta'ilhtuy, yu'uncha an yu wa tani talaycha yu kajala'me'e'swakana'. ¿Ts'uk'up'ut'uni jant'u k'at'alhamnin an jamach'alhkat? Pus wa oxich'a k'ats'uk'u, walh an jamach'alhkat oxi kala'ts'inan,

mu oxi para uxint'i li tatapats'anit'ajun an Dios. Pero li wa t'ani laycha, chuncha k'at'alhanana'a; mu ntu wa la'a'ijcha li lhi'anta an espada an jamach'alhkat, yucha, yucha an Diosi tapatsanit'ajun, para li yu ilhtuy yu ntu oxi kamama'alh'ajnilh.
Pus lhitask'iniya li k'aja'asmatnit'iti an jamach'alhkatni, chi jantu wanajcha wa xliyu li jantucha k'amama'alh'ajnik'ant'it, wachu xliyu li chuncha yu junita laka jatapast'ak'at.
Chi wachu yucha ixlakata li uxitnan map'alhlhip'inat'it an tanlhun, mu an jamach'alhkatni yucha an Diosi tat'atapatsay chi yucha yu lhilhij ixli'ilhtutk'an.

Ixchuxk'an k'ajaxt'a'nitcha yu jalhip'iniyat. Yu k'axt'a'niya'it'iti laka tu'u la'a'tayjun, k'axt'a'nitcha la'a'tayjun, yu k'amap'alhniya'it'iti ixlakata yu lhimapalhlhi'at tu'u, chunchacha k'amap'alhnit. Li yu k'alhiwilaya'it, k'alhiwilatcha, yu ay lapanak k'ala'ts'ina'it, ch'unch'ach'a k'ala'ts'int'it.
Jant'u xamat'i k'alhip'init tu'u', wa x'aman an jamapayninti, mu yucha ntu a'tam lay mapalh'okan, pero yu mapayniya ixt'alapanak muktaxtuycha tacha an najun lhamap'a'sin.

An lhamap'a'sin najun: "Jant'u wa aya k'alat'i, jant'u k'ajama'nin, jant'u k'aja'alhawan, jant'u k'ask'unla'ts'i tu'u'." Tacha ani laknajun an lhamap'a'sin chi an alicha lhamap'a'sin, anchacha naw'ojota an tan najun: "K'amap'aynit'i mint'alapanak t'ach'a akst'umap'aynik'an".
Yu lhit'ajuni jamapayninti tu lhitama'chapuyi ixt'alapanak. Pus an laka jamapayninticha ts'awj muktaxtukan an lhamap'a'sin.

Chuxcha k'a'ilht'ut tacha aniy, k'alhak'ap'up'itcha an panch'e'ex yu chaway t'awnaw, ixpakucha li kalajkuj'wicha la kilhtatatk'an. Akxni wa jakiklaka'iniwka ma'atka ixt'awnachalh kinta'alhtaxtutk'an, pero chaway palaycha waniya t'ajun.
Sawalhcha anta an jatats'isni chi mintacha an jatunkunu', pus xliyu ntucha ali ka'ilhtuw an yu xnawin an jatats'isni, kala'la'ch'iwcha yu xnawin an jatunkunu yu kapulasayaw.

Wa oxicha katsuku, tacha akxni tan tunku. Jantu wa sawalhcha kala't'a'ap'ajtsuku laka lajk'atan. Jantu kapu'ilhtuwi wa tanlhuncha yu ntu oxi an kilakatunajk'an, chi ntu wa aya kapulaw. Chi ntu kala'ajiw chi ntu kalaxkajiw.
Yu lhitask'iniy li yucha an kiJamach'alhkatchak'an Jesucristojo katamalhtanan, jant'u k'ap'uxk'a'ut'iti yu wa mijatapast'ak'atchak'an oxi lhiwilay.
Oxi k'ala'a'it an yu ntu k'ut'ilh la xjakiklaka'inti, ch'i nt'u k'at'alak'ikxt'uk'ut.
Mu ta'alini yu tanajun li layi kata'ulh wa tuchicha ta'uputun, pero an ali'in yu ntu lajk'ut'ilin la xjakiklaka'intik'an wa yu wa jatawk'atcha talak'uy.

Pus yu chuxi lak'u'ojoy, jantu kala'amaj'alhi an yu wa sakxtuy yu lak'uy, chi an yu wa sakxtuy yu lak'uy, jantu kalhichiwinilh wachu an yu lak'u'ojoy tanlhun, mu an Dios chunchacha la'a'iy anchunu lapanak.

¿Tisu milhijunticha uxint'i para li k'alhich'iwincha yu ixma'tsuku apumatami? Li oxi u jantu t'axajachalh, yucha yucha an ixpatroncha ixkwentaj. Pero oxi kat'axajanta mu an Jamach'alhkat ka'ilhtuya li oxi kat'axajchalh.

Atumpaj, ali'in tanajun li alini wilhchan yu palay lhitapalay chi an ali wilhchan li jantu, chi an ali'in tanajun li watamcha an wilhchan. Pero atamj atamjcha tani yu lhiwilaycha chunchacha kalhiwilalh.

Yu lhiwilayi la'atam wilhchan li palay lhitapalay, ixlakatacha an Jamach'alhkati chuncha ilhtuy. Chi yu wa tuchicha si uy, ixlakatacha an Jamach'alhkati uy, chi xta'nicha lhimala'puchajuni an Dios, chi xamati yu wa sakxtuyi yu uy, ixlakatacha an Jamach'alhkati li chuncha ilhtuy, chi wachu xta'niy lhimala'puchajuni an Dios.
Mu ntu xamati yu wa para ix'akstucha katsukulh chi yu wa para ix'akstucha kanilh.
Li t'awnaw, para yucha an Jamach'alhkati li t'awnaw; chi li niyaw, para yucha an Jamach'alhkati li niyaw. Pus katsuku u kaniw, an kijatsukuntik'an yucha an Jamach'alhkati ixnawin.
An Cristo xliyu lhinilh chi la'awcho'olh, para li kajach'alhkatnanilhi an yu tanitacha chi an tala'ajunta.
¿Chi chaway, t'asu li lhich'iwinicha mint'ala'ajuni? ¿U tasu li la'amaj'ancha mint'ala'ajun uxint'i? Kinchuxk'ani kacha'anaw la x'ukxlakapu Dios para li yuchacha akintajunan li oxi u jantu ixt'awnaw.
Mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta najunta: "Kit'in ikt'ajun, najuni an Dios, Ta lhichuxi akintatso'ottanikana la ki'ukxlakapu', Chi chux sima'at kanawna li kit'ini Dios.
Pus kitnan atamj atamjcha ka'akstujunaw an Dios tani yu ixt'awnawcha.
Pus xliyu ntucha kalalhichiwiniwi wa siya kitnancha, apalij k'ap'ast'akt'itcha li ntucha tu'u k'a'ilht'ut yu lay kapu'ayst'uk'uk'alh mint'ala'ajunk'an u yu lay kaputat'ilhilh la xjakiklaka'inti.

Kit'in li ijkiklaka'icha an Jamach'alhkat Jesús, ijk'atsayi li tacha an alin yu ukan, jantu tu'u yu ntucha lay ka'ukalh. Chi li xamati najun li alini yu ntu ka'ukalh, pus para yucha jantu lay kati'ulh.

Chi wa xliyu t'uch'ini yu uycha, chi amint'ala'ajun kalhita'oxila'alhilhcha, jant'uch'a jamap'ayninini chuncha. Jant'u k'a'ilht'u li wa xliyu t'uch'ini yu uycha kats'an'alhi xamati yu lhinitacha an Cristo.
Pus jant'u k'amak'a'unt'iti an yu oxi para uxitnan li wa tani kalhichiwinkalhcha.
Mu an xlich'alhkat Dios jantu wayt chi ntu lhi'ot'at, ancha, tan ts'awj katsukukalh, chi tan wa oxicha katsukukalh chi tan lhi'achacha kaputsukukalh an Stalan'a Takuwin.
Yu chunchacha t'atapatsay an Cristo ma'an'achaycha an Dios chi an lapanakni talaknajuncha li ts'awjcha t'ajun.
Pus wa yuchacha kapuxkaju yu pu'oxiya tawlancha chi kala'a'tayjupaxawcha para li k'ut'ilhi kawalh kijakiklaka'intik'an.

Jant'u k'alakt'ilhi an tapatsat yu xnawin Dios wa ixlakatacha an wayt. Chux an yu ukan la'stalan'a, chi sawalh; pero ntu oxi li xamati lapanak wa xliyu tuchini yu uycha, kajapumats'antijlalhi an ali'in.
Palay oxi nt'u k'a'ut'i lhiway ch'i nt'u k'a'ott'i xaxkan uvaj chi tu'u k'a'ilht'up'alh yu wa lay kaputa'a'talh xamati mint'ala'ajun.
Amijakiklaka'inti yu lhit'a'un lax'ukxlakapucha an Diosi k'alhits'uk'u. Oxi para yucha li yu past'ak'a li ntu tani junita tuchini ilhtulhcha.
Pero li yu past'ak'a li sna ntu oxi li ulhcha tu'u, ix'akstucha ta'aj'ajuy, mu ntu laxjakiklaka'inti uy; chi yu ntu lakajakiklaka'inti minachalh, yucha tala'alhin.
Yu lajk'ut'ilini juntaw la kijakiklak'a'intik'an, kajalhi'a'tayjuwi an yu ntu lajk'ut'ilin la xjakiklaka'intik'an, jantu kapuxkajuwi yu wa kitnancha akintama'an'achan.
Kinchuxk'an kajama'an'achawi an kint'alapanaknik'an, ka'ilhtuwi yu laj'oxi tanlhun para yu'uncha, walh lajk'ut'ilini katajuna la xjakiklaka'intik'an.
Mu masi an Cristo, jantu wa x'akstucha ma'an'achakalh, yucha la xjatsukunti uktaxtulh tacha an najunta an tan tso'muk'akanta: "Tacha an stak xkayaj ixtajunan kit'ini kila'cha'an'olh."
Mu an tanlhun yu ma'anchacha la'ts'o'kalh, yucha lhits'o'kalh li kapulaklaniw para li laktachapunini kapujunwi chi chuncha layi kapakxan'iyaw yu najun an Dios li kajuna'.
Yucha an Dios yu xt'a'a ta'oximaj'ayat chi yu ka'ilhtun li k'ap'akxan'it'i tu'u, yuchacha kata'ilhtun li wa tamcha k'ak'ats'at, tacha an Cristo Jesús,
para li akxni wa tamcha k'ats'ayat, wa ayxtamcha laka la'atam chiwinti k'anawna'it li an Dios yucha ay chi yucha ixPay an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo.
Pus oxi k'alala'a'ip'axat tacha an Cristo Jesús tala'a'in, k'alala'a'ip'axat'it para li an Dios katasulhi li ay.

Kit'in klajunaw li an Cristo jakitapatsanichilhi an judiojnin, ki'ilhtuchilhi tacha an ixjajunitacha an Dios an yu ta ixjalhila'ts'inaw, chi chunchacha japumasunilh li yu najuni an Dios li ka'ilhtuya, ilhtuy sawalh.

Wachu yucha ixlakata li kilachilh, li an yu ntu judiojnin katanawlhi li an Dios yucha ay, ixlakata an ixjamapayninti, tacha najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "Xliyu kit'in ajkajuna an yu ntu judiojnin li uxint'i ayk'at'i, chi akmilhpaniya aminta'a'ut."
Chi an lakatam tan ts'o'muk'apalhkanta nawpalay: "¡Uxitnan yu ntu judiojnin, k'ajat'alaj'ach'ant'itcha an ixlapanakni Dios!"
Chi an alakatam nawpalay: "Minchuxk'an yu ntu judiojnin, k'ana'unt'iti li an Jamach'alhkat ay, chi chux lapanakni, minchuxk'an, k'amilhp'anit'iti milhpat."
An Isaias wachu ts'o'lhi: "Kala'awna an ixjataxiyak an Isaí, yu ka'ostayaya para li kajach'alhkatnanilh an yu ntu judiojnin, chi yucha katapupakxan'i'oya chux an lapanakni."

An Dios yu ilhtuy li kapakxan'ikalhi yu najun, yuchacha kataxta'nin achat chi oxi jatawlhnat, uxitnan yu k'iklak'a'iyat, chi an la x'alhp'asninti an Stalan'aTakuwin yuchacha katapu'ilhtun an Dios li k'ap'akxan'it'iti an tacha najun.
Kint'ala'awnin, ijk'atsayi li uxitnan lhuwi lhit'awnat an oxi lanti chi chux an jatapast'ak'at lhit'awnat, pus layi lamap'a'sip'axayat,
pero aniy laka jalhiki iktapujulh sawalhi iklats'o'niw ixlakata yu laklhichiwiniy tanlhun, para li nt'u k'ak'apt'it. Chuncha k'ilhtuy, ixlakata li an Dios chuncha kilhijunilh la xjamapayninti,

para li akt'atapatsalhi an Jesucristo para li oxi katat'axajchalh an yu ntu judiojnin. Tacha ani kilhisacerdote iktapatsay k'it'in, iklhichiwiniy an laj'oxi ixchiwinti an Dios, para li ajkalhicha'alhi an yu ntu judiojnin la x'ukxlakapu an Dios, tacha lha'ulan yu ka'achanilh an Dios, yu stalan'acha laka Stalan'a Takuwin.
Li ikt'atapatsay an Dios, alini tuchini ixlakatacha li ikputa'ayay an Jesucristo.
Mu ntu iktapujuyi aknawlh tu'u yu ntucha yu an Cristo chuncha kimpu'ilhtuy, para li kataja'asmatnalhi an yu ntu judiojnin. Chi laka lakchiwinti chi laka laktanlhuncha yu tasuyi chuncha k'ilhtuy,

chi laka laj'alhp'ascha tanlhun yu laktasuy chi tanlhuncha yu la'lhi'a'nin chi la x'alhp'asninticha an ixTakuwin Dios. Pus sta la'acha'an Jerusalén chi tacha an lak'alincha la'acha'anaxni tuntala'acho'o sta Ilírico chuxcha ikma'pitsi'ojota an xchiwinti Cristo.
Chunchacha kit'in ikt'ataxtunilh iklhichiwiniy an laj'oxi chiwinti, tan tuka' k'is ixlichiwinkan an Jesucristojo iklhichiwinilh, chuncha ntu wa ik'aklhtayanicha xamati yu anchacha a'taynita,

mu chunchuniya najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta ixchiwinti Dios: "An yu ntu a'tam xjalhix'alakanta ixlakata yucha, yu'uncha katala'ts'ina'. Chi an yu ntu a'tam ixta'asmatta kalhichiwinkalh, katalhimacha'xaya'."
Xliyu li masi a'lhuwcha iklala'k'uxa'anacha'aw, jantu lalh.
Chaway li k'ilhtu'olhcha an kintapatsat tan ani lhilakwilhkanchilh chi mu la'alhucha k'ata yu sawalhcha iklala'k'uxa'amputunacha'aw,
akxni ak'ana xalakaat'un España aklala'antacha'aw. Chi akxni aklala'ts'inawcha masi ntu ma'an, akilat'ataylhi'anawi kijalhtanti.
Chaway la'acha'an Jerusaleni ikti'an, iktijalhi'ani la'a'tayjun an kijat'ala'awnink'an yu ancha tawilanalh.
Mu an jamacha'an Macedonia chi an jamacha'an Acaya ixta'achanink'ani tama'ayxto'lhi la'a'tayjun, para li katamala'achanilhcha an kijat'ala'awnink'an yu wa takilhpati an la'acha'an Jerusalén.

Wa ixta'achaninchak'ani chuncha tapastaklhi, masi chuncha yu junita li kata'ilhtulh, mu tacha an judiojnin an yu tajakiklaka'inincha tat'alaxta'nilhi an laj'oxi tanlhun yu wa takuwin an yu ntu judiojnin, pus an yu ntu judiojnin wachu katat'ala'a'tayjulhi la xlaktanlhunk'an an judiojnin yu an tajakiklaka'inincha.
Pus akxni chunchacha ak'ilhtuya aniy, chi akxni ajkama'axta'niyacha an yu ma'ayxto'kalh la'a'tayjun, ak'anacha España chi aklala'ts'intijlayawcha.
Kit'in oxi ijk'atsay li akxni aklala'antacha'aw laktachapunini kalakjun'oyaw an la xjapaxkatla'ts'inti an Cristo.
Pero iklatapaynisk'iniyawi kint'ala'awnin la xtalakask'i an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo chi la xjamapayninti an Takuwin li akilat'atapayniniwi an Dios kilakata.

K'alhisk'init'iti an Dios li akima'alhtaxtulhi la xmakak'an an yu ntu tajakiklaka'inin, an yu tawilanalh xalakaat'un Judea chi li an la'a'tayjun yu iktijalhi'ani an kijat'ala'awnink'an an la'acha'an Jerusalén oxi kajama'lhtayanankanchalh;
li Dios chuncha lakask'in, lhi'acha aklala'cha'aw, lhi'acha aklala'ts'iw chi aklat'ajastaknawcha.
Yucha an yu xt'a'a oxi jatawlhnat Diosi katalhistakni minchuxk'an. Chunchacha kawalh.
Iklalhisk'iniyaw an kint'alajamatsank'an Febe, yu lhka'ulakanta li kaja'a'tayjulh an yu tajakiklaka'inin an la'acha'an Cencrea

li oxi k'ala'a'it, la xtalakask'i an Jamach'alhkat, tacha lhitask'ini li chuncha kala'ilhtukalh yu wa tamcha kiklaka'ikan Dios, chi k'alhi'a't'ay'ut'iti wa tuchicha ma'lhtask'ini, mu yucha wanajcha xluwk'ani ja'a'tayjuta, kit'in wachu ki'a'tayjuta.
Akilala'axa'alanicha'awi an yu kintat'atapatsay an Priscila chi an Aquila, yu wachu tat'atapatsay an Cristo Jesús.

Yu'uncha wa k'ischa ixtitama'ats'an'atacha ixjatsukuntik'an wa xliyu kintama'alhtaxtulh, chaway jantu wa kit'incha ijkaxta'niy lhimala'puchajun, wachu taxta'niya lhimala'puchajun ixchuxk'an an kijat'ala'awnink'an an yu ntu judiojnin ta kilhmakchux tata'ayxt'o'a.

Wanajcha chun k'ajala'axa'alachi'it'iti an kijat'ala'awnink'an yu tata'ayxt'o'a an la ixcha'a Priscila chi Aquila. Akilala'axa'alanicha'awi an ki'amigo Epeneto, yucha yu p'ulhnajcha kiklaka'ilh Cristo an xalakaat'un Akaya.
K'ala'axa'alachi'it'iti an Maria, yucha sawalhcha tapatsata milakatak'an.

K'ajala'axa'alachi'it'iti an Andrónico chi an Junias, yu ta ijkalhila'ts'in chi xajkat'amalaklhchawkanta, yu'uncha p'ulhnaja takiklaka'ilh an Cristo kit'in xli'astan, chi yu'uncha sawalhcha oxi jalhiwilakan li jamala'achakanta li katalhichiwinilh an xchiwinti Jesús.
K'ala'axa'alachi'it'iti an Amplias, yucha ki'amigo la xtalakask'i an Dios.
K'ala'axa'alachi'it'iti an Urbano, yu wachu t'atapatsay an Cristo tacha kitnan chi an Estakis.
K'ala'axa'alachi'it'iti an Apeles, yu wanajcha lhuw malaksuta li kiklaka'iya an Cristo, chi an yu tawilanalh la ixcha'a an Aristóbulo wachu k'ajala'axa'alachi'it.
K'ala'axa'alachi'it'iti an Herodión yu ta iklhila'ts'in chi an yu tawilanalh la ixcha'a an Narciso, yu'uncha wachu takiklaka'iya an Jamach'alhkat.

K'ajala'axa'alachi'i't'iti an Trifena chi an Trifosa, yu'uncha wachu tat'atapatsayi an Jamach'alhkat, chi an kint'alajamatsank'an Pérsida, wachu k'ala'axa'alachi'it, yucha wachu sawalhcha t'atapatsata an Jamach'alhkat.
K'ala'axa'alachi'it'iti an Rufo, yu sakxtuta an Dios, chi wachu k'ala'axa'alachi'it'iti an ixnati yu wa tacha kinaticha wachu ikla'ts'in.
K'ajala'axa'alachi'it'iti an Asíncrito chi an Flegonte chi an Hermas chi an Patrobas chi an Hermes chi an yu ancha tat'awilananchalh kijat'ala'awnink'an.
K'ala'axa'alachi'it'iti an Filólogo chi an Julia chi an Nereo chi an ixt'alajamatsan, chi an Olimpas chi ixchuxk'an an kijat'ala'awnink'an an yu ancha tat'awilananchalh.
K'alala'axa'alap'axachi'itcha minchuxk'an laka stalan'a jala'xtikilhtastuknut. Ta kilhmakchux an yu takiklaka'iy Cristo tamak'aniyacha'ani jala'axa'alanti.

Kint'ala'awnin, iklatapaynisk'iniyaw li k'ajalhak'ap'up'it'iti an yu wa sawalhcha tajalakilhmakt'uyunun chi tajama'ayst'uk'unun, an yu ntucha chun tamasuniyan tacha yu uxitnan map'a'sik'ant'at. Jant'u k'ajach'a'o'at'it,

mu yu'uncha jantu yu an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Cristojo tat'atapatsay, yu'uncha wa x'akstuchak'ani tacha an tanajun, yu'uncha wa tapu'o'xcho'oycha laka lakxlak'anti ixchiwintik'an chi laka lajk'usi ixchiwintik'an an yu wa las takiklaka'iy li tu'u'.

Ta lhichuxi k'atsakan li uxitnan jak'iklak'a'ininat'it, chi sawalhcha oxi iklhiwilay li ch'unch'a layat, pero iklakask'in li laka jatapast'ak'ati k'a'ilht'ut an yu laj'oxi tanlhun chi an yu ntu laj'oxi tanlhun jant'u k'a'ilht'ut,
chuncha an Dios yu xt'a'a oxi jatawlhnat watukan ka'ilhtuya li k'a'akp'ut'ayamat'iti an satanás. Uxitnancha kataxta'nin an ixjamapayninti an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesús.
An kint'atapatsan Timoteo, yu wachu chun tapatsay tacha kit'in chi an yu ta ijkalhila'ts'in, an Lucio chi an Jasón chi an Sosípater tamak'aniyacha'an jala'axa'alanti.
Kit'in yu ijkunkan Tercio, yu iklats'o'niyaw aniy laka jalhiki, wachu iklala'axa'alayaw la xtalakask'i an Jamach'alhkat.

Wachu tala'axa'alayan an Gayo. An la ixcha'a an Gayojo ikwilh, chi aniya tata'ayxt'o'a an yu tajakikla'inin. Chi an Erasto wachu tala'axa'alayan, yucha ma'ay xatumin an la'acha'an, chi an kint'ala'ajunk'an yu junkan Cuarto wachu tala'axa'alayan.
An xjamapayninti kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo minchuxk'ancha kataxta'nin.

Oxi kalhichiwiniw an Dios, yu lay ta'ilhtuyan uxitnan li oxi k'at'a'aklats'uk'ut, tacha an najun an laj'oxi chiwinti yu iklhichiwiniy, chi tacha an masukan yu lhichiwiniy Jesucristo. Aniy chiwinti yucha yu sawalh, yu an Dios wa la'asa' lhichiwininta chi ma'ani ixtats'e'ta sta akxni an lakaamunulhpa jantuka' ix'alin,

pero chaway an tan tats'o'muk'alh an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, anchacha pumalakasukalh, tacha najuntacha an Dios yu ntu a'tam katinilh. Ani xlamap'a'sin an Dios yu wa la'asa' ixt'ajun, chaway lhichiwinkancha ta lakachux an la'acha'anaxni para li katakiklaka'ilh chi kata'ilhtulhi yu lhinajun.
An yu wa yucha Dios sawalh chi jalakpastaknan, yucha an Jesucristojo ay pujun chi ixpujun'alhincha. Chunchacha kawalh.
Kit'in ikPablo yu kint'asanilh an Dios chi kimala'achalhcha an Jesucristo para li ajkamak'atsaaninilh an xchiwinti, iklala'axa'alayaw ali an kint'ala'ajunk'an Sóstenes.

Uxitnan ixlapanakni Dios, yu t'a'ayxt'o'at an la'acha'an Corinto, tamastalan'atani an Jesucristo. Chi Diosi tat'asanin li wachu la'stalan'ani k'a'unt'it ali an yu wachu ta'a'atant'asay wa tanchun kawalhcha an xta'a'ut an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo. Yucha ixJamach'alhkatk'an chi kiJamach'alhkatk'an.
An kimPayk'an Dios chi an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo kataxta'nincha ixjamapayninti chi oxi jatawlhnat.
Lhilhiji ikxta'niy lhimala'puchajun an kiDios milakatak'an, mu yucha tapuxta'nini an Jesucristo ixjamapayninti.
Yucha an Cristojo tapuxta'nin an Dios chux an yu laj'oxi tanlhun, laj'oxi chiwinti chi laj'oxi jatapast'ak'at.
Mu an chiwinti yu lhichiwiniy an Cristo oxicha tasuy la mijatsukuntik'an.
Pus chaway tu tu'u tats'an'atayaniyan yu xt'a'a Dios para li lay k'ap'ut'ap'ats'anit'it li chaway wa p'akxan'iyatka tuchi wilhchancha katalakasuya an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo.
An Dios kata'a'tayjuyani li k'at'a'aklats'uk'ut'iti sta akxni ka'ukla'oya', para li ntu xamati tu'u katalhimuk'an akxni kachincho'oya an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo.
An Dios, yucha ilhtuy sawalhi yu najun li ka'ilhtuya', chi yucha yu tat'asanin para li k'at'at'ala'xt'o't'iti an isTs'alh Jesucristo, yucha kiJamach'alhkatk'an.
T'ala'awnin, la xtalakask'i an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo iklatapaynisk'iniyaw li lhilhiji wa tam k'ak'ats'at'it ch'i nt'u k'at'ala'ap'its'it'it, wa la'atam jatapast'ak'ati k'alhits'uk'ut'it.
Tuchi chuncha iklalhijunaw, mu an yu ta jalhila'ts'in an Cloé kintajuni li wa la'ayat'it.

Iknawputun li ali'in yu uxitnan tanajun: "Kit'in yucha an Pablojo ikch'a'o'ay. Chi an ali'in tanajun: "Kit'in yucha an Apolojo ikch'a'o'ay." Chi ali'in tanajun: "Kit'in yucha an Cefasi ikch'a'o'ay." Chi ali'in tanajun: "Kit'in yucha an Cristo."
¿Chu sna wanaj pumalhuwi Cristo? ¿An Pablo makxtukmuk'akalhi laka cruz milakatak'an? ¿U sna a'p'axat'iti la xtalakask'i an Pablo?
Ikxta'niy lhimala'puchajuni an Dios li ntu xamati apumatami ikma'paxalh yu uxitnan, wa yucha an Crispo chi an Gayo.
Chuncha ntu layi xamati lay katinawlh li la kintalakask'i a'paxli.
Wachu ijkama'paxalhi an yu ta jalhila'ts'in Estéfanas, pero ntu ikpast'ak'a li xamati ikma'paxapalata apumatam.

Mu an Cristo tu kilhijuni li ajkama'paxanalh, yucha kilhijuni li aklhichiwinilh an laj'oxi chiwinti. Jantu iklhichiwiniy laka lajk'usi chiwinti yu minachalh la xjatapast'akat an lapanak, para li an xcruz an Cristo jantu kama'ats'an'alhi ix'alhp'asninti.
An chiwinti yu lhichiwiniy li nilh an Cristo laka cruz wa tachanu wa lhitontojcha talhiwilay an yu tats'an'at'ajun, pero an yu ta'alhtaxtut'awnaw, aniy chiwinti yucha ix'alhp'asninti an Dios.

Tacha najunta an la ixchiwinti Dios: Ajkalakt'ilhiniya an ixjatapast'ak'atk'an an yu sawalhcha tajalakpastaknan. Chi ajka'ilhtuya li ntu katalhimacha'xalhi tu'u an yu sawalhcha lay talhimacha'xay tu'u talay.

¿Tanischa t'ajun an jalakpastaknaj lapanaki? ¿Tanischa t'ajun an xamaestro lhamap'a'sini? ¿Tanischa t'ajun an yu lani lhilakikxtukut tanlhun yu alin aniy lakamunulhpa'a? ¡An Dios ilhtulhi li wa lhitontojcha kawalh an xajatapast'ak'at aniy lakamunulhpa'.

An Dios sawalh jalakpastaknan xliyu an lapanakni yu tat'ajun an lakamunulhpa jantu layi tapumispay wa xjatapast'ak'atchak'an. An Dios chuncha oxi lhiwilalh li an yu tajakiklaka'inin kajama'alhtaxtulhi an la xchiwinti, masi wa lhilokojcha lhiwilakan.
Mu an judiojnin task'in li kajamasunikalh tu'u yu kamasulh ix'alhp'asninti an Dios chi an griegojnin tapuxkajuy lhuw jatapast'ak'at.
Pero kitnan lhichiwinaw an Cristo yu makxtukmuk'akalh laka cruz, yu an judiojnin tu tala'ts'imputun wa ixlakata tacha an nilh chi an yu ntu judiojnin tanajun li wa lhilocojcha.
Pero an yu Dioscha jat'asanita, judiojnin u griegojnin, yu'uncha tak'atsayi li an Cristo ix'alhp'asninti an Dios chi ixjatapast'ak'at an Dios.

Mu masi wa lhitontojcha tasuy yu najun an Dios, palay oxi jatapast'ak'at, an ixjatapast'ak'at lapanak jantu, chi masi ka ntu k'is k'ut'ilhi katasulh tu'u yu ix'anu an Dios, palay k'ut'ilh, an wa ixtachaputcha lapanak, jantu.

T'ala'awnin, k'alhak'ap'up'it'iti li an Dios tat'asanini masi ntu milhuk'ani yu k'alhits'uk'ut jatapast'ak'at yu wa xanawincha aniy lakamunulhpa', chi ntu milhuk'ani yu k'alhits'uk'ut lhich'alhkat chi ntu milhuk'ani yu k'alhit'ap'alat.

Mu wa xliyu li an Dios para li kajamamaxanilhi an yu sawalhcha tajalakpastaknan tanajun, jasakxtulhi an yu wa laktontojnincha jalhimalakxtukan. Chi para li an Dios kajamamaxanilhi an yu sawalhcha lajk'ut'ilin tanajun, jasakxtulhi an yu ntu lajk'ut'ilin aniy lakamunulhpa'.

An Dios yucha jasakxtulh an lapanakni an yu wa jala'amaj'ankancha chi ntu tu'u talhitapalay jajunkan aniy lakamunulhpa'. An yu ntu tu'u talhitapalay, japu'ilhtukani li ntu tu'u katalhitapalalh an yu talhitapalay tanajun.
Chuncha ntu xamati lay katilhita'ayalh tu'u la x'ukxlakapu an Dios.

Pero an Dios yuchacha tat'amala'xto'tan uxitnan an Jesucristj. Chi wachucha ilhtulhi li an Cristo kijatapast'ak'atchak'ani kawalh chi yu ts'awjcha kaputsukuw chi yu kapustalan'aw chi yu kaputa'alhtaxtuw.
Tacha an najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "Li xamati lhita'ayaputun tu'u, yucha an Jamach'alhkatcha Diosi kalhita'ayalh".
T'ala'awnin, akxni iklakila'kilaw, iklalhixa'alawi an ixchiwinti Dios chi ntu yu sawalhcha lajk'usi chiwinti ikpuchiwinilh yu wa xjatapast'ak'atchak'an an lapanakni.
Chi akxni ancha xaklat'a'aklat'awnaw, jantu tu'u atumpaja ijk'atsaaputulh, wa de Jesucristo chi akxni tacha an nilh an laka cruz.
Akxni iklala'cha'aw jantucha k'is k'ut'ilhi xajkunita chi wa xk'ip'ip'icha xaklay la kintalhanti.

Chi akxni iklalhixa'alaw an ixchiwinti Dios jantu iklapuxa'alaw yu sawalhcha laj'ay chiwinti para li aklama'ankiklaka'iniw. Iklama'ankiklaka'iniw mu yucha Takuwini yu masulh la x'alhp'asninti li an yu iklajuniw sawalh.
Chi chuncha ik'ilhtulh para li amijakiklaka'intik'an jantu ani kapuminchalh an wa la xjatapast'ak'atchak'an lapanakni, yucha an ix'alhp'asninti Diosi kapuminchalh.

Pero an yu tak'at'atacha la xjakiklaka'intik'an chun sawalh laka lakchiwinti yu pujatapast'ak'ati ikpulakchiwininaw. Pero ntu wa xajatapast'ak'atcha aniy lakamunulhpa', chi ntu xjatapast'ak'atk'an an yu ani tach'alhkatnan, yu'uncha tama'ats'an'at'ajuncha an ixlich'alhkatk'an.

Yu ikmasuyaw yucha an yu ntu lay la'ts'inkan ixjatapast'ak'at Dios. Ani jatapast'ak'at wa la'asa'a tan t'ajun sta akxni a'taynichalh an lakamunulhpa'. Chi ani xjatapast'ak'at Dios najun li sawalh kalhitapalaw.
Ani ntu xamati tacha an tach'alhkatnan aniy lakamunulhpa lhimacha'xata, mu li kaxtalhimacha'xalh tu kaxtamakxtukmuk'alhi laka cruz an ay Jamach'alhkat.
Pero tacha an najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "An yu tamapayni an Dios jamala'asijninita tanlhun yu ntu xamati la'ts'inta chi ntu xamati asmatta chi masi wa xamaticha kapastaklhi".
Yucha aniy tanlhuni yu kintamasunitan an Dios laka Takuwin, mu an Takuwin yucha oxi laklhakapu'an'ojoy chux, sta masi yu sawalhcha ma'at t'awnachalh xjatapast'ak'at an Dios.

Yu wa lapanak jantu xamati k'atsaaniy ixjatapast'ak'at apumatam, wa yucha k'atsay an kintakuwink'an tani yu jatapastaknanawcha atamjtamin. Pus wanajcha chuni an ixTakuwin Dios, wa yucha k'atsay tuchini past'ak'acha an Dios.

Chi kitnan ntu wa takuwincha yu wa anicha alin lakamunulhpa la'a'itaw. Yu la'a'itaw yucha an Takuwin yu kintaxta'niyan an Dios, para li kala'lhimacha'xawi an laktanlhun yu an Dios la xjamapayninti kintaxta'nitan.

Ani laktanlhun, laka chiwinti yu an ixTakuwin Dios kintamasunitani pulakchiwininaw, jantu wa laka chiwinticha yu wa la kijatapast'ak'atchak'an lanitaw. Chunchacha lhilakchiwinaw laka chiwinti yu minachalh la ixTakuwin an Dios.

An lapanak yu ntu lhit'ajuni an ixTakuwin Dios, jantu la'a'iya yu xt'a'a an ixTakuwin Dios. Mu wa lhitontojcha yu wa lhiwilay. Chi wachu ntu lay la'lhimacha'xayi mu yucha la xTakuwin Diosi la'lhimacha'xakan.
Pero yu lhit'ajuni an xTakuwin Dios, layi k'atsay chux an tanlhun tanyucha yu oxi u jantu, pus layi kanawna'. Pero an yu lhit'ajun an xTakuwin Dios yucha ntu lay tu'u katilhimuk'akalh.
Mu an tan ts'o'muk'akanta najunta: ¿Tisiyuchacha k'atsaani xjatapast'ak'at Jamach'alhkat Diosi? ¿Tisiyuchacha lay kamap'asiya'a? Pero kitnan lhit'awnawi an ixjatapast'ak'at an Cristo.
T'ala'awnin, kit'in tu layi iklaxa'alaw uxitnan tacha lapanakni yu oxicha tamispay an xTakuwin Dios, iklaxa'alaw wa tacha yu ntuka' oxi tamispay, tacha wa jas'at'ancha iklalhixa'alaw an Cristo.
Wanaj tu k'is lhima'anxkayi yu klamasuniw. Tacha jas'at'an yu tats'ik'ika', mu nt'uk'a' lay k'axlakts'ak'at'iti yu p'as tu'u. ¡Chi masi chaway jant'uk'a' lay lakts'ak'ayat'it,
mu t'awnatka tacha yu ntuka' jalakp'ast'aknanat'it. Li la xk'ayatka ch'i la xt'uk'uyatka, wa t'ani layatcha, wa tacha wa lapanaknika yu wa ntuka' tamispay Diosi layat'it.
Akxni xamati najun: “Kit'in yucha an Pablojo ikch'a'o'ay”. Chi pumatam nawpalay: “Kit'in yucha an Apolojo ikch'a'o'ay”. Ch'unch'ach'a lhimasuyat li wanajka wa lhilakatijtam lapanakni.

An Apolo chi kit'in Pablo ¿tisapu kitnancha? Kitnan wachucha wa ikt'atapatsayaw an Dios, kitnancha yu uxitnan p'ujak'iklak'a'inint'it. Atamjtamin kitnan k'ilhtuwcha an tapatsat yu an Dios kintalhijunin.
Kit'in ikjach'ananalh chi an Apolo la'tanti'awalh, pero an Dios yucha yu ilhtulh li kata'ayalh an yu ch'ankalh.
