Jantucha xamati oxi katitala'ts'ilh chi katitamapaynilh, wa katamaslakatininacha. Jantucha layi katitalaklhajalh tacha an wa tanlhuncha katapast'ak'a kata'ilhtuputuna'. Jantucha k'is oxi sawalhi tacha an katitalalh chi ntucha k'is katitala'ts'imputulhi chux an tanlhun yu laj'oxi.

Wa kataja'o'xcho'onunacha chi katatapujuya kata'ilhtuya an tanlhun. Wa yucha an tanlhuncha yu ntu tu'u laklhitapalayi sawalhcha kata'ilhtuputuna'. Chi wa yucha an yu oxicha talhik'atsan tapast'ak'a kata'ilhtuya', jantucha katitapuxkawlhi an Dios.
Katalaya li ma tajamapayninin, pero tacha an katalaya la ixlakatijlak'an chunchacha katapumasuya li ntu talhit'ajuni an ix'alhp'asninti an jamapayninti. Anchunu lapanakni nt'u t'u'u k'ajat'a'ilht'u.
Mu yu'unchaa an yu talaktanuy laka lakcha'a chi talaj'o'xcho'oycha an t'akunin yu wa stakcha talhit'ajun xtala'alhink'an, yu wa stakcha talhit'ajun tipaspit jatapast'ak'at yu ntu oxi.
Yu'uncha lhilhiji talaklanit'ajun an tanlhun, pero ntu a'tami lay tacha'an tamispay an yu sawalh.

Chi tacha an Janes chi an Jambres jantu ta'asmatnilhi an Moisés, wanajcha chuni talay yu'uncha, jantu ta'asmatputuni an yu sawalh. Aniy lapanakni tatalakt'ilhinitacha xjatapast'ak'atk'an, tamakawlhcha an jakiklaka'inti.
Pero ntu ma'ati katitat'a'alh, mu chux an lapanakni katalhakapu'ana li wa ntu tajalakpastaknan, tacha taputapasalh anchunu xt'uyunk'an yu ntu ta'asmatniputulh an Moisés.
Pero uxint'i oxi t'aylhip'int'a tacha an ikmasuy. Tacha ikt'ajun, tuchini chunchacha iklhilay, an kijakiklaka'inti, li iklhitayani an tanlhun, an kijamapayninti chi an kintachaput li iklhitayaniy.

Ch'i k'int'ala'ts'int'a li kinch'a'o'akan kilhituma'chapuputunkan chi an kima'alh'ajnat. Tacha an iklhitsukulh ma'alh'ajnat chi iklhitayanilh an la'acha'an Antioquía, chi Iconio chi Listra. ¡Ikma'alh'ajnalhi li xakinch'a'o'akan! Pero an Jamach'alhkat kila'ma'alhtaxtu'olh.
Chi ixchuxk'an an yu wachu oxi tat'a'aklatsukuputun an Cristo Jesús kajalhitama'chapukana'.
Pero an yu wa ay tajunita lapanakni chi an yu wa taja'o'xcho'onun wa palay palay kata'ana tan tu oxi, kataja'o'xcho'onuna chi kaja'o'xcho'okana'.
Pero uxint'i wa k'at'aylhip'i an yu laklanit'acha, ch'i yu k'iklak'a'it'acha. Uxint'i k'ats'aycha tichini yu'unchacha tamasunin.
Chi wa mintajas'at'ati k'ats'at'a an ixchiwinti Dios, yucha yu lay kaxta'niyan jatapast'ak'at para li k'at'a'alht'axt'u, ixlakata li k'iklak'a'iy an Cristo Jesús.

Chux an tan ts'o'muk'akanta an ixchiwinti Dios yucha an Diosi chuncha chiwininta. Yucha pumasukan an tanlhun chi pujamap'a'sininkan chi pula'oxinikan xjatapast'ak'at yu wa lhits'an'ay. Pujamatalanininkan para li oxi jatsukunti kalhitsukukalh,
para li an ixlapanak Dios oxi tukani kajalakpastaknalh chi oxi tukani kalanilh lay kalak'ilhtulh chux yu laj'oxi tanlhun.
La ix'ukxlakapu an Dios chi an Cristo Jesús yu kamina la xlich'alhkat chi yu kajajuna li oxi u jantu xtat'ajun an yu tat'ajunka chi an yu talaknitacha, iklhijunani aniy:
li k'alhich'iwini an ixchiwinti Dios, k'ajamak'ats'aanini akxni ixpaku chi masi akxni ntu ixpaku '. K'ajamat'anunin, k'ajamap'a'sin, xlak'anti k'ajama'oximaj'ayan ch'i k'amasut'i.

Mu kachina panch'e'ex akxni ntucha katita'asmatputulh an yu laj'oxi lhamap'a'sin. Chi mu wa xliyu wa ixjatapast'ak'atchak'ani ta'ilhtuputun, wa lhuwcha maestrojnini katalakask'ina para li wa yu oxicha talhiwilay kajajunikalh.
Katamakawnacha an yu sawalh chi wa la'stucha kuentojo kata'asmat'a'.
Pero uxint'i oxi k'asa' ts'uk'u la mijatapast'ak'at, k'alaklhit'ayanini an la'lhima'alh'ajna tanlhun. Wa yuch'ach'a k'ajamak'ats'aanin an laj'oxi chiwinti, oxi k'amukt'axt'ut'i amintapatsat.
Kit'in akima'axta'kanacha tacha la'atam lha'ulan li akima'nikanacha, chi chint'ajuncha an panch'e'ex li ak'anacha.
Iklasalhcha an oxi lasat, ikmuktaxtulhcha an kintapatsat, chi ntu a'tami iktaticho'olh, ikmuktaxtulh sawalh.

Chaway kimpakxan'icha an yu ikt'acha'an akla'a'ilh, an corona, yu an Jamach'alhkat yu ts'awj muktaxtuy xlijuez akixta'niya akxni kachinacha wilhchan. Chi ntu wa kit'incha akintixta'nilh, wachu kajaxta'niya ixchuxk'an yu an laka jamapayninti tapakxan'iy akxni kaxlimj mina'.
K'alhip'uxk'awnini li lay watukan ak'int'at'i la'ts'ini',
mu an Demas kimakawlhcha, yucha, wa yucha aniy lakamunulhpacha oxi lhiwilay, chi alhcha Tesalónica. An Crescente alh Galacia, chi an Tito alh Dalmacia.
Wayucha an Lucascha kint'atamakajunta. K'ap'uxk'awchi an Marcos chi k'at'at'at'i, mu akilhitapalhniya an laka tapatsat.
An Tíquico ikmala'achalh Éfeso.
Akxni k'at'ana'a, k'alhit'ana'a an ikpupula'axt'a'kan yu ikmakawchalh an Troas la ixcha'a an Carpo. Chi k'alhit'an'ot'achi an libro, yu palay ikma'lhtask'iniy yucha an yu libro de jaxta'an.
An Alejandro an yu la'slaman tsasnat, tu k'is oxi tacha an kint'alay. Yucha an Jamach'alhkatcha kamamapalhniya tacha an lay.
Uxint'i wach'u k'ajalajk'ats'aananin, mu ani lapanak tu k'is la'ts'imputuni an kinchiwintik'an.
Akxni p'ulhnajcha ikchiwinilh para li ntu ta aki'ilhtukalh jantu xamati kilhi'a'tayjulh. Ixchuxk'ani kintamakawlh, jantu kajalhakapu'aninikalh.

Pero an Jamach'alhkat ancha xakint'ayalh, chi kixta'nilhi tachaput, pus layi iknawlh an chiwinti yu puta'alhtaxtukan chi chuncha lay ta'asmatlhi an yu ntu takiklaka'iy Dios. Chuncha ikma'alhtaxtukalh la ixkilhni an león.
Chi an Jamach'alhkat akima'osuni'oya chux yu ntu oxi, akima'alhtaxtuya para li akilhi'alh tan ch'alhkatnanachalh lakt'iyan. Yucha ay xpujun'alhincha. Chunchacha kawalh.
K'ala'axa'alachi an Prisca chi an Aquila, chi an yu ta jalhila'ts'in an Onesíforo.
An Erasto tamakawchalh la'acha'an Corinto, chi an Trófimo wa ta'an'ay, ikmakawlh la'acha'an Mileto.
K'alhip'uxk'awnini li lay k'at'at'i akxni ntuka' chin ixpaku lhik'asnin. An Eubulo la'axa'alayan chi an Pudente chi an Lino chi an Claudia chi ixchuxk'an an kijat'ala'awnink'an.
An Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo kat'a'aklatsukulhi amintakuwin. An jamapayninti katat'a'aklatsukun. Chunchacha kawalh.
Kit'in ikPablo, ixma'tsuku an Dios chi yucha an Jesucristojo kimala'achay. Kimala'achay an Jesucristo para li an yu jasakxtutacha an Dios katacha'alhi katamispalh an yu sawalh chi katamuktaxtulh.
Yu'uncha tapakxan'iy an jatsukunti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy. Akxni ntuka' tu'u ix'ilhtukan chunchacha ixnajunta an Dios li kaxt'a'a', chi yucha ntu maslakatinin.
Chaway, akxni ts'awjcha ixpaku tukan, yucha ilhtuycha an yu najun li ka'ilhtuya', yuchacha pumuktaxtut'ajun li iklhichiwiniycha yu najun, yucha an kiJama'alhtaxtunuk'an Diosi chuncha kilhijuniy.
Uxint'i Tito, wach'u k'iklak'a'i sawalhi an yu kiklaka'itaw, tachanu kints'alhk'at'i. An kimPayk'an Dios chi an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo kataxta'nini jamapayninti chi oxi jatawlhnat.

Ikmakajun an tan junkan Creta, para li k'alats'awalat'i yu xtamakajuntaka kalats'awalakalh, chi para li lakatamin la'acha'an k'ajamak'aw yu katala'ts'ilhi'alh an tan tata'ayxt'o'a an yu takiklaka'iy Dios tacha iklhijunin k'a'ilht'u.

An yu kajalhistaklhi'alh an yu takiklaka'iy Dios, xamati lapanak yu ntu tu'u kalhitawk'alh tala'alhin. Wa pumatam xt'iwi kalhitsukulh chi an xjas'at'an katakiklaka'ilh Dios, chi ntu kajajunkalh li wa tani talaycha chi li ntu k'is taja'asmatnan.

Mu an yu jalhistaklhi'an yu takiklaka'iy Dios, yucha ntu ka'ilhtulhi yu ntu oxi, yucha t'atapatsay Dios. Jantu ka'ayajk'atsaalh, jantu katalh'amalh, jantu kat'a'ap'alh, jantu kalasalh, chi ntu kask'unla'ts'ilhi li kapulhajalhi tu'u yu ntu oxi.
Yucha, kajaxta'nilhi tan katatamakawlh yu tala'cha'an la ixcha'a', yu oxi tanlhuni ka'achanilh. Stalan'a kajalakpastaknalh, oxi lapanaki kawalh, stalan'a lapanaki kajunlhi chi oxi lanti kalhitsukulh.
Kamuktaxtulhi an chiwinti yu lhitala'si tacha yu kalaks masunikalh, para li wachu layi kajamap'a'silh ali'in an laka laj'oxi chiwinti chi kajamakiklaka'inilhi an yu wa ta'alhapu'iyajuy an chiwinti.
Mu wanaj lhuwi tat'ajun an yu ntu k'is taja'asmatnan, an yu wa tani talakchiwiniycha, yu ntu tu'u lhitapalay, chi wa taja'o'xcho'onuncha, an judionin yu'uncha yu palay wachu chuncha talay.
Aniy lapanakni oxi kawalh kajalajkikchutkalh, mu wa talakmalokojlaycha ixchuxk'an yu tawilanalh lakatamin laka cha'a', wa tanlhuncha tamasuy yu ntu katamasulh para li katapu'o'xcho'olhajalhcha.
Masi pumatam yu yu'uncha, yu ixnajun yu wa katapasayaka, nawlh: "An jamacha'an Creta, sawalh tamaslakatinin, yu'uncha lakmakxkay jatapakxat, wa sawalhcha tawajin chi ntu tatapatsay."
Tacha aniy nawlh an lapanak, sawalh. Pus chaway alhp'asi k'ajalaj'aymat'i para li la'stalan'ani katawalh la ixjakiklaka'intik'an,
para li ntu wa yuchacha katalhakapu'alh yu wa tala'la'oxitacha xcuentojk'an an judiojnin chi yu talhinajun an yu wa tamakawpalaycha an yu sawalh.

An yu la'stalan'an, chux an tanlhun para yu'uncha, la'stalan'a; pero para an yu la'smala'an chi ntu tala'a'iya an jakiklaka'inti, jantu tu'u alin yu stalan'a, mu yu'uncha la'smala'a talhit'ajun an xjatapast'ak'atk'an.
Tanajun li tamispayi Dios, pero la ixlakatijlak'an chunchacha tapunajun li ntu tamispay, jantu k'is jalhila'ts'imputu chi ntu k'is taja'asmatnan, jantu lay tu'u ta'ilhtuy yu laj'oxi.
Pero uxint'i k'alhich'iwin yu yucha lhichiwiniy an oxi lhamap'a'sin.
An yu laktatanincha stalan'a katajalakpastaknalh, sawalhi yu katanawlh, katajalajk'atsaanalh, stalan'a la ixjakiklaka'intik'an kawalh chi la xjamapaynintik'an chi li talhitayani an lhima'alh'ajnat.
An yu laknananincha wanajcha chun tacha yu kajapulhiwilakalh xlakatijlak'ani katalhitsukulh, jantu katalakmaslakatinilh chi ntu katala't'a'ap'alh. Katamasulhi yu oxi
chi katamasunilhi an yu lakjatsi'ininka li katamapaynilhi xt'apapak'an chi xjas'at'ank'an,
katajalajk'atsaanalh chi la'stalan'ani katawalh, katalhistaklhi ixcha'ak'an, oxi lapanakni katawalh chi kata'asmatnilhi xt'apapak'an, para li an ixchiwinti Dios tu wa aya kalhichiwinkalh.
Wanajcha chun, k'ajamat'anunit'i an yu lakts'alaninka li katajalajk'atsaanalh.
Uxint'i k'ajat'ap'ulhnin k'ajamasunin chux an tanlhun yu laj'oxi. Akxni jamasuni u jamap'a'si laka stalan'a lakatijla k'a'ilht'u chi xlisawalh.
Chi yu stalan'a chiwinti k'anaw yu ntu xamati kanawlh li ntu oxi. Chuncha watichicha yu tam kanawputuna tacha an nawnaw, kamaxanana'. Mu ntu layi tu'u wa aya akintitalhichiwinin.
An ma'tsukunin k'aja'uni li kata'asmatnilhi xpatronk'an. Watuchicha chuxi katalhima'an'achalh, jantu kataja'alhtaystuknulh.
Jantu kataja'alhawanalh, katamasulhi li yu'uncha la'lhitala'sin lapanakni yu ntu taja'alhawanan, para li chux an laka laktanlhun katapumasulhi li ayi an tacha masuy an Dios yu kintama'alhtaxtuyan.
Mu an Dios yucha masutacha xjamapayninti akxni ja'alhtasunilh an ta'alhtaxtut ixchuxk'an an lapanakni.

An xjamapayninti Dios kintamasuniyan li kamakajucha an yu ntu oxi chi an yu wa tanlhuncha past'ak'aw ka'ilhtuw aniy lakaamunulhpa', chi yu oxicha jatsukunti kalhi'aw yu chaway ani panch'e'ex t'awnaw, yu ts'awj chi yu jamapayninin.
Chuncha katsuku li ntuka' chini an yu lhi'acha pakxan'iyaw: akxni kaxlimjcha chincho'oya an ay kiDiosk'an chi an Jesucristo yu kintama'alhtaxtuyan.

Yucha tama'axta'lhi laka lhinin kilakatak'an para li akintama'alhtaxtuni chux tan alin yu ntu oxi, chi stalajcha akintach'a'a'ojon. Chi kitnan xjas'at'ancha kajunwi, yu wa yu laj'oxicha tanlhun ka'ilhtuw.
Yucha aniya yu k'amasut'i, k'ajamat'anunin chi alhp'asi k'ajamap'a'sin. Jantu xamati kanawlh li nt'u t'u'u lhit'ap'alay.
K'ajamap'ast'ak'anit'i ixchuxk'an li kata'asmatnilhi an jamach'alhkatni, kata'ilhtulhi chux yu laj'oxi tanlhun.
Jantu xamati wa aya katalhichiwinilh, jantu laj'ayajk'atsanin lapanakni katawalh, laj'oxi lapanakni katawalh, ixchuxk'an an lapanakni katamasunilhi jakilhpatinijk'atsat chux la ixjalhunutk'an.

Mu kitnan la'atam panch'e'ex xjuntachalh wachu ntu k'is ixjalakpastaknanaw chi ntu xja'asmatnanaw; ists'an'ataw chi yuchacha xakintalaklhilat'awnan chux an tanlhun yu ntu oxi jatapast'ak'at chi tanlhuncha yu ntu oxi k'atsat. Tan tu oxi ixt'awnaw chi tan laxkaykan, xakintaxkaykanan chi xlaxkaypaxayaw.
Pero an Dios yu kintama'alhtaxtuyan masulhi ixta'alh'oxinti chi ixjamapayninti kilakatak'an chux yu t'awnaw.

Chi masi li kitnan jantu wa xliyu li tu'ucha yu laj'oxi tanlhun ilhtuw, wa la xjamapayninticha kintama'alhtaxtun, kintach'a'an chi kintamapaxan. Chi sast'icha jatsukunti kintapuxta'nicho'on an Stalan'a Takuwin.
Pus yucha an Jesucristo yu kintama'alhtaxtuyani kintapuxta'nin lhuw an Stalan'a Takuwin,
para li xli'astan akxni li oxicha kintapu'ilhtutan an xjamapayninti, laycha kapakxan'iyaw li kala'a'iyaw yu an Dios nawlh sawalh li akintaxta'niyan, yucha ntu a'tam min'ojoy.

Aniy chiwinti yucha sawalh, chi klakask'in li sawalhch'a k'anawi yucha chi lhitala'si k'anaw, para li an yu takiklaka'iy Dios yucha kata'ilhtulh an yu oxi tanlhun. Aniy tanlhun yucha laj'oxi chi talhitapalhniya an lapanakni.

Pero an wa tanlhuncha la lhikikxtukut chiwinti yu wa lhitontojcha yuch'a k'amak'aw. Chi an ixlakapu'anka li t'anch'unch'a a'p'unt'anch'i, ch'i nt'u k'ala'ay, chi ixlakata an ixlamap'a'sin Moisés wach'u nt'u k'alalhik'ikxt'uk'u; mu yucha ntu tu'u lhitapalay chi ntu tu'u yu oxi kamakawnin.
An lapanak yu wa ilhtuy li kala'aykalh u katala'apitsikalh, li a't'uych'a un li ntu oxi tacha lay, k'at'amakxt'ucha.
Yuch'a k'ats'aycha li anchunu lapanak tucha oxi t'ajun, chi ilhtuycha tala'alhin chi kamama'alh'ajnikana xli'akstu wa xliyu tacha an lay.
Akxni akmala'achaniyan an Artemas u an Tíquico, watukan k'aso'ot'achi ak'ila't'ana'a la'acha'an Nicópolis, mu ancha aktamakawna akxni ixpaku cha lhik'asnin.

An Zenas yu la'Fmispay lhamap'a'sin chi an Apolos k'ajalhi'a't'ay'uchi laka laktanlhun chux yu lay. K'ajaxt'a'nini yu katama'lhtask'iniya para li ntu tu'u katats'an'atayanilh para li katataylhi'alh ixtijk'an.
Chi an kilapanaknik'an katalanilh, wachu kata'ilhtulh an yu oxi, chi kataja'a'tayjunulhi akxni tu'u task'iniy, para li an xjatsukuntik'an kalhitapalalh.

Ixchuxk'an an yu ani tat'ájun tan ani ikt'awnachilh tamak'aniyan jala'axa'alanti. K'ajala'axa'alachi an yu kintat'alamapayniyan laka jakiklaka'inti. Katat'a'aklatsukuni an jamapayninti minchuxk'an. Chunchacha kawalh.

Filemón, oxi kint'atapatsank'an, kit'in ikPablo, iklaklhchajuy ixlakata an xchiwinti Jesucristo, chaway ikts'o'niyan ani kartaj ali an kint'ala'ajunk'an Timoteo yu wachu kiklaka'iy an ixchiwinti Dios. Ani karta para uxint'i Filemón,

chi para ixchuxk'an an yu tata'ayxt'o'a la mincha'a yu takiklaka'iy an ixchiwinti Dios, chi para an kint'alajamatsank'an Apia chi an Arquipo yu wachu p'as kintat'alhakapu'anan li lhilasayaw an ixchiwinti Dios.
Yucha an kimPayk'ancha Dios chi an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristojcha kataxta'nin xjamapaynintik'an chi oxi jatawlhnat.
Akxni iktapayni, lhilhiji ikpast'ak'an chi ikxta'niya lhimala'puchajun an Dios milakata,
mu ik'asmat'a tanajun li k'iklak'a'iya an Jesucristo ch'i li jat'alamap'ayniya an yu wachu takiklaka'iy.
Chi mu uxint'i jalhixa'alayi an lapanakni tichini kiklaka'itawcha, iklhisk'iniya an Dios li k'alhimach'a'xa'o chux an laj'oxi tanlhun yu kintaxta'niyan an Jesucristo.
Sawalhcha oxi iklhiwilay chi kima'oximaj'ayayi an mijamapayninti kint'ala'ajun Filemón, mu uxint'iy taputa'oximaj'ayan an kijat'ala'awnink'an.
Xliyu chaway masi kit'in yucha an Jesucristo kimala'achatachalh chi ikt'acha'ani aklhijunin t'uch'ini k'a'ilht'ucha,
pero wa laka lamapaynini ijkunan yu k'a'ilht'u, mu kit'in ikPablo chaway iktatacha, chi atumpaj chaway iklhilaklhchajuyi ixlakata an xchiwinti Jesucristo.
Iksk'iniyan lamapaynin ixlakata an Onésimo, mu chaway tachanu kints'alhcha walh aniy laka pulach'in, mu kiklaka'ilhcha an ixchiwinti Dios,
masi minchalhcha wilhchan jantu tu'u xlitapalhniyan xna'un, pero chaway uxint'i chi kit'in kintalhitapalhniyancha.
Chaway ikmala'achanicho'oyancha chi tachanu kit'ini k'ala'a'it'i.

Kit'in xaknajun li wa laycha li xakint'atamakawlhcha aniy, para li xaki'a'tayjulhcha yucha tacha uxint'i xak'i'a't'ay'ut'i, li chaway kit'in iklaklhchajuyka aniy laka pulach'in ixlakata an ixchiwinti Dios.
Pero ntu chuni iklhi'achani kit'in li uxint'i nt'u t'u'u k'ats'ay. Para li ntu wa asi akmatanunincha li k'amak'awnin akint'atamakawlh, kit'in oxi iklhiwilay li yu minta'achanin.
Kit'in iknajun an Onésimo ka xliyu lhilaj'osni tam panch'e'ex para li chaway ixpujun'alhincha k'ala'a'it'i,

chi k'ala'a'it'i tacha xamati yu sawalh map'ayni, tacha mint'ala'ajun yu map'ayni sawalh, jantucha tacha wa mimputapatsancha. Kit'in ikmapayni sawalh, pero uxint'i p'alaych'a k'amap'aynit'i, mu lapanak chi wachucha kiklaka'ilhi an ixchiwinti Dios.
Chaway ijkunan, mu kint'atapatsank'at'i tachanu kit'ini k'ala'a'it'i an Onésimo.
Li tu'u tala'alhini ilhtunitan u li lhi'aniyan, kit'incha ak'ilhich'it'i.

Chi para li ntu ajkunini li wach'u k'ilhip'iniya mijatsukunti, mu kit'ini ikmasunin la xtij an Jesucristo, chaway kit'in ikPablo la kimaka ikts'o't'ajun ani jalhiki tan ikpujunan li kit'ini akmapalhniyan.
Kint'ala'ajun Filemón, la xtalakask'i an Dios iksk'iniyan lamapaynin ak'ila'oximaj'ayat'i, mu uxint'i misp'aycha an Dios wachu'.
Ikts'o'niyan mu ijk'atsayi li k'a'asmat'a'a an tacha ijkunan, chi ijk'atsayi li tacha an ijkunan k'a'ilht'u uxint'i, k'alhimo'slaya'ilht'uya'a.
Atumpaj wachu ijkunan li ak'imala'sijnininka lakatam tan lay akcha'alh, mu ikpakxan'iya li amintapaynitk'an ka'asmat'anta an Dios, para li lay aklala'cha'aw.
Wachu tala'axa'alayan an Epafras yu wachu kint'amalaklhchawkanta ixlakata an xchiwinti Jesucristo,
chi an Marcos chi an Aristarco chi an Demas chi an Lucas, wachu tala'axa'alayan, yu'uncha wachu kintat'atapatsay la xchiwinti an Dios.
An xjamapayninti Jamach'alhkat Jesús la mintakuwinchak'ani katsukulh.
Yu ma'anchacha xjuntachalh an Dios wanaj a'lhuwi jaxa'alalh an yu ta ixjalhila'ts'inaw chi tamj tamjcha ixjaxa'alay yucha an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Diosi ixjapuxa'alay.
Yu chaway anicha xati'astan panch'e'ex, yucha an isTs'alhcha kintapuxa'alayan, yu pu'ilhtulh an lakaamunulhpa chi yu ma'axta'ni'olh chux an tanlhun.

Yucha ixmakalip'at an ixta'ayat an Dios, yucha ixtasut an Dios chi yucha sa' lakch'apayaw'ojota chux an tanlhun an laka alhp'asni xchiwinti. Akxni kintaxakamaj'anincha kintala'alhink'an, tawilhcha an lakt'iyan tan ch'alhkatnan an Dios tan oxi ixpa'xti tawlhnilh,
chi palay xa'ayi walh, an angelhnin jantu, mu yucha la'a'ilh la'atam ta'a'ut yu palay oxi, an angelhnin jantu.

Mu an Dios jantu a'tam junilh xamati angelh: "Uxint'i kinTs'alhk'at'i; kit'ini ikxta'nin jatsukunti." Chi ntu xamati angelhi kapastakpalh kanawlh: "Kit'in ixPayi ajkuna', chi yucha kints'alhi kajuna'."
Chi lakatam najun akxni lhimilhcha an la'atamij isTs'alh aniy lakaamunulhpa: "Ixchuxk'an an ix'angelhnin an Dios ayi katala'ts'ilh."
La ixchiwinti Dios najun: Yucha ja'ilhtuyi an ix'angelhnin tacha un chi an yu tat'atapatsay tacha lam lam an jikmi ja'ilhtuy.
An Dios juniy an isTs'alh: "Uxint'i Diosk'at'i amilhich'alhkat xpujun'alhincha. Amink'iw yu p'uch'alhk'atnan wa tami k'ap'uxt'a'a'a.
Uxint'i yucha an yu laj'oxi tanlhuni ach'ani, jant'u la'ts'imp'ut'uni an yu ntu laj'oxi tanlhun, xliyu lhisakxtun an Dios, minDios chi palay xta'nini achat an mint'alhtanan jantu."
Chi nawpalay: "Uxint'i Jamach'alhkat, xlip'ulhnaj ilht'ucha tan katawilh an lakaat'un. Chi an lakt'iyan la mimaka ilht'u.
Yu'uncha katats'an'acho'oya', pero uxint'i k'ats'uk'u'alhiya'a. Chi chux yu'uncha katalaj'at'ilina tacha la'atam la'ch'it.
Uxint'i k'ajats'ipsa'a tacha ts'ipskan alhtam la'ch'it chi k'ajamap'axaya'a tacha mapaxakan la'ch'it. Pero uxint'i watachacha uxint'i k'a'una'a, amink'ata jantu a'tam katimin'olh."
An Dios tu a'tam junilh xamati angelh tacha junilh an isTs'alh: "Tan oxicha kimpa'xti k'at'a'ulh sta li an yu wa taxkayan ajka'ilhtuyacha li k'ajap'ut'ach'at'acha."
Mu ixchuxk'an an angelhnin yu'uncha takuwinin yu tat'atapatsay an Dios, yu'uncha jamala'achakanta para li kata'a'tayjulh an yu katata'alhtaxtuya'.
Pus xliyu li lhitask'iniya li oxicha palayi kalhakapu'aw an chiwinti yu asmattawcha, para li ntu kach'axpataxtuwi an laka tij.

An Dios japuxta'lhi ixlamap'a'sin an angelhnin yu tawananchacha xjuntachalh, chi alhp'asi ixjunita, chi yu ta'ilhtulhi xtala'alhink'an chi yu wa ta'asmatmaj'alhi an lhamap'a'sin jaxta'nikalhi lhima'alh'ajna tacha yu xtat'acha'ancha.

¿Tasucha kalhita'alhtaxtuyaw kitnan li ntu katilhistakwi an la'atam ay ta'alhtaxtuti? Yucha an Jamach'alhkati yu p'ulhnaj jamak'atsaaninilh ani ta'alhtaxtut, xli'astan kintamak'atsaanincha an yu ta'asmatlhi aniy chiwinti.
Atumpaj an Dios yucha pumasuycha laka laktanlhun yu la'lhi'a'nin chi tanlhuncha yu ntu wa xamaticha lapanak lay ilhtuy chi mala'pitsicha an stalan'a xTakuwin tacha yu yuchacha oxi lhiwilay.
An Dios jantu la xmaknik'an an angelhnini jamakawnita an lakaamunulhpa yu lhichiwint'awnaw yu wa ka'alinaka'.
Pero tichiyucha najun tanchun: ¿Tisu xlijunticha an lapanak para li ap'ast'akt'icha, u tisu xlijunticha an wa ists'alhcha lapanak para li ala'p'ixiyalhnacha?
An lapanak yucha palay wa lakat'ikt'i ilht'u, an angelhnin jantu, walh ch'i xt'a'nini ixcorona yu kaputa'ayalh chi kalhiwilakalh.

Chux an tanlhun ilht'u li la xjach'aja an lapanaki katamakawlh. Pus mu li ilhtulhi an Dios li chux an tanlhun la xjach'aja an lapanaki katamakaw'olh, pus tu tu'u yu ntucha yu kala'ts'ilhi'alh walh chi chaway la'ts'inaw li ntuka' chuxi yu yuchacha kala'ts'ilhi'an'olh.

Pero la'ts'inawi li an Jesús yu an Dios ilhtulh tam panch'e'ex li palay wa xalakat'ikt'i kawalh chi an angelhnin palay xalaj'ajin, li yucha xta'nikalhi ixcorona para li ayi kala'ts'inkalh chi kalhila'sikalh ixlakata li yucha nilh. An Dios la xjamapayninti lakask'ilhi li kama'k'atsalhi an lhinin kilakatak'an kinchuxk'an.

Chux an tanlhun ixlakata an Diosi li lak'alin chi yucha lak'ilhtuta, yucha lakask'in li ixchuxk'an an xjas'at'an katacha'alhi tan ch'alhkatnan. Xliyu an Dios laka lhima'alh'ajna ilhtulhi li ntu tu'u kats'an'anilh an Jesucristo, yu ixjama'alhtaxtunuk'an an xjas'at'an.
Mu ixchuxk'an wa pumatami xPayk'an: tacha an yu jamastalan'anan chi an yu jamastalan'anikan. Xliyu an isTs'alh Dios jantu maxanani li kintajunan li ixjat'ala'awnin juntaw.
Chuncha nawlh an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "Ajkalhixa'alaya milakata an kijat'ala'awnin, chi akmilhpaniyani milhpat xtan'ajni tan ikta'ayxt'o'aw."
Chi nawpalay: "Yucha ajkiklaka'iya'." Chi nawpalay: "Aniya ijkat'ayalh an kijas'at'an yu an Dios kijaxta'nilh."

Ixjas'at'an pumatam lapanak wachu chuni ixjakanitk'an chi ixjak'alhnik'an, wanajcha chuni an Jesús lhitsukulhi ixjakanit chi ixjak'alhni, para li an xlinin kapulaklhajalhi an yu lay ixjama'ninin, an xapay makxkay un.
Chunchacha japuma'alhtaxtunilh ixchuxk'an an yu wa xliyu li xtatalhamni an lhinin wa xja'a'ch'apa'alhitacha xtat'ajun.
Mu yucha kilachilh jantu para li kaja'a'tayjulh an angelhnin, yu'uncha an yu tapu'a'p'unminchalh an Abrami ja'a'tayjulh.

Chi chuncha xlitask'iniy li wanaj tacha an ixjat'ala'awnini kijunchilh para li lay yu xa'ay tukan sacerdote kijunchilh, yu jalakmapayni chi t'atapatsay an Dios. Chi nilh para li lay kajamala'mixinilh xtala'alhink'an an lapanakni.
Chi mu wanaj yucha ma'alh'ajnalh akxni lhila'ts'intanukalh, pus yucha layi kajalhi'a'tayjuya an yu jalhila'ts'intanukan.

Pus chawayi kint'ala'awnin, uxitnan yu wach'u t'asanik'anat an lakt'iyan, k'alhak'ap'up'it'iti an Cristo Jesús, an mala'achalh Dios chi yu ay tukan sacerdote, mu ixlakata yucha li tacha ani jakiklaka'ininaw.
Yucha muktaxtuni sawalhi an Dios, yu lhka'ulalh li ka'ilhtulh ani tapatsat, tacha an Moisés yu wachu muktaxtu'olhi xtapatsat an la ixcha'a an Dios.
Pero an Jesús palay lhitapalayi la'ts'inkan, an Moisés jantu, tacha an yu yajuy a'atam cha'a yucha yu palay lhitapalay, jantu yu an cha'a'.
Wa tanyuchacha cha'a si alini tichini la'oxilhcha, pero chux an tanlhun yu lak'alin'ojoy yucha an Diosi lak'ilhtulh.
Pus chunchacha, an Moisés tacha ma'tapatsan muktaxtulh sawalhi chux an la ixcha'a Dios, chi nawlhi an yu Dios ka xnawlh xli'astan.
Chi an Cristo, isTs'alh Dios yucha lhist'ak'a sawalhi an ixcha'a Dios, chi an cha'a yucha kitnan, li sa' lhitsuku'alhiyawi an kijakiklaka'intik'an chi tacha an laj'achanaw li pakxan'iyaw.
Xliyu tacha an lhinajun an Stalan'a Takuwin an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: Li asmat'at'iti uxitnan chaway yu iknajun,
jant'u k'at'ak'alh ilht'ut'iti mijalhunutk'an tacha an yu ntu kintakiklaka'ilh chi kintalhila'ts'intanulhi an tan wa lakaaxixnicha.
Ancha kintalhila'ts'intanulhi an yu t'a xjalhila'ts'inat masi xtala'ts'intacha t'up'uxam k'ata tacha an klak'ilhtuy tanlhun,
xliyu kintalhima'talh'amalh anchunu lapanakni yu ma'anchacha xtat'ajun, chi iknawlh: ‘Wa lhilhijcha tats'an'ata la xjalhunutk'an, jantu tamispata an kin tij.’
Xliyu iklhitalh'amajnawlh, iknawlh: Jantu katitatanuchalhi tan ijkastaknan.
K'alhak'ap'up'it'iti t'ala'awnin, li ntu xamati yu uxitnan kalhitsukulh jalhunut yu ntu oxi, yu ntu jakiklaka'inin, yu kamala'xtinulh la x'ukxlakapu an yu la'ajuntu Dios.
Apalij k'alamach'ap'ut'iti atamjtamin yu uxitnan tamin wilhchan, li nawkanka: "Chaway", para li ntu xamati yu uxitnan ka t'ak'alh lalh ixlakata an xja'o'xcho'onti an tala'alhin.
Mu kitnan kinta'ilhtukantan li kat'atala'xto'wi an Cristo, para li oxi katsuku'alhiw sta xpu'uktaxtun an laka jakiklaka'inti yu xlit'awnaw xlip'ulhnaj.
Xliyu lhinajunta: Li chaway asmat'at'iti uxitnan yu an Dios najun, jant'u k'at'ak'alh ilht'ut'iti amijalhunutk'an tacha an yu wa tala'amaj'alh an Dios.
¿Chi tisiyu'unchacha an yu xta'asmattacha an ixchiwinti Dios chi wa tala'amaj'alhi? Ixchuxk'an yu an jamaxtuchalh xalakaat'un Egipto an Moisés.
¿Chi tisi yu'unchacha yu jatalh'amnilh an Dios t'up'uxam k'ata? Yu'uncha an yu ta'ilhtulh xtala'alhink'an, yu'uncha tala'ta'a'atalh chi talaknilhi an tan wa jaxixnintacha lakaat'un.
¿Chi tisi yu'unchacha yu jajurarlanikalh chi jantu katitatanuchalhi tan jastaknani? Yu'uncha an yu ntu ta'asmatnilh an xchiwinti.
Pus la'ts'inawcha li ntu layi tatanuchalh wa xliyu li ntu tajakiklaka'inilh.
Pus xliyu li ixpaku ka an tan kintajunan li layi katanucha'aw tan jastaknan an Dios, kajalajk'atsanaw, jantu junita xamati de uxitnan jantu katanuchalh.
Mu kitnan wachu kintamak'atsaanikantani an laj'oxi chiwinti tacha yu'uncha; pero yu'uncha jantu tu'u talhitapalhnilh masi ta'asmatlhi, mu ntu takiklaka'ilhi an chiwinti .

Pero kitnan yu kiklaka'iyaw, katanutacha'awi tan jastaknan an Dios, an tan najunta: "Xliyu iklhitalh'amajjurarlalh iknawlh li ntu katitatanuchalhi tan ikjastaknan." Masi an xlaktapatsat xlak'ilhtu'ojotacha sta akxni ilhtuchalh an lakaamunulhpa'.
Mu an tanchun lhichiwininta chunchuni yu xlila'atujuncha wilhchan: "Chi an Dios jastaknalhcha akxni lak'ilhtu'olhcha an xtapatsat xlila'atujuncha wilhchan."
Chi nawpalata an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "Jantu katitatanuchalhi tan ijkastaknanta."
Walh chi ts'an'ayka li ali'in katatanuchalhi an tan jastaknankan, mu an yu p'ulhnaj jamak'atsaanikalh an laj'oxi chiwinti jantu tatanuchalh wa xliyu jantu takiklaka'ilh.

Xliyu an Dios a'tam makawpalay la'atam wilhchan, la'atam sast'i "chaway". Yucha an Daviti ma'ancha puchiwinilh, tan an nawkalh: "Li asmat'at'iti uxitnan chaway yu najun an Dios, jant'u k'at'ak'alh ilht'ut'iti mijalhunutk'an."
Mu li an Josué kaxjaxta'nilhcha jastaknat an israelitajnin, an Dios jantucha tu'u atumpaj wilhchani kaxlichiwinilh.
Pus chaway alinka la'atam jastaknat para an yu takiklaka'iy Dios.
Mu yu tanuyachalhi an la xjastaknat Dios, wachucha jastaknani la xtapatsat, tacha an Dios jastaknantacha la xtapatsat.
Pus kat'ataxtuniwi para li katanucha'aw anchunu tan jastaknankan, para li ntu xamati ali kataylhi'alh tacha an yu ntu tajakiklaka'inilh.

Mu an ixchiwinti Dios yucha la'ajunta chi alhp'as, chi palay jach'uk'unun, walh jantu masi watuchicha espada yu ta'ukxput'uy makikxtukanta, chi yucha layi ta'aknuy sta ch'uk'uy an tak'atsan chi an takuwin, ta'aknuyi sta xpulaknicha tukan an lapanak, layi k'atsay tani jatapastaknankancha chi tuchini ilhtuputuncha an jalhunut.
Jantu tu'u an yu alin ani yu ntucha lay kala'ts'ilh, chuxi la'ts'in'ojoy la xla'chulh anchunu yu kajun'oyaw tani xt'awnawcha.
Pus li lhit'awnawi yu xa'ay tukan sacerdote, an Jesús, an isTs'alh Dios, yu pala'puschalh an lakt'iyan, kakiklaka'i'alhiwcha yu kiklaka'itaw.

Mu ani lhit'awnaw xa'ay tukan sacerdote layi akintamak'akxaniyan li tu'u' ilhtuyaw yu ntu lay lhitayaniw. Yucha wachu lhila'ts'intanukalhi chux laka laktanlhun tacha kitnan, pero yucha ntu tu'u ilhtulh xtala'alhin.

Pus kakiklaka'iwcha, kastalhcha awi an tan wilh xputawlan yu puch'alhkatnan an kiDiosk'an, yu jamapayninin, para li akintamak'akxanin chi an la xjamapayninti akintalhi'a'tayjuni akxni ma'lhtask'iniyaw.

Mu chux yu xa'ay tukan sacerdote an tan tat'ajun lapanakni, sakxtukan, chi lhka'ulakancha para li yuchacha kat'achiwinilh Dios ixlakatak'an an lapanakni, chi para li kama'axta'lhicha lha'ulan chi kajama'nilhcha jatapakxat ixlakata tala'alhin.
Chi mu an sacerdote wachu k'atsayi li lhima'anxkayi li ak'ilhtulh yu lhinajun an Dios, pus layi jalakmapayni an yu ntu tu'u tak'atsay chi an yu wa tats'an'ata,
chi ixlakata li wachu lhima'anxkayi lhiwilay li ka'ilhtulh yu lhinajun Dios, pus kajama'niya jatapakxat chi kaja'ulanana', yu ixlakata xtala'alhin yucha chi yu ixlakata xtala'alhink'an an lapanakni.
Jantu xamati lay katilhitsukulh ani tapatsat wanajcha wa xjatalaputut, yucha an Diosi kaxta'niya yu chuncha katapatsaya', tacha ixjunita an Aarón.
Wanajcha chun, an Cristo jantu wa x'akstucha lhka'ulakalh xa'ay tukan sacerdote, yucha an Diosi xta'nilh ta'ayat akxni junilh: "Uxint'i kinTs'alhk'at'i, kit'ini ikxta'nin jatsukunti."
Chi tanchun ts'o'muk'apalhkanta an la ixchiwinti Dios jumpalay: "Uxint'i xpujun'alhincha sacerdote tacha an Melquisedec."
An Cristo akxni ixt'ajunka aniy lakamunulhpa, tapayninilh chi sk'inilhi laka p'as chiwinti chi alhut an yu lay kaxma'alhtaxtulh laka lhinin, chi mu wa xliyu jakiklaka'inin, pus an Dios asmatnilh.
Pus an Cristo masi yucha isTs'alh Dios, mu ma'alh'ajnalh, pus laklanilhi tanyuchacha yu ja'asmatnat,
chi chaway li ts'awjcha tukani tsukulh, yuchacha walh li kataputa'alhtaxtu'olh yu xpujun'alhincha ixchuxk'an an yu takiklaka'i.
Chi an Dios ilhtulhcha li xa'ay tukan sacerdoteje kajunlhi tacha an Melquisedec.
Yu ixlakata aniy wanaj lhuwi yu aknaju, pero lhima'anxkayi li aklhichiwinilh, mu uxitnan sawalhcha xlak'anti lhimach'a'xayat'it.

Tacha ani ma'anchacha la'pusta panch'e'ex, uxitnan jamatalanininch'a k'ax'unt'it, walh chi apalij wa ma'lht'ask'inip'alat li a'tam wa k'a'ump'alhk'ant'iti an tanlhun yu ntu la'lhima'anxkay, yu masuy Dios, t'ach'anu t'ach'ip'int'at'iti li yu p'as tu'u ukan jant'uk'a' lay uyat'it wa ts'ik'ikk'a ot'at'it.
Chi yu wa ts'ik'iyka jantuka' k'atsayi an oxi chiwinti, mu jas'at'aka'.
Pero yu p'ascha lakts'ak'akan ukan para yu'uncha an yu laj'ajincha, yu wa xliyu tajatapastaknancha pus la's'alalancha, tak'atsaycha tanyuchacha yu oxi chi yu ntu oxi.

Pus kataylhi'awcha sta li kat'acha'awcha li laj'ajincha kajunwi. Jantu wa x'amancha kalhakapu'aw an yu p'ulhnajcha laklaniw yu masuy Cristo: akxni an makajucha yu ntu laj'oxi chi an tanlhun yu kalhi'an laka lhinin, chi li kiklaka'iwcha an Dios,
chi li laklaniwcha li a'paxkan, chi li jalak'uktach'apakan an yu tajakiklaka'inin, chi li katala'awcho'oya an yu talaknitacha chi yu xpujun'alhincha kanawkana li oxi u jantu tani xt'awnawcha.
Chuncha aktaylhi'anaw akmasuyaw li Dios kintamakawniyan.
Ali'in jantucha takiklaka'in. Tala'a'ilhcha an jatapulhkunu chi takilhk'atsalhcha yu an Dios jaxta'niy tuchini yu katalhitapalacha, chi tama'la'a'ilhcha an Stalan'a Takuwin.
Chi wanajcha chun takilhk'atsalhcha an oxi ixchiwinti Dios, chi an ix'alhp'asninti an yu wa ka'alinaka lakaamunulhpa.

Pero li yu'uncha a'tam tata'a'tapalay, jantucha layi wanaj a'tam xlisast'i katijamach'a'o'apalakalh Dios, mu chuncha tachanu a'tam tamakxtukmuk'apalayi an isTs'alh Dios, chi tamamaxanicha tan lhilhuw.
Akxni an lakaat'un ot'acha an xkan yu wa paktsincha ancha tamayachalh, chi oxicha jama'axta'niy yu tach'an an lapanakni, an Dios najun oxi kawalh an t'un.,
Pero an lakaat'un tan wa lakalhtukuncha, jantu tu'u lhitapalay, an Dios kajuna li ntu oxi, chi kala'xawakana'.
Pero masi chuncha ikchiwinawi t'ala'awnin, ijk'atsayawi li uxitnan yu oxi tu'u k'ala'a'iya'it, kanaju, yu yucha an ta'alhtaxtut.

Mu an Dios yucha ts'ajwi lak'ilhtuy an tanlhun, jantu katikaplhi yu uxitnan lak'ilht'ut'at chi an mijamapaynintik'an yu masunit'at li ja'a't'ay'uyat an yu tajakiklaka'inin, t'ach'a t'aylhip'int'at masi chaway.
Pero iklakask'inaw li atamjtamin uxitnan k'at'aylhip'it'iti k'amasut sta wa xpu'ukla'ojoncha t'ach'a an t'at'axt'uniyat'it, para li k'alhits'uk'utcha sawalhi yu p'akxan'iyat.
Jant'u wa k'ala'malhe'nint'it, k'ajala'ts'ixt'ut'iti an yu la xjakiklaka'intik'an chi li talhitayani, tala'a'iya yu jaxta'niy Dios yu jajunkan li kajaxta'nikana'.
Akxni an Dios junilhi tuchini kaxta'niyacha an Abram, an Dios wa x'akstucha punawkalh, mu ntu xamati alin yu palay ay, yu kapunawnkalh,
najun: "Kit'in sawalh, aknawna' li oxi k'a'unt'i chi lhuwi ajkaxta'niyan yu katapu'a'p'un'anan."
Chi lhitayanilhi pakxan'ilh, chi la'a'ilhi an Abram yu an Dios ixjunita li kaxta'niya'.
An lapanakni akxni tanajun li kata'ilthuya' tu'u', yu palay ay xamati tapunajun, chi akxni tanajuncha li chuncha sawalhi li tu'u, jantucha ali lay tu'u lalhikikxtukukan.

Pus an Dios oxicha sawalhi jamasuniputulh an yu jajuniy li kajaxta'niya yu laj'oxi, jajuniy li kajaxta'niya sawalh chi li ntu tu'u yu tamcha katinawpalh, xliyu lhinawlh li ka'ilhtuya' para li kak'atsakalhi li sawalhi yu najun.

Akxni jajunilh li kajaxta'niya sawalhi yu ja'alhtasuni chi jaxta'nilh an ixchiwinti, jajunilh la'at'uy chiwinti yu ntu lay katitapaxalh, chi an Dios tu lay katipumaslakatinilh. Yucha pula'a'iyaw yu sawalh oxi kintama'oxamixiyan yu an puxkawyaw ixja'a'tayjunti Dios chi yu kiklaka'iyaw tacha an kintajunan li kapakxan'iw.

Tacha aniy pakxan'iyaw lhitala'si chi k'ut'ilhi kinta'ilhtuniyan kintak'atsank'an, tacha an barco lhitala'si sa' putawlay an tsasnat yu puch'i'ulakan. Tacha ani pakxan'iyaw la'pustachalhi sta la x'a'lhch'a an st'ak'ak'a la'ch'it an uk'alh an laka tajtan awint'i lakt'iyan,
tan an Jesús tanuchalh, para li akintatap'ulhnin chi junlhicha yu xa'ay tukan sacerdote yu xpujun'alhincha tacha an melquisedec.

An Melquisedec xarey la'acha'an Salem chi isacerdote an Dios yu wilhchalh lakt'iyani ixjunita. Akxni an Abram chincho'olhcha li jakit'alasalh an rejnin chi jalhajalh, an Melquisedec kilakatastuklhi chi lhitapaynisk'inkalhcha an Abraham li Diosi ka'a'tayjulh.

Tacha an la'akawincha ixkilhajaxtuta an tanlhun an tan kilasalh an Abram xta'nilhcha la'atamini an Melquisedec. An ta'a'ut Melquisedec yu p'ulhnaj nawputun: xajamach'alhkat yu oxi laklats'awalay tanlhun, chi wachu xajamach'alhkat la'acha'an Salemiji ixjunita. Chi Salem nawputun: xajamach'alhkat oxi jatawlhnat.

An Melquisedec jantu tu'u lhit'ajun xpay chi xnati chi ntu xamati'ini yu ta kajalhila'ts'ilh, jantu k'atsakani tawanancha tsukulh chi tawanancha nilh, wa xt'atami tacha an isTs'alh Dios, xpujun'alhincha sacerdoteje junita.
K'alhak'ap'up'it'iti li ay lapanak sawalhi ixjunita an Melquisedec mu masi an Abram yu kimpayk'an xlila'ts'inaw xta'nilhi décima parte an yu xkilaklhajaxtuta tanlhun tan kilasalh.

An la xlamap'a'sin Moisés najunta li an sacerdotejnin yu tapu'a'p'unmintachalh an Leví, talhit'ajuni lhamap'a'sin li katach'ilhi décima parte yu talhajay an lapanakni, masi an lapanakni chi an sacerdotejnin wachu yucha an Abrami tapu'a'p'unmintachalh.

Pero an Melquisedec masi ntu yu xpu'a'p'unmintachalh an Leví, ma'lhtaylhi an décima parte yu ilhajata an Abram chi an Melquisedec sk'inilhi an Dios li oxi katawilh an Abram yu ixjunita an Dios li tuchini kaxta'niyacha.
Chi yu palay ay yucha an yu sk'in an Dios li oxi katawilh yu palay xalakat'ikt'i, jantu lay xamati katinawlh li ntu chun.
Ani chun sawalh an diezmo wa lapanaknicha yu talakniya tajama'lhtayanan, pero an lakatam ancha jama'lhtayanan pumatam yu lhichiwinkan li t'ajunka'.
Chi layi kanaju li an Leví, yu jama'lhtayanan an diezmo chaway, yucha an Abramcha pujamapalanalh wachu',
mu an Melquisedec akxni alhcha lakatastuknu an Abram, an Abram ixjalhit'ajuncha la ixlakatunaj an yu katapu'a'p'un'ana'.

Li an lapanakni laycha yu'uncha ts'awj kaxtaputsukulh an sacerdotejnin yu ta xjalhila'ts'in an Leví, (mu yu'unchacha yu japuxta'nikalh lhamap'a'sin an lapanakni), oxicha kaxtaputsukulh, pero mu ntu layi oxi taputsukulh pus task'inipalh li katsukupalh pumatam sacerdote yu tacha an Melquisedec jantucha yu tacha an Arón.
Mu akxni mapaxakani tani tapatsaycha pumatam sacerdote wachu tapaxayi an lhamap'a'sin,
chi ani Jesús yu tacha ani lhichiwinkan yucha tumpaj lapanakni japu'a'p'unminchalh, yu yu'uncha jantu xamati tapatsalh tan ixma'axta'kan lha'ulan.
Mu oxi k'atsakan li an kiJamach'alhkatk'an yucha an Judaja japu'a'p'unminchalh, walh an Moisés tu tu'u jalhichiwinilh akxni lhichiwinilh ixlakata an pusacerdote.
Chi aniy palaycha oxi tukan putasuy, li an sast'i sacerdote yu talakasulh tacha an Melquisedec.
Yucha jantu wa lapanaknicha ta'ilhtulh sacerdote, yucha pujunlhi sacerdote an la x'alhp'asninti xjatsukunti yu ntu a'tam katinilh.
Yucha alini tan lhichiwininta an Dios, tan najun: "Uxint'i mimpujun'alhincha milhisacerdote tacha an Melquisedec."
Pus an yu p'ulhnajcha lhamap'a'sin mala'mixikalhcha, mu ntu alhp'asi ixjunita chi ntu tu'u xlitapalay,
pus an xlamap'a'sin Moisés jantu tu'u yu oxicha ka'ilhtulh, chi yu xli'o'lhtapaxancha yucha palay lhitala'si, yucha stalh pula'anawi an Dios.
Chi aniy yucha jurarlanikalh. An ali'in sacerdotejnin akxni jalhka'ulakalh jantu jajurarlanikalh,
pero yu ixlakata aniy yucha jurarlanikalhi akxni nawlh an yu junilh: An Jamach'alhkat jurarlalh, chi ntu astan katinawlh: Uxint'i xpujun'alhincha sacerdote tacha an Melquisedec.
Ani nawputun li yucha an Jesuscha yu lhitala'sicha japut'atamakajun an ixlapanakni an Dios.
An ali'in sacerdotejnin wanajcha xluwk'ani tawalh wa xliyu li akxni ixtanicha jantucha lay ali xtataylhi'an.
pero an Jesús mu yucha jantu a'tam katinilh, pus an xpusacerdote jantu a'tam katitapaxalh.
Xliyu yucha layi jama'alhtaxtuy yu xpujun'alhincha yu yucha tapula'cha'an an Dios, mu yucha xpujun'alhincha li t'ajun para li kajalhitapayninilhi an Dios ixlakatak'an.

Pus an Jesús yucha xa'ay tukan sacerdote yu xma'lhtask'iniyaw. Yucha Stalan'a, jantu tu'u ilhtuy yu ntu oxi, yucha jantu lhkiliki, yucha jantu jat'atala'xt'o'a an yu ta'ilhtuy xtala'alhink'an yucha palay awint'i lakt'iyani ulakantachalh.

Yucha jantu tacha an ali'in xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin, yu tama'lhtask'iniy tamin wilhchan katama'nilh jatapakxat, yu p'ulhnajcha tama'niy jatapakxat ixlakata xtala'alhink'an chi xli'astan ixlakatachak'an an lapanakni, yucha wa a'tami ilhtulh yu xpujun'alhincha, wanaj xjatsukunti yucha ma'axta'lhi.

An xlamap'a'sin Moisés wa lapanaknicha yu lay ta'ilhtuy xtala'alhink'ani jalhka'ulay, pero an yu nawlh an Dios li sawalh, yu xli'astancha lhamap'a'sin ilhtukalh, yucha lhka'ulay an isTs'alh, yu ntu tu'u xtala'alhin chi yu xpujun'alhincha.
Yucha aniya an yu tukancha lhilakchiwint'awnaw: an xa'ay tukan kisacerdotejk'an sa'cha wilhchalhi an lakt'iyan tan lhi'oxi la xpa'xti an tan wilh xputawlan an Dios yu puch'alhkatnan.
Yucha la'ts'ilhi'an an tan xasawalh ixtajtan Dios, yu yucha an Dios la'oxilh yu ntu wa lapanakcha la'oxilh.
Mu ixchuxk'an an xalaj'ajin sacerdotejnin jalhka'ulakani li katama'ninilhi jatapakxat an Dios chi li kataja'ulananilh, pus an Jesucristo wachu task'iniya li tu'u kama'axta'lhi.
Li aniy lakaat'uni kax'aklatsukulh yucha jantu kaxjunlhi sacerdote, mu aniy ta'alincha sacerdotejnin yu tama'axt'a'a lha'ulan tacha lhinajun an xlamap'a'sin Moisés.

Ani sacerdotejnin yu'uncha wa yucha an ixma'stele'k'an yu lak'alinachalh sawalh anu lakt'iyani taputapatsay, tacha an junikalh an Moisés akxni mala'oxinikalh an Tabernáculo tan xchin an ix'alhp'asninti Dios, akxni junkan: "Oxi k'alhak'ap'up'i, chux an tanlhun ch'unch'a k'a'ilht'u, t'ach'a an masunik'a an a'stitawk'a."
Pero an xa'ay tukan kisacerdotejk'an, yu la'a'ita ixpusacerdote yu palay oxi, yucha yu palay oxi lakchiwinti kintaput'atamakawnan, mu yu palay laj'oxi tanlhun yu akintaxta'nikanani pupastakchalh.
Li an yu p'ulhnaj lakchiwinti yu kintaput'atamakawkan jantu inta kaxlits'an'alh, pus tucha tu'u kaxlitask'inilh li kax'alimpalh yu xlipu'a'tuycha xakintaput'atamakawkan.

Pero an Dios la'cha'alhi tan tu oxi xtat'ajun an lapanakni chi nawlh: "An Jamach'alhkat Dios najun: kamina wilhchan akxni tumpaj ajkat'atamakawcho'oya an xla'acha'an an Israel chi an ixla'acha'an Judá.

Ani lakchiwinti yu ajkaput'atamakawcho'oya jantu yu tacha an ik'ilhtulh ali an yu t'a ixjalhila'ts'inat'it, akxni ijkala'ma'ch'apachalh para li ajkamaxtuchalh Egipto; chi mu yu'uncha jantu tamuktaxtulhi tacha an ijkajunilh, kit'in ijkamakawlh, najuni an Jamach'alhkat.

An lakchiwinti yu ajkaput'atamakawna an la'acha'an Israel xli'astan yucha aniy, najuni an Jamach'alhkat: An la ixjatapast'ak'atk'ani ak'ilhtuya li katalhitsukulh an kilhamap'a'sin chi la ixjalhunutk'ani ajkats'o'muk'aniya'. Kit'ini ixDiosk'an ajkuna chi yu'uncha kilapanakni katajuna'.
Chi ntucha xamati katit'alamasunilh ixt'alapanak chi kamasunilh xamati ixt'ala'ajun, kajunilh: k'amisp'at'icha an Jamach'alhkat. Mu ixchuxk'ani akintamispaya', sta yu wa lakt'ikt'in chi yu laj'ajin.
Ajkamala'mixiniya tanlhun yu ntu oxi ta'ilhtuta, chi ntucha a'tam aktijapastaknilhi ixtala'alhink'an."
Li lhichiwiniya an Dios yu sast'icha chiwinti putamakawcho'okan, an yu p'ulhnaj at'ilhcha ilhtulh, chi yu at'ilhcha chi yu ntucha xa'a'ikan wa k'ischa ts'an'aniy li kala'mixacha.

Chaway oxicha, an chiwinti yu Dios p'ulhnajcha jat'atamakawlh ixlapanakni, yucha lhinawlh yu ixma'lhtask'iniy para li katakiklaka'lhi an Dios. Wachu lhinawlh li kata'ilhtulh la'atam cha'a yu wa de anicha lakaat'un tan ixputapayninikan.
An cha'a yu xputapaynikan chunchuniya ixjunita: tan yu p'ulhnajcha pulaktam tan ixjunkan xnawin Dios, ancha ixlaktanun yu pumach'atakan maklhku, chi mesa chi an pan yu yucha an Dios ixma'axta'nikan.
Ix'a'lhch'acha an ixli'a'xt'uycha st'ak'ak'a la'ch'it an laka cha'a, ixjunkan yu wa lhilakatijtamcha xnawin Dios.

Ancha ixtanun la'atam altar de oro tan ixawakan pum chi ancha ixtanun an caja yu xmasuy li jat'atala'xto'lhi an ixlapanakni Dios. An caja wanaj si orojo xpulakmuk'a'okanta chi x'aymuk'akanta, chi ancha xtajun la'atam xaluj de oro xputajun maná, chi an xk'iw an Aarón yu alhala'awlh chi an la'lht'a'alhcha chiwx tan ists'o'ulakanta an la'akaw lhamap'a'sin yu japut'atamakawlh an ixlapanakni an Dios.

An caja ixta'ukxyanalhcha xt'uyunk'an tacha lapanakni xtala'pa'achujlata, yu'uncha xtamasuy an ix'alhp'asninti Dios, an tan mala'mixikan tala'alhin. Pero yu chaway yu yucha ixlakata aniy tanlhun jantu lay yucha oxi katilhichiwinkalh.
Chi li chunchacha ixlak'ilhtukanta aniy tanlhun, an tan p'ulhnajcha pulaktam ani cha'a wa paktsincha xtatanuy an sacerdotejnin xtat'achiwiniycha an Dios.

Pero an tan xlipulakt'uycha an laka cha'a wa yucha an yu xa'ay tukan sacerdoteje lay ixtanuy, wa a'tami tam k'ata, chi akxni ixtanuy ixli'an jak'alhni, ixma'axt'a'acha ixlakata yucha chi ixlakatak'an an lapanakni yu wa o'palajcha xta'ilhtuta xtala'alhink'an.
Chunchacha an stalan'a Takuwin ixpumasuy li laklhchajuyi an tan xwilh Dios wa xliyu li an yu p'ulhnaj pulaktam laka cha'a ix'alinka'.

Chux tacha ani wa kintapumasunikanancha yu ani panch'e'ex, li an lha'ulan chi an tacha jama'nikan jatapakxat yu anchacha jama'axta'nikan an Dios jantu tu'u lhitapalay para li oxicha katajalakpastaknalh an yu chuncha ta'ilhtuy.

Mu ancha ajnik'acha wa waytcha chi wa yu laycha otkan tu'u tama'axt'a'a, chi tanlhuncha ta'ilhtuy yu laycha katapustalan'alh, chi tanlhuncha lhamap'a'sin ixlakata an jakanit, yucha lhitapalay wa sta akxni an Dios kamapaxacho'oyacha an tanlhun.

Pero an Cristo kilachilhcha, chi an tanlhuncha yu laj'oxi ka'alina chaway yucha an Cristojcha yu tukancha xa'ay sacerdote. An laka stalan'a cha'a tan tapatsay xlisacerdote palay oxi junita. Yu jantu wa lapanaknicha tala'oxita, yucha ntu xanawin aniy lakamunulhpa'.

An Cristo wa a'tami tanulh an tan wilh Dios, jantu wa xliyu li kama'axta'pala xjak'alhnik'an chivo chi jas'at'a torojnin, yucha, ma'axta'lhi xjak'alhni, xpujun'alhincha tanulh, chi xpujun'alhincha li kintama'alhtaxtun.
Mu li an xak'alhnik'an an toroj chi an xapaynin cabra chi an xalhk'ak'acha becerra yu lax lax jala'muk'akan an yu ntu la'stalan'an tat'ajun, li tapustalan'ancha la ixlakatunajk'an,

¿Tasucha jantu palaycha katapustalan'ana an xak'alhni Cristojo? An laka Takuwin yu ntu a'tam niy, yucha putama'axta'nilh ix'akstu an Cristo an Dios, yucha lha'ulan yu ntu k'is lhkiliki, chi an xak'alhni kintastalan'aniyani an kijatapast'ak'atk'an tacha an tanlhuncha yu xlak'ilhtutaw yu wa kintalhi'anan laka lhinin, para li lay kat'atapatsaw an Dios yu la'ajunta.

An Cristo yucha yu sast'icha kintat'aputamakawcho'on an Dios, mu akxni an nilh jama'alhtaxtulhi an lapanakni la xtala'alhink'an yu xta'ilhtuta akxni ix'alinka an yu p'ulhnajcha ixjaput'atamakajunta, chi ilhtuyi li yu yucha an Dios jat'asanita katala'a'ilhi yu kajaxta'niya yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy yu yucha an Dios jajunita li kajaxta'niya'.
Akxni xamati lapanak niy makajun la'atam jalhiki, pero para li katapasalh, task'iniya li kamasukalhi li an yu la'oxilh an jalhiki nitacha.
Pus Anchunu jalhiki jantu tu'u lhitapalay li an yu la'oxita t'ajunka', lhitapalay akxni nitacha.
Wanajcha chun an yu p'ulhnajcha japut'atamakawlh chiwinti an ixlapanakni an Dios wachu lhimaj'ankalhi jak'alhni para li kalhitapalalh.

An Moisés jamak'atsani'olhi chux tacha an najunta an lhamap'a'sin chux an lapanakni; xli'astan xa'a'ilhcha slapulh xla'ach'awt jatapakxat chi xax'oy hisopo, chi lhilaj'awalhcha an xjak'alhnik'an an becerrojnin chi an chivojnin, xliyajutacha xkan, chi lax laxcha la'maka'alhi an jalhiki yu xpuwilh an lhamap'a'sin chi ixchuxk'an an lapanakni wachucha jala'maka'alh.
Wachuncha jajuniy: "Ani jak'alhni yucha yu taput'atamakawnan an Dios yu talhijunan li k'amukt'axt'ut."
An Moisés wachu lax lax la'maka'alhi an jak'alhni an cha'a tan xputapayninikan an Dios chi chux an laktanlhun yu ancha xputapatsakan.
An lhamap'a'sin ixnajun li lanan wanaj chuxi kamastalan'akalh laka jak'alhni; chi li ntu tu'u maj'ankan jak'alhni jantu tu'u mala'mixikan tala'alhin.

Pus chuncha ixtask'iniy li anchunu laktanlhun yu tacha xla'ma'stele' an yu lak'alinachalh lakt'iyan chuncha yu lay kamastalan'akalh; pero aniy tanlhun yu lak'alinachalh an lakt'iyan yu palay oxi lha'ulani ma'lhtask'ini, jantu yu wa tacha aniy.

Mu an Cristo jantu tanulh laka stalan'a cha'a yu wa lapanaknicha tala'oxita, tan wa la'ts'ixtukantacha tani junitacha an yu stalan'a cha'a sawalh, yucha wanaj an lakt'iyani tanuchalh para li la x'ukxlakapucha Diosi chaway katayachalh kilakatak'an.
Chi ntu para li wa a'lhuj a'lhujcha kama'axta'kalh, tacha lay an xa'ay sacerdote tamin k'ata, yucha tanuycha an laka cha'a yu xnawin Dios chi lhi'ancha jak'alhni yu ntu xjak'alhni.

Pero an Cristo wa a'tami tanulh an tan wilh Dios, li a'lhuw xtanulh a'lhuwi xnilh sta akxni ilhtukanchalh an lakaamunulhpa'. Pero chaway, yu pula'ojoycha an panch'e'ex, an Cristo wa a'tami talakasulh chi xpujun'alhincha, chi ix'akstu tama'axta'lhi ma'nikalh para li kama'osulh an tala'alhin.
Chi tacha an ilhtukanta li an lapanakni wa a'tami katanilh, chi xli'astan kajajunkanacha li oxi xtat'ajun u jantu,

wanajcha chuni an Cristo wa a'tami ma'axta'kalh para li kajalhi'anilhi xtala'alhink'an xluwk'an an lapanakni, chi katalakasupala yu xlipu'a't'uycha. Pero ntucha yu an tala'alhini katila'milh, yucha wa kaminacha jama'alhtaxtunu an yu tapakxan'iy.

Mu an xlamap'a'sin Moisés yucha wa xma'stele'cha an tanlhun yu laj'oxi yu wa ka'alinaka', jantu yu an yu sawalhcha. Xliyu an xlamap'a'sin Moisés jantu a'tami lay yu oxicha sawalh katija'ilhtulh an lapanakni, yu tamin k'ata tala'an an Dios, para li a'tamcha katama'axta'nipalh lha'ulan wa yu laycha tama'axta'ni.
Mu li an lhamap'a'sin laycha sawalhi kaxjama'osunilh xtala'alhink'an, jantucha kaxtapastaklhi li talhit'ajuni xtala'alhink'an, chi ntucha ali kaxtama'nilhi jatapakxat yu kaxtalha'ulanalh.
Pero tacha ani jama'nikan jatapakxat yu lha'ulanankan wa tamincha k'ata pastakkan an tala'alhin.
Mu an xjak'alhnik'an an toroj chi an xjak'alhnik'an an yu xajo'atnin cabra jantu lay mala'mixi an tala'alhin.
Pus xliyu akxni tanuchilhcha an lakamunulhpa an Cristo juniy an ixPay: "Uxint'i nt'u yu oxi lhiwilay yu jama'nikan jatapakxat chi lha'ulan; apalij k'ixt'a'nin kilakatunaj.
Yu jala'xawakan jatapakxat chi lha'ulan yu pumala'mixikan tala'alhin jant'u oxi lhiwilat'i.
Wachuncha iknajun: Anicha ikyalh, tacha kalaks kilhits'o'muk'akanta an laka jalhiki, para li ak'ilhtulhcha tacha yu uxint'i oxi lhiwilayi Dios."

P'ulhnaj najun, ixma'nika jatapakxat chi lha'ulan chi yu ixla'xawa'oka jatapakxat chi lha'ulan yu pumala'mixikan tala'alhin jant'u la'a'it'i, ch'i nt'u oxi lhiwilat'i (aniy tanlhun chuncha ma'axta'kan mu chuncha lhinajun an lhamap'a'sin).
Chi xli'astan najun: Dios, anicha ikyalh para li ak'ilhtulhcha yu uxint'i oxi lhiwilay, ma'osulhi an tacha p'ulhnajcha ixjala'ma'nikan jatapakxat yu ixla'ulanankan chi yu sast'icha ilhtucho'olh.
Xlakata tacha an yu yuchacha oxi lhiwilalh an Dios chunchacha yu kintapustalan'akan, mu an Jesucristo ma'axta'lhi an ixlakatunaj para li kalha'ulanankalhcha, wa a'tam chi xpujun'alhincha.
Chux sacerdote lhilhiji tamin wilhchan tapatsay chi wa yuchacha a'lhuw a'lhuw ma'axt'a'a an tacha jama'nikan jatapakxat, yucha ntu a'tam lay mala'mixiy an tala'alhin.
Pero an Jesucristo wa a'tami lhinilh an tala'alhin yu xpujun'alhincha, chi xli'astan tawilhcha tan oxi la ixpa'xti an Dios.
Chaway anchacha pakxan'ita sta li an Dios la xjach'ajacha kajamama'olh an yu wa taxkaji para li kajaputach'atalhcha.
Mu yucha wa laka la'atam lha'ulani ja'ilhtulh li xpujun'alhincha oxi katatsukulh an yu la'stalan'ancha.
Chi an Stalan'a Takuwin kintajunan, akxni nawlh:

Yucha aniya yu ajkat'atamakawna yu'uncha, xli'astancha akxni kala'pusacha anchunu wilhchan, najuni an Jamach'alhkat: An la xjalhunutk'ani akmakawna an kilhamap'a'sin chi an la xjatapast'ak'atk'ani akts'o'muk'aya'.
Chi nawpalay: Chi ntucha ali aktijapastaknilhi xtala'alhink'an chi tanlhuncha yu ntu oxi ta'ilhtuta.
Pus tan mala'mixikancha tala'alhin, jantucha ali task'iniya kaja'ulanankalh ixlakata an tala'alhin.
T'ala'awnin, chaway jantucha lhima'anxkayi tanuyacha'aw an tan wilh Dios ixlakata an xjak'alhni Jesucristo.
An sast'i tij yu pulhitsukuyaw jatsukunti yucha kintamati'anin an tan ix'uk'alh la'ch'it, akxni xta'lhi an ixlakatunaj xliyucha lay tanuyaw.
Lhit'awnaw pumatam yu ay sacerdote yu kintatap'ulhniyan an yu kiklaka'iyaw Dios.
Pus kala'awcha an Dios la kijalhunutk'an yu xlisawalh jantu katalhanaw, la kijalhunutk'an kamakajucha yu ntu oxi jatapast'ak'at, chi kach'a'awcha kilakatunajk'an laka stalan'a xkan.
Lhitala'sicha kalhitsuku an yu pakxan'iyaw, an yu kiklaka'itaw, jantucha wa tamj tamj kapastakkwi mu an yu najun li akintaxta'niyani an yu pakxan'iyaw ka'ilhtuya sawalh.
Kala'a'tayjupaxawcha para li kalamatanuniw ali kalhitsuku an jamapayninti chi li ka'ilhtuwi tanlhun yu laj'oxi.
Jantu kamakajuwi li ta'ayxt'o'aw, tacha talay ali'in, kitnan kalama'oximaj'ayapaxaw chi palaycha li la'ts'inawcha li an wilhchan wanicha minta.
Li a'tam ilhtupalawi kintala'alhink'an yu wa lhile'eyajcha chi li mispayawcha an yu sawalh jatapast'ak'at, jantucha xamati ali akintitalhinin para li akintamala'mixinikan kintala'alhink'an,
wa la'atamcha yu ay tukan lhima'alh'ajna pakxan'iyaw chi tan lam lam anta jikmi yu wanaj kajat'olo'oya an yu ntu taja'asmatnan.
Yu ntu muktaxtuyi an xlamap'a'sin Moisés, li tanajuni xt'uyunk'an u xt'utunk'an li chuncha sawalhi lay watukan niy, jantu k'is mak'akxanikan.

Pus ¿jant'u lhiwilayat'iti li palay ay lhima'alh'ajna katala'a'iya an yu wa taputayaycha an isTs'alh Dios, chi ntu tu'u talhiwilay an xjak'alhni yu ixtapustalan'antacha chi wa talhila'ts'incha an Takuwin yu jamapayninin?
Pero mispayawi an Jamacha'alhkat yu nawlh: "Kit'ini aklhach'inina', kit'ini akmapala'." Chi nawpalay: "An Jamach'alhkat yucha kajajuna an yu takiklaka'iy li oxi u jantu yu ta'ilhtulh."
¡Ay tukan lhima'anxkayi li la xmaka an Dios yu la'ajunta aktamachalh!
Pero k'ap'ast'akt'i anchunu panch'e'ex yu la'pustacha, akxni map'ulhk'unik'ant'itcha, xli'astan lhit'ayanit la'atam alhp'as chi lhima'alh'ajna lasat;
chun sawalh wachu mamaxanik'ant'it ch'i ma'alh'ajnant'it wa st'akch'a lhi'a'nik'ant'it chi a tumpaj ja'ilht'ut'iti mincompañerojk'an an yu wachu tacha uxitnan ixtama'alh'ajnant'ajun.

Mu an yu xtalaklhchawnan uxitnan oxi jala'ts'int'it, ch'i an t'ach'a lakmaxt'unik'ant'it milaktanlhunk'an masi ma'alh'ajnant'it laj'ach'ant'it, mu k'ats'ayat'iti li uxitnan lhit'awnat'iti yu k'ajama'lht'ayanana'it yu palay oxi chi yu ntu min'ojoy an lakt'iyan.
Pus, jant'u k'ama'ats'an'at'iti an mijakiklaka'intik'an, yu k'ap'ujama'lht'ayanana'it yu k'alhajaxt'uya'it.
Mu lhitask'iniya li k'alhit'ayanit'it, para li akxni mukt'axt'utitcha an yu lhinajun Dios, k'ajama'lht'ayanana'itcha an yu unk'anat li k'axt'anik'ana'it.
Mu ts'an'ayka lakats'uni, chi an yu kamina kaminacha, chi ntu katita'a'ma'alh.
Pero an yu ntu ilhtuy xtala'alhin yucha an ixjakiklaka'inticha kaputsukuya'; chi li katala'asp'itcho'oya jantu oxi aktilhiwilalh.
Pero kitnan jantu yucha an yu wa tatala'asp'itcho'oy chi tats'an'aycha, kitnan jakiklaka'ininawcha para li kalhitsukuw kijatsukuntik'an.
An jakiklaka'inti, yuch'a li na'un sawalhi li kajuna yu p'akxan'iy, yuch'a li na'un li lhit'a'uncha sawalhi masi yu nt'uka' la'ts'in.
Yu ma'anchacha xtat'ajun oxi jala'ts'inkalh mu xtajakiklaka'inin.
Yucha an jakiklaka'inti pulhimacha'xayaw li an lakamunulhpa yucha an ixchiwinti Diosi pu'ilhtukalh, an yu tasuy tan an yu ntu tasuyi minchalh.

An Abelh yucha an jakiklaka'inti palay oxi puma'axta'nilh lha'ulan an Dios, pero an Caín jantu, pus xliyu lhichiwinkan li yucha oxi lapanaki ixjunita, yucha an Dioscha lhichiwiniy ixlakata an xla'ulan; chi masi nitacha chiwinika'.

An xjakiklaka'inti an Enoc kalaks pulhi'ankalhi para li ntu kala'ts'ilhi lhinin, chi ntucha inta la'cha'ancho'okalh, mu yucha an Diosi lhi'alh; chi akxni ntuka' xli'ankan, k'atsakalhi li an Dios oxi xliwilay an Enoc.
Pero li ntu jakiklaka'ininkan an Dios jantu lay oxi akintitalhiwilan, mu lhitask'iniya li yu stalhcha la'ani an Dios kakiklaka'ilhi li yucha t'ajun chi an yu tapuxkajuy jaxta'niya yu laj'oxi tu'u'.

Akxni an Dios mak'atsaanilh an Noé tanlhun yu ntuka' xtasuy, kiklaka'ilh xliyu mala'asijnilh an ay caja tan tata'alhtaxtulh an yu ta jalhila'ts'in, chi laka anchunu jakiklaka'inti xta'niy lhima'alh'ajna an lakamunulhpa', chi yucha xta'nikalhi yu an Dios jaxta'niy ixlapanakni para li oxi kajala'ts'inkalh.
An Abram, akxni t'asanikalh, kiklaka'ilhi li kataxtulhi para li ka'alh tan kajama'lhtayanana yu Dios kaxta'niya'; chi taxtunilhcha masi ntu xk'atsay tanchuncha xti'an.

Xlakata an xjakiklaka'inti li tawilh an Abram tacha yu ntu an jamacha an lakaat'un tan junkan li kaxta'nikana', alicha an Isaac chi an Jacobi ixjat'atawlay laka cha'a yu wa las yawkan, yu'uncha wachu katajama'lhtayanana an yu junkan li kaxta'nikana an Abram.
Mu an Abram yucha ixpakxan'i an la'acha'an yu oxi ch'an'aknuy, tan yu wanaj yucha an Dios najun tani kawalhcha chi yu yucha la'oxita.

Wanajcha chun laka jakiklaka'inti an Sara, masi ntu lay xjamas'at'anan, la'a'ilhi tachaput para li kaja'aynalh, chi lhitsukulhi xjas'at'a masi ntucha ixpaku ', mu yucha kiklaka'ilhi li ka'ilhtuya sawalhi an yu junilh li kaxta'niya'.
Wanajcha chun an Abraham yu wanajcha xnit'ajun, lhuwi tapu'a'p'unminchalh tacha an st'aku yu ta'alin an lakt'iyan, tacha an kukuj yu ntu lay put'e'ekan yu alin an la xkilhtu alamalh.

La xjakiklaka'intik'ani talakni'olh ixchuxk'an ani lapanakni, jantuka' tala'a'ilhi an yu jajunkan li kajaxta'nikana', wa ma'atka tala'ts'ilh, takiklaka'ilh chi tala'axa'alalh, chi tanawlhi li yu'uncha jantu aniy lakamunulhpa xla'acha'ank'an chi li wa katala'pusa'.
Yu chuncha tanajun, ts'awjcha tanajun li tapuxkajuy la'atam la'acha'an,
li wa yuchacha kaxtapastaklhitsukulh an tan tataxtuchalh, layi kaxta'ancho'olh.
Pero yu'uncha xtak'uxa'an tan palay oxi, tan talhman juntachalh; pus an Dios yucha ntu maxanani li xDiosk'an tajuni, mu yucha jamala'asijninita la'atam la'acha'an.
An Abram jakiklaka'inilh xliyu akxni lhila'ts'intanukalh, ma'axta'lhi tacha lha'ulan an Isaac. An yu ixla'a'ita tuchini yu kaxta'nikanacha ixma'axt'a'acha an ists'alh masi wa pumatam,
masi li ixjunkanta: "Yucha an Isaaki yu k'ap'u'a'p'ump'ina'a,
mu an Abram ixk'atsayi li an Dios yucha layi sakcho'oy xamati tan tamanalh janinin, aniy chaway nawputun, an Abram jama'lhtayanancho'olhi an Isaac.
An Isaac kiklaka'ilhi an Dios xliyu lhitapayninilh li kaja'a'tayjulhi an Jacob chi an Esaú, ixlakata an tanlhun yu wa ka'alinaka'.

An Jacob kiklaka'ilhi an Dios xliyu akxni ntucha ma'an kaniya, tapayninilhi para li kaja'a'tayjulhi an ixjas'at'an José, chi aycha la'ts'ilh an Dios, la ixpaliki xjama'anch'apaxnanta para li lay kasa' tayalh.
An José kiklaka'ilhi an Dios xliyu akxni kaniyacha, lhichiwinilhi li katataxtuya an Israelitajnin Egipto chi jajunilhi tani kata'ilhtuyacha an ixjalukut.
An xpaynin Moisés ixtakiklaka'iya an Dios xliyu akxni tsukulh tamats'e'lhi la'at'utu malhkuyu', mu tala'ts'ilh li k'usi jas'at'a ixjunita chi ntu tatalhamnilhi an xlamap'a'sin an rey.
An Moisés kiklaka'ilhi an Dios xliyu akxni ta'ayalhcha, jantu la'a'ilhi li ists'alh an istsi faraón kajunikalh.
Apalij la'a'ilh li kajat'alhitama'chapukalh an ixlapanakni Dios, jantu la'a'ilhi li kama'an'achalhi an tanlhuncha yu wa la'pusa tala'alhin.
Palay oxi lhiwilalh li ntu oxi la'ts'inkan an Cristo, jantu la'a'ilhi an tanlhuncha yu laj'oxi ixlhit'ajun an Egipto, mu yucha xlakapu'anta yu an Dios kaxt'a'a'.
An Moisés jakiklaka'inilh xliyu lhitaxtulh an Egipto, jantu talhamnilhi an rey masi xtalh'aman, mu yucha lhitala'si ixk'atsan tachanu ixla'ts'ini an yu ntu tasuy Dios.
Xlakata an xjakiklaka'inti li an Moisés ilhtulhi an Paxku chi li kala'la'muk'akalhi jak'alhni an laka lakmalhticha para li an yu jama'ni'ojoy an yu xlima'sast'i jas'at'an yu'uncha jantu kajama'nilh.

An israelitajnin takiklaka'ilhi an Dios xliyuw tala'pusli an laka slapulh alamalh tachanu tan wa jaxixninta lakaat'un, chi an jamacha'an Egipto wachucha chuni ta'ilhtuputulh walh yu'uncha wanaj talaj'aksk'anj'u'olh.
An israelitajnin takiklaka'ilhi an Dios xliyuw an axi yu ixla'acho'oni'ojoy an la'acha'an Jericó tatist'a'olhi akxni xli'a'tujuncha tatala'asp'itni'olh an israelitajnin.
An Rahab yu wa aya ixlay t'aku kiklaka'ilhi an Dios xliyu li jantu nilh tacha tanilh an yu ntu xtajakiklaka'inin, mu yucha oxi jala'a'ilh an yu takilaka'alh.

¿Chi tisu alicha ali aknawlhi? Xapanch'e'exi task'iniy para li aklhichiwinilh an Gedeón, chi an Barac, chi an Sansón chi an Jefté, chi an David, chi tacha an Samuel chi an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios yu wa katapasayaka'.

Ixchuxk'an yu'uncha takiklaka'ilhi an Dios xliyu la'alhuw lhich'alhkat talhajalh, chi tanawlhi tanyucha yu oxi chi yu jantu, tala'a'ilhi yu jajunkan li kajaxta'nikana', tala'ma'e'sto'lhi la'a'lhuw lión.

Talakmamixilhi laj'ay lhitalhamnit jikmi, jantu jama'nikalhi laka espada yu lajkikxtuy, ta'ilhi xtachaputk'an masi ntucha lajk'ut'ilin xtajunita, lajk'ut'ilini tawalh laka lasat, tala'ma'ats'alalhi yu kilhmaktam soldadojnin.

Ta'alilhi t'akunin yu tala'awcho'olhi xjaninik'an chi tala'a'icho'olh, pero ali'in stakcha jamama'alh'ajnikalh, jantu tala'a'ilhi li kajama'alhtaxtukalh, para li katalhitsukulhi yu palay oxi jatsukunti akxni kala'awcho'okana'.
Ali'in stakcha jamamaxanikalh chi jala'na'makalh chi sta xjalakch'i'ulakanta laka kadena chi xjamalaklhchawkanta.

Jalakt'alhmakalh laka chiwx, japuch'uk'ukalh, jalhila'ts'intanukalh, japuma'nikalhi yu lajkikxtuy espada. Wa tanlayjcha xtalak'aklat'ajun wa ixjaxt'a'anchak'an jatapakxati ixjapula'axt'a'kan, wa xtalajkilhpaticha, tucha k'is oxi xtak'atsan, stakcha xjalhitama'chapukan.

An lakamunulhpa jantu xt'acha'ani li kaxjalhitsukulh ani lapanakni, wa tanchuncha ixtalak'aklat'ajuni an tan wa xixtacha lakaat'un chi lakaak'iwin, chi tan la'tan'apilho'o'o a'stitawk'a chi tan la'jalho'o'o lakaat'un.
Pero ntu xamati yu'uncha la'a'ilh yu najun an Dios li kaxt'a'a', masi oxi jalhichiwinkalh an la xjakiklaka'intik'an,
mu an Dios ixpaxkama'ata yu palay oxi para kitnan, para li wa ayxtamcha ali yu'uncha akinta'ilhtukan li ntucha tu'u kintats'an'aniyan.

Pus xliyu li kitnan kintala'acho'oni'oyani lhuw yu tala'ts'ilh an x'alhp'asninti Dios, kamakaw'ojocha chux yu wa kintamama'tijlayancha, chi an tala'alhin yu wa las kintamats'antijlayan, chi lhitala'sicha kajats'alaw an jats'alat yu lhit'awnaw laki'ukxlakapuk'an.

Yucha an Jesuscha kasa' la'ts'iw, mu yucha puminachalh an kijakiklaka'intik'an chi yucha yu oxicha tukan kinta'ilhtuniyan an kijakiklaka'intik'an. An Jesús lhitayanilhi an laka cruz, jantu lhakapu'alhi anchunu lhimaxan lhinin, mu yucha ixk'atsayi li xli'astan ka'achana', chi tawilhcha tan oxi la xpa'xti an tan wilh xputawlan yu puch'alhkatnan an Dios.
K'alhak'ap'up'it'iti anchunu yu ma'alh'ajnalh, yu wa tat'atasp'itlhi an yu wa xtala'alhinchak'an ta'ilhtuy, para li tacha an laj'oximaj'ay unt'at jant'u wa k'alho'ont'it chi k'ala't'a'a't'atcha.
Mu uxitnan t'uk'a' st'a anch'a lhit'ayaniyat li wanajch'a k'alhimaj'ant'it mijak'alhnik'ani li t'alasayat an tala'alhin.

Walh ch'i k'apt'atcha t'ach'a an unk'anat tacha uxitnan xajas'at'an, tan nawkan: Kijas'at'a, jant'u k'ala'amaj'a an ixjamalakpast'ak'anti an Jamach'alhkat Dios, ch'i nt'u k'at'a'oxila'alhit'i akxni la'a'aymayan.
Mu an Jamach'alhkat yu mapayniy, malakpast'ak'aniy, chi ixchuxk'an yu jala'a'iy tacha ixjas'at'an, jatina'a.
Li lhit'ayaniyat'iti an ixjamalakpast'ak'anti Dios, tacha ixjas'at'ancha kata'ilhtuyan, ¿chu sna xamati lapanaki katsukulh yu ntucha kamalakpast'ak'anilh ixjas'at'a?
Pero li an Dios uxitnan jantu tamalakpast'ak'aniyani tacha jamalakpast'ak'aniy ixchuxk'an an yu ixjas'at'an sawalh, pus uxitnan jantu sawalh ixjas'at'an.

Atumpaj jalhitsukuwi yu wa anicha lakaat'un kilakpaynink'an yu xakintamalakpast'ak'aniyan, chi ixjakiklaka'iyawcha. ¿Tasu li ntu palaycha kakiklaka'iyaw an kimPayk'an yu wilhchalh lakt'iyan para li katsukuwi?

Anchunu kilakpaynink'an jantu ma'ani kintamalakpast'ak'anin chi yu'uncha wa tacha yu oxicha xtalhiwilay ajnik'a kintamalakpast'ak'anin, pero an Dios oxi para kitnani li kintamalakpast'ak'aniyan, para li wachucha la'stalan'ani kajunwi tacha yucha.
Chun sawalh akxni wa kintamalakpast'ak'anit'awkananka, jantu achaniyau, kintaxkaniyan u lhita'oxila'alhiyaw, pero xli'astan oxicha xajachalh. Akxni laj'achanawcha chi oxicha tsukuyaw.
Lajk'ut'ilinch'a k'a'unch'o'ot'it, mu wa la't'iya'anch'a lak'unt'at'it.
Oxi k'alhak'ap'up'it t'anch'unch'a p'alht'ananat para li nt'u k'ap'uts'an'at'iti t'ach'a an wa t'iya'ch'a layat; walh ch'unch'a k'at'a'alht'axt'uya'it.
Oxi k'ajat'alalhip'it chux an lapanakni chi la'stalan'ani k'ats'uk'ut, mu yu ntu stalan'a katitsukulh jantu katila'ts'ilhi an Jamach'alhkat Dios.
K'ajalajk'ats'anant'it, jantu junita xamati jantu kajama'lhtayanalh yu an Dios xta'niputun; jantu junita kala'awlh la'atam xajataxiyak talh'amti chi katamama'tijlancha chi xluchak'ani kajamatsamalh;
jantu xamati wa aya kalalh chi yu ntucha ka'asmatniputulh an Dios, tacha lalh an Esaú, mu yucha wa la'atam wayt lhist'amaj'alhi li yucha xa'ay.

Ch'i k'ats'ayatcha li masi xli'astan lakask'ilhi li an ixpay kask'inicho'olhi an Dios yu ixt'acha'an kaxlitsukulh, jantucha lhakapu'ankalh, chi masi astan nawlh jantucha tani lhila'alh, masi lhi'alhulh.
Uxitnan jantu ani ch'ip'int'at an tan wilh a'stitawk'a yu lay xlakach'apakan, chi ixma'taji laka jikmi, tan s'oya' junita, tan ts'ite's wilh chi tan lhima'anxkay.
Jant'u asmatt'iti tacha an is'oli kikst'ililh s'olh, chi tacha an p'as ixchiwinkan, tan ma'anchacha ta'asmatlhi an judiojnin. Tatapaynisk'inlhi li ntucha ali kajaxa'alakalh,

mu ntu xtalhitayaniya tacha ani yu ixjalhijunkan tan jajunkalh: Li xamati kakitach'ataya ani a'stitawk'a kalakat'alhmakalh sta kama'nilalh u kama'nikalh laka patipni chi masi wa la'atamcha jatapakxat kakitayalh ani a'stitawk'a, wanajcha chun.
Chi sawalhcha lhitalhamnit tuchichuni an yu xtasuy, sta an Moisés nawlh: Ijkaxk'ip'ip'itnincha la kintalhanti.
Uxitnan ch'it'ant'at an tan junkan a'stitawk'a Sión, la xla'acha'an an Dios yu la'ajunta, an la'acha'an Jerusalen yu lakt'iyan alinachalh, tan la'alhuw millón angelhnin tat'awilanalh,

tan ta'ayxto'nun an ixjas'at'an Dios yu jats'o'ulakanta an lakt'iyan, tan wilh an Dios yu kinchuxk'an kiJuezk'an, tan tat'ajun an ixtakuwink'an yu oxi xtat'ajun yu ja'ilhtukalh li ntucha tu'u xtala'alhink'an katalhitsukulh,
tan wilh an Jesús, yu sast'icha kintaput'atamakawcho'on an Dios, chi tan alin an jak'alhni yu lax lax jala'muk'anankalh yu palay oxi kintaxa'alayan, walh jantu an ixjak'alhni Abel.

K'ajalajk'ats'anant'iti li nt'u wa k'ala'amaj'ant'iti an yu chiwiniy, mu li ntu tata'alhtaxtulhi an yu wa tala'amaj'alh an yu jalaj'aymalh aniy lakaat'un, palaycha kitnan, li wa la'amaj'anawi an yu kintalaj'aymalakaminan sta anu lakt'iyan.
Anchunu panch'e'ex akxni chiwinilh an Dios malaklalhi an lakaat'un, pero chaway najun: "A'tam akmalaklapala', chi ntucha wa yu an lakaat'un wachu an lakt'iyan."
Chi li najun a'tam akmalaklapala, nawputun li kama'osukana an yu wa lak'ilhtukanta, an yu lay malaklakan, para li wa yuchacha katamakawlh an yu ntu lay malaklakan.
Pus kitnan, mu la'a'it'awnawcha lhich'alhkat yu ntu lay lak'anukan, kaxta'wicha lhimala'puchajun, chi yuchacha kaput'atapatsaw an Dios kama'an'achawcha laka jakiklaka'inti chi laka jalhiwilanti;
mu an kiDiosk'an jikmi yu jala'xawanan.
Xpujun'alhincha chuncha kajunlhi li lamap'aynip'axayat li lhit'ala'awnin.
Jant'u k'ak'apt'iti li oxi k'ajala'a'it'it yu tala'cha'anan la mincha'ak'an, mu chuncha ali'in masi ntu xtak'atsay, angelhnini ixtala'a'iy la ixcha'ak'an.
K'ajap'ast'akt'iti an yu talaklhchawnan, tachanu jat'alaklhch'awyat'it; chi an yu wa jala'lhitama'chapukan, tachanu an la ixlakatunajk'ani t'awnat'it.

Minchuxk'an yu lakt'at'awk'anat oxi k'ats'uk'ut mint'uyunk'an, stalan'a k'ats'uk'ut li lat'at'awnat'it, mu an yu wa aya talay chi an yu tat'atamapalay xamati yu ntu yu tat'at'ajun, an Dios kajaxta'niya lhima'alh'ajna.
Jantu wa tumincha sawalhch'a k'axo'ulat'it, k'at'alaj'ach'ant'itcha yu lhit'awnatcha chaway; mu an Dios najun: Jantu a'tam aktikapmaj'an chi ntu at'am aktimakajun.
Pus lhitala'si lay nawnaw: "An Jamach'alhkat Dios yucha ki'a'tayjuy; jantu aktitalhamnilhi tani laycha aki'ilhtulh an wa lapanakcha."
K'ajap'ast'akt'iti an xalaj'ajin, yu talhixa'alan an ixchiwinti Dios; k'alhak'ap'up'it'iti tani t'axajachalhcha ixjatsukuntik'an, ch'i k'ala'ts'ixt'unitcha an xjakiklaka'inti.
An Jesucristo wanajcha yu yu kutanchacha xjuntachalh, chi yu chaway, chi wa xpujun'alhincha kajuna'.

Jant'u k'ak'iklak'a'it'iti wa tanlhuncha tipaspit lhamap'a'sin yu ntu lhitala'si. Palay oxi li an kijalhunutk'an k'ut'ilhi kawalh la xjamapayninti an Dios, walh jantu li wa xalhamap'a'sincha wayt; mu yu yucha lhamap'a'sin jantu a'tam tu'u lhitapalay.
Kitnan lhit'awnaw la'atam tan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan tan tu tat'acha'an lay kata'ulh yu ma'axta'kan lha'ulan an yu tatapatsay an laka cha'a tan ixt'ajun ix'alhp'asninti Dios,
mu an ixlakatunajk'an an jatapakxat, an yu jatamaknuni ixjak'alhnik'an an laka cha'a yu sawalh stalan'a an sacerdote ixlakata an tala'alhin, ma'spa an laka campamentojo ankan la'xawaka.
Pus xliyu wachu an Jesús, para li kajamastalan'anilhi la xjak'alhni an yu takiklaka'i, xlima'spa an la'acha'an nilh.
Pus kataxtuwcha tan tawilanalh an lapanakni kala'awcha xlima'spa an campamento, chi kama'alh'ajnawcha wachu tacha yucha ntu tu'u talhiwilalh,
mu aniy jantu tu'u la'acha'ani yu ka'alin'alhiya', kitnan puxkawyaw la'acha'an yu ka'alin'alhiya' yu wa ka'alinaka'.
Pus lhilhiji yucha an Jesucristo kapuma'axta'niw milhpat an Dios tacha kilha'ulank'an, la kinkilhnik'an kapumapa'a'uwi an ixta'a'ut.
Jant'u k'ak'apt'iti uxitnan li k'a'ilht'ut'iti yu laj'oxi tanlhun chi li k'ala'a't'ay'up'axat'it; mu an Dios yu chuncha lha'ulani achani.

K'aja'asmatnit'iti yu tajunan amimpastornink'an ch'i k'ajak'iklak'a'it'it; mu yu'uncha talhistakta amintakuwink'an chi mu yu'uncha kajalhisakmikana t'ani xt'awnatcha, p'us k'ajak'iklak'a'it'it, para li lhi'acha katatapatsalh chi ntu junita katanawlh li lhima'anxkaycha talhiwilay, mu li chuncha, jantu tu'u yu oxi talhiminiyan.
Akilalhitapayniw, mu iklhiwilayawi li oxi ijkalakpastaknanaw, chi oxi iktaylhi'amputunaw chux an tanlhun.
Chi palaycha iklalhitapaynisk'iniyaw kit'in li k'at'ap'aynit'it, para li akimakawnikalhi watukan aklala'ampalhcha'aw.
An Dios yu xt'a'a oxi jatawlhnat, yu mala'awnicho'olh an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo, an ay lapanak yu jalhist'ak'a ixborregojnin, an laka jak'alhni yu xpujun'alhincha putamakawkalh.

Yuchacha katapu'ilhtun li layi k'amukt'axt'ut chux tanlhun yu laj'oxi, para li yu yuchacha chuncha oxi lhiwilayi k'a'ilht'ut, chi an Dios yucha an Jesucristojcha akintapu'ilhtun kitnan tani yu lhi'achanicha. ¡Yucha an Jesucristojo yu ay chi xpujun'alhincha! Chunchacha kawalh.
T'ala'awnin, iklatapaynisk'iniyaw li k'alhit'ayanit'iti ani kinchiwinti, mu wa lakats'uniya ani klats'o'nitaw.
K'ak'ats'at'it an kint'alajunk'an Timoteo makawcho'okalhcha li xmalaklhchawkanta, li wa tukan kamina akt'a'antachalhi li aklala'antacha'aw.
K'ajala'axa'alachi'it'iti ixchuxk'an an mimpastornink'an, chi ixchuxk'an an yu takiklaka'iy Dios. An xalakaat'un Italia tala'axa'alayan.
An Dios minchuxchak'ani kataxta'nin an xjamapayninti. Chunchacha kawalh.
Kit'in Santiago, ixma'tapatsan an Dios chi an Jamach'alhkat Jesucristo, ijkala'axa'alay an kilhmakkawt'uy ixlapanak Dios yu ta'a'pitsinin ta xlijalhi'ay an lakaamunulhpa'.
Kint'ala'awnin, uxitnan sawalhch'a k'alaj'ach'ant'iti akxni tanlhuncha tu'u yu lhima'anxkay p'ula'p'ust'awnat'it.
Mu k'ats'ayatcha li akxni lhila'ts'int'anuk'anat'it ixlakata an mijakiklaka'intik'an, p'alay laklaniyat'iti lhit'ayaniyat an ma'alh'ajnat.
Pero li lhit'ayaniyat k'alhip'uxk'awnit'iti para li oxicha k'ats'uk'ut, k'a k'at'atcha sawalh, jantucha tu'u katats'an'anin.
Li xamati yu uxitnan ts'an'ani jatapast'ak'at, kask'inilh an Dios, chi an Dios kaxta'niya', mu an Dios ixchuxk'ani lhuw jaxta'niy yu task'iniy chi ntu xamati yu wa la'amaj'an.
Pero yu sk'in, kakiklaka'ilh sawalhi li kaxta'nikana'. Jantu kanawlh li sna kalaya u jantu. Mu yu ntu lhiwilay yucha wa tacha an milh milhcha lay alamalh, watanlayjcha lhilhi'an an un.
Yu chuncha lay, jantu kapastaklhi li tu'u kala'a'iya la xmakni an Dios,
mu chaway tami past'ak'a chi lhiy tamcha pastakpalay, chux yu ilhtuy jantu lhitala'si, wa tamj tamj jatapastaknan.
Yu wa kilhpati kint'ala'ajunk'an kalhi'achalhi li an Dios juniya li yucha lhitapalay;
chi an yu jamatumin wachu ka'achalhi akxni ntucha lhitapalay la'ts'inkan mu yucha wa tacha an xaxanti an jach'itini katapasaya'.

Akxni xajachilhcha an wilhchan chi sawalhcha p'asi jask'unun, an jach'itin xixacha chi patajunicha an xaxanti chi ntucha k'usi jun. Chuncha katapasaya an yu jamatumin, wa kat'anicho'oyacha tuchini wa tilak'ilhtuycha.
Wa lhi'o'slaya oxicha para yucha an lapanak yu lhitayani akxni lhila'ts'intanukan. Mu akxni li kalhajayantacha, kala'a'iyacha an xakorona jatsukunti, yu an Dios najun li kajaxta'niya an yu tamapayni.

Li akxni xamati lhila'ts'intanukan li ka'ilhtulh tu'u yu ntu oxi, jantu kapastaklhi li Diosi chuncha ilhtuy. Mu an Dios jantu k'is past'ak'a li ka'ilhtuputulh yu ntu oxi tu'u', chi an Dios jantu xamati lhila'ts'intanuy para li kama'ilhtuputulh yu ntu oxi.
An lapanak yucha an lajk'atsancha tanlhun yu ntu laj'oxi, yucha yu lhila'ts'intanuy, chi li lhakapu'ancha, pus ma'ilhtuycha yu ntu oxi.
Yucha anicha yu ntu laj'oxi tanlhuni yu pup'a'a an tala'alhin, chi akxni an lapanak ilhtutacha sawalhi an tala'alhin, la'chincha an lhinin.
Kint'ala'awnin yu iklamapayniyaw, jant'u k'at'a'o'xch'o'ot'it:
Chux yu oxi tu'u kintaxta'nikanan chi yu ntu k'is inta tu'u ts'an'ani, talhmani minachalh, yucha an xaPay jatapulhkunu makminachalh, yu ntu tapaxay chi ntu laklay tacha an ma'stele'.
Yucha mu chuncha lakask'ilh, kintaxta'nini jatsukunti an laka chiwinti yu sawalh, para li kitnancha p'ulhnaj kajunwi tacha an jamala'awnininta.
Kint'ala'awnin yu klamapayniyaw, k'alhak'ap'up'it'iti ani yu klajunaw: minchuxk'ani wa las k'a'asmatt'it yu unk'anat'it, pero ntu wa lasi k'ach'iwinint'it chi ntu wa lasi k'at'alh'amant'it.
Mu an lapanak yu wa talh'aman jantu lay ilhtuy yu oxi lhiwilay an Dios.

Pus uxitnan k'amak'aw'o'ot'itcha chux yu ntu oxi chi tacha an wa stakcha alin yu wa lhi'ay junita, chi laka jakilhpatinijk'atsatcha k'ala'a'it an chiwinti yu xt'a'nik'anat. Mu aniy chiwinti layi katama'alhtaxtuyan.
Jantu wa lhilakatijtamcha k'a'asmatt'iti aniy chiwinti, yucha k'amukt'axt'utcha, mu li jantu, wa mi'akstuchak'ani o'xcho'ok'anat'it.
Yu wa asmat'acha ajnik'a an chiwinti, chi ntu muktaxtuy, tachanu xamati lapanak yu la'pula'ts'inkancha laka spejo,
la'pula'ts'inkancha ix'akstu, pero akxni tala'asp'itcho'oycha kappalaycha tani tasuycha.

Pero yu ntucha k'ap'a yu asmat'a, chi oxicha lhakapu'an an yu ts'awj lhamap'a'sin, yu jama'alhtaxtunun, chi yuchacha pu'aklatsuku'alhiy chi ilhtuycha tacha najun, yucha lhi'acha kak'atsana tuchini yu ilhtuycha.
Li xamati k'atsan li sawalhcha kiklaka'iya tuchini kiklaka'itacha, pero li ntu lay lhist'ak'a an isima'at, wa ix'akstucha o'xcho'okan chi ntu tu'u lhitapalay tuchini yu kiklaka'itacha.

Yu stalan'a jakiklaka'inti chi yu ntu lhkiliki la x'ukxlakapu an Dios, yu xaPay, yucha aniy: Kaja'a'tay'ut'i la xma'alh'ajnatk'an an yu maticha ixpayk'an chi an yu maticha xt'apapak'an an t'akunin, ch'i nt'u k'alhk'iliki an laka laktanlhun yu ntu laj'oxi aniy lakaamunulhpa'.
Kint'ala'awnin, uxitnan yu k'iklak'a'iyat an ay kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesucristo, jantu wa kata'alilhi yu oxi k'ajalhiwilat.
Mu li t'an t'a'ayxt'o'at'it katanuchalh xamati lapanak yu maktanun ix'anillo de oro chi sawalhcha oxi ixla'ch'it, chi wachu katanuchalh pumatam yu wa kilhpatiy, yu wa at'ilhcha ixla'ch'it,

chi wa yucha an yu sawalhcha oxi mala'ch'ininta yu oxi k'ala'ts'int'it ch'i k'a'unit: "Anich'a k'at'a'ulh tan oxi"; chi an yu wa kilhpatiy k'a'unit: "Uxint'i anch'unuch'a k'asa' t'ayachi u anicha lakaat'uni k'at'a'ulh".
Wa siya uxitnancha, wa lasakxt'uyatcha yu oxi lhiwilayat chi yu jantu, tachanu juesninch'a unat laka yu ntu oxi jatapast'ak'at.

Kint'ala'awnin, uxitnan iklamapayniyaw, k'a'asmatt'iti aniy: An Dios yuchaa jasakxtuta an yu wa takilhpati aniy lakaamunulhpa', para li sawalhcha katajakiklaka'inilh chi para li katajama'lhtayanalhi an lhich'alhkat, yu yucha an Dios jajunita li kajaxta'niya an yu tamapayni;
uxitnan apalij wa nt'u t'u'u jalhiwilayat'it. ¿Chu ntu yu an jamatuminini yu sawalhcha talhitama'chapuyan chi taxa'alhi'anancha la x'ukxlakapuk'an an jamach'alhkatni?
¿Jantu yu'uncha yu xkayaj talhichiwiniy an oxi xta'a'ut an yu p'ut'asanik'ant'it?
Uxitnan oxich'a li ch'unch'a layat li mukt'axt'uyat sawalhi an yu ay tukan lhamap'a'sin, tacha najunta an tan ts'o'muk'akanta: "K'amap'aynit'i mint'alapanak t'ach'a akst'u map'aynik'an".
Pero li wa ta'alini yu oxi jalhiwilayat chi ali'in jantu, tala'alhinch'a ilht'uyat, chi an xlamap'a'sin Dios kanawna li minkwentajk'an.
Mu watichicha yu muktaxtu'ojoycha chux an lhamap'a'sin, pero li inta la'atam lhamap'a'sin jantu ka'ilhtulh, chuxcha jantucha muktaxtu'ojoy.

Mu an Dios nawlh: "Jant'u k'at'at'amat'i yu ntu mint'iwi'", chi nawpalay: "Jant'u k'ajama'nin". Pus chaway, li xamati jantu t'atamayi yu jantu xt'iwi, pero li jama'ninin, jantucha muktaxtuyi an lhamap'a'sin.
Uxitnan k'ach'iwinint'it ch'i k'alat'it tacha yu yucha an lhamap'a'sin yu akintama'alhtaxtuyan akintapujunkanan li oxi u jantu xlayaw.

Mu yu ntu k'is tamapaynilhi ali'in, wanajcha chuni kaja'ilhtukana akxni kajajunkana li yu'uncha ixkwentajk'an. Chi an yu tajamapayninin yu'uncha oxi katat'axajanta, tan kanawkana li oxi u jantu yu ilhtuta atamj.
Kint'ala'awnin, ¿tisu lhitapalhnicha xamati li kanawlh li jakiklaka'inini, li ntu tu'u ilhtuy yu kaputasulhcha? ¿laycha kaputa'alhtaxtuya wa laka jakiklaka'inti?
Kanajuw li xamati kint'ala'ajunk'an u kint'alajamatsank'an tats'an'atayani ixla'ch'itk'an chi tats'an'atayani yu lhilhij kata'ulh,
chi xamati yu uxitnan kajajunilh: Oxich'a k'ap'it, k'amala'ch'inint'itcha ch'i k'alaj'o'ats'atcha; pero li ntu jaxta'niya yu tama'lhtask'iniy la ixlakatunajk'an, ¿tisu talhitapalhnicha?
Wanajcha chuni tapasay an laka jakiklaka'inti, li ntu tu'u k'ilhtuy yu kaputasulhcha, jantu tu'u lhitapalay.

Pero xamati layi kanawlh: "Uxint'i jak'iklak'a'inin chi kit'in tanlhuncha iklak'ilhtuy. Kit'in iknajun li jant'u lay ak'int'imasunini li jak'iklak'a'inin li nt'u ilht'uyi yu lhinawkan. Chi kit'in chunchacha akpumasuniyan kijakiklaka'inti tacha an iklak'ilhtuycha tanlhun."
Uxint'i k'iklak'a'iya li wa pumatami Dios, oxich'a li ch'unch'a lay, pero an lakmakxkay'un wachu takiklaka'iy chi tajaxk'ip'ip'itnin.
Jantu wa tontojo k'a'unt'i, ch'i k'ak'ats'at'i li na'uni li jakiklaka'inin pero li nt'u ilht'uyi yu laj'oxi tanlhun, jantu tu'u lhitapalay.
An Dios la'a'ilhi an Abraham tacha oxi lapanak, yu tacha kimpayk'an xlila'ts'inaw, wa xliyu an Abraham lha'ulanalhi an ists'alh yu junkan Isaac, lha'ulananilhi an Dios.
Ch'away la'ts'incha an la xjatsukunti an Abraham li xjakiklaka'inin, pero wachu ixlak'ilhtuyi tanlhun tan ixputasuy, chi xliyu tacha an xlak'ilhtuycha, pus an ixjakiklaka'inti oxicha sawalhi walh.
Chunchacha sawalhi tapasalh an tan ts'o'muk'akanta tan najunta: "An Abraham kiklaka'ilhi an Dios, pus an Dios oxi lhiwilalh tacha an lalh an Abraham." "Chi an Abraham ix'amigojcha an Diosi junikalh."
Pus chaway uxitnan la'ts'inatcha li an Dios oxi lapanaki juniy li yu ilhtuyi tanlhun yu laj'oxi, jantu wa xliyu li jakiklaka'inincha.

Wanajcha chuni putapasalh an t'aku yu ixjunkan Rahab, yu wa aya ixlay. An Dios tacha yu oxicha aklat'ajun t'aku la'a'ilh wa xliyu li ilhtulhi yu oxi. Mu ani t'aku jaxta'nilhi tan katatawilh an yu xta'anta jalaklakawanin. Chi ja'a'tayjulhi li lakatamcha laka tiji katapu'ancho'olh.
Mu tacha an lakatunaj li ntu lhit'ajuni takuwin, nita, wanajcha chuni an jakiklaka'inti li ntu ilhtukaniy tanlhun yu laj'oxi, jantu tu'u lhitapalay.
Kint'ala'awnin, jantu wanajcha milhuk'ani k'a'unt'it yu k'ajamat'alaninint'it, mu k'ats'ayatcha li yu ijkamatalanininaw palay akintamama'alh'ajnikanani li ntu oxi ikmasuyaw.

Kinchuxk'ani lhuw ilhtuyaw tu'u yu ntu oxi, li xamati jantu k'is wa aya najun u ta'elh'o'xcho'oy akxni chiwiniy, yucha lapanakcha yu ts'awj sawalh t'ajun, chi yu chuncha, wachu layi lhistak'ojoy chux an ixlakatunaj para li ntu tu'u yu ntucha oxi ka'ilhtulh.
Akxni jamakilhtanuyaw ixfrenojk'an an kawayojnin para li lay kajamalhtanaw, chux an ixlakatunajk'an ilhtuyawi tani ilhtuputunawcha.

Ch'i k'alhak'ap'up'it wachu an barco; masi yucha wanaj laj'ay chi tacha an jatisamaj'an an un masi yu k'ut'ilh, pero an yu tamalhtanay talhi'ani watanchuncha talhik'uxa'an, walh chi wa lakat'ikt'i an yu tapumalhtanay.
Wanajcha chuni an sima'at yucha wa lakat'ikt'i, pero layi lak'ilhtuy laj'ay tanlhun. ¡La'atam lakat'ikt'i jikmi layi la'xaway ay lakaak'iwin!

Chi an sima'at yucha tacha jikmi, ancha minachalh ta tipachux yu alin tala'alhin an lakamunulhpa'. An sima'at la kilakatunajk'ani kintat'amala'xto'nikantan, pus kintalhkiliki'oyani chux la kilakatunajk'an. Chi an sima'at yucha an la'nini putakilhnuy chi makilhnu'ojoycha ta xlilhman an jatsukunti.
An lapanak layi ja'ilhtuy tani ja'ilhtuputuncha chux an xajatapakxat lakamunulhpa', yu tala'pa'achujlata chi an ts'apulin chi an yu tatajumanalh alamalh. Layi jamamansojlay an lapanak,
pero ntu xamati lay mamansojlay an sima'at. Yucha la'atam tu'u yu ntu oxi, yu ntu lhitamakajun li kamamansojlakalh chi wa stakcha lhit'ajuni yu lhinikan.
Lakisima'atk'an oxi lhichiwininaw an Dios, yu kimPayk'an, chi wanajcha yu xkayaj japujunaw an lapanakni yu yucha an Dios ja'ilhtulh tacha yucha junita.
Wa la'atam kinkilhnik'ani tan putaxtuy laj'oxi chiwinti chi xkayaj chiwinti. Kint'ala'awnin, jantu chun.
¿Chu sna layi tan taxtuy xkan kataxtulh yu sa'si chi kataxtupalh yu sun?

Tacha a'atam xak'iw higo jantu layi katitawk'anilh aceituna chi alhtam xasiwik uva jantu layi katitawk'anilh higo. Pus wanajcha chuni kint'ala'awnin, tan taxtuy xkan yu s'o'o jantu layi katitaxtulh yu sa'si.
