Yu lhit'ajuni ixpa'asmatna, ka'asmatlhicha yu an Takuwin jajuniy an tan tala'ta'ayxt'o'a an yu takiklaka'iy Dios.

Xli'astan akxni chunchacha ikla'ts'in'olh ijkalakawanalh ikla'ts'in la'atam malhticha yu lhti'ay, an lakt'iyan; chi yu p'ulhcha chiwinti ik'asmatlhi wa tacha wa pus'olhkalhcha kikst'ilhilh s'olh, kijuniy: Anicha k'at'awk'ach'it'a, walh lani akmasuniyancha an tanlhun yu wa kalaktapasayaka.
Wa akxni la xmakni an Takuwincha iktsukulh chi ikla'ts'ilhcha la'atam putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan an lakt'iyan, chi ancha sa'cha ixpuwilh tichiyucha.

Chi an yu ancha sa' ixwilh wa tacha an tasuycha jaspeje ixtasuy u tacha an tasuy an rubí, chi ixtuntala'acho'o an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan ixyalhcha la'atam ixkulhmakchat wa xlimjcha ixtasuy tacha la'atam esmeralda.

Chi ixtuntala'acho'o an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan a'ap'uxamt'at'i putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan wachu ixla'acho'owilhnilh; chi ijkala'ts'in an tan lakwilhcha putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan sa'cha ixtalakwilanalh pumap'uxamt'at'i tatanin wa la'sut'ut'ucha an ixla'ch'itk'an chi talaj'a'tanumanalhcha ixkoronajk'an de oro.

Chi an tan wilhcha an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan ixtaxtuyachilhcha jamakalipni chi xt'asaycha xalapanak xkan chi ixchiwinkan; chi lhilaxlakapu an tan wilh an yu puch'alhkatnankan ma'atujun k'iw yu lajkinkama'tajita ixtamapulhkuy, yu'uncha yucha an la'atujun xTakuwin Dios.

Chi lhilaxlakapu an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan ikla'ts'in wa tacha wa la'atamcha alamalh de vidrio, wa tacha de cristalhcha; chi wani an tan wilh an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan chi ixtuntala'acho'o, ixtawilanalh ixt'at'ink'an yu tala'ajunta, wa stakcha talhit'ajun ixla'chulhk'an la xlakapuk'an chi la x'a'lhch'ak'an.

An p'ulhnajcha tuchichun yu la'ajunta wa tacha la'atam lión, an xlila'at'uycha wa tacha wa la'atam becerro, an xlila'at'utucha wa tacha ix'ukxpu lapanaki lhit'ajun, chi an xlila'at'at'icha wa tacha wa la'atamcha ats'o'o yu jalht'ilitninta.

Chi la'atamincha an la'at'at'i tuchichun yu tala'ajunta talaklhit'ajun la'achaxanan ixpa'achujk'an, chi ixtuntala'acho'o chi ixlipulakni an ixpa'achujk'an wa stakcha lakwilhnilh la'chulh chi ntu sa' ixtakilhuni tunku chi puts'ista. Ixtanajun: Stalan'a, stalan'a, stalan'a an Jamach'alhkat Dios, yu lay ilhtu'u'ojoy chux an tanlhun. Yucha ixjunita, chi yu yucha chaway chi yu kaminaka'.

Chi an la'at'at'i tuchichun yu tala'ajunta, a'tamin a'tamin ixtanajuni li ayi an yu sa' xwilh la xpuch'alhkatna an yu ixpujun'alhincha li t'ajun chi yu'uncha xtalhiwilay chi xtaxta'niy lhimala'puchajun.

Akxni chuncha ixta'ilhtuy, an ixpumap'uxamt'at'ik'an tatanin ixtatatso'ottanicha la x'ukxlakapu an yu sa' xwilh laka putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan, chi ixtala'ts'incha li yucha ayi an yu ixpujun'alhincha li t'ajun, chi ixtamaka'ancha an ixkoronajk'an la xlakapu an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan. Chi ixtanajun:
Jamach'alhkat, uxint'i t'ach'ip'ini li ayi k'ala'ts'ink'a ch'i li k'alhiwilak'a ch'i li k'ach'alhk'atna, mu uxint'iy yu lak'ilht'u chux an tanlhun chi la mintalakask'i li lak'alin chi li ilhtukalh.
Chi an yu sa'cha ixwilh laka putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan ikma'la'ts'in an tan lhi'oxi ixmaka ixch'apata la'atam libro, ta'ukxput'uyi ts'o'kanta chi lakatujuni oxi ixch'axpach'ikanta an libro.
Chi ikla'ts'ilh pumatam angelh yu k'ut'ilh yu p'as ixnajun: "¿Tisiyuchacha yu t'acha'an li lay kapux'otlhi an libro chi li kach'axpax'otmaj'alh an la'atujun yu puch'axpach'ikanta?"
Pero nin an lakt'iyan nin an lakaat'un nin an ixtan'api an lakaat'un, jantu xamati lay ixpux'ot'a an libro chi ntu layi masi wa katala'ts'ilhcha.
Chi kit'in sawalhcha xak'alhun, mu ntu xamati ixla'cha'ankan yu t'acha'an kapux'otlhi an libro chi li lay kapunawlh chi li lay kala'ts'ilh.

Pero xapumatam an tatanin kijuniy: "Jant'u k'a'alhu, mu an lión yu minchalh la xt'alalhila'ts'inin an Judá, yu ixjataxiyak an David, yucha lhajatachalhcha, para li lay kapux'otlhi an libro chi li lay kala'ch'axpax'otmaj'alh an la'atujun yu puch'axpach'ikanta."

Wachuncha ijkalakawanalh chi ikla'ts'in ixtan'ajnichak'an an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan, chi an ixt'at'ink'an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta, chi an laktatanin, ixyalh la'atam jas'at'a borrego, tacha wa ixma'nikantacha ixtasuy. Chi la'atujun ix'a'alo'oti ixlhit'ajun chi la'atujun ixla'chulh, yucha nawputun an la'atujun takuwin yu ixnawin an Dios yu jamala'achakanta ta ixlijalhi'ay an lakaat'un.
An borrego stalh la'alhi an yu sa' ixwilh laka putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan chi ma'lhtaylhcha an libro an yu sa' ixch'apata tan lhi'oxi ixmaka'.

Chi akxni jama'lhtayanalhcha an libro, an ixt'at'ink'an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta chi an ixpumap'uxamt'at'ik'an tatanin tatatso'ottalhcha la xlakapu an borrego. Si ixtalaklhit'ajun x'arpajk'an chi si ixtalaklhi'anta copa de oro ixlaj'a'tsamanta cencia, yucha jumputun an ixtapaynitk'an an yu takiklaka'iy Dios,

chi ixtalakmilhpaycha la'atam sast'i milhpat. Ixtanajun: Uxint'i t'ach'ip'ini li k'ajama'lht'ayani an libro. Ch'i li k'ala'x'otnini an yu puch'axpach'ikanta. Mu uxint'i ma'nik'a chi an la mijak'alhni jama'alht'axt'ut'i an lapanakni para li ixnawin Diosi katawalh, ta kilhmakchux ta'alin an lapanakni, ta kilhmakchux chiwinti, ta kilhmakchux la'acha'an chi ta kilhmakchux lhich'alhkat.
Ja'ilht'u li ixrejnin an kiDiosk'ani katawalh chi isacerdotejnin chi li katach'alhkatnalhi ani ix'ukxni lakaat'un.

Chi iklaka'ampalh, wanaj lhuw angelhnini ijka'alha'asmatlhi, xtuntala'acho'ochak'an an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan chi an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta chi an laktatanincha ixtayanalh. Lhuw tukani ixtayanalh, wanaj la'alhuw millón.

Chi p'asi ixtachiwiniy ixtanajun: ¡An borrego an yu ma'nikalh t'acha'ani li kala'a'ilhi an lhich'alhkat, chi an tanlhun yu laj'oxi, chi an jatapast'ak'at, chi an tachaput, chi li kalhila'sikalh, chi li ayi kala'ts'inkalh chi kamilhpanikalh!

Chi chux yu ilhtukanta yu alinachalh an lakt'iyan, chi ix'ukxni an lakaat'un, chi ixtan'api an lakaat'un, chi an alamalh, chi chux yu ancha lak'alin, ik'asmat'a ixtanajun: ¡An yu wilh laka putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan, chi an jas'at'a borrego, kajamilhpanikalh, kajalhila'sikalh, chi ayi kajala'ts'inkalh chi ixpujun'alhincha katach'alhkatnalh!

An ixt'at'ink'an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta ixtanajun: "Chunchacha kawalh". Chi an ixpumap'uxamt'at'ik'an tatanin tatatso'ottanilhcha chi tatamuntitanilhcha, chi tala'ts'ilhcha li yucha ayi an yu ixpujun'alhincha li t'ajun.

Ikla'ts'ini akxni an jas'at'a Borrego exnilhcha ma'atami an ma'atujun yu puch'axpach'ikanta an libro, chi xapumatam an ixt'at'ink'an an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta ik'asmat'a tacha wa t'asaycha xalapanak xkan, najun: ¡K'at'at'i chi k'ala'ts'i!

Sa'cha ikla'ts'in, ikla'ts'in la'atam sut'ut'u kawayo, an yu ixpu'uk'alh ixli'anta la'atam pulhk'awilh ixpatipni, chi xta'nikalhcha la'atam corona, lhajatachalhcha taxtunilh para li alicha kalhajachalh.
Akxni exnilhcha yu xlima'at'uycha an yu puch'axpach'ikanta libro an jas'at'a Borrego, ik'alha'asmat'a an yu xlipumat'uycha tuchichun yu tala'ajunta, najun: "¡K'at'at'icha chi k'ala'ts'icha!"

A'tam ikla'ts'impalh la'atam kawayo, slapulh, chi an yu ixpu'uk'alh xta'nikalh lhich'alhkat para li layi kama'osulh an oxi jatawlhnat an lakaat'un chi li katalama'nipaxalhi an lapanakni, chi xta'nikalhcha ma'atam lhman espada.

Akxni xlima'at'utucha exnilh an jas'at'a Borrego an yu puch'axpach'ikanta libro, ik'alha'asmat'a an yu xlipumat'utuchak'an an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta, najun: "¡K'at'at'icha chi k'ala'ts'icha!" Pus sa'cha iklaka'an chi ikla'ts'ilhcha la'atam ts'iti kawayo, an yu ixpu'uk'alh ixch'apata la'atam pama'ch'ixni.

Chi ixtan'ajnik'an an ixt'at'ink'an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta ik'asmat'a nawkan: "Tam kilo trigo tamcha wilhchan xatapatsat, chi la'at'utu kilo cebada tamcha wilhchan xatapatsat; pero an aceite chi an jamaskajanti xaxkan uva jantu kamin'olh."
Akxni xlima'at'at'icha exli an yu puch'axpach'ikanta libro an jas'at'a Borrego ik'alha'asmat'a an yu xlipumat'at'ichak'an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta, najun: "¡K'at'at'icha chi k'ala'ts'icha!"

Sa'cha ikla'ts'in, ikla'ts'in la'atam x'awaw kawayo chi an yu ixpu'uk'alh, lhinin ixjunkan, chi an la'nin ixch'a'o'atacha, chi jamakawnikalhcha para li an cuarta parte tacha an wilakalh an lakaat'un katajama'ninilh laka espada chi laka chawan chi laka ta'an'at chi laka an ma'tilin yu ta'alin an lakaat'un.

Akxni an jas'at'a Borrego exlicha an yu xlima'akisicha yu puch'axpach'ikanta an libro, an ixtan'api an tan ja'ulanankan ijkala'ts'incha an ixtakuwink'an an yu jalhima'nikanta an ixchiwinti Dios chi ixlakata li sawalhi tacha an ixtanajun.

P'ascha ixtachiwiniy ixtanajun: "Jamach'alhkat, yu stalan'a, chi yu sawalh, ¿sta tasu wanancha wa k'at'ip'akxaniya'a para li k'aja'uncha li oxi u jantu tani talaycha an yu tawilanalh an lakaat'un ch'i k'ajalhich'it'icha an kijak'alhnik'ani?"

Wachuncha jala'xta'nikalhcha la'sut'ut'u ixla'ch'itk'an chi jajunkan li katapakxampalhka lakats'uni panch'e'ex, sta li katata'a'tsalhcha an ixt'ala'ajunk'an yu wachu chun kajalhima'nikana tacha yu'uncha jalhima'nikalh ixlakata li tat'atapatsay an Dios.

Akxni an jas'at'a Borrego exlicha an ixlima'achaxancha yu puch'axpach'ikanta an libro, ikla'ts'in p'as tukani laklalh an lakaat'un, an wilhchan wa ts'iticha walh, tacha wa la'ch'itcha yu pu'ankan tan nikanta, chi an malhkuyu wa slapulhcha walh, tacha wa jak'alhnicha.
Chi an st'akunin tapatajulhcha an lakt'iyan, an lakaat'uncha tatamachalh, tacha akxni an tapatajuy an higo yu la'st'a'awka la xak'iw, akxni p'as lak'anuy an un.
An lakt'iyan la'mixlicha, tacha akxni a'xtam jalhiki pasmilhkan, chi chux an a'stitawk'a chi chux an lakaat'un yu la'atanchanu'ojota xkan tatalaklakapaxatawilhi an tan ixtawilanalh.

Chi an xarejnin aniy lakaat'un chi an xalaj'ajin lapanakni, chi an yu jamatuminin chi an xalaj'ajin soldadojnin chi an yu wa talhinajuncha an lapanakni aniy lakaamunulhpa chi chux yu wa ma'tsukucha chi yu jantu, tala'tats'e'lhicha an tan la'tan'apilho'o'o lakaat'un chi tan lakpujawilh laj'ay chiwx an laj'a'stitawk'a.

Chi ixtajunicha an laj'a'stitawk'a chi an laj'ay chiwx: "Akila'a'lhtants'iwcha chi akilamats'e'wicha, para li ntucha akintala'ts'ini an yu wilh tan ch'alhkatnan chi ntucha akla'ts'iwi ixtalh'amti an jas'at'a Borrego.
Mu chaway chilhcha an ay wilhchan yu pujamama'alh'ajninin; ¿tisiyuchacha lay kalhitayaniya'a?"

Xli'astan ijkala'ts'ilhcha ixt'at'ink'an angelhnin sa'cha ixtayanalh an tama'ats'astut'at'i lakaat'un, ixtasast'uk'acha an la'at'at'i un yu alin aniy lakaat'un, para li ntu k'is kalalhi un an la x'ukxni lakaat'un chi an la x'ukxni alamalh chi masi wa a'atamcha k'iw kasunulh.

Chi wachu ikla'ts'impalh pumatam angelh yu tach'ixchalh an tan akxajachilh wilhchan, chi ixlit'ajuncha an iseyo an Dios yu la'ajunta. Chi p'ascha jaxa'alalh an ixt'at'ink'an angelhnin, an yu ixjaxta'nikantacha lhich'alhkat li layi katalakt'ilhilh an lakaat'un chi an alamalh.
Jajuniy: "Jant'uk'a' k'alhit'ama'ch'ap'ut'iti an lakaat'un chi an alamalh chi an lakaak'iwin, sta akxni kajamuntiseyojla'oyawcha an yu tat'atapatsay kiDiosk'an."
Chi ik'asmatlhicha tani ixpumachuxchak'ani an yu jaseyojlakalh: 144.000 yu jaseyojlakalh, ta kilhmakchux an ixjas'at'an an Israelhi jasakxtukalh.

An yu yucha an Judá tapu'a'p'unminchalh, la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh. An yu yucha an Rubén tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh. An yu Gad, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uy milh lapanaknicha jaseyojlakalh.

An yu Aser, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uy milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh. An yu Neftalí, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh. An yu Manasés, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh.

An yu Siméon, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh. An yu Leví, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh. An yu Isacar, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh.

An yu Zabulón, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh. An yu José, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh chi an yu Benjamín, tapu'a'p'unminchalh la'akawt'uycha milh lapanakni jaseyojlakalh.

Chunchacha ikla'ts'in'olh, xli'astan ikla'ts'in wanaj lhilhuw sawalhi lakyakalh, yu ntu xamati lay put'e'e, tan ixtalakmintachalh an lapanakni ta lakachux laj'ay la'acha'anaxni, chi ta kilhmakchux an lapanakni ta'alin, chi chux la'acha'anaxni chi ta kilhmakchux chiwinti alin, an la xlakapucha an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankani ixtayanalh chi tan an ixyalh an jas'at'a Borrego, wa la'sut'ut'ucha ixtala'mala'ch'ininta, chi ixtalakch'apatacha jap'ach'i.
Chi p'ascha ixtalaknajun: An Dios, yu wilh laka putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan chi an Jas'at'aa Borrego, yu'uncha kintama'alhtaxtuyan.

Chi ixchuxk'an an angelhnin ixtalakyanalhcha ixtuntala'acho'o an tan ixwilh putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan, chi an tan ixtalakwilanalh tatanin chi an tan ixtawilanalh an ixt'at'ink'an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta; chi tatatso'o'talhcha la xlakapu an tan wilh putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan chi tatamuntitachalhcha lakaat'un, ayi tala'ts'ilh an Dios.

Ixtalaknajun: Chunchacha kawalh. An tanlhuncha an yu laj'oxi xt'a'a an Dios chi an ta'ayaxtu chi an jatapast'ak'at chi an lhimala'puchajun chi an jalhila'sinti chi an lhich'alhkat chi an alhp'asninti ix'anucha an kiDiosk'ani kawalh yu ixpujun'alhincha. Chunchacha kawalh.
Wachuncha xapumatam an tatanin chiwinilh, kijuniy: "Aniy yu tala'la'ch'ita la'sut'ut'u ixla'ch'itk'an ¿tisi yu'unchacha chi tanischa talakmintachalhi?"

Kit'in ijkuniy: "Uxint'i k'atsay, kit'in tu ijk'atsay." Yucha kijuniy: "Aniy yu'uncha yu taminchalh laka ay lhima'alh'ajna, chi tach'a'atacha ixla'ch'itk'an chi talasut'ut'utacha la ixjak'alhni an jas'at'a Borrego."

Xliyuchacha li la ixlakapucha an tan wilh putawlan yu puch'alhkatnan Diosi tat'ajun, chi tunku chi ts'isi tatapatsanicha an la xtajtan; chi an yu wilh an laka putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan kajalhi'a'tayjuya mu ancha t'ajun.
Jantucha katitama'alh'ajnalhi laka chawan chi laka kikxixat. Chi ntucha ali katita'ichilhi laka wilhchan chi ntucha ali katitalhakalh.
Mu an jas'at'a Borrego an yu wilh laka puch'alhkatna yuchacha kajalhist'ak'a chi kajalhi'ana tan taxtuta xkan yu xt'a'a jatsukunti; chi an Dios kajalakpuxakamaj'an'oya chux ix'alhutk'an yu'uncha.
Akxni exnilhcha an jas'at'a Borrego yu xlima'atujuncha xpuch'axpach'ikanta an libro, wanaj sa' jun'olhi an lakt'iyan, katacha paytat hora,
Chi ijkala'ts'in an ixpumatujunk'an angelhnin yu ixtayanalh la ix'ukxlakapu an Dios jaxta'nikalhcha ma'atujun s'olh.

Wachuncha mimpalh pumatam angelh chi tayalhcha la xlakapu an tan ma'axtakan lha'ulan, ixch'apata la'atam pamala'ap'uwan de oro, chi wanajcha lhuw cenciaja xta'nikalh para li kat'ala'maka'alhcha an ixtapaynitk'an ixchuxk'an an yu takiklaka'iy Dios, la xlakapucha an yu de oro tan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan yu ixyalh an tan wilh putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan.
La xmakacha an angelhi tach'ixli an xajin an cencia la x'ukxlakapucha an Diosi alh, t'a'antacha wachu an ixtapaynitk'an an yu takiklaka'iy Dios.

Chi an angelh xa'a'ilhi an pamala'ap'uwan, chi la'tsamalhcha jikmi, xajikmi an tan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan, chi warrarracha maka'alhi an lakaat'un; chi stakcha t'asalh xalapanak xkan, chi stakcha ixlakt'asakan chi stakcha jamakalipnilh chi laklalhcha an lakaat'un.
Wachuncha an xpumatujunk'an angelhnin an yu ixtalhit'ajun ma'atujun s'olh tala'asijlhicha para li katas'olacha.

Pus an yu p'ulhnajcha angelh pus'olilhcha an s'olh, walh maka'ankalhcha an lakaat'un wa tacha chaj'it chi jikmi yu lhiyawkanta jak'alhni, chi an tercera parte tacha an lakyalh an k'iw wanaj la'xaw'olh chi chux an la'st'a'aw jach'itin.
Xlipumat'uycha an angelh s'olilh an la'is'olh, wa tacha wa la'atamcha ay a'stitawk'a yu ma'tajita laka jikmi maka'ankalh an alamalh, chi an tercera parte an alamalh jak'alhnicha walh.
Chi tanilhi an tercera parte yu ancha tala'ajunta an alamalh, chi tercera parte tacha an alin barco wanaj lakt'ilhi'okalh wachu'.

Akxni xlipumat'at'icha an angelh s'olilh an laka s'olh, patajuchalh an lakt'iyan la'atam aya st'aku, wa lamamacha ixma'tajita tacha wa kinkama'tajitacha ma'atam k'iw, chi tajuchalhcha tercera parte tacha an lak'alin ayxkan chi tan an laktaxtuta xkan.
An st'aku ixjunkan suninti, pus an tercera parte an xkan wanaj suni jun'olh, pus wanaj lhuw lapanakni talhinilh an sun xkan.

Akxni an xlipumat'at'icha angelh s'olilh an la is'olh, an tercera parte an wilhchan taputs'isilhcha, chi an tercera parte an malhkuyu', chi an tercera parte tacha an alin an st'aku, para li ntucha ka'alilhi jatapulhkunu tercera parte akxni tunku chi akxni puts'ista.

Chi iklaka'an, ik'asmat'acha jalht'ilitnin la'atam ats'o'o la xtan'ajni an lakt'iyan, p'asi ixnajun: "¡Payni'incha, payni'incha, payni'incha an yu tawilanalh lakaat'un, ixlakata an ali yu katas'olaka laka s'olh an xt'utunk'an angelhnin!"

An xlipumakisicha angelh pus'olilhcha an s'olh, chi ikla'ts'in an lakt'iyan patajulh la'atam st'aku, an lakaat'uncha tamachilh, chi xta'nikalhcha an xayave an xamalhticha an tan tu inta kimaktay xliputalhman.
Chi mati'alhcha an tan tu inta kimaktay xliputalhman, walh ancha takutchilhcha jin tacha lakatam laka aya horno; pus an xajin wanaj maputs'isi'olhi an wilhchan chi an un.
Chi an laka jin tataxtuchilhcha wa tacha sele', lakaat'uncha tatayachilh, chi ja'ilhtukalhcha li tacha an kululhcha yu ta'alin aniy lakaat'uni xlilaj'alhp'as katawalh.

Jajunkan li ntu tani kata'ilhtulh an jach'itin chi an k'iw yu alin aniy lakaat'un, chi watuchicha yu st'a'aw, jajunkan li wa yucha an lapanakni katalhitama'chapulh yu an tu tu'u tamuntiwilanalh an iseyo Dios.
Chi jajunkan li ntu katama'nilhi an lapanakni, jajunkan li wa lhilakatijtamcha katamama'alh'ajnilh, la'akisi malhkuyu', an ixmakxkayaxtuk'an tacha an tajats'ak'anan an kululh.
Chi anchunu panch'e'ex an lapanakni katapuxkawya an lhinin, pero ntu katitala'cha'alh, akxni katalakniputuna', pero an lhinin kajalaj'osa'.

An sele'nin wa tacha kawayojnincha yu jala'mala'asijnikantacha para li ka'ankanacha japulasaka laka guerraja ixtatasuy. An la xlaj'a'tsulhk'an ixtalaklhi'anta wa tacha corona yu de oro. Chi an ix'ukxpuk'an wa tacha wa ix'ukxpuchak'an lapanakni xtatasuy,
an ix'ayk'an wa tacha wa ix'aycha t'aku ixtalhit'ajun, chi an ixtatsalatk'an wa tacha ixtatsalatcha lioni ixtalhit'ajun,

an la ixlakatunajk'an ixtalaklakatanumanalhcha yu ixtapamatanchanan, wa tacha de tsasnat; an ixpa'achujk'an wa tacha wa lhuwcha kawayo yu jalaktich'imuk'akanta karretaj yu talakats'alaj'ancha tan katalasayacha ixmakat'ajun.
An ix'istajk'an wa tacha wa ix'istajchak'an kululhi ixtasuy chi ixtalhit'ajun ixpats'ak'ank'an, an la x'istajchak'ani ixtapulhitama'chapuy an lapanakni la'akisi malhkuyu'.
Yu ixrejchak'an ani tacha sele'nin, yucha an xa'angelh tan tu inta kimaktay xliputalhman, lhihebreo junkan Abadón chi lhigriego Apolión.
La'puslicha yu p'ulhnaj lhima'alh'ajna, pero ts'an'apalayka la'at'uy.
An xlipumachaxancha angelh s'olilhcha an la'is'olh, chi ik'asmatlhi chiwinkalhcha an tan lakyanilh la'at'at'i ix'a'alo'ot an tan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan, yu ixyalh la ix'ukxlakapu an Dios.
Junkan an xlipumachaxancha angelh an yu ixlhit'ajun an s'olh: "K'ajax'ott'icha an xt'at'ink'an angelhnin yu jach'iyawkanta wani an tan yu ay tukan ayxkan yu junkan Éufrates."

Pus jax'otkalhcha an xt'at'ink'an angelhnin, para li katajama'ninilhcha tercera parte tacha an t'awkan, mu yu'uncha wa para yuchacha ixjalhila'sikanta anchunu panch'e'ex, anchunu wilhchan, chi anchunu malhkuyu, chi anchuchunu k'ata.
Chi ik'asmatlhi tani ixpumachuxchak'ani an soldadojnin yu xtapu'uk'analh an ixkawayojk'an: doscientos millones.

Laka la'puminatnat chunchuniya ijkala'ts'ilh an kawayojnin chi an yu xtapu'uk'analh. An yu xtapu'uk'analh an kawayojnin ixtalaktankilhak'uk'analh yu tapamatanchanan, wa la'slapulhcha, wa tacha de jikmicha, chi wa lak'azulhcha chi wa la'x'awawcha tacha an azufre. Chi an kawayojnin wa tacha wa ix'a'tsulhchak'an leoni ixtalhit'ajun chi an la xkilhnik'an ixtalajkilhtaxtuycha jikmi chi jin chi azufre.
An lapanakni tacha ani t'awkan lakaamunulhpa, tercera parteje laknikalh, ixlakata ani tipat'utu tuchichun yu ixtakilhtaxtuy an kawayojnin, an jikmi chi an jin chi an azufre.

An ix'alhp'asnintik'an an kawayojnin an la xkilhnik'an chi an la x'istajk'ani ixtalhit'ajun; an ix'istajk'an wa tacha tsapulincha ixtajuninita, ixtalhit'ajun ix'a'tsulhk'an chi yuchacha ixtajapulhitama'chapunun.

Chi an ali'in lapanakni yu ntu tapunilh an tanlhun lhima'alh'ajna, masi chuncha, jantu tamakawlhi tacha an ta'ilhtuy tanlhun yu ntu oxi. Chi ntu tamakawlhi li tatatso'ottani an lakmakxkay'un chi li tatatso'ottani an tanlhun jala'la'oxinti yu de oro chi de plata chi de bronce chi de chiwx chi de k'iw yu tacha ixdioschak'an tala'ts'in yu ntu lay tajalakawanan chi ntu taja'asmatnan chi ntu lay tajalhtanan.
Chi ntu tamakawlhi ixjama'nintik'an chi ixpujachawanak'an chi ali wa aya xtalat'atamayi masi yu ntu talat'at'ajun chi ali ixtaja'alhawanan.

Ikla'ts'impalay ta'alhtajupalh pumatam yu k'ut'ilh angelhi an lakt'iyan, ixla'atanchanu'ojota la'atam jataputs'i an la x'a'tsulh, ix'ukxyalh la'atam ixkulhmakchat chi an ix'ukxpu wa tacha an wilhchancha, chi an ixlakch'aja wa tacha wa lam lamcha la'ma'tayyalh jikmi.
Ixch'apata la'atam lakat'ikt'i libro tapux'otta; chi an yu oxi ixch'aja an alamalhcha tach'anjuchalh chi an ixch'anjama'xi an lakaat'uncha tach'atalh;
chi p'ascha t'asalh tacha t'asay la'atam lión, chi akxni t'asalhcha, la'atujun xalapanak xkan wachu tachiwinilh.

Akxni tachiwin'olhcha an la'atujun xalapanak xkan, kit'in xakts'o'ulaputun, pero ik'asmatlhi la'atam chiwinti an lakt'iyan yu kijuniy: "Wa sa' k'ama'at'i an yu tanawlh an la'atujun xalapanak xkan, jant'u k'ats'o'ulat'i."
Wachuncha an angelh an yu ikla'ts'ilh ixch'atayachalh la x'ukxni an alamalh chi an lakaat'un, tamakch'ixlicha an lakt'iyan,
chi pujurarnalhcha an yu ixpujun'alhincha li t'ajun, an yu ilhtulh an lakt'iyan chi an lakaat'un chi an alamalh chi chux yu ancha lak'alin. Najun: "Jantucha ali kati'alilhi panch'e'ex,

akxni kachinacha panch'e'ex akxni an yu xlipumatujuncha angelh ka'a'tayniyacha kas'ola an la'is'olh, kajunacha tacha an najun an Dios, tacha yucha jamak'atsaanilh an yu ixtat'atapatsay, an yu ixtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios."

An chiwinti yu ik'asmatlhi an lakt'iyan a'tam kixa'alapalh chi kijuniy: "K'ap'inchi chi k'ama'lht'aycha an lakat'ikt'i libro yu tapux'otta an la xmaka an angelh, yu ch'atay la x'ukxni an alamalh chi an lakaat'un."

Pus ikla'alhcha an angelh chi ijkunicha li akixta'nilhi an lakat'ikt'i libro. Yucha kijuniy: "Ni'ijcha chi k'a'ut'icha; la minkilhni wa sa'sicha k'ak'ilhk'ats'aya'a, pero la mimpalakni wa suncha kajunanta."
Ikma'lhtaylhcha an lakat'ikt'i libro an angelh chi ik'ulhcha, wa sa'sicha ijkilhk'atsalh lakinkilhni tacha t'axkat, pero akxni ik'ulhcha wa suncha junchalh la kimpalakni.

Chi kijunkan: "Task'iniya li a'tam k'alhich'iwimp'alhi an ixchiwinti Dios lakalhuw la'acha'anaxni, chi tan laj'ay la'acha'anaxni ch'i k'ajalhixa'alat'i an lapanakni ta lakachux alin an tipaspit chiwinti chi an laj'ay jamach'alhkatni." Xt'uyunk'an yu talhichiwniy ixchiwinti Dios

Wachuncha kixta'nikalh ma'atam ch'ankat wa tacha ma'atam makat'ikt'i k'iw yu palhkan, chi kijunkan: "K'a'ost'aycha chi k'alhk'at'icha an ixtajtan an Dios, chi an tan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan chi k'ajap'ut'e'echa an yu ancha ay tala'ts'in an Dios.

Pero an tan wa jalhi'ay junita an lhima'spa an laka tajtan anch'a nt'u k'alhk'at'i, mu ancha jama'axta'nikantacha an yu ntu tajakiklaka'inin, yu'uncha kata'akch'intamaya an stalan'a la'acha'an 42 malhkuyu'.

Chi kit'in ajkamak'ana xt'uyunk'an yu oxi akintalhichiwinina yu tala'mala'ch'ininta laka laklhwat'aka la'ch'it, yu'uncha katajamak'atsaaninina yu najun an Dios li katapasaya', 1260 wilhchani katajamak'atsaaninina'."
Ani ixt'uyunk'an lapanakni yu oxi akintalhichiwinina yu'uncha tacha a'at'uy olivo chi ma'at'uy ixputawk'an maklhku yu tayanalh la ix'ukxlakapu an xaJamach'alhkat lakaat'un.
Li xamati ta ja'ilhtuputun, yu'uncha takilhtaxtuy jikmi chi wanaj tala'xawa'ojoyi yu wa jaxkaji; chuncha kapuniya yu wa ta ja'ilhtuputun.

Ani pumat'uy yu oxi kintalhichiwiniy jaxta'nikanta lhich'alhkat li lay katamalaklhchawlh an lakt'iyan para li ntu kalalhi xkan akxni tajamak'atsaaninint'ajun an yu najun an Dios li katapasaya', chi layi ta'ilhtuy li an xkan jak'alhni kawalh, chi talhit'ajuni lhich'alhkat para li katamak'atsanilhi an lakaat'un laka laktanlhun lhima'alh'ajna, wa ta a'chuxcha chuncha ta'ilhtuputun.
Akxni katalhichiwin'oyacha yu katalhichiwinina, an ma'tili yu kaminanta an tan tu inta kilhimaktay xliputalhman kajat'alasayacha chi kajalhajaya chi kajama'niya'.
An ixlakatunajk'an an tan jalhi'ay junita an tan ay la'acha'ani katatamaya', tan wa kapulhimacha'xakalhcha junikalh li Sodoma chi Egipto, tan wachu tamakxtukmuk'alh laka cruz an kiJamach'alhkatk'an.

Chi an lapanakni yu tanlayjcha katalakminanta la'acha'anaxni ta kilhmakchux, chi tipaspitcha chiwinti, kata'a'la'ts'imayacha an ixlakatunajk'an, la'at'utu wilhchan apaytat chi ntu katitamakawlhi li kajamaknukalh.

An yu tawilanalh aniy lakaat'un sawalhcha katalhilaj'achana li jama'nikalhcha, katalala'xta'nipaxayacha yu laj'oxi tu'u'; wa xliyu ani xt'uyunk'an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios sawalhcha ixtajamama'alh'ajninini ixtalhiwilay an yu ani tawilanalh lakaat'un.
Pero xli'astan an xlila'at'utucha wilhchan apaytat, an Dios japutamaknucho'olhi takuwin yu xt'a'a jatsukunti chi tatayacho'olhcha, chi an yu tala'ts'ilh sawalhcha talaktalhanalh.

Wachuncha an xt'uyunk'an yu oxi talhichiwiniy an Dios an lakt'iyan p'asi ta'asmatlhi chiwinkalh, jajunkan: "¡Anicha k'at'awk'ach'it'at!" Pus ta'alhcha an lakt'iyan, laka la'atam jataputs'i, chi an yu wa ixtajaxkayanan tala'ts'in.

Wa akxni p'asi laklalh an lakaat'un chi décima parte an ay la'acha'ani talakpujlhi chi la'atujun milh lapanakni tanilh ixlakata li laklalh an lakaat'un. An yu ntu tanilh sawalhcha talaktalhanalh, chi talaknawlhi li an Dios yu wilhchalh anu lakt'iyan yucha ay.
La'puslicha an xlitipat'uy lhima'alh'ajna, pero mimpalatacha watukani an xlitipat'utu.

An xlipumatujuncha angelh s'olilhcha an la is'olh, walh wachuncha p'asi chiwinkalh an lakt'iyan, nawkan: "An lhich'alhkat aniy lakaamunulhpa ix'anucha an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Dios chi ix'anucha wachu an ixCristo, chi yuchacha ixpujun'alhincha kajuna kach'alhkatnana'."
Chi an xpumap'uxamt'at'ik'an tatanin yu ixtawilanalh la xputawlank'an yu tapuch'alhkatnan la xlakapu an Dios, tatatso'ottalhcha chi tatamuntitachalhcha, chi aycha tala'ts'ilh an Dios.

Ixtanajun: Iklaxta'niyaw lhimala'puchajuni Jamach'alhkat Dios, uxint'i yu lay ilht'u'o'oy chux tanlhun. Yu uxint'ik'at'i chi uxint'i ix'unit'a chi yu k'at'ana'a, mu la'a'it'icha an ay milhich'alhkat chi ch'alhk'atnancha.

An laj'ay la'acha'anaxni tala'talh'amancha, pero chilhcha ixpaku mintalh'amti chi chilhcha xapanch'e'ex li k'aja'una'acha li oxi u jantu tani ixtat'ajuncha an yu chaway janinincha. Chi k'ajaxt'a'niya'acha yu talhajaxtulh an yu ixtat'atapatsayan yu ixtanajun minchiwinti yu katapasaya', chi an yu takiklaka'iyan, chi yu talhiwilay an minta'a'ut, chi yu laj'ajin, chi lakt'ikt'in, chi k'ajama'niya'acha an yu wa talakt'ilhi aniy lakaat'un.

Wachuncha talhti'alhcha an ixtajtan an Dios awint'i lakt'iyan, chi an la xtajtan ixtasuycha an caja yu pumujuta an xchiwinti yu japut'atamakawlh an ixlapanakni. Chi stakcha jamakalipnilh, chi xlakchiwinkancha, chi xtat'asaycha xalapanak xkan, chi laklalhcha an lakaat'un chi p'ascha tukani patajulh chaj'it.
An lakt'iyan talakasulh ay tuchichun: pumatam t'aku ixla'axt'a'ojotacha an wilhchan chi ixpuch'ataycha an malhkuyu', chi ix'a'tanuncha la'atam ixkorona yu wilhnilh la'akawt'uy st'aku.
An t'aku ixja'aynanta chi ixt'asaycha mu ixkaniycha, chi ixma'alh'ajnancha li kajamas'at'ananacha.

Wachuncha, a'tam talakasupalh la'atam tuchichuni an lakt'iyan: la'atam aya tsapulh, slapulh, la'atujun ix'a'tsulhi ixlhit'ajun chi ma'akawcha ix'a'a'lo'ot chi lakatamincha an la x'a'tsulh ixlak'ukwilhcha la'atamin korona.

Chi an la x'istaj japuxo'p'uxli an tercera parte an st'aku an lakt'iyan, chi an lakaat'uncha jamaka'alh. Akxni kalhitsukuyacha ixjas'at'a an t'aku, an aya tsapulh la xlakapucha an t'aku tayanilh, para li tacha katsukuya an ixjas'at'a kat'olo'nikanacha.

Wachuncha an t'aku lhitsukulhcha ixjas'at'a, ts'alh, yucha yu kach'alhkatnana chux an la'acha'anaxni laka ma'atam tsasnat. Pero an ists'alh an t'aku ma'osunikalh, lhi'anikalhcha la ix'ukxlakapu an Dios tan ch'alhkatnan.
Chi an t'aku os'alhcha tan wa jasa'nik'a, tan an Dios ixmala'asijninita tan katawilh, para li anchacha kaxta'nikalh yu ka'ulh 1260 wilhchan.
Xli'astan lasakalhcha an lakt'iyan: an Miguel chi an ix'angelhnin tat'alasalhcha an aya tsapulh. An aya tsapulh chi an ix'angelhnin tajat'alasanalhcha,
pero ntu lay talhajachalh, chi ntucha lay tatawlhchalhi an lakt'iyan.

Pus an aya tsapulh tamakxtukanchalhcha, yu jumpalhkan ma'aniya tsapulh chi jumpalhkan xapay makxkay'un u satanás yu ja'o'xcho'onun chux an lakaamunulhpa'. Ani xapay makxkay'un chi an ix'angelhnin warrarracha jat'at'alhtamaj'okalhi an lakaat'un.

Wachuncha p'asi ik'asmatlhi chiwinkalh an lakt'iyan, nawkan: Chaway chilhcha an jama'alhtaxtunti chi an alhp'asninti chi an ixlich'alhkat an kiDiosk'an chi an xlich'alhkat an ixCristo, mu chaway maka'ankalhcha ma'spa an yu ixja'alhtasuy an kijat'ala'awnink'an, yu ixja'alhtasuy la ix'ukxlakapu an kiDiosk'an ts'isi chi tunku.
An kijat'ala'awnink'an tapulhajalhi an ja'alhtasunu la xjak'alhni an Borrego chi an laka chiwinti yu yu'uncha tajamak'atsaaninilh; tala'amaj'alhi ixjatsukuntik'an sta tanilh.

Pus chaway k'a'ach'acha lakt'iyan chi yu anch'a wilhchi'it. ¡Pero payni'incha an yu lakaat'un tawilanalh chi an yu alamalh tatajumanalh, mu an xapay makxkay'un k'atsayi li ntucha ma'ani katitsukulh, pus sawalhcha talh'amani ta'alhtajulh chi sawalhcha taxkayan!
Akxni la'ts'ilhcha an aya tsapulh li lakaat'uncha t'alhtamaj'okalh, ch'a'o'alhcha an t'aku an yu ixlit'ajun pumatam ixjas'at'a yu ts'alh.
Pero an t'aku xta'nikalh la'at'uy laj'ay ixpa'achuj ats'o'o, para li lay kajalht'ilitnij'alh tan wa jasa'nik'a tan ixla'oxinikanta li katawilh, tan kamawakana la'at'utu k'ata a paytat.
An aya tsapulh kilhtaxtumaka'alh xkani an tan alh an t'aku', para li an xkan kama'amuxtulh tacha tan ay xkan.
Pero an lakaat'un lhi'a'tayjulhi an t'aku', mu an lakaat'un ta'elh'a'mix'alh chi otlhi an xkan an yu kilhtaxtulh an aya tsapulh.

Wachuncha an t'aku sawalhcha ilhtulhi li katalh'amalhi an aya tsapulh; pus an aya tsapulh alhcha jat'alasana an ali'in yu yucha an t'aku tapu'a'p'unmintachalh; an yu takiklaka'iy an xlamap'a'sin an Dios, yu tach'a'o'ay sawalh tacha an najun an Jesús.
Sa'cha iktayalhi an laka kukuj an alamalh.

Walh ikla'ts'in takutlhi an alamalh la'atam ma'tili', la'atujun ix'a'tsulhi ixlhit'ajun chi ma'akaw ix'a'alo'ot, lakatamincha la x'a'alo'ot ix'a'tanuncha ixkorona chi lakatamincha la x'a'tsulh ixlakwilhnilhcha la'atamin ta'a'ut yu wa aya juniy an Dios.

Ani ma'tili yu ikla'ts'ilh wa tacha leopardojo ixtasuy, an ixlakch'aja wa tacha ixch'aja oso, chi an ixkilhni wa tacha ixkilhni lión. An aya tsapulh xta'nilhcha ix'alhp'asninti chi xputawlan yu kapuch'alhkatnana chi ay lhich'alhkat.
La'atam ix'a'tsulh an ma'tili wa tacha wa ixk'atsaninicha yu laycha kaxpunilh, pero an tan ixk'atsanini ta'oxinilh, pus sawalhcha lhi'a'nilhi chux an lakaamunulhpa chi ch'a'o'alhcha.

Ayi xtala'ts'in an aya tsapulh mu yucha yu xta'nilh lhich'alhkat an ma'tili', chi wachu ayi xtala'ts'in an ma'tili', ixtanajun: "¿Tisiyuchacha ixt'achun tacha aniy ma'tili chi tisiyuchacha lay kat'alasaya'a?"
Aniy ma'tili wachu makawnikalhi li kanawlhi laj'ay tanlhun yu ntu oxi chi li kaxkayaj junilhi an Dios, t'up'uxamt'uy (42) malhkuyu xta'nikalh lhich'alhkat.
Pus chunchacha ilhtulh, wa aya lhichiwinilhcha an Dios, chi wa aya lhilakajunilhcha an ixta'a'ut, chi an tan wilhchalh, chi wachu wa aya jalhichiwinilhcha an yu lakt'iyan tawilananchalh.

Wachu makawnipalakalhi li kajat'alasalhi an yu takiklaka'iy Dios sta li kajalhajalh. Chi xta'nikalh wachu lhich'alhkat ta kilhmakchux t'awkan, chi chux tan la'jalhi'aycha la'acha'anaxni chi ta kilhmakchux chiwinti alin, chi chux yu laj'aycha tukan lhich'alhkat.

Anchunu ma'tili ayi katala'ts'ina ixchuxk'an an yu tawilanalh an lakaat'un, yu an tu jats'o'ulanikanta ixta'a'utk'an an laka libro tan tasuy yu kaxta'nikana jatsukunti sta akxni ilhtukanchalhcha an lakaamunulhpa', ixlibro an Borrego yu ma'nikalh.
Li xamati lhit'ajun ixpa'asmatna, ka'asmatlhicha.
Li xamati kalhi'ankana laka pulach'in, laka pulach'ini ka'ana'. Li xamati kapuniya espada, espadaja kapuniya'. Anicha putasuy an xjakiklaka'intik'an an yu takiklaka'iy Dios, chi li talhitayanij.
Xli'astan kla'ts'impalh la'atam ma'tili yu tawk'achilh an lakaat'un, ma'at'uy ix'a'alo'oti ixlhit'ajun wa tacha ix'a'alo'ot borrego, pero wa tacha aya tsapulhi xchiwiniy.

Chi yucha ixlit'awni'ojoy chux an xlich'alhkat an p'ulhnaj ma'tili', chi x'ilhtuyi li an lakaat'un chi an yu ancha tawilanalh ayi katala'ts'ilh an yu p'ulhnaj ma'tili', an yu xk'uch'unikanta tan ixk'atsanini yu wa tacha laycha kaxpunilh.
Wachu ilhtuyi laj'ay tanlhun yu lhi'a'nin, yu ntu wa xamaticha lay ilhtuy, sta layi ma'alhtajuy jikmi an lakt'iyan lakaat'uncha maka'an, tan tala'ts'in an lapanakni.

Chi tacha an makawnikalhcha li layi kalak'ilhtulh an tanlhun yu ntu wa xamaticha lay lak'ilhtuy, la x'ukxlakapu an yu p'ulhnaj ma'tili, ja'o'xcho'olhcha an yu tawilanalh lakaat'un chi jalhijunilhcha li kata'ilhtunilh la'atam ixma'stele'e an ma'tili yu ixla'ajuntaka masi ixmak'atsanikantacha laka yu kikxtuy espada.

Ani yu xlila'at'uycha ma'tili makawnikalhi li layi kaxta'nilh jatsukunti an ixma'stele' an yu p'ulhnaj ma'tili', para li ani ma'stele' layi kachiwinilh chi ka'ilhtulhi li chuxi kajama'ni'okalh yu ntu ay katitala'ts'ilh.

Atumpaj, ilhtulhi li chux, lakt'ikt'in chi laj'ajin, chi jamatuminin chi jakilhpatinin, chi yu ntu wa japutapatsakancha chi yu wa japutapatsakancha, li kajaseyojlakalhi tan oxi ixmakak'an u la xmuntsank'an.

Walh lani chuncha ntucha lay xamati katijamawnalh chi katijast'analh, wa yu makseyojlakantacha u yu muntiseyojlakantacha, u yu lhit'ajuncha an ixta'a'ut an ma'tili', u yu lhit'ajun an xanumero an ixta'a'ut.
Aniy laka jatapast'ak'atcha kalhimacha'xakalh. Yu lhimacha'xay, wa kaput'e'enilhcha an ixnumero an ma'tili', mu wa ixnumerojcha lapanak: 666.

Xli'astan ijkalakawanalh ikla'ts'ilhcha an Borrego sa'cha ixyalh la x'ukxni an a'stitawk'a yu junkan Sión, ancha ixtat'ayanalh 144,000 lapanakni, ixtalakmuntiwilanalhcha an ixta'a'ut an Borrego chi ixta'a'ut an ixPay.

Wachuncha ik'asmat'a chiwinkalh an lakt'iyan wa tacha akxni p'ascha makat'ajun yu lhuw xkan chi wa tacha akxni yu p'ascha tukan t'asay xalapanak xkan, an chiwinti an yu ik'asmatlhi wa tacha wa akxni tan wanajcha xluwk'an tajasanan yu wa si la x'arpajk'an.

Chi xtalakmilhpaycha la'atam sast'i milhpat la xlakapu an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan chi la xlakapuk'an an xt'at'ink'an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta chi la xlakapuchak'an an tatanin. Jantu lay xamati lay xlaklaniy anchunu milhpat, wa yu'uncha an 144,000 lapanakni yu jama'alhtaxtukalh tacha ani wilhkanchilh aniy lakaat'un.

Aniy lapanakni yu'uncha yu ntu k'is tasmala'alh laka t'akunin, yu'uncha ntu k'is jat'atsukukalh sawalh. Yu'uncha wa tanchuncha an, an Borrego yu'uncha ancha tat'a'an. Yu'uncha jama'alhtaxtukalhi an tan tat'ajun ali'in lapanakni tachanu yu p'ulhnaj tukan lha'ulan para Dios, chi para an Borrego.
La xkilhnik'an yu'uncha jantu tu'u jala'cha'aninikalh maslakatinti, mu yu'uncha jantu tu'u jalhkilikilh wanaj.

Ikla'ts'impalh pumatam angelh yu xjalht'ilitnin xtan'ajni an lakt'iyan yu xli'anta an laj'oxi chiwinti yu ntu a'tam min'ojoy, para li kajalhixa'alalhcha an yu tawilanalh lakaat'un, chux la'acha'anaxni tan laj'ay, chi tan wa lakt'ikt'i la'acha'an tan wa si ta talalhila'ts'in chi ta tipachux chiwinti alin chi ta kilhmakchux lapanakni alin.

P'ascha ixnajun laka chiwinti: "K'at'alhamnit'iti an Dios, ayi k'ala'ts'int'it, mu an panch'e'ex chilhcha li kanawnacha tichini yu oxicha t'ajun chi yu jantu, ayi k'ala'ts'int'it an yu ilhtulh an lakt'iyan chi an lakaat'un chi yu ilhtulh an alamalh chi tan laktaxtuy an xkan".

Wachuncha talakasupalh pumatam angelh yu xlipumat'uycha taylhi'alh, najun: "¡Tat'ilhilhcha, tat'ilhilhcha an ay la'acha'an Babilonia, mu ja'ilhtulhi li chux an ay la'acha'anaxni kata'otlhi an k'uch'u yu wa aya pulay."

Chi an xlipumat'utucha angelh taylhi'alh najun laka p'as chiwinti: "Li xamati ay la'ts'in an ma'tili chi li ayi la'ts'in an ixma'stele', chi li lhitamakajuni li kamuntiseyojlakalh u kamakseyojlakalh la'iseyo an ma'tili,

yucha kama'alh'ajnana', tachanu ka'ot'a an ixtalh'amti Dios, yu puxte'ejukalh wanaj wa ixla'stu an la xakopaj ixtalh'amti chi kamama'alh'ajnikana laka jikmi chi laka azufre la x'ukxlakapuk'an an la'stalan'a angelhnin chi an Borrego.

Chi an xajin an ixma'alh'ajnatk'an ixpujun'alhincha katach'ixtayaya', tunku chi ts'isi jantu tajastaknani an yu ay tala'ts'in an ma'tili chi yu ay tala'ts'in an ixma'stele', chi yu tala'a'i li kajamuntiseyojlakalh u kajamakseyojlakalh an la ixta'a'ut."
Xliyu lhitask'ini li katalhitayanilhi an ixlapanakni Dios, yu tamuktaxtuy an xlamap'a'sin chi yu takiklaka'iy sawalh an Jesús.

Wachuncha ik'asmatlhi kixa'alakalh sta an lakt'iyan kijunkan: "K'ats'o'ulat'i: 'Oxi para yu'uncha yu chaway ati'anta taniy chi tat'atala'xto'ta an Jamach'alhkat Dios'." Chun, najuni an Takuwin, katajastaknanacha la xtapatsatk'an, chi mu oxi tatapatsalh aniy pus awint'i katala'a'iyanta yu laj'oxi.

Ijkalakawanalh ikla'ts'ilh la'atam sut'ut'u jataputs'i, chi la x'ukxni an jataputs'i sa'cha ixwilh pumatam wa tacha wa ists'alhcha lapanak, ix'a'tanun ixcorona de oro, chi ixch'apatacha ma'atam ixmachita yu kikxtuy.

Wachuncha an laka tajtan taxtupalachilh pumatam angelh, chi p'ascha xa'alay an yu sa' ixwilh laka jataputs'i, juniy: "K'a'ulanincha amimachita an jach'ananti chi k'amach'ixt'amit'icha an jach'ananti, mu an jach'ananti an lakaat'un k'at'alhcha, chi chilhcha ixpanch'e'ex."
Pus an yu ixwilh laka jataputs'i ulanilhcha an ixmachita an lakaat'un, chi lhi'alhcha an yu ixch'ankanta lakaat'un.
Wachuncha a'tam taxtupalachilh pumatam angelhi an laka tajtan yu yachalh an lakt'iyan, wachu ixch'apata ma'atam ixmachita yu kikxtuy.

Chi an laka tan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan taxtupalachilh pumatam angelh yu xa'angelh an jikmi chi p'ascha xa'alay an yu wachu ixch'apata ma'atam xmachita yu kikxtuy, juniy: "K'a'ulanincha amimachita an uva ch'i k'alakch'uk'up'uxt'icha an la xasiwik an uva yu alin an lakaat'un, mu lakchatacha."

An angelh ulanilhcha an xmachita an la ix'ukxni an lakaat'un chi lakch'uk'up'uxlicha an uva an la xasiwik yu alin an lakaat'un, chi xli'astan mujulhcha an laka ay xpupach'itkan uva, yu jumputun an ixtalh'amti Dios.
An uva pach'itkalhcha ma'spa an la'acha'an, chi an tan xmukanta an uva takutlhi jak'alhni, sta an la xfrenojk'an an kawayojnini tacha'aninilh, 300 kilómetrojo xlima'at cha'alh.

An lakt'iyan ikla'ts'impalh la'atam ay tuchichun chi lhi'a'nin: pumatujun angelhnin, yu'uncha xtalhit'ajun an tipatujun lhima'alh'ajna yu xati'astancha ka'alina', yu kapu'uktaxtuyacha an xtalh'amti Dios.

Chi ikla'ts'impalh wachu wa tacha la'atam alamalh de vidrio lhiyalh jikmi; anchacha ixtalakyanalh an la xpiktu ani alamalh de vidrio, an yu talhajalh an ma'tili chi an ixma'stele', chi an iseyo chi an xanumero xta'a'ut, xtalakch'apatacha an ix'arpa Dios.

Ixtalakmilhpaycha an xmilhpat Moisés yu t'atapatsay Dios chi an xmilhpat Borrego. Ixtalaknajun: Laj'ay chi la'lhi'a'nini an yu lak'ilhtuta an Jamach'alhkat Dios, yu lay chux lak'ilht'u'o'oy. Ts'awj chi sawalhi an yu lak'ilht'uyi xaJamach'alhkat ta kilhmakchux alin lapanak.

¿Tisiyuchacha jantu katitalhamnini, Jamach'alhkat? ¿Tisiyuchacha jantu oxi katilhichiwinini? Mu wa uxint'i yu stalan'ak'at'i. Chux an laj'ay la'acha'anaxni katamina chi ayi katala'ts'inan, mu t'ach'a an oxi sawalh ch'alhk'atnan tasuycha.
Ikla'ts'in'olh aniy, xli'astan ikla'ts'in tati'alhcha an tajtan an lakt'iyan tan ma'akanta an xlamapa's'in Dios yu ts'o'kanta.

Chi an laka tajtan tataxtuchilhcha an xpumatujunk'an angelhnin yu xtalhit'ajun an tipatujun lhima'alh'ajna. Ixtala'la'ch'itacha lajk'usi la'sut'ut'u la'ch'it chi wa la'slimjnik'acha, chi ixtalaktankilhakwilanalhcha isinturonk'an de oro.
Wachuncha xapumatam an xt'at'ink'an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta, jaxta'nilhcha la'atamin copa de orojo an ixpumatujunk'an angelhnin, ixlaj'a'tsamanta an ixtalh'amti Dios, yu xpujun'alhincha li t'ajun.

An laka tajtan wanaj a'tsamtanu'olh jin ixlakata an ixta'ayat Dios chi ixlakata an ix'alhp'asninti; chi ntu xamati lay ixtanuy an laka tajtan sta li akxni chunchacha katapasa'oya an tipatujun lhima'alh'ajna an yu talhit'ajun an xpumatujunk'an angelhnin.
Ik'asmatlhi p'asi chiwinkalh sta an laka tajtan, jajunkan an xpumatujunk'an angelhnin: "K'ap'inchi'it xte'emaj'anini an lakaat'un an ixtalh'amti Dios yu lakputajun an la'atujun copa."

An yu p'ulhnajcha alh an angelh puxte'elhcha an ixkopaj an lakaat'un, walh chux an lapanakni yu an ixjaseyojlata an ma'tili chi sawalhcha ixtalhiwilay an ixma'stele' wanaj talaklakaxaj'ochilh tacha ts'its'i yu wa stakcha laj'a'xtuy chi sawalhcha lakxkay.
An xlipumat'uycha angelh puxte'elhcha an ixkopaj an alamalh, walh an xkan wanaj tapalalh jak'alhni, tacha xjak'alhni lapanak yu wa ma'nikanta, chi wanaj tani'olhi an yu lakxkan ixtala'ajunta.
An xlipumat'utucha angelh puxte'elhcha an ixkopaj an laka lak'ayxkan chi an tan laktaxtuta xkan, walh wanaj jak'alhni jun'olh an xkan.
Wachuncha an xa'angelh lakxkan ik'alha'asmatlhi najun: Uxint'i Stalan'ak'at'i Dios, yu uxint'i chi yu uxint'i ix'unit'a, oxi t'ach'a an ilht'uy tacha chaway ani xt'a'a lhima'alh'ajna,
wa xliyu yu'uncha tamaj'anilhi xjak'alhnik'an an yu takiklaka'iyan yu la'stalan'an chi an yu ixtanajun minchiwinti, jama'ot'ut'icha wachu jak'alhni, mu tat'acha'an.

Ik'alha'asmatpalh wachu pumatam yu sta an laka tan ma'axta'kan lha'ulan ixnawnachalh: "Chun sawalhi Jamach'alhkat Dios, yu lay lak'ilht'u'o'oy chux tanlhun, an t'ach'a xt'a'a lhima'alh'ajna sawalh chi ts'awj."
An xlipumat'at'i angelh puxte'elhcha an ixkopaj an tan wilh an wilhchan, wachuncha an wilhchan makawnikalhcha li kajalaklakamichilhcha laka jikmi an lapanakni.
Pus an lapanakni talaklaka'ichilhcha an laka alhp'as lhi'ichi, walh masi chuncha jantu tamapaxalhi xjatapast'ak'atk'an. Apalij wa xkayaj tajunilhi an Dios masi yucha ch'alhkatnani ani lhima'alh'ajna.

An xlipumakisicha angelh puxte'elhcha an ixkopaj an la xputawlan yu puch'alhkatnan an ma'tili', walh wa chuncha an xlich'alhkat wanaj lakaaputs'isni tamakaw'olh chi an lapanakni tacha an ixtama'alh'ajnancha ixtapa'ats'icha an isima'atk'an.
Pero masi chuncha jantu tamakawlhi ta'ilhtuy yu ntu oxi, apalijcha wa aya xtajuniya an Dios yu wilhchalh lakt'iyan ixlakata li xtach'apatachalhcha ts'its'i yu laj'a'xtuy chi li xtama'alh'ajnancha.
An xlipumachaxan angelh puxte'elhcha an xkopaj an ayxkan tan junkan Éufrates, walh an xkan wanaj xixli, para li laycha katala'pusli an rejnin yu kataminanta tan lhi'akxajachilh an wilhchan.
Chi ikla'ts'in la xkilhni an aya tsapulh chi la xkilhni an ma'tili chi la xkilhnicha an yu ntu sawalh ixchiwinti Dios lhichiwiniy takilhtaxtulh la'atamin makxkay'un wa tacha ts'o'oto.

Yu'uncha ixtakuwink'an lakmakxkay'un, yu ta'ilhtuycha tanlhun yu la'lhi'a'nin yu ntu wa xamaticha lapanak lay ilhtuy, chi ta'ancha puxkawnini an rejnin an lakaat'un ta xlijalhi'ay an lakaamunulhpa', para li katama'ayxto'lhicha tan kalasakana akxni kachinacha an ay wilhchan yu ix'anu an Dios yu lay lak'ilhtu'ojoy chux.
K'a'asmatt'it, kit'in tacha ja'alhawna akmina'. Oxi para yucha yu s'alaj wilh chi ma'ata ixla'ch'it, para li ntu wa alhalha katsukulh chi ntu kala'ts'inikalhi ixmaxanti.
Wachuncha an lakmakxkay'un tama'ayxto'lhicha an rejnin an tan junkan lhihebreo Armagedón.
An xlipumatujuncha angelh puxte'elhcha an xkopaj an laka un, walh wachuncha p'asi chiwinkalh an laka tajtan an lakt'iyan, an tan wilh an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan, nawkan: "¡Ilhtu'okalhcha!"

Wachuncha tsukulhcha jamakalipnin, chi lakchiwinkancha chi tat'asaycha xalapanak xkan, chi p'ascha laklalh an lakaat'un, yu ntu a'tam chuncha laklata sta wa tawanancha t'ajun an lapanak aniy lakaat'un.

An ay la'acha'an puma'at'utu walh, chi an la'acha'anaxni an lakaamunulhpa laktalakt'ilhilh. Wachuncha an Dios pastaklhi an ay la'acha'an yu junkan Babilonia para li kama'ot'ulhcha an jamaskajanti xaxkan uva yu alhp'as ixtalh'amti an Dios.
Chux an lakaat'un yu la'la'atanchanu'ojota xkan chi an laj'a'stitawk'a jantucha inta k'is laktalakasucho'olh.

Chi an lakt'iyan patajuchalhcha laj'aya chaj'it ixjapat'alaycha an lapanakni, palay de kwarenta kilojo ixlaktats'ink'iy, an lapanakni stakcha xkayaj tajunilhi an Dios ixlakata li lhima'alh'ajnacha ix'ilhtuy an chaj'it, mu ay tukan lhima'alh'ajna sawalhi alilh.

Xapumatam an xpumatujunk'an angelhnin an yu xtalakch'apata la'atamin kopaj kila'milh chi kijuniy: "K'at'at'i akmasuniyani yu t'acha'an ixma'alh'ajnat an ay t'aku yu wa aya lay, yu sa' wilh an la x'ukxni lhuw lakxkan.
Yucha wa aya tat'alaycha an xarejnin aniy lakaat'un, chi an tawilanalh aniy lakaat'un talhila't'a'ap'alhcha tacha an wa aya lay an t'aku'.

Wachuncha an angelh kilhi'alhcha laka takuwin tan wa jasa'nik'a, ancha ikla'ts'in pumatam t'aku ixpu'uk'alh la'atam slapulh ma'tili', wa stakcha ixlakawilh ta'a'ut yu wa xkayaj juniy an Dios, chi la'atujun ix'a'tsulhi ixlhit'ajun chi ma'akawcha ix'a'alo'ot.

An t'aku xla'ch'ita xla'ch'it xmumu chi slapulh, chi wa stakcha ixlakamalht'ak'akanta laka oro, chi chiwx yu la'lhuw chi perlas, ixch'apata la'atam copa de oro, wa stakcha xpu'a'tsamanta tanlhun yu ntu k'is lhila'ts'imputu chi tanlhuncha yu ntu oxi ixlakata li wa aya xlay.
Chi xmuntits'o'ulakantacha la'atam ta'a'ut yu ntu xamati mispay: "An ay Babilonia, ixnatik'an an wa aya talay t'akunin chi chux an tanlhun yu ntu lhila'ts'imputu aniy lakaamunulhpa'".

An t'aku ikla'ts'in xlit'a'ap'atacha an ixjak'alhnik'an an ixlapanakni Dios chi an ixjak'alhnik'an an yu jalhima'nikalh ixlakata li oxi xtalhichiwiniy an Jesús. Akxni chunchacha iklats'ilh sawalhcha iklhi'a'nilh.
Chi an angelh kijuniy: "¿T'asu li lhi'a'niycha? Kit'in ajkunani tuchini jumputuncha an t'aku', chi an ma'tili an lhiminta yu lhit'ajun la'atujun ix'a'tsulh chi ma'akaw ix'a'alo'ot.

An ma'tili an yu la'ts'i, ixt'ajun, pero chaway jantucha, chi chaway ka'akxajcho'otachilhcha tan an t'awnachalh tan tu inta kimaktay xliputalhman chi ka'anacha tan kats'an'ayacha. Ali'in tawilanalhi lakaat'un yu ntu tu'u jats'o'muk'anikanta ixta'a'utk'an an laka libro tan tasuy yu kaxta'nikana jatsukunti, sta akxni ilhtukalhcha an lakaamunulhpa'. Yu'uncha katalhi'a'niya akxni katala'ts'ina an ma'tili yu ixt'ajun xlip'ulhnaj chi yu chaway tucha tu'u t'ajun, pero kaminpala'.
Aniy task'iniy jatapast'ak'at para li lay kalhimacha'xakalh: An la'atujun atsulh jumputun lakatujun a'stitawk'a tan tawlay an t'aku',

chi an la'atujun a'tsulh wachu nawputum xpumatujunk'an rejnin. Ixkisink'an ani rejnin tata'a'talhcha, pumatam yu yu'uncha ch'alhkatnant'ajun chi an pumatam tuka' min. Pero akxni kamina, jantu ma'ani katich'alhkatnalh.

An ma'tili yu ixt'ajun chi yu chaway tucha tu'u t'ajun yucha xlipumatsajinchak'an an rejnin; chi ani yu xlipumatsajinchak'an an rejnin wanajcha yu xapumatam an xpumatujunk'an an rejnin, chi kama'nikana'.
Ch'i an la'ts'i ma'akaw a'alo'ot, xpumakawk'an rejnin, yu ntuka' tala'a'iy lhich'alhkat, pero katala'a'iya lhich'alhkat tacha rejnin wa tam hora ali an ma'tili'.
Ani xpumakawk'an rejnin wa tami katak'atsaaya', chi katama'axta'niya an ix'alhp'asnint'ik'an chi an xlich'alhkatk'an an ma'tili'.

Katat'alasaya an jas'at'a Borrego, pero an jas'at'a Borrego kajalhajaya', mu yucha ixJamach'alhkatk'an jamach'alhkatni, chi ixRejk'an rejnin, chi an yu ancha tat'a'aklat'ajun yucha jat'asanita chi yucha jasakxtuta chi yu'uncha oxi tataylhi'anta."
An angelh kijumpalay: "An xkan an t'an la'ts'in wilh an t'aku, yu wa aya lay, yucha la'acha'anaxni, an tacha lakalhuw tawilanalh lapanakni chi ta kilhmakchux lapanakni yu tipaspit tachiwiniy.

Ch'i an la'ts'i ma'akaw a'alo'ot chi an ma'tili, yu'uncha kataxkaya an t'aku an yu wa aya lay, wa alhalhacha katamakawna chi wanaj katamakaw'oya'. Kata'uniyacha an xakanit chi katala'xawayacha laka jikmi,

mu an Dios ja'ilhtunilhi an la xjalhunutk'an li kata'ilhtulhcha yu ilhtuputulh an Dios: li wa tamcha katak'atsaalh chi kataxta'nilhcha an xlich'alhkatk'an an ma'tili', sta li chunchacha kalak'uktaxtu'olh an xchiwinti an Dios.
Chi an t'aku an yu la'ts'i yucha an ay la'acha'an yu jach'alhkatnaniy an xarejnin aniy lakaat'un."
Akxni chunchacha ikla'ts'in'olh xli'astan an lakt'iyan ta'alhtajupalh pumatam angelh, ay lhich'alhkati ixlhit'ajun, chi wanaj mapulhku'olhi an lakaat'un la xmakalip'at.

Chi p'ascha tukani chiwinilh, najun: ¡Ta'a'talhcha, ta'a'talhcha an ay Babilonia! Wa ixcha'achak'an lakmaxkay'uni chaway, chi wa taputats'e'acha chux tanlhun lakmakxkay'un chi wa xpamaj'anchak'an chux tanlhun lakmakxkay ts'o'on chi yu ntu jalhila'ts'imputu.

Mu chux an laj'ay la'acha'anaxni ta'otlhi an jamaskajanti xaxkan uva yu wa aya pulay, chi an rejnin yu aniy lakaat'un tat'ajun wa ayacha tat'aalalh, chi an tajast'anan aniy lakaat'un tapulhitsukulhcha ixtumink'an tacha an wa lhimo'slaycha lakmasuy yu lajkusi ixtanlhun an ay la'acha'an.

Ik'asmatpalh chiwimpalakalh an lakt'iyan, najun: Uxitnan yu kilapanakni, k'at'axt'ut'iti anchunu la'acha'an, para li nt'u k'ajat'a'ilht'ut'iti xtala'alhink'an chi ntu katala'cha'ani an ixma'alh'ajnatk'an,
mu an xtala'alhink'an sta an lakt'iyancha cha'alh chi an Dios japastaknilhcha tacha an wa tani talaycha.

Wanajcha chuni k'a'ilht'ut tacha ja'ilhtulh an ali'in, chi pu'a't'uyi k'amap'usp'itnit tacha an lak'ilhtulh an tanlhun. K'ala'oxinit jamaskajanti xaxkan uva yu a't'uy chuncha xli'alhp'as tacha an jala'oxinilh an ali'in.

K'a'ilht'ut'iti li kaxkanilh chi li kama'alh'ajnalh, tacha yucha stakcha lalhi li ay chi li sawalhcha lajk'usi tanlhuni lhit'ajun. Mu an la ixjalhunut najun: Aniy tacha reynaja ikwilh kit'in. Jantu wa ikjanimakawpulanticha t'aku', jantu aktima'alh'ajnalh.
Xliyu wanaj wa tam wilhchan kala'china tanlhun ixma'alh'ajnat: lhinin, alhut chi chawan, chi kala'xawakanacha laka jikmi, mu an Jamach'alhkat Dios yucha alhp'as chi yucha kama'niya'.

An xarejnin aniy lakaat'un yu wa aya tat'alalh an ay la'acha'an chi yu tat'alhitsukulhi tanlhun yu sawalhcha lajk'usi, katalhita'oxila'alhiyacha chi katalhilaj'alhunacha akxni katala'ts'inacha xajin li la'xawakancha.

Wa ma'atcha katatayayanta ixlakata li katatalhanajlaka'anacha tacha an kamama'alh'ajnikana', chi katanawna: Paynicha, paynicha an ay la'acha'an Babilonia, yu k'ut'ilh la'acha'an, mu wanaj wa puwalasi chilh mima'alh'ajnat!
An yu tajast'anan aniy lakaat'un wachu katalhila'ta'oxila'alhiya chi katalhilaj'alhuna anchunu la'acha'an, mu ntucha xamati katijatamawnilh xlist'atk'an:

lhist'at tacha oro chi plata chi yu la'lhuw xtapalh chiwx chi perlas chi la'ch'it yu laj'oxi yu de lino chi de seda, yu xmumu chi slapulh; chi ta tipachux yu lhaklhij akamin jalakch'uk'unti k'iw chi tanlhuncha yu de marfil la'oxikanta chi tanlhuncha yu de laj'oxi k'iw ilhtukanta chi yu de bronce chi yu de tsasnat chi yu de mármol,

wachu an canela chi tanlhuncha lhala'oxin yu lak'akamin; chi cencia chi perjume chi tanlhuncha alhch'ajat chi jamaskajanti xaxkan uva chi aceite chi yu sawalhcha oxi harina chi trigo; chi jatapakxatcha yu tamak'uk'anan chi borregojcha chi kawayo chi carreta sta lapanakni yu wa japutapatsakancha.
Chi an la'acha'an katajuna: ¡Jant'uch'a t'u'u lhit'a'un an yu sawalhch'a ixlaj'ach'aniy lajkan jatawk'at, ixpujun'alhinch'a ma'ats'an'at'i chux, an lajk'usi mintanlhun chi amin tumin!

An yu yucha ixtalakst'ay aniy tanlhun chi an yu tapulhitsukulhcha xtumink'an an ay la'acha'an, wa ma'atcha katatayayanta, mu katatalhamniyacha an ixma'alh'ajnat an ay la'acha'an, katala'ta'oxila'alhiyacha chi katalaj'alhunacha,
chi katanawna: ¡Paynicha, paynicha an ay la'acha'an! oxi linojo ixmala'ch'ininta, an ixla'ch'it xmumu chi slapulhi ixjunita, xlakamalht'ak'akantacha laka oro chi perla chi yu la'lhuw tapalay chiwx.

¡Walh chi wanaj wa puwalasi la'mix'olh ani lajk'usi lhuw tanlhun! Ixchuxk'an an xakapitanin an barco chi ixchuxk'an yu tama'pu'an an barco, yu inta tita'an chi an marinerojnin chi ixchuxk'an yu ancha tamakutuy an alamalh yu taput'ajuncha, wa ma'atcha tatayachalh,
chi akxni tala'ts'incha an xajin tacha an la'xajuy an ay la'acha'an, talakt'asalhcha tanajun: Jantu a'tam alinta la'acha'an yu sawalh alhp'asni tacha an Babilonia.

Chi talak'uktawk'alhcha po'xmi mu ixtala'ta'oxila'alhicha chi xtalaj'alhuncha chi talakt'asalhcha, ixtalaknajun: ¡Paynicha, paynicha an ay la'acha'an! Ixchuxk'an an yu xtalaklhit'ajun xbarkojk'an an alamalh ixtapulhit'ajuncha xtumink'an an laka laktanlhun yu laj'oxi ixlhit'ajun an la'acha'an. ¡Walh chi wanaj wa tam pants'ik'isi lakt'ilhikalh!

Uxint'i lakt'iyan k'a'ach'acha ixlakata anchunu la'acha'an, chi uxitnan yu k'iklak'a'iyat an Dios chi uxitnan yu an Dios tamala'achan li k'alhich'iwinint an xchiwinti, k'alaj'ach'ant'itcha, mu an Dios li xta'nilhcha lhima'alh'ajna an la'acha'an wa xliyu ta'asmatnincha uxitnan li wa xtalhitama'chapuyan.

Wachuncha pumatam angelh yu k'ut'ilh ch'ixsaklhi la'atam aya chiwx, wa tacha wa la'atamcha ay xachiwx palakskitin chi warrarracha maka'alh an alamalh, najun: Wanajcha chuni jant'u k'at'ilhima'la'ach'ip'ink'a k'alakt'ilhik'ana'a ay la'acha'an Babilonia, ch'i nt'uch'a a't'am k'at'ila'ts'inch'o'ok'a.

Jantucha a'tam kati'asmatcho'okalhi la mincalle jasanti laka arpaj chi laka sp'ililh s'olh chi laka kikst'ililh s'olh chi ntucha tu'u katitawalh tapatsanin yu tu'u tapatsat tala'taxtuni chi ntucha kati'asmatkalhi katimakat'awlh an chiwx yu palakskitininkan.

Jantucha a'tam katitapulhkulhi la'atam maklhku ani la'acha'an chi ntucha kati'asmatkalhi katilakchiwinkalh tan la'tama'xto'kan. Mu an milapanakni yu xtajast'anan yu'unchacha yu laj'alhp'asni xtajunita an lakaat'un ch'i ja'o'xch'o'o chux an laj'ay la'acha'anaxni la mijachawanti.
Aniy la'acha'ani la'cha'ankalh xjak'alhnik'an an yu xtalhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios chi an yu ixlapanakni Dios chi ixchuxk'ancha an yu jama'nikanta aniy lakaat'un.
Xli'astan ik'asmatlhicha lhilhuw tukani xlakchiwinkan an lakt'iyan chi p'as, ixlaknawkan: ¡Aleluya! an ta'alhtaxtut chi an ta'ayat chi an lhich'alhkat ixnawin an kiDiosk'an,

mu yucha ts'ajwi xta'niy lhima'alh'ajna yu t'acha'an; chi xta'nilhcha ixma'alh'ajnat an ay t'aku yu wa aya lay, an lakaamunulhpa lakt'ilhilhi an t'aku wa xliyu wa aya lay. An Dios lhich'ilhcha an t'aku li xjama'ninita an yu tat'atapatsay.
Chi a'tam laknawpalakalh: ¡Aleluya! An xajin an t'aku xpujun'alhincha katach'ixtayaya'.

Wachuncha an xpumap'uxamt'at'ik'an tatanin chi an xt'at'ink'an tuchichun yu tala'ajunta tatatso'ottanilhcha chi tatamuntitanichalhcha lakaat'uni an Dios yu sa' ixwilh la xputawlan tan ch'alhkatnan. Chi ixtanajun: "¡Amén! ¡Aleluya!"

Chi sta an tan wilh putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan chiwinkalh nawkan: ¡Chux uxitnan lakt'ikt'in chi laj'ajin ch'i yu t'ap'ats'aniyat an Dios ch'i yu k'iklak'a'iyat, yucha an kiDiosk'ani ay k'ala'ts'int'it!

Ik'asmatpalh wachu wa tacha wa tan wanajcha lhilhuw lakchiwinkan, tacha makat'ajun tan lhuw tukan samama xt'ajyalh xkan chi tacha p'as t'asay xalapanak xkan, ixnawkan: ¡Aleluya! Mu an Jamach'alhkat yu kiDiosk'an yu lay ilhtu'ojoy chux, yucha ch'alhkatnan.
Kalaj'achawcha, oxicha kalajk'atsaw chi ayi kala'ts'iw, mu chilhcha panch'e'ex li katama'xt'o'acha an Borrego. An ixli'it la'asijtacha
makawnikalhcha li kala'ch'ilhcha ixla'ch'it yu k'usi tukan yu sut'ut'u chi xlimjnik'a, mu anchunu k'usi la'ch'it yucha jumputun an tacha ts'awj ixtat'ajun an ixlapanakni Dios.
An angelh kijunilh: "K'ats'o'muk'a: Sawalhcha oxi para yu'uncha an yu jajunkan li kata'alh ma'waynin tan tama'xt'o'a an Borrego." Chi nawpalay: "Aniy chiwinti sawalh, yucha ixchiwinti an Dios."

Iktatso'ottanilhi la ixjach'aja an angelh para li ayi akla'ts'ilh. Yucha kijuniy: "Jant'u ch'uni k'alat'i, kit'in wa ikt'atapatsaycha an Dios, tacha uxint'i chi tacha an mijat'ala'awnin yu xlisawalh tataylhi'an an tacha najun an Jesús. Yucha an Diosi yu ay k'ala'ts'i. Mu tacha an najun an Jesús yu sawalh yucha yu jamachiwiniy an lapanakni yu tanajun an ixchiwinti Dios."
An lakt'iyan ikla'ts'in lhti'ay chi ancha talakasulh la'atam sut'ut'u kawayo, an yu ixpu'uk'alh ixjunkan: Yu Sawalh chi yu Muktaxtuy yu najun, mu yucha ts'ajwi ixch'alhkatnan chi ilhtuycha lasat.
An ixla'chulh wa tacha akxni an lam lamcha an jikmi ixtasuy, chi an la x'a'tsulh lhuw koronaja ix'ukwilh chi ixmuntits'o'ulakantacha la'atam ta'a'ut yu wa yucha mispay.
An ixla'ch'it wa stakcha xlipaxta jak'alhni chi an ixta'a'ut ixjunkan: IXCHIWINTI DIOS.
An lhuw xasoldadojnin lakt'iyan ixtach'a'o'aycha laka la'sut'ut'u ixkawayojk'an chi ixtala'mala'ch'inintacha laka yu k'usi tukan la'ch'it, la'sut'ut'u chi ntu la'smala'a.

An la xkilhni xkilhtaxtuy makat'ikt'i yu kikxtuy espada, yu kajapumak'atsaniyacha an laj'ay la'acha'anaxni, chi yuchacha kajach'alhkatnaniya laka ma'atam tsasnat; chi yucha kapach'it'a la xch'aja an uva para li kataxtunilhcha xaxkan yu nawputun ixtalh'amti Dios, Dios yu lay ilhtu'ojoy chux.
An la xla'ch'it chi an la x'atu chunchunicha ists'o'ta: ixRejk'an rejnin chi ixJamach'alhkatk'an jamach'alhkatni.

Chi ikla'ts'ilhcha pumatam angelh yu sa' ixyalh an laka wilhchan, p'ascha jaxa'alalh chux an ts'o'on yu talakjalht'ilitnin an lakt'iyan, jajuniy: "¡K'at'at'itcha chi k'at'a'ayxt'o't'itcha an laka ay ixwayt an Dios,

para li k'a'ut'itcha ixjakanitk'an rejnin chi xalaj'ajin soldadojnin chi xakanitk'an yu laj'alhp'asnin lapanakni chi xakanitk'an kawayojnin chi yu taputawk'ay, chi xakanitk'an ta kilhmakchux lapanakni, yu ntu xamati xputapatsay, chi yu wa xputapatsakancha, chi yu xtalhitapalay lapanakni chi yu jantu."
Wachuncha ikla'ts'in an ma'tili chi an xarejnincha an lakaat'un chi an ixsoldadojninchak'an ixta'ayxto'nuncha para li katat'alasayacha an yu ixpu'uk'alh kawayo chi an ixsoldadojnin.

Walh an ma'tili ch'apayawkalhcha chi wachu an yu ntu sawalh ixchiwinti Dios xlichiwiniy. Yucha ix'ilhtuta la ix'ukxlakapu an ma'tili tanlhun yu ntu wa xamaticha lapanak lay ilhtuy, yu japulaj'o'xcho'olhcha an yu tala'a'ilh an iseyo an ma'tili chi yu ay talhiwilalh an chiwx yu tacha an ma'tilicha ix'ilhtukanta. Ani xt'uyunk'an warrj warrjcha jat'alhtamaj'okalh xtak'atsank'an tan wa mililicha lay jikmi laka azufre.
Chi an ali'in jala'ma'nik'alhcha an laka espada an yu ixkilhtaxtuy yu ixpu'uk'alh kawayo, chi chux an ts'o'on talhi'o'atsalhcha an ixjakanitk'an an yu jala'ma'nikalh.
Ikla'ts'ilh pumatam angelh yu xta'alhtajut'ajun an lakt'iyan, ixlimintacha an xayavej an tan tu inta kimaktay xliputalhman, chi xch'apatacha ma'atam lhman cadena.
Ani angelh ch'apayawlhcha an aya tsapulh, an ma'aniya tsapulh, yu jumpalhkan xapay makxkay'un u satanás. Chi la'ach'ilhcha tam milh k'ata,

chi warrarracha maka'alh an tan tu inta kimaktay xliputalhman. Chi malaklhchawnilhcha chi oxicha o'slamnilh para li ntucha ali kajalaj'o'xcho'olhi an ta kilhmakchux ta'alin lapanakni, sta li kacha'alhcha milh k'ata. Akxni kacha'anacha milh k'ata ka x'otpalhkana lakats'uni panche'ex.

Ikla'ts'impalh la'alhuw putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan, anchacha talaktawilh yu jaxta'nikalh lhich'alhkat. Chi wachu ijkala'ts'ilh an ixtakuwink'an an yu jalhilaj'a'cha'xkalh ixlakata an ixchiwinti an Jesús chi an ixchiwinti Dios, an yu ntu ay tala'ts'ilh an ma'tili chi an chiwx an yu tacha an ma'tilicha x'ilhtukanta, chi yu ntu talhitamakawlh li kajaseyojlakalh la xmuntsank'an u la xmakak'an, yu'uncha tala'awcho'olh chi tat'ach'alhkatnalhcha tam milh k'ata an Cristo.
Aniy yucha yu p'ulhnajcha la'awcho'ot. Pero an ali'in janinin jantuka' tala'awcho'olh sta akxni cha'alhcha tam milh k'ata.

Sawalhcha oxi para yu'uncha an yu p'ulhnajcha tala'awcho'olh chi la'stalan'an. An xlila'at'uycha lhinin jantu lay ta katija'ilhtulh, yu'uncha isacerdotejnincha an Diosi katajuna chi isacerdotejnincha an Cristo, yuchacha katat'ach'alhkatnana tam milh k'ata.
Akxni kacha'anacha tam milh k'ata, an satanás kamakawcho'okanacha tan ixlaklhchajuy,

chi ka'anacha jalaj'o'xcho'onuw ta kilhmakchux an lapanakni yu ta'alin ta xlijalhi'ay an lakaat'un, an Gog chi an Magog, lhuw tukani kajama'ayxt'o'a', tacha an malh kukuj an alamalh, kajalhi'anacha tan katalasaya'.

Pus tatawk'achilhcha ta xlila'apu'ay an lakaat'un, chi tala'atanchanulhcha an tan talakyajuta ixmulht'a'ak'an an ixlapanakni Dios chi an la'acha'an yu mapayni an Dios, pero an Dios makminchalh jikmi an lakt'iyan chi wanaj jala'xawa'olh.

Wachuncha an xapay makxkay'un an yu xjalaj'o'xcho'oy t'alhtamaj'okalhcha tan milili aklatajun la'stu jikmi chi azufre, tan an wachu jamujukalh an ma'tili chi an yu ntu sawalh ixchiwinti Dios xlichiwiniy. Ancha kastakcha jala'mama'alh'ajnikana ts'isi chi tunku, ixpujun'alhincha kajuna'.
Ikla'ts'ilh la'atam ay sut'ut'u putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan chi an yu ixpuwilh, la x'ukxlakapu ta'osli an lakaat'un chi an lakt'iyan chi ntucha k'is inta jala'ts'incho'okalh.

Chi ijkala'ts'ilh an janinin, laj'ajin chi lakt'ikt'in, an la x'ukxlakapucha Diosi ixtalakyanalh, chi an libro jala'pux'otkalhcha, walh a'tam a'xtam libro pux'otpalakalh, yucha an librojcha tan tasuy yu kaxta'nikana jatsukunti, wachuncha tsukulhcha jajunkani an janinin atamj atamj tani yu xtat'ajuncha, oxi u jantu, an laka librojcha ists'o'muk'akanta tuchini xta'ilhtutacha.

An alamalh jama'axta'lhicha an janinin yu ancha xtatajumanalh, chi an lhinin chi an la'nin wachucha tama'axta'lhi an janinin yu ancha xtalhit'ajun, chi atamj tamincha jajunikalh tuchini yu xta'ilhtutacha akxni ixtat'ajun, oxi u jantu.
Wachuncha an lhinin chi an la'nin warrarracha jamaka'ankalhi an tan milili aklawilh la'stu jikmi. Yucha anicha yu xlipu'a't'uycha lhinin.
Yu ntu la'cha'ankalhi ixta'a'ut an laka libro tan tasuy yu kaxta'nikana jatsukunti warrarracha maka'ankalh an tan milili aklawilh jikmi.

Ikla'ts'ilh la'atam sast'i lakt'iyan chi la'atamcha sast'i lakaat'un, mu an yu p'ulhnajcha lakt'iyan ixjunita chi an p'ulhnajcha lakaat'un ixjunita jantucha tu'u xtajunita, chi an alamalh wachucha ntucha tu'u ixjunita.

Chi kit'in Juan, ikla'ts'ilhi an stalan'a la'acha'an, an sast'icha la'acha'an Jerusalén, tan wilhchalh an Diosi minchalh, ixla'asijtacha tacha pumatam jatsi yu katama'xt'o'acha, oxicha ixmala'ch'ininta ixlakata an ixli'it.
Walh ik'asmatlhi p'asi chiwinkalh an lakt'iyan, nawkan: "Aniycha jat'awilh an Dios an ixlapanakni, chi yu'uncha ixlapanaknicha katajuna', chi an Dios kajat'a'aklatsukuyacha an lapanakni mu xDiosk'an.

An Dios yuchacha kajalaklakpuxakamaj'ana chux ix'alhutk'an la ixla'chulhk'an, chi ntucha kati'alilhi lhinin, chi alhut, chi ta'oxila'alhit, chi ma'alh'ajnat, mu an yu p'ulhnajcha ixlak'alin tapasalhcha."

An yu sa' ixwilh laka putawlan yu puch'alhkatnankan najun: "Kit'in sast'icha chux iklak'ilhtucho'oy." Chi kijuniy: "K'ats'o'muk'a: mu aniy chiwinti yucha ka'uktaxtuya sawalh chi t'acha'ani li kakiklaka'ikalh."
Chi kijumpalay: "Chaway la'olhcha. Kit'in ik'Alfa chi ik'Omega, yu pu'a'tayni chi yu pu'ukla'ojoy. Yu kikxixa, kit'ini akxta'niya xkan an tan taxtuta, yu xt'a'a jatsukunti, chi ntu tu'u aktich'ilh.
Yu kalhajayanta chuxi kala'a'iya', chi kit'in xDiosi ajkuna chi yucha kijas'at'a kajuna'.

Pero an yu wa sawalhcha talaktalhanan chi an tu tajakiklaka'inin, chi an yu ntu k'is jalhila'ts'imputu chi an yu wa tajama'ninin, chi an yu tat'amay yu ntu tat'at'ajun, chi an yu tajachawanan, chi an yu tacha xdioschak'an tala'ts'in wa tanlhuncha, chi ixchuxk'an an maslakatinin, yu'uncha kata'ana an tan milili ma'taywilh jikmi chi azufre, yu xlipu'a't'uycha lhinin."

Wachuncha stalh kila'milh xapumatam an xpumatujunk'an angelhnin an yu xtalhit'ajun la'atujun copa yu xlaj'a'tsamanta yu astancha kamina lhima'alh'ajna, kijuniy: "K'at'at'i akmasuniyani an xli'it an jas'at'a Borrego, an ixt'iwi an jas'at'a Borrego."
Chi an Takuwin kilhi'alhcha lakatam tan talhman chi ay a'stitawk'a chi kimasunilhcha an stalan'a ay la'acha'an Jerusalén, an tan wilhchalh Diosi minchalh an la'acha'an, ta'alhtajulhcha.
An la'acha'an wa xlimjcha xputapulhkuyi an ixmakalip'at an Dios. Tacha an xmakalip'a wa tacha wa la'atamcha chiwx yu k'usi, tacha la'atam jaspe yu pax'a'ay tacha an vidrio.

Ixtuntala'acho'o an la'acha'an ix'axi'okanta, ayi ixjunita an axi chi talhman, la'akawt'uy xamalhticha ixlhit'ajun chi lakatamincha la xamalhticha xyalh pumatam angelh chi an laka lakmalhticha ixla'ts'o'ulakantacha ixta'a'utk'an an kilhmakkawt'uy ists'alan an Israel.
La'at'utu malhticha lhitan akxajachilh wilhchani xtalhitamakajun, chi la'at'utu lhi'alhma'ast'ay, chi la'at'utu lhitalaktsin, chi la'at'utu lhitan ta'aknuyachalh wilhchan.

An axi yu xla'acho'o'ojoy an la'acha'an, yu xpuch'atay la'akawt'uy cimiento, chi lakatamincha laka cimiento ists'o'ulakantacha ixta'a'utk'an an xpumakawt'uyk'an yu xjamala'achay para li kata'alh lhichiwinin an ixchiwinti Dios an jas'at'a Borrego.
An angelh an yu xakint'achiwiniy ixch'apata ma'atam palhkan de oro, yu kapulhkayacha an la'acha'an chi an xalakmalhticha chi an axi.
An la'acha'an wa lht'at'ijnik'a ixjunita, xlilhman chi xlipu'ay wa tam. An angelh lhkalhcha an la'acha'an an la xpalhkan, doce mil estadiosi ixlhit'ajun : xlilhman chi xlitalhman chi xlipu'ay wa tam.
Wachuncha lhkalhcha an axi: ka tacha 144 ma'stumpa'a ixlhit'ajun, tacha yu palaklhkanan lapanaki xpulaklhkat'ajun an angelh.
An axi de jaspeje xli'ilhtukanta, chi an la'acha'an la'stu yu de oro sawalh, wa tacha an vidriojcha yu oxi sp'uyulakanta.

An xlakjach'aja an axi an la'acha'an xlilakmalht'ak'akantacha ta tipachux yu lajk'usi chiwx, an yu p'ulhnajcha xjach'aja xlimalht'ak'anikantacha laka jaspe, an xlitach'ant'uycha laka zafiro, an xlitach'ant'utu laka ágata, an xlitach'ant'ati laka esmeralda,

an xlitach'ankisi laka ónice, an xlitach'anchaxan laka rubí, an xlitach'antujun laka crisólito, an xlitach'antsajin laka berilo, an xlitach'annajatsi laka topacio, an xlitach'ankaw laka crisoprasa, an xlitach'ankawtam laka jacinto chi an xlitach'ankawt'uy laka amatisa.
An la'akawt'uy malhticha la'akawt'uy perlas, la'atamincha malhticha wa la'atamin perlaja xli'ilhtukanta. Chi an tij yu an la'acha'an lakmalh de oro, yu la'stu oro sawalh, pax'a'ay tacha an vidrio.
An la'acha'an jantu tu'u ikla'ts'ilh tajtan, mu yu ixtajtan an la'acha'an yucha an Jamach'alhkat Dios yu lay ilhtu'ojoy chux tanlhun, chi an jas'at'a Borrego.
An la'acha'an jantu ma'lhtask'iniy wilhchan chi malhkuyu para li katamapulhkulh, mu yucha an tacha xlimjcha pulhkuy an Diosi mapulhkuy, chi an jas'at'a Borrego yuchacha ixpumaklhku an la'acha'an.
Chi an laj'ay la'acha'anaxni yu katata'alhtaxtuya an la xjatapulhkunucha an la'acha'ani katatsukuya', chi an xarejnin lakaat'un katalhi'aniyacha tanlhun yu laj'oxi.
An xalakmalhticha jantu a'tam katilakmalaklhchawkalhi tunku, chi ancha ntu a'tam katitats'isilh.
Katalaklhi'aniyacha an la'acha'an tanlhun yu laj'oxi talaklhit'ajun ta kilhmakchux an lapanakni.

Pero jantu a'tam katitanuchalhi tu'u yu ntu oxi, chi xamati yu wa tanlhuncha ilhtuy yu ntu lhila'ts'imputu u maslakatinti. Yu katatanutachalh wa yu'uncha an yu jats'o'muk'anikanta xta'a'utk'an an laka libro tan tasuy yu kaxta'nikana jatsukunti la xlibro an jas'at'a Borrego.

Xli'astan an angelh kimasunilhcha la'atam yu ntu smala'a ayxkan, lhi'anta xkan yu xt'a'a jatsukunti, wa stalan'acha, an la xputawlank'an yu tapuch'alhkatnan an Dios chi an jas'at'a Borregojo ixajtachilh.

An xtan'ajnicha an la xatij an la'acha'ani ixjats'alay. Tapiktutamin an ayxkan anchacha ixyalh an k'iw yu xt'a'a jatsukunti, tamin malhkuyu xt'a'a xjatawk'at, a'kawt'uyi xt'a'a xjatawk'at tam k'ata. An xax'oy an k'iw yucha para li katalhitak'uch'ulhcha ta kilhmakchux ta'alin an lapanakni.
Ancha jantucha tu'u kati'alilh yu ntu oxi, an putawlan yu puch'alhkatnan an Dios chi an jas'at'a Borrego an la'acha'ancha katawla', chi an yu tat'atapatsay an Dios ayi katala'ts'ina',
katat'ala'ukxpula'ts'inacha an Dios chi an xta'a'ut an Dios katalakmuntitawlacha.

Ancha jantu katitats'isilh, yu ancha katatawla jantu katitama'lhtask'inilhi xajatapulhkunu pumaklhku u li kamaputunkulh an wilhchan, mu an Jamach'alhkat Dios yucha kajamapulhkuniya', chi xpujun'alhincha katach'alhkatnana'.

An angelh kijuniy: "Aniy chiwinti sawalh chi ka'uktaxtuya sawalh. An Jamach'alhkat, an Dios, yu jamachiwiniy an yu tanajun ixchiwinti Dios yu katapasaya, mala'achachalhi an ix'angelh para li kajamasunilhi an yu tat'atapatsay tuchini yu katapasayacha watukan."
"¡Kit'in watukan akmina'! ¡Sawalhcha oxi para yucha yu kiklaka'iy an chiwinti yu puwilh aniy libro tani katapasayacha!"

Kit'in ikJuan kit'ini ik'asmatlhi chi ikla'ts'ilh aniy tanlhun. Chi xli'astan akxni chunchacha ik'asmatlhi chi akxni chunchacha ikla'ts'ilh, iktatso'ottanilhcha la xjach'aja an angelh an yu kilakmasunilh an tanlhun, para li ayi akla'ts'ilh.

Pero yucha kijuniy: "Jant'u ch'uni k'alat'i, mu kit'in wa ikt'atapatsaycha an Dios, tacha uxint'i chi tacha an mijat'ala'awnin an yu talhichiwiniy ixchiwinti Dios, chi tacha ixchuxk'an an yu takiklaka'iy tacha an ts'o'muk'akanta chiwinti aniy laka libro. Yu ay k'ala'ts'i yucha an Dios."
Chi kijumpalay: "Jant'u wa sa'ch'a k'ama'at'i aniy chiwinti yu katapasaya', yu ts'o'muk'akanta aniy laka libro, mu an panch'e'ex wa niycha t'ajun.

An yu wa ay junita, kachajcha ali ilhtulhi yu ntu oxi, chi yu ntu stalan'a kachajcha ali lhkilikilh, chi yu oxi lapanak kachajcha ali ilhtulhi yu oxi tanlhun, chi yu stalan'a kachajcha ali stalan'alh."
"K'alhak'ap'up'it'it, kit'in wa tukan akmina', chi aklhiminacha yu akxta'niya atamj atamj ixlakata tuchini yu ilhtulhcha.
Kit'in ik'Alfa chi ik'Omega, yu p'ulhnaj chi astan, yu pu'a'tayniy chi yu pu'ukla'ojoy."
Oxi para yu'uncha an yu tama'paja xla'ch'itk'an para li lay kata'unilh xajatawk'at an k'iw yu xt'a'a jatsukunti chi para li lay kataputanuchalh an la xalakmalhticha an la'acha'an.

Pero an x'oyun yu'uncha ma'spa katatsukuya', chi an jachawanan, chi an yu tat'atamay yu ntu tat'at'ajun, chi an jama'ninin, chi an yu tacha xdioschak'an tala'ts'in wa tanlhuncha chi chux lapanak yu achani chi ilhtuy maslakatinti.

"Kit'in ikJesús ikmala'achachalhi an ki'angelh para li kajamak'atsaanilhi aniy tanlhun an tacha tala'ta'ayxt'o'a an yu kintakiklaka'iy. Kit'in xjataxiyak chi ikpu'a'p'unminchalh an David, kit'in ikst'aku yu xlimj mapulhkuy akxni tunkunmintacha."

An Stalan'a Takuwin chi an ixli'it an jas'at'a Borrego tanajun: "¡K'at'at'icha!" Chi yu asmat'a wachu kanawlh, "¡K'at'at'icha!" Chi yu kikxixa kamilh chi yu lakask'in ka'otlhicha an xkan yu xt'a'a jatsukunti, jantu tu'u katimapalalh.

Ixchuxk'an yu ta'asmat'a aniy chiwinti yu katapasaya, yu ts'o'muk'akanta aniy laka libro, chunchuniya ijkajuniy: Li xamati yu wa lhimo'slaycha tacha aniy laknajunta aniy tanlhun, an Dios kala'xta'niya lhima'alh'ajna tacha an la'ts'o'muk'akanta aniy laka libro.

Chi li xamati yu wa ma'osuniy an chiwinti yu puwilh aniy libro, yu katapasaya, an Dios kama'osuniya yu xla'a'ilh tacha najunta an laka libro tan tasuy yu kaxta'nikana jatsukunti, chi jantu katila'a'ilhi an la'acha'an yu stalan'a chi an tanlhuncha yu aniy laka libro ts'o'muk'akanta.
An yu laklhichiwiniy aniy tanlhun, najun: "Chun, watukan akmina'." Chunchacha kawalh. ¡K'at'at'icha Jamach'alhkat Jesús!
An ixjamapayninti an kiJamach'alhkatk'an Jesús minchuxchak'ani kataxta'nin. Chunchacha kawalh.
